T02D1347-2:4b-31: bum pa la sogs pa bzhin du ma yin te /
T02D1347-2:4b-32: myos byed ni rnal 'byor gyi dbang po rnams la thar pa ster bar byed par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:4b-33: de bzhin du kha zas byed pa ni 'dir kha zas thams cad bde ba'i don te /
T02D1347-2:4b-34: gang cung zad kha zas byed pa de thams cad shin tu chung ba bde bar 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:4b-35: de'i phyir nyin zhag so so'i dus su ma zhu
T02D1347-2:4b-36: ba'i rgyur mi bya'o zhes pa ni kha zas kyi
T02D1347-2:4b-37: nges pa'o // dpal ldan spyod pa ste rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:4b-38: spyod pa dngos grub rgyur zhes pa dngos grub kyi
T02D1347-2:4b-39: nges pa'o // rgyur te / de'i phyir mtshan mo
T02D1347-2:4b-40: dur khrod gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs par
T02D1347-2:5a-1: pa dag rtsed mo'i don du ni ma yin no
T02D1347-2:5a-3: rnal 'byor gyi spyod pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5a-4: da ni kun spangs kyi rnal 'byor pa'i sman gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:5a-5: 'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa'i kha na bar gyur na /
T02D1347-2:5a-6: de'i tshe mi bskyed pa cung zad dro bar byas
T02D1347-2:5a-7: te khar bzung na kha'i nad zhi bar byed par
T02D1347-2:5a-8: 'gyur ro // so yi zug rdu nyid kyi yang
T02D1347-2:5a-9: zhes pa ste yang yig las so srin gyi yang
T02D1347-2:5a-10: 'gyur ro // ngo // gang gi tshe mgo bo na gyur na /
T02D1347-2:5a-11: de'i tshe tho rangs mi bskyod pa rngub pa byas
T02D1347-2:5a-12: na rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi mgo yi nad 'phrog
T02D1347-2:5a-13: ste de bzhin nyid du chu ni rngubs pas so
T02D1347-2:5a-14: // gang gi tshe rna ba na bar gyur pa
T02D1347-2:5a-15: de'i tshe gcin dro bar byas pa rna bar rab
T02D1347-2:5a-17: mig gi nad la grang mor byas pa mig tu
T02D1347-2:5a-18: rab tu blugs pas grangs bzhin du gnyis ka'i nad
T02D1347-2:5a-19: 'phrog ste gcin ni dro dang grang mo zhes so
T02D1347-2:5a-20: / 'byung pos gzir la zhes pa 'byung po yi
T02D1347-2:5a-21: dags la sogs pas bzung ba la tsha ba gsum
T02D1347-2:5a-22: dang bcas pa'i mi bskyod pa brngubs na bde ba
T02D1347-2:5a-23: / ster te / zos pa nyid la yang zhes
T02D1347-2:5a-24: pa sbrul gyis zos pa yang bde ba ster bar
T02D1347-2:5a-25: / ster te / 'gyur ro // kha'i nad la sogs pa nye bar zhi ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5a-26: da ni bshang ba zhes pa la sogs pas tshe
T02D1347-2:5a-27: 'phel ba'i don du bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyor ba gsungs
T02D1347-2:5a-28: te / 'dir ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:5a-29: lus zhes gsungs pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi rdzas lnga
T02D1347-2:5a-30: dang nang gi rdzas lnga gcig tu byas pa ni
T02D1347-2:5a-31: bdud rtsi lnga'i sbyor ba ste /
T02D1347-2:5a-32: bdud rtsi lnga po de zos pas rnal 'byor pa rnams la tshe ster bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:5a-33: phyi rol du bshang ba'i sgras rnams par snang mdzad
T02D1347-2:5a-34: stobs ldan stobs kyi zhag ste mu zir brjod do
T02D1347-2:5a-35: // nang du ni bshang ba nyid de 'di dag cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5a-36: gcin ni phyi rol du khyab 'jug mi bdag ste bhrim ga r'a dz'a'i khu ba'o //
T02D1347-2:5a-37: nang du ni gcin nyid do //
T02D1347-2:5a-38: khrag ni phyi rol du lhang tsher ro //
T02D1347-2:5a-39: nang du ni bud med kyi me tog ste cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5a-40: khu ba ni phyi rol du dngul chu'o //
T02D1347-2:5a-41: nang du ni khu ba nyid de 'di dag cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5b-0: mi yi sha na ni phyi rol du 'bras @5b bu gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:5b-1: nang du ni rkang ste 'di dag kyang cha mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5b-2: de ltar bshang ba cha gcig dang sha rkang pas
T02D1347-2:5b-3: dman pa'i cha dang khrag cha phyed dang khu ba
T02D1347-2:5b-5: 'di rnams gcig tu byas nas gcin gyis lan bdun
T02D1347-2:5b-6: gyi bar du bsgo bar bya ste yang dang yang
T02D1347-2:5b-7: du nyi ma la bskams nas so //
T02D1347-2:5b-8: de nas nyin zhag so sor zho gnyis tsam gyi
T02D1347-2:5b-9: mar dang sbrang rtsi dang bcas pa zos na zla
T02D1347-2:5b-10: ba drug gi mtshams su tshe ster bar 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:5b-15: bud med dang sbyor ba spangs pa las so zhes pa ni bdud rtsi lnga'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5b-16: da ni bsam gtan bcas pas zhes pa la sogs pas me tog rngub pa gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:5b-17: 'dir bsam gtan ni dbu mar srog rab tu gzhug
T02D1347-2:5b-18: pa ste bsam gtan de dang bcas pa ni bsam
T02D1347-2:5b-19: gtan bcas pa'o // me tog ni bud med kyi rdul lo //
T02D1347-2:5b-20: phyi rol tu ni skra'i rgyal po bhrim ga r'a dz'a ste /
T02D1347-2:5b-21: de'i khu ba bud med kyi me tog dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5b-22: bsam gtan bcas par me tog rngubs na bsam gtan
T02D1347-2:5b-23: bcas pa rnams kyi skra dkar dang bcas rga ba
T02D1347-2:5b-24: dang ni lus skyes rnams kyang zla ba drug gi
T02D1347-2:5b-25: mtshams su 'phrog ste rngub pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5b-26: da ni sgron ma lnga gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:5b-30: rta dang mi rnams kyi sha sbrang bu'i skyugs pa dang dang bsres pa ste /
T02D1347-2:5b-31: sbrang rtsi dang bsres pa'i sgron ma lnga zos pas mtha' dag nas ni 'phrog par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:5b-32: sbrang bu'i skyugs pa gzhan ni sbrang chang ste /
T02D1347-2:5b-33: de dang bcas pa mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog par 'gyur ro zhes pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:5b-34: bud med me tog khu ba dag dang bsres pa
T02D1347-2:5b-35: ni sngar brjod pa'i phyi dang nang gi bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:5b-36: de / lo gcig zos nas rga ba nges par
T02D1347-2:5b-37: sel bar byed do zhes pa ni sngar brjod pa'i
T02D1347-2:5b-38: de / nges pa'o // da ni rlung la sogs pa nye bar zhi ba gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:5b-39: rlung 'joms lan tshva skyur ba dag tu rab tu 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:5b-40: mngar dang bska ba'i rdzas dag ni mkhris pa'i dgra'o //
T02D1347-2:5b-41: bad kan 'joms pa kha pa kun dang tsha ba
T02D1347-2:5b-42: gsum dang bcas pa ste sman rnams sam ni khu
T02D1347-2:6a-2: bad kan 'joms par yi 'o ma tsha ba gsum
T02D1347-2:6a-3: bcas dag ste ma he'i 'o ma sha ka ra
T02D1347-2:6a-4: dang bcas pa mkhris pa'i dgra'o //
T02D1347-2:6a-5: rlung 'joms dag kyang rnga mo'i 'o ma rgyam tsha
T02D1347-2:6a-6: dang bcas pa ste rnam gsum nad 'phrog pa yi
T02D1347-2:6a-7: 'o ma grangs bzhin du rgyam tsha la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:6a-8: dang ldan pa ni rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad
T02D1347-2:6a-9: kan 'joms pa'o // de bzhin mar zhes pa ba'i
T02D1347-2:6a-10: mar ni rims dang bral ba rnams kyi rnam pa
T02D1347-2:6a-11: gsum gyi nad zhi bar byed do zhes pa nges
T02D1347-2:6a-12: kan 'joms pa'o // pa'o // da ni kha la
T02D1347-2:6a-13: sogs pa'i nad nye bar zhi ba'i don du bskol
T02D1347-2:6a-14: ba'i til mar la sogs pa gsungs pa dz'a t'i
T02D1347-2:6a-15: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:6a-16: 'dir thams cad du chu ni rdzas kyi brgyad 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:6a-17: dz'a t'i'i 'dab ma'i brgyad 'gyur gyi chu rkang ba'i
T02D1347-2:6a-18: lhag mar dz'a t'i bskol ba'i khu ba'i chu cung
T02D1347-2:6a-19: zad dro bas kha nad zhi bar byed par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:6a-20: te so'i zug rngu nyid kyang ngo //
T02D1347-2:6a-21: til mar ni til gyi til mar ro //
T02D1347-2:6a-22: dngos po'i chu ni ra'i gcin te de dang mnyam
T02D1347-2:6a-23: pa bskol ba'i til mar lhag ma la tsha ba
T02D1347-2:6a-24: gsum dang lan tshva rkang pa dang bcas pa'i cha
T02D1347-2:6a-25: shad tshos pa'i mjug tu rab tu sbyin te /
T02D1347-2:6a-26: de rna bar rab tu blugs pas rna ba yi ni nad dag 'joms so //
T02D1347-2:6a-27: de bzhin du mar ni ba lang gi mar te'o
T02D1347-2:6a-28: ma brgyad 'gyur dang bskol ba'i 'jug tu klu n'a
T02D1347-2:6a-29: ga ge sar dang dmar po gur gum ste de
T02D1347-2:6a-30: dag rkang pa'i cha shas sbyin no //
T02D1347-2:6a-31: mar 'di rngubs pas sna yi nad dag 'joms pa nyid do //
T02D1347-2:6a-32: kar ko t'i ste bandh'a ka ra ko t'i dang lang ga li dang /
T02D1347-2:6a-33: ain dr'i ni aindra ba ru n'i ste /
T02D1347-2:6a-35: bong bu'i chu dang bcas pa byugs pas 'bras kyi phreng ba 'phrog go zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:6a-36: mdor bsdus pa ste rgyas par gso ba'i bstan bcos las shes par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:6a-37: da ni lag pa zhes pa la sogs pas rdo
T02D1347-2:6a-38: rje'i tsher ma nye bar zhi bar byed pa gsungs
T02D1347-2:6a-39: te / 'dir gang gi tshe sdig pa'i nad kyi
T02D1347-2:6a-40: nye bar 'tshe ba byung na de'i tshe dang por
T02D1347-2:6a-41: tsha ba skye bar 'gyur zhing lag pa dang rkang
T02D1347-2:6a-42: pa'i tshigs rnams gdung bar 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:6a-43: mgo bo yang gdung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:6b-0: mtshan nyid 'di shes nas ting nge 'dzin dmigs @6b par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:6b-1: de la 'di ni cho ga ste bug pa med
T02D1347-2:6b-2: pa'i khyim du tsha ba skyes pa rab tu zhugs
T02D1347-2:6b-3: nas lag pa gnyis po dag ni brla'i mthar thug
T02D1347-2:6b-4: par rab tu 'phyang bar bya zhing rkang pa'i padma
T02D1347-2:6b-6: srog gi rlung ni 'gog pa bum pa can bya'o //
T02D1347-2:6b-7: ji srid lus ni sa la rab tu ltung bar
T02D1347-2:6b-8: ma gyur pa de srid du ste tsha ba'i nad
T02D1347-2:6b-9: kyis sa la rab tu ltung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:6b-10: de nas ma ltung ba'i bar du yang dang yang du srog rtsol bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:6b-11: ji srid tsha ba dag ni grol bar yang ma
T02D1347-2:6b-12: gyur pa de srid du bya ste tsha ba grol
T02D1347-2:6b-13: bar gyur na mi bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:6b-14: // yang dang yang du ting nge 'dzin la gnas
T02D1347-2:6b-15: pas 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa byed pa'i tsher ma can
T02D1347-2:6b-16: ni nges par 'joms te snying ga'i padmar zla ba'i
T02D1347-2:6b-17: gzugs can dri med ri bong can mtshungs sna tshogs
T02D1347-2:6b-18: yum ni bsgoms pas so zhes pa ni srog rtsol
T02D1347-2:6b-19: gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje padma'i gdan
T02D1347-2:6b-20: la bzhugs pa zhal gcig pa phyag gnyis pa ste
T02D1347-2:6b-21: // / padma dang mchog sbyin gyi phyag go zhes
T02D1347-2:6b-22: pa ni sdig pa'i nad nye bar zhi ba'i nges
T02D1347-2:6b-23: // / pa'o // da ni sdig pa'i nad nye bar zhi ba'i don du sman gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:6b-24: 'dir gang gi tshe sdig pa'i nad kyi mtshan ma
T02D1347-2:6b-25: tsha ba skyes pa dang lag pa dang rkang pa'i
T02D1347-2:6b-26: tshigs rnams gdung bar gyur na /
T02D1347-2:6b-27: de'i tshe sran chung btags nas chu grang mos tsha
T02D1347-2:6b-28: bas rnam par bsnun pa'i mi rnams la byin na
T02D1347-2:6b-30: de bzhin du tsha ba'i mthar ni zhes pa nyin
T02D1347-2:6b-31: zhag gsum pa la tsher ma 'thon pa'i dus su
T02D1347-2:6b-32: sdig pa'i nad kyis shi ba'i thod pa ste ma
T02D1347-2:6b-33: rnyed na ji ltar rnyed pa bdar nas mi bskyod
T02D1347-2:6b-34: pa bsres pa'i skyes pa'i thod pa skyes pa dang
T02D1347-2:6b-35: / bud med kyi thod pa bud med kyis 'thungs
T02D1347-2:6b-36: shing ma rnyed na ji ltar rnyed pa 'thungs pas
T02D1347-2:6b-37: 'jigs par byed pa 'am tsher ma can 'phrog ste
T02D1347-2:6b-38: / / tsha ba'i mthar thod pa ji ltar rnyed pas so zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:6b-39: 'dir sran chung la sogs pa mngon par bsngags pa'i slad du sngags su 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:6b-40: de yang dang por aom yig ste sngags kyang chu
T02D1347-2:6b-41: me rlung rnams dag gi sngon du aom yig ces
T02D1347-2:6b-42: pas thog mar aom yig go //
T02D1347-2:7a-1: pa ni pa sde'i yi ge gnyis pa chu'i khams te pha'o //
T02D1347-2:7a-3: steng du ae yig ste chu me rlung 'di dag
T02D1347-2:7a-4: rnams gcig pa nyid ni phrem ste rjes su por
T02D1347-2:7a-5: nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1347-2:7a-6: re // badzra snga ma kanda k'a rnams kyi ming ngo ;
T02D1347-2:7a-7: / de nyid kyis ni bsrung ba bya ste sran
T02D1347-2:7a-8: chung la sogs pa la lan bdun mngon par bsngags
T02D1347-2:7a-9: pa ji lta ba de bzhin nyid du de nyid
T02D1347-2:7a-11: mgo mgrin snying ga lte ba gsang ba dang sogs
T02D1347-2:7a-12: pa'i sgras gtsug tor te gnas drug po 'di rnams
T02D1347-2:7a-13: su thun gsum du bsrung ba bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:7a-14: nges pa'o // 'dir sngags ni aom phrem bi shva
T02D1347-2:7a-15: m'a ta: badzra kanda k'a na n'a sha ya n'a
T02D1347-2:7a-16: sha ya sh'antim ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:7a-17: gzhan bsrung ba'i don du lha sbyin gyi sh'a ntim ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:7a-19: 'di ni bcom ldan 'das ma sna tshogs yum gyi ste /
T02D1347-2:7a-20: nye bar 'tshe ba thams cad las bdag dang gzhan
T02D1347-2:7a-21: bsrung ba la dran par bya'o zhes pa ni bcom
T02D1347-2:7a-23: sngags 'dis lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i sran chung
T02D1347-2:7a-24: chu grang mos btags pa btung bar sbyin zhing tsha
T02D1347-2:7a-25: bas shi ba'i thod pa mi bskyong bas [*bskyod pas?]
T02D1347-2:7a-27: 'byung pos zin pa la tsha ba gsum dang bcas
T02D1347-2:7a-28: pa mi bskyod pas btags nas sbyin te sdig pa'i
T02D1347-2:7a-29: nad nye bar zhi ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:7a-30: da ni mnyam pa zhes pa la sogs pas nyi
T02D1347-2:7a-31: ma'i gdung ba zhi ba'i nges pa mdzad pa de
T02D1347-2:7a-32: 'dir gang gi tshe so ga lam du nyi ma'i
T02D1347-2:7a-33: 'od zer gyis bsregs par gyur pa de'i tshe mnyam
T02D1347-2:7a-34: pa dh'a dri zhes pa skyu ru ra'i 'dab ma'i
T02D1347-2:7a-35: phye ma dang dh'a nya pa zhes pa ku stum
T02D1347-2:7a-36: bu ru ste de dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:7a-37: gzhan yang de bzhin tin ti r'i yi 'dab ma'i
T02D1347-2:7a-38: phye ma zhes pa ban dh'u li'i 'dab ma'i phye
T02D1347-2:7a-39: ma mnyam pa'o // de ltar thams cad cha mnyam
T02D1347-2:7a-40: par byas nas nyi zla reg pa zhes pa nyi
T02D1347-2:7a-41: ma dang zla ba'i 'od zer gyis reg pa'i chu
T02D1347-2:7a-42: ni nges par dri ma dang bral ba zhes pa
T02D1347-2:7a-43: nya lci bas la sogs pa'i dri ma dang bral
T02D1347-2:7a-44: ba rkang pa'i lhag mar bskol bar bya zhes pa
T02D1347-2:7a-45: ni rdzas kyi brgyang 'gyur gyi chu blugs pa nas
T02D1347-2:7b-0: ji srid khu ba rkang pa gcig tu gyur @7b
T02D1347-2:7b-1: pa de srid du rdzas gsum po ba skol bar
T02D1347-2:7b-2: ma mnyam pa'o // bya'o // bskol ba'i yul 'di la srang gis ni tshad ma yin te /
T02D1347-2:7b-3: thams cad du bre'i tshad do zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:7b-4: de'i khu ba rkang pa'i cha shas tsam ka ra
T02D1347-2:7b-5: dang bsres pa gzhan pa'i nyin zhag nas btung ste
T02D1347-2:7b-6: / de ltar rim pa 'di yis zhag gsum du tho rangs kyi dus su'o //
T02D1347-2:7b-7: so ga nyi ma'i 'od zer dag gis bsregs pas
T02D1347-2:7b-8: 'chi ster 'phrog ste khams bdun song ba dag kyang
T02D1347-2:7b-9: ngo zhes pa spu dang pags pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:7b-10: songs ba ste kyang yig gis gzhan yang ngo zhes
T02D1347-2:7b-12: da ni gser la nyi ma zhes pa la sogs pas bcud len gzhan gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:7b-13: 'dir lus la phyi rol gyi bcud len don du
T02D1347-2:7b-14: gnyer ba gang su zhig gis grub pa'i bcud len
T02D1347-2:7b-15: med na bcud len 'bring po 'di bya'o //
T02D1347-2:7b-16: 'di'i cho ga gsungs pa ni gser la ste rnam
T02D1347-2:7b-17: par dag pa'i gser la nyi ma zhes pa zangs
T02D1347-2:7b-18: dang khab len lcags dang pa da las skyes zhis
T02D1347-2:7b-19: pa lhang tsher gyi lcag sdang lcags zhes pa rnon
T02D1347-2:7b-20: po ste so sor mnyam pa'i cha bzung ba 'di
T02D1347-2:7b-21: dag rnams kyi cha dang gser mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:7b-22: m'a kshi ka yi phye ma rab tu btab pa
T02D1347-2:7b-23: kha phye ba'i gong bur rlung drag pos sdud par
T02D1347-2:7b-24: bya ste / ji srid du gser gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:7b-25: de nyid ni sa bon te sa bon de phyed
T02D1347-2:7b-26: kyis zhes pa gser srang gnyis kyis dngul gyi chu
T02D1347-2:7b-27: srang bzhi'o // dri ma dag dang bral ba zhes
T02D1347-2:7b-28: pa ni lan bdun gyi bar du sbyad [*spyad?] bar
T02D1347-2:7b-29: byas pas te bsgongs pas srang ni drug tu bya'o
T02D1347-2:7b-30: srang bzhi'o // // de nas ba yi dar ba
T02D1347-2:7b-31: mar dang bral ba drag po'i rtse mo can gyis
T02D1347-2:7b-32: zhes pa mi bzad pa'i mes bsad nas bsad pa
T02D1347-2:7b-33: de ras kyis btsags te snyigs ma dor nas shin
T02D1347-2:7b-34: tu dang ba'i dangs ma gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:7b-35: dangs ma de nyid khab len gyi snod du gser
T02D1347-2:7b-36: gyi gong bu dang lhan cig bskol bar bya ste
T02D1347-2:7b-37: ji srid phyed kyi tshad du gyur pa'o //
T02D1347-2:7b-38: de nas rab tu blangs te dag pa'i ka ra
T02D1347-2:7b-39: srang brgyad ces pa la de ni rgyal po la
T02D1347-2:7b-40: sogs pa ma yin pa rnams kyis zas yongs su
T02D1347-2:7b-41: 'ju ba'i dbang gis dgu la sogs pa dang bdun
T02D1347-2:8a-0: pho ba ris kyi phye ma ka ra'i drug cu rtsa bzhi cha @8a * //
T02D1347-2:8a-1: yang de la bsre bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:8a-2: de nyid thams cad dus su bza' bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:8a-3: kha zas rnam spangs bgrod pa ji srid nyid du'o //
T02D1347-2:8a-4: zla ba drug gis lha yi lus te skra dkar
T02D1347-2:8a-5: gnyer ma dang bral ba 'di yis 'chi med nyid
T02D1347-2:8a-6: du 'gyur / 'dir btung ba la t'a ma b'u
T02D1347-2:8a-7: la bza' ba bsgrub ste t'a ma b'u la'i snyigs
T02D1347-2:8a-9: de ni thams cad dus su bza' bar bya zhes
T02D1347-2:8a-10: pa ni dangs ma de nyid cho ga nges bza'
T02D1347-2:8a-11: bar bya ste / gser gyi gong bus rnam par dman pa longs spyad par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:8a-12: 'on kyang ji srid gong bu yod pa de srid
T02D1347-2:8a-13: de dang lhan cig tu ste phyi nas de dang
T02D1347-2:8a-14: bral ba dus thams cad du'o zhes pa ni bcud
T02D1347-2:8a-16: da ni sngar brjod ces pa la sogs pas zan
T02D1347-2:8a-17: la sogs pa la nye bar longs spyod pa'i don
T02D1347-2:8a-18: du gser phyed ldan gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:8a-19: sngar brjod sa bon rgyal po mnyam pa dag ste
T02D1347-2:8a-20: gzhan yang dngul cha la ni blugs pa phyed tsam
T02D1347-2:8a-21: mo // lan tshva skyur po dag gis mnyes nas
T02D1347-2:8a-22: rnam pa mang po'i sman gyis ji srid gcig nyid
T02D1347-2:8a-24: de nas mkhris pa skyur pos mu zi sogs dang da nad dang /
T02D1347-2:8a-25: shi l'a dag kyang zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-2:8a-26: 'dir dngul chu gnas pa'i don du rdzas rnam pa gsum ni dngul chu dang mtshungs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:8a-27: dngul chu dang lhan cig mkhris pa dang skyur gyis mnye bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:8a-28: ba lang gi mkhris pa 'am nya'i mkhris pa'o //
T02D1347-2:8a-29: 'bras bu skyur mo ji ltar rnyed pa b'i dza p'u ra la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:8a-30: mu zi dang da ra da dang shi l'a dang
T02D1347-2:8a-31: t'a la k'a dang sha sha ka dang k'a k'i
T02D1347-2:8a-32: dang ka shi sa dang tud th'a ka dang hee
T02D1347-2:8a-34: mu zi la sogs pa 'di dag ni nye ba'i
T02D1347-2:8a-35: dngul chu gnyis te dngul chu chen po gcig dang
T02D1347-2:8a-36: gsum ni dngul chur mtshungs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:8a-37: de yis dngul gyi 'dab ma byugs pa nyin zhag
T02D1347-2:8a-38: gsum thab kyi 'og tu bzhag pa ni gser nyid
T02D1347-2:8a-39: du 'gyur te thab kyi mes smin pa dag go
T02D1347-2:8a-40: // phyed dang ldan pa ste gser gyi so zhes pa ste gser phyed can gyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:8a-41: da ni rnon po zhes pa la sogs pas me tog bya ba gsungs so //
T02D1347-2:8a-42: 'dir me tog gi sgras dramma gzugs can gyi rdzas
T02D1347-2:8b-0: brjod de rnon @8b po dngul gyis bkang zhing brdungs
T02D1347-2:8b-1: pa'o // 'di ni de'i 'dab ma dag pa ste
T02D1347-2:8b-2: rnon po dang nam mkha' las skyes zhes pa lhang
T02D1347-2:8b-4: aa la zhes pa t'a la k'a dang /
T02D1347-2:8b-5: lan tshva zhes pa rgyam tsha dang ya baksh'a ra dang sardza ra sa ste /
T02D1347-2:8b-6: rnon po la sogs pa rim pa yis 'phel ba
T02D1347-2:8b-7: zhes pa ni cha gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang
T02D1347-2:8b-8: bzhi dang lnga dang drug gi bar du'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-9: de dag thams cad gcig tu byas pa nyi ma
T02D1347-2:8b-10: ste zangs nyis 'gyur dag la ro mnyam byed pas
T02D1347-2:8b-11: dang po kong bu kha bsdams par bsreg ste /
T02D1347-2:8b-12: de nas kong bu kha phye bar nyi ma'i lhag mar gyur gyi bar du bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-13: slar yang lan tshvas te tam ga na'i lan tshvas dag par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:8b-14: de bzhin ba las byung ba la sogs kyis bran
T02D1347-2:8b-15: 'jam par 'gyur zhes pa la ba las byung ba
T02D1347-2:8b-17: sogs pas ni aarka'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D1347-2:8b-18: badzra ka na ka'i rtsa ba dang /
T02D1347-2:8b-20: kshi ra kanytsu k'a'i rtsa ba rnams btags nas zhag bdun gyi bar du mnan par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-21: de nas ji srid mnyen par gyur gyi du dar ba de la bkru bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-22: de nyid dngul la sum cha byin zhing bkang ba
T02D1347-2:8b-23: 'am bsnun pa dag kyang dag pa'i me tog nyid
T02D1347-2:8b-24: du 'gyur te me tog gi 'dab ma'i nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:8b-25: // da ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1347-2:8b-26: rnams mchod pa'i don du dri dang spos la sogs
T02D1347-2:8b-27: pa'i le tshe sbyar ba gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:8b-28: ae la zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:8b-29: 'dir dri'i bstan bcos las gsungs pa'i cho gas sbyangs
T02D1347-2:8b-30: pa'i rdzas rnams re mig nyi shu rtsa lnga'i bdag
T02D1347-2:8b-31: nyid can gyi le tshe sbyar ba la dgod par
T02D1347-2:8b-32: bya ste / re mig dang po la ae la'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-33: gnyis pa la ga pur ro //
T02D1347-2:8b-34: gsum pa la phreng ba zhes pa spri ka'i me tog go //
T02D1347-2:8b-35: bzhi pa la g-yo ba zhes pa sihla ka'i phye ma'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-36: lnga pa la gha na zhes pa gla sgang ngo //
T02D1347-2:8b-37: drug pa la 'bras bu can te pri yang ku'i me tog go //
T02D1347-2:8b-38: bdun pa la bya rog ste aa ga ru nag po'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-39: brgyad pa la ri skyes te shee lee ya'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-41: bcu pa la sing ha mu tra'o //
T02D1347-2:8b-42: bcu gcig pa la autpala te ru rta'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-1: la 'bras bu ste dz'a ti pha la'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-2: bcu gsum pa la ri dags skyes te gla rtsi'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-3: bcu bzhi pa la dmar po ste gur gum mo //
T02D1347-2:9a-4: bcva lnga pa la dee tya ste mu r'a'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-5: bcu drug pa la p'u ti ste pu tra ke sha'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-6: bcu bdun pa la klu ste n'a ga ge sar gyi me tog go //
T02D1347-2:9a-7: bcva brgyad pa la bsil ba ste tsandan no //
T02D1347-2:9a-8: bcu dgu pa la ra na ste au sh'i ra ka'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-9: nyi shu pa la 'dab ma ste ta m'a la'i 'dab ma'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-10: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la pa la ste m'am si'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-11: nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa la chu ste p'a la ka'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-12: nyi shu rtsa gsum pa la 'khri shing zhes pa 'khri shing gla rtse'o ;
T02D1347-2:9a-13: / nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa la nam mkha' ste bhe runda bishta'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-14: nyi shu rtsa lnga pa la 'khyog po ste pindi ta ka ra'i me tog go //
T02D1347-2:9a-15: de ltar 'di dag ni rdzas rnams te ji ltar
T02D1347-2:9a-16: 'dod pa bzhin le tshe sbyar ba las byung ba'i
T02D1347-2:9a-17: rdzas lnga po 'di dag gis bzang po'i dri mdzod
T02D1347-2:9a-18: cig ces pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-19: ri dags ri bong can sogs zhes pa ni gla
T02D1347-2:9a-20: rtsi dang ga pur dang bcas pa'i bdug pa dag
T02D1347-2:9a-22: me tog dri bzang po rnams kyis bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-23: chad la sogs pas so zhes pa ni ga pur
T02D1347-2:9a-24: dang gla rtsi dang dz'a ti pha la dang bcas
T02D1347-2:9a-25: pa 'chad par 'gyur pa'i chad thams cad kyis dbug
T02D1347-2:9a-26: par bya'o zhes pa ni rdzas dgod pa'i nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:9a-27: // da ni le tsher sbyar ba la bkod pa'i
T02D1347-2:9a-28: rdzas rnams kyi cha gsungs pa mig ces pa la
T02D1347-2:9a-29: // sogs pa ste / 'dir re mig dang po
T02D1347-2:9a-30: la bkod pa'i rdzas ni mig ces pa cha gnyis
T02D1347-2:9a-31: // sogs pa ste / so // gnyis pa la zla ba zhes pa cha gcig go //
T02D1347-2:9a-32: gsum pa la me zhes pa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:9a-33: bzhi pa la rgya mtsho zhes pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-34: lnga pa la mda' zhes pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-35: drug pa la yon tan zhes pa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:9a-36: bdun pa la chu gter zhes pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-37: brgyad pa la mda' zhes pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-38: dgu pa la lag pa zhes pa gnyis so ;
T02D1347-2:9a-39: / bcu pa la zla ba zhes pa gcig go //
T02D1347-2:9a-40: bcu gcig pa la mda' zhes pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:9a-41: bcu gnyis pa la mig ces pa gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:9a-42: bcu gsum pa la zla ba zhes pa gcig go //
T02D1347-2:9a-43: bcu bzhi pa la me zhes pa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:9a-44: bcva lnga pa la chu gter zhes pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-0: bcu drug pa la @9b zla ba zhes pa gcig go //
T02D1347-2:9b-1: bcu bdun pa la dus zhes pa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:9b-2: bcva brgyad pa la dus zhes pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-3: bcu dgu pa la mda' zhes pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-4: nyi shu pa la mig ces pa gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:9b-5: nyi shu rtsa gcig pa la chu gter zhes pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-6: nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa la mda' zhes pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-7: nyi shu rtsa gsum pa la mig ces pa gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:9b-8: nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa la zla ba zhes pa gcig go //
T02D1347-2:9b-9: nyi shu rtsa lnga pa la 'jig rten zhes pa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:9b-10: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas ae la la sogs
T02D1347-2:9b-11: pa cha shas grangs rnams rim pas yongs su bkod
T02D1347-2:9b-12: pa re mig lnga lnga dag la ste /
T02D1347-2:9b-13: rdzas lnga ni le tsher sbyar ba'i grong khyer la
T02D1347-2:9b-14: gnas te grong khyer zhes pa ni re mig go
T02D1347-2:9b-15: // dag pa'i rdzas kyi cha shas nyin zhag ces bya zhes pa bcva lnga'i cha shas te /
T02D1347-2:9b-16: gcig dang gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga dang
T02D1347-2:9b-17: gcig tu gyur pa de dag gis dri 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:9b-18: zhes pa ni dri'i le tshe sbyar ba las rdzas
T02D1347-2:9b-19: kyi cha shas kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-20: da ni sbos kyi le tshe sbyar ba gsungs pa dz'a ti zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:9b-21: 'dir sngar bkod pa'i le tshe sbyar ba'i rdzas rnams
T02D1347-2:9b-22: kyi nang nas dz'a ti la sogs pa'i rdzas lnga
T02D1347-2:9b-23: phyung ste / de rnams kyi gnas su rim pa gzhan lnga sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-24: de la dz'a ti zhes pa ni dz'a ti pha la ste /
T02D1347-2:9b-25: sogs pa las gnyis pa ni ae la'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-26: gsum pa la ni 'khri shing gla rtsi'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-27: bzhi pa la ni 'dab ma ste ta m'a la'i 'dab ma la'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-28: lnga pa ni ka la sha ste kakko la'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-29: 'di rnams kyi grong du ste re mig tu rim
T02D1347-2:9b-30: pas bkod par bya ba ni dz'a ti pha la'i
T02D1347-2:9b-31: re mig tu rgya skyegs so //
T02D1347-2:9b-32: ae la'i re mig tu sa rdza ra sa'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-33: 'khri shing gi re mig tu 'o ma zhes pa shr'i b'a sa'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-34: 'dab ma'i re mig tu pu ra zhes pa gu gul lo //
T02D1347-2:9b-35: kakko la'i re mig tu si ta zhes pa kun du ru ka'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-36: de ltar bdug pa'i bya ba rnams la bdug pa
T02D1347-2:9b-37: ni rdzas lnga po sngar brjod pa'i cha shas dag
T02D1347-2:9b-38: gis bya'o // zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-39: ga pur ka ra dang bcas pa ste gang du
T02D1347-2:9b-40: ka ra dang yin pa der ka ra dang lhan
T02D1347-2:9b-41: cig sbrang rtsi sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:9b-42: sen mo dag ni me yi cha shas kyis lhan
T02D1347-2:9b-43: cig pa ste de ltar cha bcva brgyad kyis yan
T02D1347-2:9b-44: lag drug gi spos su 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:10a-1: ka ra dang sbrang rtsi dang gla rtsi dang bcas pa ni yan lag bcu pa la ste /
T02D1347-2:10a-2: bdug spos kyi le tshe sbyar ba la rdzas kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-3: da ni spos kyi ring bu gsungs pa de dag
T02D1347-2:10a-4: ces pa la sogs pa ste 'dir bdug pa'i le
T02D1347-2:10a-5: tshe sbyar ba las gsungs pa'i spos kyi sbyor ba
T02D1347-2:10a-6: sbrang rtsi dang bral ba dri yi chu ka ra
T02D1347-2:10a-7: cung zad bsreg pa dang sbyar ba des spos kyi
T02D1347-2:10a-8: ring bu n'a r'a tsa'i rnam pa bya ste /
T02D1347-2:10a-9: gos la sogs pa bdug pa dang dam pa'i chos dang /
T02D1347-2:10a-10: sku gzugs la sogs pa'i don du'o zhes pa ste nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-11: da ni khrus kyi le tshe sbyar ba gsungs pa
T02D1347-2:10a-12: lte ba dang po zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:10a-13: 'dir sngar brjod pa'i dri'i le tshe sbyar ba la
T02D1347-2:10a-14: bkod pa'i rdzas rnams kyi nang nas lte ba la
T02D1347-2:10a-15: sogs pa'i rdzas lnga phyung ste /
T02D1347-2:10a-16: de dag gi re mig rnams la grangs bzhin du
T02D1347-2:10a-17: khrus kyi le tsho sbyar ba la gzhan dag sbyin
T02D1347-2:10a-18: par bya'o // de la lte ba'i re mig la gra nthi barnna dgod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-19: sim ha m'u tra'i re mig la stag gi sen mo'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-20: ri bong can ni grong du ha re nu'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-21: mkha' yi grong du ha ta zhes pa ka tso ri ka'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-22: gzhan yang de bzhin te ji ltar spos kyi bya
T02D1347-2:10a-23: ba la dung zhes pa sen mo ste cha gsum
T02D1347-2:10a-24: mo // de ltar shun pa dag gi cha gsum sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-25: khrus kyi sbyor ba la khrus kyi rdzas rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:10a-26: nang nas de ltar cha bcva brgyad la rdzas drug
T02D1347-2:10a-28: khrus kyi le tshe sbyar ba la rdzas kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-29: da ni dril phyis kyi le tshe sbyar ba gsungs
T02D1347-2:10a-30: te 'dir khrus kyi le tshe sbyar ba gsungs pa'i
T02D1347-2:10a-31: rdzas rnams nang nas shun pa bzhin du rdzas lnga
T02D1347-2:10a-32: po rnams cha gsum sbyin bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:10a-33: dh'a n+ya zhes pa ku stum bu ru dang m'u
T02D1347-2:10a-34: rb'i zhes pa ma ru ba ka dang brgya yis
T02D1347-2:10a-35: mtshan dang zhes pa me tog brgya pa dang da
T02D1347-2:10a-36: ma zhes pa da ma ka dang ma dh'u ri
T02D1347-2:10a-37: ste lnga po 'di rnams cha gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:10a-38: de ltar cha bcva brgyad kyis dril phyis su 'gyur te dril phyis kyi rdzas kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:10a-39: da ni smin pa'i til mar gyi don du til
T02D1347-2:10a-40: mar gyi re mig sbyar ba gsungs pa sngar zhes
T02D1347-2:10a-41: pa la sogs pa ste 'dir sngar brjod pa'i dri'i
T02D1347-2:10a-42: le tshe sbyar ba'i rdzas kyi tshogs ma bzlog pa
T02D1347-2:10a-43: chu skyes zhes pa sen mo ste chu skyes bzhin
T02D1347-2:10a-44: du lus dang zhes pa shun pa dang gra nthi
T02D1347-2:10b-0: barnna dag kyang @10b ste de dag cha gsum byin
T02D1347-2:10b-1: nas dri'i le tshe sbyar ba'i rdzas lnga dang bcas
T02D1347-2:10b-2: pa / rdzas bdun gyi cha bcva brgyad kyis 'chad
T02D1347-2:10b-3: par 'gyur pa'i rim pas til mar smin par bya
T02D1347-2:10b-4: ste dri sna tshogs kyi til mar du 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:10b-5: pa / // til mar gyi le tshe sbyar ba'i rdzas nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:10b-6: de bzhin du phye ma la sogs pa ste phye
T02D1347-2:10b-7: ma dag gi yul la gra nthi de bzhin zhes
T02D1347-2:10b-8: pa ni sen mo bzhin du rdzas lnga po rnams
T02D1347-2:10b-9: la granthi barnna ka sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:10b-10: lus dang ha ta btung ba bsgo ba la sbyin
T02D1347-2:10b-11: par bya bar 'gyur te kha bsgo ba la yang
T02D1347-2:10b-12: ngo // shun pa po la gri nthi dung zhes
T02D1347-2:10b-13: ba rdzas bzhi'i cha gsum ni 'bras bu'i smin pa
T02D1347-2:10b-14: dang 'dab ma sbyar ba'i smin pa dang dang ba'i
T02D1347-2:10b-15: smin pa dang sogs pa las khyogs kyi smin pa
T02D1347-2:10b-16: 'chad par 'gyur pa la sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:10b-17: de ltar brjod pa'i rim pas rab dbye sum cu
T02D1347-2:10b-18: dag gis dri la sogs pa'i sbyor ba sum cu
T02D1347-2:10b-19: legs spras rnam mang dri dang spos la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:10b-20: sbyor ba dang khrus dang dril phyis la sogs pa

T02D1347-2:13b-12: de nyid ni spyir rnam pa bzhi ste glang po
T02D1347-2:13b-13: che'i rna ba dang rta'i rmig pa dang autpala'i 'dab
T02D1347-2:13b-14: ma dang ba da ra'i 'dab ma'o //
T02D1347-2:13b-15: de rnams la dri'i sbyor ba la glang po che'i rna ba dang rta'i rmig pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:13b-16: spos kyi sbyor ba la ba da ra dang autpala'i 'dab ma'o //
T02D1347-2:13b-17: 'dir yang ba da ra'i 'dab ma mchog ste de
T02D1347-2:13b-18: med na autpala'i 'dab ma la sogs pa gzung bar
T02D1347-2:13b-19: bya'o // dag pa ni dri'i bstan bcos las brjod
T02D1347-2:13b-20: pa'i cho gas bskol ba dang brdung ba dang bu
T02D1347-2:13b-21: ram dang bska ba'i chus bran pa dang phye mar
T02D1347-2:13b-22: byas pa dang 'bras bu gsum la sogs pas byug
T02D1347-2:13b-23: pa dang bsgos pa'i phyir dag pa'o //
T02D1347-2:13b-24: de nyid gzhan pa'i rdzas kyis dman zhing dang rab
T02D1347-2:13b-25: dag dang zhes pa ni chang ste de dang rnam
T02D1347-2:13b-26: par bral ba'o // dri yi chu yis btags zhes
T02D1347-2:13b-27: pa ni 'dir dri yi chu yi don du shin
T02D1347-2:13b-28: tu dang ba'i chu blangs nas ae la dang shun
T02D1347-2:13b-29: pa dang m'a si dang b'a la ka dang tsan
T02D1347-2:13b-30: dang rnams zho gnyis thum por bcings te chu bre
T02D1347-2:13b-32: de nas rkang pa'i lhag mar bskol bar bya ste srid de'i chur gyur par ro //
T02D1347-2:13b-33: des dri gzhan yang brtag par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:13b-34: spos kyis smin pa zhes pa ni sen mo dag
T02D1347-2:13b-35: pa btags pa de nyid bdug pas smin pa'i cho
T02D1347-2:13b-37: bska ba drag po sbrang rtsi dang bcas lag skyes
T02D1347-2:13b-38: dag gis kham bu rim pas 'phel zhes pa la
T02D1347-2:13b-39: sbrang rtsi dang ka ra dang bcas pa bska ba'i
T02D1347-2:13b-40: kham bu gcig ste nyin zhag dang po la'o //
T02D1347-2:13b-41: kham bu'i thog ma tha mar sbrang rtsi dag dang
T02D1347-2:13b-42: dkar po nges par bsreg ste dang po spos las
T02D1347-2:13b-43: so // zhes pa'i nges pa las dang por sbrang rtsi dang sha ka ra'o //
T02D1347-2:13b-44: bar du bska ba'i spos kyi kham bu sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:14a-1: tu sbrang rtsi dang ka ra nges par bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:14a-2: nyin zhag gnyis pa la me tog bsgo bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:14a-3: de ltar gcig gis bar du chod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:14a-4: drag po'i spos kyis kham bu gnyis nyin zhag gnyis la nges par bsreg go //
T02D1347-2:14a-5: sen mo'i kham bu gsum nyin zhag gsum gyis so //
T02D1347-2:14a-6: de nas kham bu gnyis ni ka ra bsres pa
T02D1347-2:14a-7: dag ste zhes pa ni ma la ya'i kham bu
T02D1347-2:14a-9: g-yo ba'i gcig ste lcags dang ga pur dag gis yang ngo //
T02D1347-2:14a-10: kham bu'i thog ma dang tha mar sbrang rtsi dang sha ka ra sngar bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:14a-11: de ltar gcig gis bar du chos pas nyin zhag
T02D1347-2:14a-12: nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i spos kyis smin par 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:14a-13: // de nas nyin zhag bcus me tog bzang po
T02D1347-2:14a-14: rnams kyis bsgo nga byas nas de ji srid spos
T02D1347-2:14a-15: kyi skyon nye bar zhi bar gyur pa'i bar du'o
T02D1347-2:14a-16: // // dri yi chu yis bsres pa dag ces
T02D1347-2:14a-17: pa ni sngar gyi cho gas nyin zhag so sor
T02D1347-2:14a-19: chu grang mo sbyin par mi bya ste chu grang mos bsgyur par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:14a-20: dri yi chu de yis bsres pa'i dri byas nas /
T02D1347-2:14a-21: 'jim pa'i thod pa 'dzag pa min pa phyi rol
T02D1347-2:14a-22: nas spra tshil dang gos kyis bcings te brtan par
T02D1347-2:14a-23: kha bcad la de nyid ni gzhan shin tu che
T02D1347-2:14a-24: ba'i snod kyi rdza mar ro //
T02D1347-2:14a-25: yang na sa 'og tu ste de med na'o //
T02D1347-2:14a-26: snod der bcug la steng nas bye ba sbyin par
T02D1347-2:14a-27: bya ste ji srid snod kyi mgrin pa'i mthar thug
T02D1347-2:14a-28: pa gang bar gyur gyi bar du'o //
T02D1347-2:14a-29: bye mas gang ba'i snod de la thun mong ba'i chu nyi mas dros pa sbyin no //
T02D1347-2:14a-30: snod de nyid nyi ma'i 'od la zla ba drug gi bar du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:14a-31: de ltar zla ba drug gi nye bar sbyor bas
T02D1347-2:14a-32: smin par 'gyur te chu la gnas pa lte ba'i
T02D1347-2:14a-33: ga bo'i dri zhes pa ni dri'i rgyal po'i nges
T02D1347-2:14a-34: pa'o // da ni dri'i til mar gyi don dang
T02D1347-2:14a-35: me tog gi til mar gyi slad du til dag
T02D1347-2:14a-36: pa gsungs pa til zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:14a-37: 'dri til yongs su smin pa sar pa rnams yang
T02D1347-2:14a-39: 'dab ma bskol ba'i chu dag dang zhes pa 'dab ma ni aa mra'i 'dab ma'o //
T02D1347-2:14a-40: de bzhin du dzam bu dang ka pi tha dad
T02D1347-2:14a-41: ma du lung ga dang bil ba rnams kyi ste
T02D1347-2:14b-1: / de dag bskol ba'i chu ni 'dab ma'i chu
T02D1347-2:14b-2: ste nges ma nyes nas til rnams kyi sbun pa
T02D1347-2:14b-3: bsal ba ni dag pa dang po'o //
T02D1347-2:14b-4: de nas dra ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyi steng du gos
T02D1347-2:14b-5: byin nas de'i steng du til rnams snod gzhan gyis
T02D1347-2:14b-6: byibs nas bdug bar bya ste dag pa gnyis so
T02D1347-2:14b-7: // byugs pa la sogs pa rnams kyis zhes pa
T02D1347-2:14b-8: ni 'bras bu gsum dri'i chus btags pa'i byug pa
T02D1347-2:14b-9: // sbyin par bya'o // sogs pas ni nyi ma'i 'od kyis bskam par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:14b-10: de ltar til rnams dag byas nas phyi nas dza'
T02D1347-2:14b-11: ti la sogs me tog rnams kyis nyin zhag 'ga'
T02D1347-2:14b-12: zhig ste phyogs sam nyin zhag bcur bar chad med
T02D1347-2:14b-14: ji srid bsgos pa rnams bsgos pa'i me tog gi
T02D1347-2:14b-15: dri 'dzin pa'i bar du ste de ni 'dod pa
T02D1347-2:14b-17: de nas til btsir ba'i 'khrul 'khor gyis ta li
T02D1347-2:14b-18: mar blangs nas mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:14b-19: bod pa'o // mkhas pas mching bu'i snod du gzhag par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:14b-20: til mar de ni khrus sam yan lag byug pa
T02D1347-2:14b-21: dag la myos byed me tog til mar nyid ni
T02D1347-2:14b-23: ci ste smin pa'i til mar byed par 'dod na
T02D1347-2:14b-24: de'i tshe til mar de nyid dri bzang po'i chu
T02D1347-2:14b-25: dang mnyam pa bskol bar bya ste ji srid til
T02D1347-2:14b-26: mar gyi dbu ba 'dor gyi bar du'o //
T02D1347-2:14b-27: de nas 'bogs pa'i dus su dri'i rdzas brgya cha'i dri'i chus btags pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:14b-28: phyi nas dbog par bya ste ji srid grangs par gyur gyi bar du'o //
T02D1347-2:14b-29: de nas gla rtsi la sogs pa'i 'bugs pa byin nas mchid bu'i snod du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:14b-30: de nyid ma da'i chang rkang pa'i cha shas kyis
T02D1347-2:14b-31: bsres nas rgya skyegs kyi snod du nyi ma'i 'od
T02D1347-2:14b-32: kyis zhag bdun gsungs na gla rtsi'i til mar du
T02D1347-2:14b-33: 'gyur ro // 'od ma'i dong par smin pa ni nye ma'i smin par 'gyur te //
T02D1347-2:14b-34: de ltar byug pa la sogs pa ni 'od ma'i
T02D1347-2:14b-35: dong par smin zhing lte ba la sogs pas phug
T02D1347-2:14b-36: pa mchog gi byug par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:14b-37: de ltar cho ga sna tshogs pa dri'i bstan bcos
T02D1347-2:14b-38: las gsungs pa'i dri la sogs pa'i sbyar ba bya
T02D1347-2:14b-39: ste / 'dri ni bcom ldan 'das kyis mdor bsdus pa gsungs so //
T02D1347-2:15a-0: da ni sbrum ma rnams btsa' @15a * //
T02D1347-2:15a-1: ba'i don du thams cad sum cu rtsa bzhi'i 'khrul 'khor gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:15a-2: sa 'dzin zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir gang
T02D1347-2:15a-3: gi tshe sbrum ma rnams btsa' ba'i dus phyi rol
T02D1347-2:15a-4: gyi pho nya mo'i skyon gyis mngal rengs par gyur
T02D1347-2:15a-5: na de'i tshe 'khrul 'khor 'di tshad kyi rgyab tu
T02D1347-2:15a-6: bri bar bya ste tshang ces pa ni bre'o //
T02D1347-2:15a-7: de'i rgyab tu re mig bcu drug byas nas re mig dang po las 'dzin te bdun no //
T02D1347-2:15a-8: gnyis pa la nyi ma ste bcu gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:15a-9: gsum pa la zla ba ste gcig go //
T02D1347-2:15a-10: bzhi pa lam nu ste bcu bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:15a-11: lnga pa la mig ste gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:15a-12: drug pa la 'dod pa ste bcu gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:15a-13: bdun pa la nor te brgyad do //
T02D1347-2:15a-14: brgyad pa la drag po ste bcu gcig go //
T02D1347-2:15a-15: dgu pa la rgyal po ste bcu drug go //
T02D1347-2:15a-16: bcu pa la me zhe pa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:15a-17: bcu gcig pa la phyogs zhes pa bcu'o //
T02D1347-2:15a-18: bcu gnyis pa la 'byung ba zhes pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:15a-19: bcu gsum pa la bug pa zhes pa dgu'o //
T02D1347-2:15a-20: bcu bzhi pa la drug pa drug go //
T02D1347-2:15a-21: bcva lnga pa la tshes zhes pa bcva nga'o //
T02D1347-2:15a-22: bcu drug pa la chu gter dag ces pa ni
T02D1347-2:15a-23: bzhi ste mtha' yi re mig bcu drug pa la
T02D1347-2:15a-24: gzhag par bya'o // re mig bzhi pa la gnas
T02D1347-2:15a-25: pa'i aom ka 'di rnams kyi grangs gcig tu bsdus
T02D1347-2:15a-26: pa ni chu yi gter dang rtse mo can zhes
T02D1347-2:15a-28: thams cad du dpal ldan 'khor lo mtha' dag ni
T02D1347-2:15a-29: tshad kyi rgyab tu bris nas 'khrul 'khor 'di rab
T02D1347-2:15a-30: tu btsa' bar 'gyur pa'i dus su sbrum ma rnams
T02D1347-2:15a-31: la bstan par bya zhes pa ste mngal 'gro ba'i
T02D1347-2:15a-32: nges pa'o ; / da ni mngal la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:15a-33: byis pa'i rgyud gsungs pa rnal 'byor ma rnams zhes
T02D1347-2:15a-35: 'dir sa yi steng du rab gsal rnal ;'byor ma
T02D1347-2:15a-36: drug cu rtsa bzhi gang yin pa de dag ni
T02D1347-2:15a-37: brgyad pa brgyad kyi ma mor rab tu grags so
T02D1347-2:15a-38: // de dag gi nang nas mngal zhes bya ba
T02D1347-2:15a-39: sum 'gyur dgu zhes pa ni nyi shu rtsa bdun
T02D1347-2:15a-40: // no // nyin zhag ces bya bcu'o //
T02D1347-2:15a-41: bcu gcig pa zla ba zhes bya ba'o //
T02D1347-2:15a-42: gzhan ni lnga pa gsum zhes pa bcva lnga ni
T02D1347-2:15a-43: lo zhes bya ste drug cu rtsa gsum po de
T02D1347-2:15a-44: dag byis pa 'dzin te mtha' dag sa yi steng
T02D1347-2:15a-45: du'o // mngal du zug rngu dang ni rab tu
T02D1347-2:15b-0: @15b btsa' ba'i dus su skye gnas la yang zug
T02D1347-2:15b-1: gzer byed pa nyid ces pa ni 'dir mngal zhes
T02D1347-2:15b-2: bya ba rnams kyi nang nas bcva lnga ni mngal
T02D1347-2:15b-3: bzung ba'i nyin zhag nas brtsams te nyin zhag bcva
T02D1347-2:15b-4: lnga'i bar du mngal du zug rdu rab tu byed
T02D1347-2:15b-5: du'o // do // de nas dgu ni zla ba dgu'i bar du rab tu 'gro'o //
T02D1347-2:15b-6: rab tu btsa' ba'i dus su gcig go //
T02D1347-2:15b-7: nu ma'i 'o ma 'phrog pa gnyis te mngal zhes bya ba rnams kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:15b-8: skyes pa rnams la byis pa'i rgyud du 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:15b-9: nyin zhag dbang dang zla ba lo yi rab dbye
T02D1347-2:15b-10: las zhes pa la 'dir byis pa'i rgyud ces pa
T02D1347-2:15b-11: ni ma mos gzir ba rnams kyi byis pa gso
T02D1347-2:15b-12: ba'o // de la nyin zhag ces bya ba rnams
T02D1347-2:15b-13: la 'chad par 'gyur pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya
T02D1347-2:15b-14: ba'o // ste / byis pa skyes pa rnam pa skyes pa'i nyin zhag nas brtsams te /
T02D1347-2:15b-15: nyin zhag drug cu'i bar du rang rang gi nyin zhag la gzir bar byed pa rnams la'o //
T02D1347-2:15b-16: zla ba re re'i dbang gis bcu gcig po rnams la zla ba bcu gcig gi bar du'o //
T02D1347-2:15b-17: de nas bcva lnga po rnams la lo bcva lnga'i bar du'o //
T02D1347-2:15b-18: de'i steng du byis pa gzhon nu nyid med de
T02D1347-2:15b-19: lo bcu drug pa la khu ba 'dzag pa'i phyir
T02D1347-2:15b-20: ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:15b-21: da ni ma rungs pa lnga gsungs pa ma rungs zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:15b-22: 'dir sa'i steng du dga' ba la sogs pa'i tshes
T02D1347-2:15b-23: kyi dbye bas tshes lnga po rnams kyi mtshams su
T02D1347-2:15b-24: gzhon nu rnams te nam mkha' la sogs pa'i rang
T02D1347-2:15b-25: bzhin yon tan dbang gis tshigs mtshams dag la yang
T02D1347-2:15b-26: dag gnas so // de dag rang gi tshes la
T02D1347-2:15b-27: 'jigs gyur byis pa 'dzin par byed de thams cad
T02D1347-2:15b-28: thun mong gi gtor mas byis pa nges par gtong
T02D1347-2:15b-30: rgyal po zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:15b-31: de dag zhi ba'i don du 'dri ni rnam mang
T02D1347-2:15b-32: dkyil 'khor khrus dang sbyin sreg gi bya ba 'chad
T02D1347-2:15b-33: par 'gyur pa dag tu rab tu 'gyur zhes pa
T02D1347-2:15b-34: ni ma rungs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:15b-35: da ni mngal zhes bya ba rnams kyis gzir ba'i sbrum ma rnams kyi /
T02D1347-2:15b-36: sman gsungs pa ru rta zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:15b-37: 'dir gang gi tshe sbrum ma rnams kyi mngal na
T02D1347-2:15b-38: bar gyur na de'i tshe sman ni ru rta dang
T02D1347-2:16a-0: ka se ru dang ta ka ra'i rtsa ba dang autpala'i rtsa ba dang padma ge @16a * //
T02D1347-2:16a-1: sar te rdzas 'di dag bsil ba'i chu yongs su
T02D1347-2:16a-2: dangs pas btags shing rdo rje yis ni bsngags pa
T02D1347-2:16a-4: aom a'a:h'um aa mu k'a y'a garbha sh'u lam ha ra ha ra sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:16a-5: zhes pa ni sngags te 'dis mngon par bsngags nas
T02D1347-2:16a-6: mngal gyi zug rdul rab sbyin zhes pa ste nges
T02D1347-2:16a-7: pa'o // de bzhin du mngal ni rengs na na
T02D1347-2:16a-8: ku la'i spu brgyad dang gtsug phung can gyi ste
T02D1347-2:16a-9: rma bya'i mjug ma bzung nas bsil ba'i chus btags
T02D1347-2:16a-10: te mngon par bsngags nas snga ma bzhin du sbyin
T02D1347-2:16a-11: pa'o // par bya'o // 'o ma phrogs pa rnams 'o ma'i shing gi 'og tu khrus bya'o //
T02D1347-2:16a-12: ba'i 'o mas gang ba'i kham phor bdun dang 'o ma'i zan gyi gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:16a-13: zhes pa ni mngal zhes bya ba rnams kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:16a-14: da ni 'o ma zhes pa la sogs pas nyin zhag ma rnams kyi cho ga gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:16a-15: 'dir nyin zhag bcu'i nang du bzung ba'i byis bzhi
T02D1347-2:16a-16: pa'i don du'o ma dang mar dang thug pa dang
T02D1347-2:16a-17: zan dang zho dang bu ram dang bcas pa'i gtor
T02D1347-2:16a-18: ma nyin zhag ma rnams dag la sbyin par bya
T02D1347-2:16a-19: ste khrus dang spos ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:16a-20: nyin zhag ma rnams kyi mtshan mo gsum du gtor ma'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:16a-21: da ni sman pa zhes pa la sogs pas zla
T02D1347-2:16a-22: ba zhes bya ba rnams kyi cho ga gsungs te
T02D1347-2:16a-23: / 'dir zhag bcu'i rjes la zla ba'o //
T02D1347-2:16a-24: de nas zla ba bcu gcig gi bar du zla
T02D1347-2:16a-25: bar skyes pa rnams zhi ba'i don du ma mo
T02D1347-2:16a-26: rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:16a-27: smin pa'i zas lnga tha dad ces pa ni mar
T02D1347-2:16a-28: gyi smin pa ste p'u ri k'a dang ghri ta
T02D1347-2:16a-29: p'u ra dang so ma li dang se ba l'i
T02D1347-2:16a-30: dang ba ta ka ces pa ste lnga tha dad
T02D1347-2:16a-31: pa'o // zas gzhan zho dang bu ram dang bcas
T02D1347-2:16a-32: pa po li ka dang mo da ka dag kyang
T02D1347-2:16a-33: pa'o // ngo // dri zhes pa tsandan dang dri
T02D1347-2:16a-34: bzang po'i me tog dang til gyi til mar ram
T02D1347-2:16a-35: mar gyi me dang bkru ba dag kyang 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:16a-36: rnams kyis zhes pa ni aa shvadtha la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:16a-37: shing 'o ma can lnga'i 'dab ma rnams kyis te
T02D1347-2:16a-38: cung zad bskol ba'i chu dro ba dang bcas pas
T02D1347-2:16a-39: byis pa la khrus bya ste zhag lnga'i bar du
T02D1347-2:16a-40: pa'o // ngo // thams cad bya'o // khrus kyi
T02D1347-2:16a-41: mjug tu byis pa la bdug pa sbyin par bya
T02D1347-2:16a-42: pa'o // ngo // thams cad bya'o // ste /
T02D1347-2:16a-43: ba lang gi so dang lug gi rva dang ri
T02D1347-2:16a-44: dags kyi spu dang mi'i sen mo dang skra dang
T02D1347-2:16b-0: @16b sprul gyi shun pa 'di dag gcig tu byas
T02D1347-2:16b-1: nas drag po'i sol bas spos so //
T02D1347-2:16b-2: lha'i gtor ma la ni sngar brjod pa'i dri dang spos la sogs pa sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:16b-3: phyogs bzhi dang grong gi dbus su'o zhes pa nges pa ste /
T02D1347-2:16b-4: byis pa zla skyes rnams ni rgyas pa'i don du
T02D1347-2:16b-5: mtha' dag brjod pa rnams kyang gtor ma dag la'o
T02D1347-2:16b-6: // da ni bza' ba lnga zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:16b-7: pas lo can ma rnams kyi cho ga gsungs te
T02D1347-2:16b-8: 'dir zla ba bcu'i steng du zla ba gnyis ni
T02D1347-2:16b-10: de nas lo bcva lnga'i bar du lor skyes pa
T02D1347-2:16b-11: ma mos gzir ba rnams zhi ba'i don du lo
T02D1347-2:16b-12: can ma rnams la gtor ma sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:16b-13: bza' ba lnga zhes pa ni yung ba la sogs
T02D1347-2:16b-14: pa rnams kyis zan ser po dang dkar po dang
T02D1347-2:16b-15: dmar po dang nag po dang ljang khur byas pa
T02D1347-2:16b-16: ste 'di dag ni bza' ba lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:16b-17: bca' ba lnga zhes pa smin pa'i zas sngar brjod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:16b-18: chu la rgyu ba nya sha dang sha dang dri
T02D1347-2:16b-19: la sogs pa sngar brjod pa dang chang dang sngar
T02D1347-2:16b-20: brjod pa'i spos la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:16b-21: thams cad smyig ma'i snod du bzhag pa nas mar
T02D1347-2:16b-22: me dang bcas pa'i gtor mas lan gsum bya ba
T02D1347-2:16b-23: par bya'o // phyogs zhes pa nyin zhag bcur phyogs
T02D1347-2:16b-24: bcu'i char te dbang po nas dbang ldan gyi mthar
T02D1347-2:16b-25: thug pa dang 'og dang steng du gtor ma ste
T02D1347-2:16b-26: grong gi dbus dang lam gyi bzhi mdor sbyin par
T02D1347-2:16b-27: par bya'o // bya'o // byis pa lor ni skyes
T02D1347-2:16b-28: pa rnams dag rab tu gsal bar sa la rgyas
T02D1347-2:16b-29: pa'i slad du mi yi dbang zhes pa ni bod
T02D1347-2:16b-30: par bya'o // bya'o // pa'o // lo can ma rnams mchod pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:16b-31: de ltar mngal nas lo ni lnga pa gsum zhes
T02D1347-2:16b-32: pa ni lo bcva lnga'i mthar thug par rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:16b-33: ma drug cu rtsa gsum po rnams nges par mchod
T02D1347-2:16b-34: par bya'o // gzhan du na byis pa rnams zhi ba la sogs par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:16b-35: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:16b-36: da ni ma mos bzung ba rnams kyi skyon gyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:16b-37: yan lag ces pa la sogs pa ste 'dir gang
T02D1347-2:16b-38: gi tshe byis pa ma mos bzung bar gyur na
T02D1347-2:16b-39: de'i tshe de'i yan lag rkyong bar 'gyur pa dang
T02D1347-2:16b-40: mig na bar 'gyur pa dang kha dang lag pa
T02D1347-2:17a-0: dag dang / rkang pa dag ni kha dang lag pa rkang pa ste ser po nyid @17a * //
T02D1347-2:17a-1: du yang 'gyur pa dang gcin ni kha dog ser
T02D1347-2:17a-2: por 'gyur pa dang tsha ba skye bar 'gyur pa
T02D1347-2:17a-3: dang / skyug par 'gyur pa dang skam pa dang
T02D1347-2:17a-4: brgyal bar 'gyur pa ste ma mo'i skyon gyi mtshan
T02D1347-2:17a-5: ma 'di dag rnams shes par gyur nas byis pa
T02D1347-2:17a-6: de dag dang yang gi sgras gdug pa'i gdon gyis
T02D1347-2:17a-7: bzung ba rnams la dkyil 'khor dang sbyin sreg la
T02D1347-2:17a-8: dang / sogs pa bya'o // rnam pa gzhan du
T02D1347-2:17a-9: gtor ma ma byin na ni gtong bar mi 'gyur
T02D1347-2:17a-10: te rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis 'byung ba las
T02D1347-2:17a-11: skyes ma mo sngar brjod pa dag gis zhes pa
T02D1347-2:17a-12: ste gso ba'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1347-2:17a-13: da ni drug cu rtsa bzhi ma rigs ldan mas
T02D1347-2:17a-14: bzung ba'i 'chi ba'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa gang gi
T02D1347-2:17a-15: zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir drug cu rtsa
T02D1347-2:17a-16: bzhi ma rigs ldan ma ni mngal dang nyin zhag
T02D1347-2:17a-17: dang zla ba dang lo'i mtshams su rnal 'byor ma
T02D1347-2:17a-18: thams cad kyi mtshams so so la khyab par byed
T02D1347-2:17a-20: des bzung ba'i byis pa'i yan lag thams cad dkar
T02D1347-2:17a-21: por 'gyur pa dang 'brum pa shin tu phra mo
T02D1347-2:17a-22: nyungs kar dang skye tshe tsam du 'gyur pa dang
T02D1347-2:17a-23: mgrin pa lus dang bcas pa 'khyog por 'gyur ba
T02D1347-2:17a-24: dang kha'am gsang ba'am bshang lam dag las khrag 'dzag
T02D1347-2:17a-26: 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan nyid mthong nas yul de la
T02D1347-2:17a-27: mchod pa bya ba min te gal te byed na
T02D1347-2:17a-28: de'i tshe sngags pa rmongs pa rnams chags pa las
T02D1347-2:17a-30: ci'i phyir zhe na gang gi phyir de ni 'chi
T02D1347-2:17a-31: bar 'gyur te nges par lha dang mi dang lag
T02D1347-2:17a-32: 'gro rnams kyis bsrung bar nus pa min pa'i phyir
T02D1347-2:17a-33: ro // 'chi ba'i mtshan ma'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:17a-34: da ni dkyil 'khor la mchod pa byas pas bde
T02D1347-2:17a-35: ba byed pa gsungs pa klu zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:17a-36: pa ste 'dir klu la sogs pa rnams kyis gzir
T02D1347-2:17a-37: ba rnams ni klu la sogs pa rnams 'chad bar
T02D1347-2:17a-38: 'gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor la mchod par byas pas bde
T02D1347-2:17a-40: 'di dag gis mtshan nyid du ma 'byung po'i rgyud
T02D1347-2:17a-41: las brjod pa shes par bya ba dag ni 'di
T02D1347-2:17a-42: nyid du 'chad par 'gyur pa'i phyag rgya bcing ba
T02D1347-2:17a-44: da ni ma rungs pa rnams mchod pa'i don du
T02D1347-2:17b-0: dkyil 'khor dang dkyil 'khor gyi gnas @17b gsungs pa
T02D1347-2:17b-1: ma rungs pa rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:17b-2: 'dir ma rungs pa rnams mchod pa'i don du dkyil
T02D1347-2:17b-3: 'khor ni grong gi phyi rol du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:17b-4: de nyid du shing gcig gi gnas dang dur khrod
T02D1347-2:17b-5: dang ni lha mchog khang pa dag gam ste lha
T02D1347-2:17b-6: khang stong pa dang chu bo 'dus pa rnams su'o
T02D1347-2:17b-7: // khru gang dag gam gnyis dang bzhi zhes pa
T02D1347-2:17b-8: ni 'dir 'byor pa dang rjes su 'tsham par dkyil
T02D1347-2:17b-9: 'khor khru gcig pa'am khru gnyis pa'am khru bzhi pa
T02D1347-2:17b-10: nas brtsams te khru stong pa ji srid pa de
T02D1347-2:17b-11: srid du slob dpon gyis bri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:17b-12: dgu dang bcu gsum mi bdag ces pa ni 'dir
T02D1347-2:17b-13: lha dgu rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshad ni khru
T02D1347-2:17b-14: gcig go // bcu gsum rnams kyi khru gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:17b-15: mi bdag ces pa bcu drug rnams kyi khru bzhi'o
T02D1347-2:17b-16: zhes pa nas brtsams te nyi shu lhag pa'i brgya
T02D1347-2:17b-17: phrag bcu drug rnams kyi khru stong gi mthar thug
T02D1347-2:17b-18: par bri bar bya ste 'byor pas so //
T02D1347-2:17b-19: 'dir dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dbus su rtsibs brgyad
T02D1347-2:17b-20: pa'i 'khor lo'am padmar 'gyur te dkyil 'khor gyi phyed
T02D1347-2:17b-22: sgo ni dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i brgyad cha'o //
T02D1347-2:17b-23: sgo yi phyed kyis kha khyer dang do shal gyi sa'o //
T02D1347-2:17b-24: kha khyer gyi phyed kyis rtsig pa'i re kh'a lnga dang rin chen snam bu'o //
T02D1347-2:17b-25: sgo'i tshad kyis sgo khyud dang logs dang 'gram mo //
T02D1347-2:17b-26: rta babs ni sgo las sum 'gyur ro zhes pa ste dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:17b-27: da ni zhi ba'i thab gsungs pa zlum po zhes
T02D1347-2:17b-28: pa la sogs pa ste 'dir 'chad par 'gyur pa'i
T02D1347-2:17b-29: thab khung rnams kyi nang nas zhi ba la zlum
T02D1347-2:17b-30: po'i thab gzung bar bya ste de nyid cha gsum
T02D1347-2:17b-31: zhes pa ni rgyar ma tho gnyis dang zabs su
T02D1347-2:17b-32: mtho gcig go // padma dkar po'i rang bzhin zhes
T02D1347-2:17b-33: pa ni snying po'i nang du rdul tshon dkar pos
T02D1347-2:17b-34: padma dang kha khyer gyi steng du padma'i phreng ba
T02D1347-2:17b-35: dang phyi rol gyi 'og tu padma'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D1347-2:17b-36: mtho gcig go // te / de ltar dkar po'i tshon rnams dag gis bkang ba'o //
T02D1347-2:17b-37: de nas padma dkar po'i lte ba dang 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:17b-38: rnams la tshon lnga dag gis lha rnams kyi mtshan
T02D1347-2:17b-39: ma bya ste rang phyogs rigs kyi dbang gis ni
T02D1347-2:17b-40: de bzhin gshegs pa lnga'i rigs kyi dbang gis so
T02D1347-2:18a-0: // rdo rje dbus dang zhes pa ni 'dir 'chad @18a * //
T02D1347-2:18a-1: par 'gyur pa las las thams cad la rdo rje'am zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:18a-2: padma'i lte ba la rdo rje sngon po ste rnam par shes pa'i phung pa'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-3: shar gyi 'dab ma la ral gri nag por 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis 'du byed do //
T02D1347-2:18a-4: lhor rin chen dmar po ste tshor ba'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-5: g-yon te byang gi 'dab ma la padma dkar po 'dab ma brgya pa ste 'du shes so //
T02D1347-2:18a-6: nub tu 'khor lo'i mtshan ma ser po ste gzugs kyi phung po'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-7: me'i 'dab ma la gri gug nag po ste rlung ngo //
T02D1347-2:18a-8: padma'i 'dab ma la gnas lha min zur du ste bden bral du lcags kyu dmar po ste me'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-9: rlung du rdo rje zhags pa ser po ste sa'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-10: drag po'i 'dab ma dag la ste dbang ldan du rtse gsum dkar po ste chu'i khams so //
T02D1347-2:18a-11: dbus kyi rdo rje ni rnam par shes pa dang lhan cig nam mkha'i khams so //
T02D1347-2:18a-12: shar gyi sgor ral gri nag po ste khro po phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-13: lho'i sgor rdo rje dbyug pa dmar po ste khro po 'dod chags rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-14: chu ru ste nub kyi sgor be con ser po ste khro bo gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-15: byang gi sgor thob dkar po ste khro bo nga rgyal rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-16: dbus su rdo rje sngon po ni khro bo'i rgyal po zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-17: sems kyi zhes pa la sogs pa nas don du
T02D1347-2:18a-18: 'di dag mdzod ces pa'i mthar thug pa ni go
T02D1347-2:18a-19: sla'o // da ni gdon gyis zin pa rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:18a-20: khrus kyi cho ga gsungs pa bum pa zhes pa
T02D1347-2:18a-21: la sogs pa ste 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs rnams
T02D1347-2:18a-22: su bum pa brgyad ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i mtshan
T02D1347-2:18a-23: nyid dang ldan pa rin chen dang bcas te rin
T02D1347-2:18a-24: po che lnga dang bcas pa 'chad par 'gyur pa'i
T02D1347-2:18a-25: sman la sogs pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-26: 'dab ma zhes pa ni 'o ma'i shing gi yal 'dab po //
T02D1347-2:18a-27: padma'i kha ste de dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:18a-28: de bzhin du som btang ba'i kham phor ni bdun gyis zhes pa ni kham phor bdun gyis so ;
T02D1347-2:18a-29: / chu dang bdud rtsi lnga la sogs pas zhes pa ni de dag dang bcas pa ste /
T02D1347-2:18a-30: chu dang 'o ma dang zho dang mar dang sbrang
T02D1347-2:18a-31: rtsi dang bu ram shing gi khu ba dang dri'i
T02D1347-2:18a-32: chu ste 'di dag gis gang pa'i kham phor bdun
T02D1347-2:18a-33: gyis rim pa bzhin du bkru bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:18a-34: de nas bum pa brgyad dang rgyal ba dang rnam
T02D1347-2:18b-0: par @18b rgyal ba'i bum pa dag gis te slar
T02D1347-2:18b-2: nyungs kar sogs kyis nges par bya ba ces pa
T02D1347-2:18b-3: ni dang por ba'i rnam lnga'i gong bu rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:18b-4: so // de nas 'bar ba'i rtsa'i thab rnams dang
T02D1347-2:18b-5: nyungs kar la sogs pa dang zan gyi gong bu
T02D1347-2:18b-6: rnams kyis te 'di dag gis bya ba par bya'o
T02D1347-2:18b-7: so // ; / de nas dri la sogs ba
T02D1347-2:18b-8: rnams kyis mchod pa dang de bzhin du rab tu
T02D1347-2:18b-9: gnas pa byas nas dkyil 'khor du gzhug par bya'o
T02D1347-2:18b-10: so // ; // der dbang bskur byin nas te
T02D1347-2:18b-11: dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa'i chus chu la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:18b-12: dbang bskur ba byin nas de nas zhi ba'i bsreg
T02D1347-2:18b-14: 'o ma zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1347-2:18b-15: gzhan gang zhig ma brjod pa de thams cad ni
T02D1347-2:18b-16: dbang gi le'u las brjod pa'i cho gas slob dpon
T02D1347-2:18b-17: gyis bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:18b-18: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:18b-19: 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-2:18b-20: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-2:18b-21: las bcud len la sogs pa dang byis pa'i rgyud
T02D1347-2:18b-22: kyi mdor bsdus pa chen po ste drug pa'o /
T02D1347-2:18b-24: // / dus kyi 'khor lo bde ba che //
T02D1347-2:18b-26: rang gzhan lta ba dag la gzhung //
T02D1347-2:18b-27: cung zad gsungs pa rnam rgyas bya //
T02D1347-2:18b-28: da ni mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las 'jam
T02D1347-2:18b-29: dpal gyis bsdus pa rang dang gzhan gyi lta ba'i
T02D1347-2:18b-30: 'dod ba'i rnam par gzhag pa gsungs pa bdag med
T02D1347-2:18b-31: ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:18b-32: 'dir 'jig rten gyi kun rdzob kyis rnam par dpyad
T02D1347-2:18b-33: na 'jig rten gyi dngos grub kyi slad du lta
T02D1347-2:18b-34: ba thams cad kyi grub pa'i mtha' mtshungs so //
T02D1347-2:18b-36: dngos po gang dang gang gis ni //
T02D1347-2:18b-37: mi rnams yid ni yang dag sbyar //
T02D1347-2:18b-38: des de'i rang bzhin nyid 'gyur te //
T02D1347-2:18b-39: sna tshogs gzugs kyi nor bu bzhin //
T02D1347-2:18b-40: zhes pa ste dngos po'i rnam par brtag pa mtshungs so //
T02D1347-2:18b-41: de bzhin du khams dang dbang po la sogs pa rnam par dpyod pa yang mtshungs so //
T02D1347-2:18b-42: tha snyad can byed pa po dang byed pa la
T02D1347-2:18b-43: sogs pa yang mtshungs te sangs rgyas pa dang mu
T02D1347-2:18b-44: stegs pa dag la bye brag med do //
T02D1347-2:18b-45: stong pa nyid kyi de kho na la ni bye
T02D1347-2:18b-46: brag yod dang de de yang bdag med ces pa
T02D1347-2:19a-1: bdag med ni rnam pa gnyis te gang zag gi bdag med dang chos kyi bdag med pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19a-2: las kyi rnam par smin pa ni rnam pa gsum ste lus dang ngag dang yid kyi'o //
T02D1347-2:19a-3: srid pa gsum zhes pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19a-4: dus kyi 'gro ba zhes pa ni dmyal ba dang
T02D1347-2:19a-5: yi dags dang dud 'gro dang mi dang lha ma
T02D1347-2:19a-6: yin dang lha rnams kyi 'gro ba ste 'gro ba
T02D1347-2:19a-7: drug go / yan lag bcu gnyis rten cing 'brel
T02D1347-2:19a-8: par 'byung ba ste de las dngos su yang dag
T02D1347-2:19a-9: 'byung ba ni 'gro ba drug po rnams so //
T02D1347-2:19a-10: rig byed bden pa zhes bya ba ni 'phags pa'i
T02D1347-2:19a-11: bden pa bzhi ste sdug bsngal dang kun 'byung dang
T02D1347-2:19a-12: lam dang 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1347-2:19a-13: gnyis kyis bsgyur pa'i dgu zhes pa bcva brgyad ni
T02D1347-2:19a-14: ma 'dres pa sangs rgyas chos rnams te 'chad par
T02D1347-2:19a-16: phung po lnga zhes pa ni gzugs la sogs pa'o ;
T02D1347-2:19a-17: / sku gsum zhes pa ni chos kyi sku la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19a-18: lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni bzhi pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19a-19: de bzhin nyid du bems po ma yin stong pa
T02D1347-2:19a-20: nyid ni rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan
T02D1347-2:19a-21: pa pra phab pa lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:19a-22: bdag med la sogs pa 'di dag gang du zhes
T02D1347-2:19a-23: pa theg pa gsum du ston pa pos brjod pa
T02D1347-2:19a-24: de ni rab tu gsal zhing nges bar rdo rje
T02D1347-2:19a-25: can gyi bstan pa ste sangs rgyas pa'i lta ba'i
T02D1347-2:19a-26: dbang gis sems can gyi bsam pas so //
T02D1347-2:19a-27: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19a-28: da ni tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug gi 'dod pa
T02D1347-2:19a-29: gsungs pa gang du zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:19a-30: ; 'dir gzhung gang du rig byed rang byung ste
T02D1347-2:19a-31: ma byas pa nam mkha' lta bu dang kha dang
T02D1347-2:19a-32: lag pa rkang pa sogs kyang skye bo'i skye gnas
T02D1347-2:19a-33: te zhes pa tshangs pa'i kha ni bram ze'i skye
T02D1347-2:19a-34: ; gnas dang / lag pa rgyal rigs kyi skye gnas dang /
T02D1347-2:19a-35: sogs pa'i sgras brla gnyis ni rje'u rigs skye gnas dang ;
T02D1347-2:19a-36: rkang pa dag ni dmangs rigs kyi skye gnas dang /
T02D1347-2:19a-37: aa shva me dha dag las gzhan pa mchog gi
T02D1347-2:19a-38: chos med ces pa ni 'dir mtho ris sgrub par
T02D1347-2:19a-39: byed pa la aa shva me dha'i mchod sbyin las
T02D1347-2:19a-40: gzhan pa mchog gi chos yod pa ma yin no
T02D1347-2:19a-41: zhes pa de ni tshangs pa'i bstan par 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:19b-0: zhes pa la sogs pa ni @19b tshangs pa'i 'dod
T02D1347-2:19b-1: pa nges pa'o // 'dir de'i nang du 'dus pa
T02D1347-2:19b-2: klu'i chos khyab 'jug gi 'dod pa ni 'di lta
T02D1347-2:19b-3: pa nges pa'o // ste / byed pa po yod
T02D1347-2:19b-4: pa dang bdag yod pa dang dge ba dang mi
T02D1347-2:19b-5: dge ba'i las yod pa dang dus yod pa dang
T02D1347-2:19b-6: sa la sogs pa'i rang bzhin yod pa dang /
T02D1347-2:19b-7: snying stobs la sogs pa'i yon tan yod pa dang
T02D1347-2:19b-8: stong pa nyid ni mnyam pa'i chos nyid yod de
T02D1347-2:19b-9: gcig tu gyur pa la sogs pas mi mthong ba'i
T02D1347-2:19b-10: phyir ro zhes brjod pa dang /
T02D1347-2:19b-11: byed po dag ba dang mi dge bas byas pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa'i rgyu yod do //
T02D1347-2:19b-12: zhes pa ni rab tu gsal zhing nges par bstan
T02D1347-2:19b-13: te dus kyi 'khor lo 'dir khyab 'jug dag gi'o
T02D1347-2:19b-14: zhes pa ni khyab 'jug pa'i 'dod pa'i nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:19b-15: // da ni dbang phyug gi 'dod pa gsungs pa
T02D1347-2:19b-16: lam drug ces pa la sogs pa ste 'dir sngar
T02D1347-2:19b-17: brjod pa'i khyab 'jug gi 'dod pa dang lhan cig
T02D1347-2:19b-20: lha gsum po ni gzugs gcig ste //
T02D1347-2:19b-21: tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che zhes pa'i nges tshig las so //
T02D1347-2:19b-22: byed pa po dang bdag dang las dang dus dang
T02D1347-2:19b-23: rang bzhin dang yon tan dang stong pa nyid zhig
T02D1347-2:19b-24: pa'i chos ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste mtha'i
T02D1347-2:19b-26: di dag dang lhan cig lam drug la sogs pa rnams rig par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19b-27: 'dir lus la lam drug rnams zhes pa ni yul drug po rnams la 'jug par byed pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19b-28: de nyid lnga dang zhes pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams kyi tshogs so //
T02D1347-2:19b-29: mchog gi go 'phang zhes pa ni drug pa ye shes kyi khams so //
T02D1347-2:19b-30: ma lus pa zhes pa ni khams thams cad gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19b-32: sngags kyi lus zhes pa ni a'a li k'a li'i bdag nyid can te sngags kyi de nyid do //
T02D1347-2:19b-33: rig ces pa ni dga' ba la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i de kho na nyid do //
T02D1347-2:19b-34: bdag ces pa ni bdag gi de kho na nyid rtag pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19b-35: dam pa'i zhi ba nyid ces pa ni zhi ba'i de nyid de thams cad du khyab pa'o //
T02D1347-2:19b-36: gzugs spangs pa de'i rnam gsum gnas na gnas pa
T02D1347-2:19b-37: ni gong bu la gnas pa dang tshig la gnas
T02D1347-2:19b-38: pa dang gzugs la gnas pa ste /
T02D1347-2:20a-0: lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rnam @20a * //
T02D1347-2:20a-1: par rtog pa'i chos can no //
T02D1347-2:20a-2: rnam gsum gnas na gnas pa de'i sbyor dang zhes
T02D1347-2:20a-3: pa ni skye ba'i dus su lam drug la sogs
T02D1347-2:20a-4: pa 'di dag rnams sbyor ba ste 'dus pa dang
T02D1347-2:20a-5: / 'chi ba'i dus su gtong ba'i dngos te de rnams rnam par 'brel lo zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-2:20a-6: thig le'i dbye bzhi pa nyid dang zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:20a-7: 'dir khu ba thig le'i dbye ba ste 'dzag pa'i
T02D1347-2:20a-8: bde ba'i gnas skabs kyi mtshan nyid de nyid zhi
T02D1347-2:20a-9: ba nyid do // mtha' dag lus la gnas pa
T02D1347-2:20a-10: zhes pa ni rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba la
T02D1347-2:20a-11: ba nyid do // khyab pa'o // bcu gnyis mdud
T02D1347-2:20a-12: pa'i dbye ba ste zhes pa ni 'dir srog chags
T02D1347-2:20a-13: rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i khyim bcu gnyis po
T02D1347-2:20a-14: rnams mdud pa'i sgras gsungs te khyim bcu gnyis po
T02D1347-2:20a-15: 'di rnams kyi dbye ba ni lo dang bgrod pa
T02D1347-2:20a-16: dang dus gsum dang dus bzhi dang dus drug dang
T02D1347-2:20a-17: ba nyid do // khyab pa'o // / zla ba
T02D1347-2:20a-18: dang phyogs dang nyin zhag dang chu tshod dang chu
T02D1347-2:20a-19: srang dang dbugs te 'di thams cad grub pa'i mtha'
T02D1347-2:20a-20: gang du rab tu gyur pa de ni nges par
T02D1347-2:20a-22: zhes pa ni zhi ba pa'i 'dod pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:20a-23: da ni 'jig rten rgyang pa na pa'i 'dod pa
T02D1347-2:20a-24: gsungs pa dbang phyug ces pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:20a-25: / 'dir lus can rnams la dbang phyug med pa
T02D1347-2:20a-26: dang byed pa po med pa dang las kyi rnam
T02D1347-2:20a-27: par smin pa dag kyang med pa dang /
T02D1347-2:20a-28: yon tan yul rnams zhes pa ni yon tan snying
T02D1347-2:20a-29: stobs la sogs pa dang yul dri la sogs pa'o
T02D1347-2:20a-30: // 'byung ba'i tshogs zhes pa ni sa la sogs pa ste de dag longs spyod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:20a-31: 'byung ba'i tshogs de med pa na ste shi ba'i mthar las kyi 'bras bu med do //
T02D1347-2:20a-32: aa ru ra dang bu ram la sogs pa yang
T02D1347-2:20a-33: dag par sbyor ba las chang gi nus pa bzhin
T02D1347-2:20a-34: 'byung ba rnams yang dag par sbyor ba'i nus pa
T02D1347-2:20a-35: ste de med pa na 'jig rten pha rol gyi
T02D1347-2:20a-36: lus 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin no zhes pa
T02D1347-2:20a-37: ni gsal bar lha yi bla ma phur bu'i bstan
T02D1347-2:20a-39: 'jig rten rgya nga phan pa'i 'dod pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:20a-40: da ni kla klo stag gzig rnams kyi 'dod pa
T02D1347-2:20a-41: gsungs pa byed po zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:20a-42: / 'dir byed po rahma na sa rgyu ba g-yo
T02D1347-2:20a-43: ba dang mi rgyu ba brtan pa'i dngos po mtha'
T02D1347-2:20b-0: dag bskyed cing stag @20b gzig rnams kyi zhes pa
T02D1347-2:20b-1: kla klo gos dkar po can rnams kyi thar pa
T02D1347-2:20b-2: dag gi rgyu rahma na de mnyes pa las nges
T02D1347-2:20b-3: par mi rnams mtho ris dang /
T02D1347-2:20b-4: ma mnyes pa las dmyal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa
T02D1347-2:20b-5: de ni rahma na yi bstan pa ste bya ba
T02D1347-2:20b-7: stag gzig gi 'dod pa des pa'o //
T02D1347-2:20b-8: da ni zad byed pa rnams kyi 'dod pa gsungs
T02D1347-2:20b-9: pa dus gsum zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir
T02D1347-2:20b-10: zad byed pa'i grub pa'i mtha' smra ba la rdzas
T02D1347-2:20b-11: dang rnam grangs dag gis rtag pa dang mi rtag
T02D1347-2:20b-13: de la dus gsum nyid dang zhes pa ni 'das
T02D1347-2:20b-14: pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'o
T02D1347-2:20b-15: // rdzas ni drug ste zhes pa ni srog dang
T02D1347-2:20b-16: gang zag dang dus dang nam mkha' dang bsod nams
T02D1347-2:20b-17: // dang sdig pa'o // 'di dag gi nang nas srog dang dus dang nam mkha' ni rtag pa'o //
T02D1347-2:20b-18: tshig dgus bsgrubs dang zhes pa ni srog dang srog
T02D1347-2:20b-19: ma yin pa dang zag pa dang sngom pa dang
T02D1347-2:20b-20: spangs pa dang bcings pa dang thar pa dang 'gro
T02D1347-2:20b-22: srog ni drug gi lus la cha shas so //
T02D1347-2:20b-23: zhes pa ni sa'i lus la cha shas dang chu'i
T02D1347-2:20b-24: lus la cha shas dang me'i lus la cha shas
T02D1347-2:20b-25: dang rlung gi lus la cha shas dang /
T02D1347-2:20b-26: nags kyi bdag po'i lus la cha shas dang 'bru'i
T02D1347-2:20b-27: lus la cha shas so zhes pa ste lus drug
T02D1347-2:20b-28: la srog rnams kyi cha shas so //
T02D1347-2:20b-29: gzhan ni yod pa'i lus lnga zhes pa ni kha
T02D1347-2:20b-30: zas can gyi lus dang 'od kyi lus dang rang
T02D1347-2:20b-32: brdzus skyes kyi lus dang mtha'i lus so zhes pa ni srog rnams kyi'o //
T02D1347-2:20b-33: brtul nyugs sngom pa 'gro dang ye shes spyod pa
T02D1347-2:20b-34: dag gi dbye ba rnams zhes pa la zad byed
T02D1347-2:20b-35: pa rnams kyi brtul zhugs ni lnga ste /
T02D1347-2:20b-36: dang po 'tshe ba med pa dang gnyis pa bden
T02D1347-2:20b-37: par smra ba dang gsum pa byin pa len pa
T02D1347-2:20b-38: dang bzhi pa tshangs par spyod pa dang lnga pa
T02D1347-2:20b-39: yongs su bzung ba thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o
T02D1347-2:20b-41: spyod lam gyi sngom pa dang /
T02D1347-2:20b-42: skad kyi sngom pa dang yongs su tshol ba'i sngom
T02D1347-2:20b-43: pa dang blangs pa mi 'dor ba'i sngom pa dang
T02D1347-2:20b-44: nye bar rab tu gnas pa'i sngom pa'o //
T02D1347-2:20b-45: 'gro ba'i dbye ba ni lnga ste /
T02D1347-2:20b-46: dmyal ba dang dud 'gro dang mi dang lha dang thar pa'i 'gro ba'o //
T02D1347-2:21a-0: @21a * // ye shes kyi dbye ba ni lnga ste /
T02D1347-2:21a-1: blo gros dang thos pa dang mtshams dang yid kyi yongs su tshol ba dang mo'i ye shes so //
T02D1347-2:21a-2: spyod pa'i dbye ba ni bcu gsum ste /
T02D1347-2:21a-3: brtul zhugs kyi dbye ba lnga dang /
T02D1347-2:21a-4: sngom pa'i dbye ba lnga dang /
T02D1347-2:21a-6: ngag gi gsang ba dang sems kyi gsang ba'o //
T02D1347-2:21a-7: zhes pa 'di dag ni mchod 'os pa rnams kyis thar pa'i don du rab tu brjod do //
T02D1347-2:21a-8: srog ni lus kyi tshad de dpag tu med pa'i
T02D1347-2:21a-9: srid pa dag gis rtag pa'i srog gis thar pa'o
T02D1347-2:21a-10: // grub pa'i mtha' gang du thar pa'i tshad ni
T02D1347-2:21a-11: 'jig rten gsum gyi steng du gdugs kyi rnam pa
T02D1347-2:21a-12: dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhi bcu rtsa lnga par nges
T02D1347-2:21a-13: par brjod pa de ni rgyal ba rnams kyi bstan
T02D1347-2:21a-14: // pa'o // zhes pa ni zad byed pa'i 'dod pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:21a-15: da ni mu stegs pa rnams kyi 'dod pa rigs
T02D1347-2:21a-16: pas rnam par dpyad nas sun dbyung bar gsungs pa
T02D1347-2:21a-17: rig byed ces pa la sogs pa ste 'dir rigs
T02D1347-2:21a-18: pas rnam par dpyad na rig byed ni rang byung
T02D1347-2:21a-19: ma yin no // de ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D1347-2:21a-21: rig byed kyi sgras don rjod par byed pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:21a-22: 'di sgra gang zhig don gyi rjod byed yin pa
T02D1347-2:21a-23: de ni mgrin pa dang rkan la sogs pa'i rtsol
T02D1347-2:21a-24: bas bskyed pa gang yin pa de'i phyir rang byung
T02D1347-2:21a-26: ci ste 'di ni rig byed kyi sgra ma yin te gzhan nyid do //
T02D1347-2:21a-27: 'di ni rna ba'i bug pa'i nang du sgra'i don
T02D1347-2:21a-28: thams cad dang gcig tu 'dres par gyur cing rtag
T02D1347-2:21a-29: pa de'i mngon par gsal bar byed pa'o zhes 'grub
T02D1347-2:21a-30: po zhe na / de'i phyir smra pa /
T02D1347-2:21a-31: 'dir gal te rig byed sgra'i don thams cad dang
T02D1347-2:21a-32: gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa nyid kyis gnas shing
T02D1347-2:21a-34: de'i tshe bum pa zhes brjod par gyur pa na
T02D1347-2:21a-35: rna ba'i bug pa'i nang du ca cor rtogs par
T02D1347-2:21a-36: bya bar 'gyur te de ltar yang ma yin no
T02D1347-2:21a-37: // de'i phyir rtag pa'i sgra gzhan khyab par byed
T02D1347-2:21a-38: pa yod pa'i dam bca' ba 'di ni don med
T02D1347-2:21a-39: // pa'o // don ni tha dad min na gal
T02D1347-2:21a-40: te sgra dang don dag gcig nyid yin pa de
T02D1347-2:21a-41: lta na me'i sgra brjod pa dag gis rang gi
T02D1347-2:21a-42: kha cis mi sreg / de'i phyir rig byed ni
T02D1347-2:21a-43: rtag pa nyid ma yin zhing don dang lhan cig
T02D1347-2:21a-44: gcig nyid ma yin no zhes grub ste gzhan pa
T02D1347-2:21b-1: kla klo rnams kyis rig byed kyi chos bsgribs par
T02D1347-2:21b-2: gyur pa na rig byed med par gyur pa de'i
T02D1347-2:21b-3: tshe tshangs pa'i gdong bzhi dag gis sngon ni rig
T02D1347-2:21b-4: byed sgra dag gis kyang don ni rab tu gsal
T02D1347-2:21b-5: bar byas te dbang po phyugs su gyur zhes pa
T02D1347-2:21b-6: la sogs pa'i klog gis so //
T02D1347-2:21b-8: de'i phyir don gzhan dang rig byed gzhan zhes grub bo //
T02D1347-2:21b-9: de'i phyir ston pa po tshangs pa yod de rig
T02D1347-2:21b-10: pa'i yul dang ma 'ongs don dang 'das pa dag
T02D1347-2:21b-11: la ston pa po grub ste gyur zhes pa'i klog
T02D1347-2:21b-12: las so // khas klog pa las byas par grub po /
T02D1347-2:21b-13: de'i phyir rig byed nam mkha' mtshungs min 'dir ni
T02D1347-2:21b-14: gnas kyi dbye ba dag las kha yis rab brjod
T02D1347-2:21b-15: byas pa'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:21b-16: rigs pas gnyis skyes kha yis bklags pa nyid tshe
T02D1347-2:21b-17: ba ste kun du 'gro ba gzhan rnams klog pa'o
T02D1347-2:21b-18: // gang phyir dmangs la sogs pa'i rigs ni kun
T02D1347-2:21b-19: 'gro min pa'i rig byed 'di dag klog dang 'gro
T02D1347-2:21b-20: // ba min // de phyir shes rab mkhas par
T02D1347-2:21b-21: gyur pa'i mi rnams dag la rig byed dag ni
T02D1347-2:21b-22: tshad mar mi 'gyur ro zhes pa ni mdor bsdus
T02D1347-2:21b-23: pas rig byed byas par 'grub pa ste rgya cher
T02D1347-2:21b-24: tshad ma'i bstan bcos las shes par bya'o zhes bya
T02D1347-2:21b-26: da ni bram ze la sogs pa rnams kyi skye
T02D1347-2:21b-27: gnas sngar brjod pa sun dbyung ba brjod par bya
T02D1347-2:21b-28: ste 'dir tshangs pa'i kha ni bram ze rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:21b-29: skye gnas te de las skye ba'i phyir ro zhes
T02D1347-2:21b-30: grag go // de bzhin du dpung pa ni rgyal rigs rnams kyi skye gnas so //
T02D1347-2:21b-31: sogs pa'i sgras brla gnyis ni rje rigs rnams kyi skye gnas so //
T02D1347-2:21b-32: rkang pa gnyis ni dmangs rigs rnams kyi skye gnas te de ltar rigs bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:21b-33: rigs bzhi po 'di dag gi mtha' ni rigs lnga pa ste /
T02D1347-2:21b-34: gdol pa de dag rnams kyi skye gnas gang yin
T02D1347-2:21b-35: ni re zhig bram ze rnams kyis mi shes so
T02D1347-2:21b-36: zhes pa las gzhan pa ci /
T02D1347-2:21b-37: 'dir tshangs pa'i kha las bram ze rnams skyes pa ni bden par grags go //
T02D1347-2:21b-38: de'i phyir bdag gis dri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:21b-39: bram ze mo rnams kyang de las skyes par gyur tam ci /
T02D1347-2:21b-40: gal te gyur na de'i tshe sring mor 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:22a-0: skye gnas gcig las skyes pa nyid kyi phyir @22a
T02D1347-2:22a-2: / de bzhin du rgyal rigs la sogs pa rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1347-2:22a-3: de'i phyir sring mo dang lhan cig bag ma ji ltar byed /
T02D1347-2:22a-4: ci ste byed na de'i tshe kla klo'i chos la zhugs so //
T02D1347-2:22a-5: kla klo'i chos la zhugs na rigs nyams te rigs nyams pa las dmyal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:22a-7: gzhan yang rnam par dpyad par bya ste 'dir gal
T02D1347-2:22a-8: te skye dgu rnams gcig gis bskyed pa yin na
T02D1347-2:22a-9: de'i tshe rigs bzhir ji ltar 'gyur /
T02D1347-2:22a-10: dper na pha gcig gi bu bzhi bzhin te de
T02D1347-2:22a-11: dag ni rigs so so so so ma yin no
T02D1347-2:22a-12: // de bzhin du rigs rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1347-2:22a-13: ci ste tshangs pa'i kha la sogs pa'i dbye bas tha dad na /
T02D1347-2:22a-14: de'i tshe de nyid rigs pas mi 'thad de ji
T02D1347-2:22a-15: ltar au dum b'a ra'i 'bras bu rtsa ba dang
T02D1347-2:22a-16: rked pa dang rtse mo las skyes pa rnams tha
T02D1347-2:22a-17: dad med pa de bzhin du skye dgu rnams kyang
T02D1347-2:22a-18: ngo // gzhan yang dkar po dang dmar po dang
T02D1347-2:22a-19: ser po dang nag po'i kha dog gi dbye bas
T02D1347-2:22a-20: tha dad pa ni ma mthong ngo //
T02D1347-2:22a-21: de bzhin du khams dang dbang po dang bde ba
T02D1347-2:22a-22: dang sdug bsngal dang rigs pa dang lung la sogs
T02D1347-2:22a-23: pa'i dbye ba ma mthong ba gang yin pa de'i
T02D1347-2:22a-24: phyir rigs nges pa med pa'o zhes grub po //
T02D1347-2:22a-25: de bzhin du aa shva me dha la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:22a-26: mchod sbyin gyi 'bras bu shu kas sun phyung ba
T02D1347-2:22a-27: 'di lta ste / mchod sdong bcad cing phyugs bsad de //
T02D1347-2:22a-28: khrag 'dam byas nas mtho ris su //
T02D1347-2:22a-29: gal te 'gro ba de lha na /
T02D1347-2:22a-31: zhes pa shu ka'i tshig tu rab tu grags so //
T02D1347-2:22a-32: de'i phyir rig byed rang byung ma yin zhing kha
T02D1347-2:22a-33: la sogs pa skye bo'i skye gnas dang aa shva
T02D1347-2:22a-34: me dha las gzhan pa mchog gi chos med pa
T02D1347-2:22a-35: ma yin te tshangs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad rnams
T02D1347-2:22a-36: par dpyad na don med pa'i rab tu smra ba'o
T02D1347-2:22a-37: // khyab 'jug pa'i 'dod pa ni dbang phyug dang lhan cig sun dbyung bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:22a-38: da ni dbang phyug gi 'dod pa sun dbyung ba
T02D1347-2:22a-39: gsungs pa gal te zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:22a-40: / 'dir gal te thams cad byed pa po dbang phyug yod par gyur na /
T02D1347-2:22a-41: de'i tshe longs spyod pa po yang gzhan ma yin
T02D1347-2:22a-42: te ji ltar gzhan gyis khur ba zos pas gzhan
T02D1347-2:22a-44: de ltar yang ma yin no //
T02D1347-2:22b-0: gang gis byed pa de ni byed pa po @22b ste gang bya ba de ni las so //
T02D1347-2:22b-1: las byas pa de'i 'bras bu longs spyod pa po ni las byed pa po'o //
T02D1347-2:22b-2: las med na byed pa po mi 'grub ste dper
T02D1347-2:22b-3: na bum pa byed pa'i phyir bum pa mkhan no

T02D1347-2:25b-14: // // ji ltar zhe na don dam pa ye

T02D1347-2:26b-22: de'i phyir dbu ma pas smras pa /
