T02D1347-2:28a-48: rgyas kyi gsung dang mtshungs pa de ni sun dbyung
T02D1347-2:28a-49: bar mi bya'o zhes pa ni dus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1347-2:28a-50: dang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:28a-51: // zhes pa la sogs pa ye shes slad du
T02D1347-2:28b-0: dus kyi 'khor los sa la @28b bstan par rab
T02D1347-2:28b-2: 'jam dang sra dang gzhan pa'i bag chags stobs kyis
T02D1347-2:28b-3: skyes bu rnams kyi sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba
T02D1347-2:28b-4: ste // sems ni nges par dngos po'i tshon gyis
T02D1347-2:28b-5: nye bar gzhag pa dag las shel bzhin tshon ldan
T02D1347-2:28b-6: ste // nyid 'gyur pa // gang yin de phyir
T02D1347-2:28b-7: rang gzhan rigs su gyur pa'i chos ni 'ga' yang
T02D1347-2:28b-8: rnal 'byor ba yis sun mi dbyung //
T02D1347-2:28b-9: chos ni sems can phan pa yul dang rnam par
T02D1347-2:28b-10: bral ba dag ste chos min dag kyang gnod pa'o
T02D1347-2:28b-11: // 'tshe ba'i rig byed tshad ma can ni bde
T02D1347-2:28b-12: ba'i 'bras bu mi ster dus kun du ni sdug
T02D1347-2:28b-13: // bsngal ster // dam pa'i byams ldan rmongs pa'i
T02D1347-2:28b-14: tshig las mchog gi bde ba byed cing sems can
T02D1347-2:28b-16: de phyir sems can don ni gcig pu dag dang
T02D1347-2:28b-17: mi bdag yid kyis rang bzhin med pa bsgom par
T02D1347-2:28b-18: bgyis // lha mi'i bla ma nga ni mtho ris
T02D1347-2:28b-19: 'jig rten dag tu dbang po sa steng du ni
T02D1347-2:28b-20: bgyis // 'khor los sgyur // sa 'og dag gu
T02D1347-2:28b-21: klu yi rgyal po gdengs can rigs kyis btud dang
T02D1347-2:28b-22: kun du 'gro dang mchog nga ste //
T02D1347-2:28b-23: ye shes sangs rgyas thub dbang 'gyur med mchog dang
T02D1347-2:28b-24: khyab bdag rnal 'byor rnams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:28b-25: dang // rigs byed aom gyi yi ge gtsang ma
T02D1347-2:28b-26: dag ste rgyal po dngos po kun gyis bdag la
T02D1347-2:28b-27: skyabs su song zhes pa ni skyabs kyi nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:28b-28: dang // // da ni nyi ma'i shing rtas phyag byas pa //
T02D1347-2:28b-29: khyod ni ma dang khyod ni pha ste khyod ni
T02D1347-2:28b-30: 'gro ba'i bla ma khyod ni gnyen dang grogs bzang
T02D1347-2:28b-31: yang // khyod ni mgon po khyod ni byed po
T02D1347-2:28b-32: phan dang sdig 'phrog khyod ni go 'phang phan sum
T02D1347-2:28b-33: yang // tshogs pa yang // khyod ni 'ba' zhig
T02D1347-2:28b-34: gnas dang khyod ni yon tan mchog gi gnas te
T02D1347-2:28b-35: skyon rnams bcom pa khyod nyid do //
T02D1347-2:28b-36: khyod ni dman pa rnams kyi mgon dang yid bzhin
T02D1347-2:28b-37: nor bu rgyal ba'i dbang po khyod la bdag skyabs
T02D1347-2:28b-38: mchi // zhes te nyi ma'i shing rtas bla ma'i
T02D1347-2:28b-39: phyag gis bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal la bstod nas
T02D1347-2:28b-40: zhabs gnyis po spyi por byas te slar yang rang
T02D1347-2:28b-42: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:28b-43: 'grel bshad rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-2:28b-44: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-2:28b-45: las rang dang gzhan gyi lta ba rigs pas rnams
T02D1347-2:28b-46: par dpyad pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste bdun pa'o
T02D1347-2:28b-48: / // / nang gi le'u'i 'grel bshad rdzogs so //
T02D1347-2:29a-0: @29a * // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1347-2:29a-1: bsod nams ye shes kyis sprul bcom ldan 'das ni gdul dka'i sems can rnams kyis rtag tu ni //
T02D1347-2:29a-2: 'jigs byed 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs dang skye bo mkhas pa rnams kyis dregs dang bral bar mthong //
T02D1347-2:29a-3: gang zhig kho na'i gsung ni sems can rnams kyi mos pa'i sems kyi dbang gis kun gyi sgra //
T02D1347-2:29a-4: gzhan gyi rna bar son pas dam pa'i lam ni yang dag ston par mdzad pa de la 'dud //
T02D1347-2:29a-5: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pa'i //
T02D1347-2:29a-6: sku ni mos pa sna tshogs las //
T02D1347-2:29a-7: rang rang bsam pas sems can gyis //
T02D1347-2:29a-8: mthong ba sprul pa'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1347-2:29a-9: gang zhig sems can kun gyi sgras //
T02D1347-2:29a-10: rdzu 'phrul bdag nyid rab gsal byed //
T02D1347-2:29a-11: sems can bsam pa'i dbang gis 'di //
T02D1347-2:29a-12: longs spyod rdzogs sku'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1347-2:29a-13: mi rtag pa min rtag pa'ang min //
T02D1347-2:29a-14: gcig min du ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02D1347-2:29a-15: dngos min dngos po med pa'ang min //
T02D1347-2:29a-17: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med cing //
T02D1347-2:29a-18: chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs //
T02D1347-2:29a-19: shes rab ma yin thabs kyang min //
T02D1347-2:29a-20: 'di ni ngo bo nyid sku gzhan //
T02D1347-2:29a-21: dus kyi 'khor lo zhes grags pa //
T02D1347-2:29a-22: sku bzhi'i bdag nyid zhi ba la //
T02D1347-2:29a-23: dngos po kun gyis phyag 'tshal te //
T02D1347-2:29a-25: 'jam pa'i dpal gyis bskul gyur pas //
T02D1347-2:29a-27: sprul pa'i skur ni gyur pa bdag / pad ma dkar pos bri bar bya //
T02D1347-2:29a-28: 'dir dpal ldan ka l'a pa'i grong gi lho //
T02D1347-2:29a-29: ma la ya'i skyed mos tshal gyi dpal dus kyi
T02D1347-2:29a-30: 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i shar sgo'i mthar
T02D1347-2:29a-31: rin po che'i sgo khyams na seng ge'i khri la
T02D1347-2:29a-32: bzhugs pa bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa'i
T02D1347-2:29a-33: sku mi'i dbang po grags pa la nyi ma'i shing
T02D1347-2:29a-34: rtas gsol ba btab par gyur pas mchog gi dang
T02D1347-2:29a-35: po'i sangs rgyas las sgrub thabs kyi le'ur zla ba
T02D1347-2:29a-36: bzang pos gsol ba btab pa dang /
T02D1347-2:29a-37: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi lan gyi gsung tshigs
T02D1347-2:29a-38: su bcad pa dang pos 'khor chen po la rab
T02D1347-2:29b-0: tu bstan par gyur @29b pa rgyal bskyed mdzad bdag
T02D1347-2:29b-1: gis dbang bskur bdun po rnams dang bum pa dang
T02D1347-2:29b-2: ni gsang ba'i dbang bskur dang //
T02D1347-2:29b-3: shes rab ye shes dbang bskur srid pa'i 'jigs pa
T02D1347-2:29b-4: 'joms pa rnal 'byor rnams kyi bgrod bya ba zhi
T02D1347-2:29b-5: pa thob // slar yang rgyal ba mchog dang bcas
T02D1347-2:29b-6: pa sna tshogs gtso bo'i sgrub thabs yang dag par
T02D1347-2:29b-7: pa thob // ni bdag gzhu'o // zla ba bzang
T02D1347-2:29b-8: po'i tshig gsan nas ni rgyal ba'i bdag pos rdo
T02D1347-2:29b-9: rje can dag gi yang sgrub thabs gsungs zhes pa
T02D1347-2:29b-10: ste 'dir tshig su bcad pa'i rkang pa gsum gyis
T02D1347-2:29b-11: sgrub thabs kyi le 'u bstan pa'i slad du zla
T02D1347-2:29b-12: ba bzang pos gsol ba btab pa'o //
T02D1347-2:29b-13: de nas rkang pa bzhi pa nas brtsams te ji
T02D1347-2:29b-14: srid le'u yongs su rdzogs pa de srid ni bcom
T02D1347-2:29b-15: ldan 'das kyi lan gyi gsung ngo //
T02D1347-2:29b-16: da ni zla ba bzang po'i tshig gsan nas ni
T02D1347-2:29b-17: rgyal ba'i bdag go bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa
T02D1347-2:29b-18: dus kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
T02D1347-2:29b-19: zhugs pas rdo rje can bcom ldan 'das dpal dus
T02D1347-2:29b-20: kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs gsungs te yang yig gis
T02D1347-2:29b-21: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1347-2:29b-22: rnams dang rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma la
T02D1347-2:29b-23: sogs pa lha mo rnams dang phyag na rdo rje
T02D1347-2:29b-24: la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang sgra
T02D1347-2:29b-25: rdo rje ma la sogs pa yul gyi lha mo
T02D1347-2:29b-26: rnams dang gtsug tor la sogs pa khro bo'i rgyal
T02D1347-2:29b-27: bo chen po rnams dang shin tu sngon mo la
T02D1347-2:29b-28: sogs pa khro bo'i lha mo rnams dang tsartsi k'a
T02D1347-2:29b-29: la sogs pa ma mo rnams dang khyab 'jug la
T02D1347-2:29b-30: sogs pa lha rnams dang rgyal ba la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:29b-31: klu'i rgyal po rnams dang khyi gdong ma la sogs
T02D1347-2:29b-32: pa rab gtum ma rnams dang gzhan rnams kyi yang
T02D1347-2:29b-33: so so'i sgrub thabs rgyal ba'i bdag pos gsungs te
T02D1347-2:29b-34: gzugs kyi sgom pas 'og min gyi srid pa'i mthar
T02D1347-2:29b-35: thug pa 'jig rten pa'i dngos grub sgrub pa'i ched
T02D1347-2:29b-36: du'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:29b-37: // da ni dus rnams par dag pas bcom ldan
T02D1347-2:29b-38: 'das kyi gzugs brtags pa mdor bstan pa gsungs pa
T02D1347-2:29b-39: zla ba'i sku zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir
T02D1347-2:29b-40: dang po'i sangs rgyas las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
T02D1347-2:29b-41: // pa / nyin mo nyi ma rdul rdo rje //
T02D1347-2:30a-2: khu ba padma de dag gcig //
T02D1347-2:30a-3: dus kyi 'khor lo bde chen po //
T02D1347-2:30a-5: de bzhin du rgyud gzhan dang gzhan dag las kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyir gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:30a-6: nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1347-2:30a-7: mtshan mo shes rab rab tu grags //
T02D1347-2:30a-8: ji ltar nyi ma drag po dang //
T02D1347-2:30a-9: de bzhin zla ba au mar 'dod ces pa'o //
T02D1347-2:30a-10: de ltar nyi ma dang zla ba dang nyin mo
T02D1347-2:30a-11: dang mtshan mo'i dbye bas nyin mtshan ni dus zhes
T02D1347-2:30a-12: gsungs te de'i 'khor lo ni dbugs drug brgya lhag
T02D1347-2:30a-13: pa'i stong phrag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:30a-14: dang rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyi mtshan nyid
T02D1347-2:30a-15: khyim gyi 'khor lo ste sems can thams cad kyi
T02D1347-2:30a-16: skye ba dang 'jig pa'i rgyur gyur pa 'jig rten
T02D1347-2:30a-18: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:30a-19: dus kyis 'byung po rnams spro zhing //
T02D1347-2:30a-20: dus kyis rtag tu sdud par byed //
T02D1347-2:30a-21: dus ni bcom ldan rdo rje can //
T02D1347-2:30a-22: nyin mtshan rang bzhin can yin no zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:30a-23: de ltar dus kyi 'khor lo 'di'i sgrub thabs ni
T02D1347-2:30a-24: skye ba dang 'jig pa rnam par nyams pa'i don
T02D1347-2:30a-25: du rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis 'chad par 'gyur pa'i
T02D1347-2:30a-26: rim par bya'o // gzugs brtags pa'i nges pa ni
T02D1347-2:30a-27: zla ba'i sku zhes pa las sogs pa ste dus
T02D1347-2:30a-28: sbyor bcu gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi nyin mtshan ni
T02D1347-2:30a-29: rim par bya'o // sku gcig go // de'i dus
T02D1347-2:30a-30: sbyor drug drug gi bdag nyid g-yon dang g-yas pa'i
T02D1347-2:30a-31: zhabs te zung gi zhabs zhes so //
T02D1347-2:30a-32: dus sbyor bzhi bzhi'i bdag nyid ni g-yon dang g-yas
T02D1347-2:30a-33: dang dbus kyi mgrin pa ste me yi mgrin pa
T02D1347-2:30a-34: zhes pa mgrin pa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:30a-35: de bzhin du dus sbyor gsum gsum gyi bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:30a-36: ni shar dang lho dang nub dang byang gi zhal
T02D1347-2:30a-37: bzhi ste chu gter zhes pa zhal bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:30a-38: sna tshogs mdog ni 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:30a-39: de bzhin du dus sbyor gnyis gnyis kyi bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:30a-40: ni g-yon dang g-yas su yang shar dang nub dang
T02D1347-2:30a-41: dbus kyi phrag pa ste phrag pa drug ces so
T02D1347-2:30a-42: // de bzhin du zla ba so so'i bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:30a-43: ni dpung pa rnams te dpung pa de rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:30a-44: nyi ma'i dpung ba zhes so //
T02D1347-2:30a-45: dus sbyor phyed pa so sor phyogs kyi dbye bas
T02D1347-2:30a-46: phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste rgyal ba'i phyag gi
T02D1347-2:30a-47: padma zhes so // de bzhin du dbugs drug cu
T02D1347-2:30b-0: drug cu'i bdag @30b nyid dang nyin zhag so so'i
T02D1347-2:30b-1: dbye bas sor mo'i tshigs sum brgya drug cu ste
T02D1347-2:30b-2: phyag re re la sor mo lnga lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:30b-3: tshigs gsum gyi dbye bas tshigs bcva lnga ste phyag
T02D1347-2:30b-4: nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams la sum brgya drug
T02D1347-2:30b-5: cur 'gyur ro // de ltar stong pa drug dang me yi tshigs zhes so //
T02D1347-2:30b-6: zhabs dag gis ni zla ba nyi ma bsreg za'i
T02D1347-2:30b-7: dkyil 'khor rnams la bdud dang drag po zhes pa
T02D1347-2:30b-8: phung po dang nyon mongs pa dang 'chi bdag dang
T02D1347-2:30b-10: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug dang nga
T02D1347-2:30b-11: rgyal gyi bdag nyid ni drag po ste skrag bzhin
T02D1347-2:30b-12: du dus kyi 'khor lo gang gis rol pas mnan
T02D1347-2:30b-13: cing srid med srid pa mnyam pa ni sgrib pa
T02D1347-2:30b-14: med pas mya ngan las 'das pa dang 'khor ba
T02D1347-2:30b-15: gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ste de ltar dus
T02D1347-2:30b-16: kyi 'khor lo gcig pu de ni bsgrub par bya'o
T02D1347-2:30b-17: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:30b-18: da ni 'di bsgrub pa'i don du gnas rnams gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:30b-19: skyed mos tshal zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir
T02D1347-2:30b-20: 'jig rten pa'i las bsgrub pa'i rjes su mthun pas
T02D1347-2:30b-22: skyed mos tshal du dbang dang dgug pa'i don du sngags pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:30b-23: ri bor rengs pa dang rmongs pa dang phur bus gdab pa'i don du'o //
T02D1347-2:30b-24: rgyal ba mchog gi gnas te byin brlabs dang bcas
T02D1347-2:30b-25: pa'i mchod rten chen por dngos grub chen po brgyad
T02D1347-2:30b-26: kyi don du'o // lha yi gnas stong par bskrad pa dang dbye ba'i don du'o //
T02D1347-2:30b-27: dang gi yi ges rgya mtsho chen po'i ngogs su yang ngo //
T02D1347-2:30b-28: grub pa'i gnas su las kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi don du'o //
T02D1347-2:30b-29: dru khrod du gsad pa'i don du'o //
T02D1347-2:30b-30: mtsho dang bzang po'i gnas su zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i dpon du'o //
T02D1347-2:30b-31: sbas pa'i sa bzhes pa phug gi gnas sum sa'i
T02D1347-2:30b-32: khang par 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid bsgrub pa'i
T02D1347-2:30b-33: don du'o // de ltar las kyi rjes su mthun
T02D1347-2:30b-34: pas yul gang du sems ni rab tu tshim par
T02D1347-2:30b-35: 'gyur pa der ni bsgrub par bya'o mi yi bdag
T02D1347-2:30b-37: de bzhin du yang gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:30b-38: gang na sa skyong chos ldan zhing //
T02D1347-2:30b-39: gang zhig kho nar skye dgu rnams //
T02D1347-2:31a-2: der ni rnal 'byor brtsam par bya zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:31a-3: nges par 'jam pa'i mal cha dag dang gdan la
T02D1347-2:31a-4: nye bar 'dug nas sngar brjod bsrung ba byas nas
T02D1347-2:31a-5: ni zhes pa ni dbang gi le'u las gsungs pa'i
T02D1347-2:31a-6: bsrung ba byas nas zhes pa ste gnas kyi nges
T02D1347-2:31a-7: pa'o // da ni kha dag pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:31a-8: gsungs pa dang por zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:31a-9: 'dir rnal 'byor pas sngar gsungs pa'i bsrung ba dang
T02D1347-2:31a-10: bdud bskrad pa byas te de nas sgrub thabs kyi
T02D1347-2:31a-11: le'u las gsungs pa'i cho gas bdag nyid skad cig
T02D1347-2:31a-12: gis lha'i gzugs kyi rnam par byas nas rang gi
T02D1347-2:31a-13: snying khar pom yig yongs su gyur pa las padma
T02D1347-2:31a-15: de'i steng du lte ba la aom yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:31a-16: de'i dbus su de nyid ces pa kun rdzob tu
T02D1347-2:31a-17: hum yig las skyes pa rdo rje rtse lnga pa'o
T02D1347-2:31a-18: // de'i 'od zer sna tshogs rnams te kha dog lnga rnams rnal 'byor pas bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:31a-19: sngon du kha la sogs pa dag par byas nas
T02D1347-2:31a-20: te bdud rtsi lnga'i ril bu khar bcug pas kha
T02D1347-2:31a-22: de bzhin du sngar gsungs pa'i mchog gi phyag rgyas
T02D1347-2:31a-23: mgo bo nas brtsams te ji srid rkang pa'i mtha'
T02D1347-2:31a-24: de srid du bdag nyid la yang dag par reg
T02D1347-2:31a-25: par bya ste de ltar na lus dag pa'o //
T02D1347-2:31a-26: de ltar kha la sogs pa dag par byas nas
T02D1347-2:31a-27: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i 'od
T02D1347-2:31a-28: zer gyis nam mkha'i mthil du de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1347-2:31a-29: rnams rab tu rtogs par byas te spros pa'i rgyal
T02D1347-2:31a-30: ba de rnams la mchod pa'i don du 'od zer
T02D1347-2:31a-31: de rnams kyang bkug nas rang gi snying khar zla
T02D1347-2:31a-32: ba'i rdo rje la rab tu zhugs par bsgom par
T02D1347-2:31a-33: bya'o // de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la mchod
T02D1347-2:31a-34: pa'i lha mo bcu gnyis po rnams kyi sa bon
T02D1347-2:31a-35: yi ge'i gong bu rnams bsam par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:31a-36: kkhgghnga kkhgghng'a tstshdzdzhnya tstshdzdzh'a tthndhna tthddhn'a pphbbhma pphpbhm'a tthddhna tthddhn'a
T02D1347-2:31a-37: spshshthka spshshthk'a zhes pa sa bon gyi yi ge 'di
T02D1347-2:31a-38: rnams las grub pa ni grangs bzhin du rol mo
T02D1347-2:31b-0: 'dod ma ste de dag la sogs pa @31b rnams
T02D1347-2:31b-1: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbang gi le'u
T02D1347-2:31b-2: las gsungs pa'i cho gas mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1347-2:31b-3: de nas 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sdig pa
T02D1347-2:31b-4: rnam pa mang po bsags pa dag ni dang por
T02D1347-2:31b-5: bshags par byas te de nas sgrub pa po yis
T02D1347-2:31b-6: lus dang ngag dang sems rnams dag pa yis ni
T02D1347-2:31b-7: gsum la skyabs su 'gro ba bya zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:31b-8: nges pa'o // da ni sdig pa bshags pa'i mjug
T02D1347-2:31b-9: thogs su bsod nams la rjes su yi rang bar
T02D1347-2:31b-10: nges pa'o // bya ste / rdzogs sangs rgyas dang
T02D1347-2:31b-11: byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis
T02D1347-2:31b-12: rnam mang dge ba gang mdzad pa //
T02D1347-2:31b-13: de rnams mtha' dag la ni sdig pa rnam bral
T02D1347-2:31b-14: byang chub spyod la rjes su gnas pa'i sngags pa
T02D1347-2:31b-15: rjes yi rang // de nas gsum la skyabs su
T02D1347-2:31b-16: 'gro ste sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun srid pa'i
T02D1347-2:31b-17: 'jigs 'phrog la yang byang chub bar du bdag ni
T02D1347-2:31b-18: rjes yi rang // skyabs su mchis // de ltar
T02D1347-2:31b-19: gsum la skyabs su song ste bdag nyid kyi dngos
T02D1347-2:31b-20: po dbul ba byas nas de nas sems can gyi
T02D1347-2:31b-21: don gyi slad du smon lam bya ste /
T02D1347-2:31b-22: rdzogs sangs rgyas su bdag gyur cig ces 'dir ni
T02D1347-2:31b-23: smon lam sems can don gyi slad du bdag bgyid
T02D1347-2:31b-24: do zhes pa'o // de ltar phyag 'tshal ba dang
T02D1347-2:31b-25: mchod pa dang sdig pa bshags pa dang bsod nams
T02D1347-2:31b-26: la rjes su yi rang ba dang de bzhin gshegs
T02D1347-2:31b-27: pa rnams la bskul ba dang gsol ba gdab pa
T02D1347-2:31b-28: dang bsod nams yongs su bsngo ba ste de ltar
T02D1347-2:31b-29: mchod pa rnam pa bdun bya'o //
T02D1347-2:31b-30: de nas rtsa ba gsum dran par bya ste byang
T02D1347-2:31b-31: chub tu sems bskyed pa dang bsam pa rnam par
T02D1347-2:31b-32: dag pa dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang bdag gir
T02D1347-2:31b-34: de nas bsod nams dang ye shes dang tshul khrims
T02D1347-2:31b-35: kyi tshogs kyi don du pha rol du phyin pa
T02D1347-2:31b-36: bcu bsam par bya ste sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
T02D1347-2:31b-37: phyin pa dang de bzhin du tshul khrims dang bzod
T02D1347-2:31b-38: pa dang brtson 'grus dang bsam gtan dang shes rab
T02D1347-2:31b-39: dang thabs dang smon lam dang stobs dang ye shes
T02D1347-2:31b-40: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsam par
T02D1347-2:31b-41: bya'o // de nas tshangs pa'i gnas rnams dran par
T02D1347-2:31b-42: bya ste byams pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba
T02D1347-2:32a-1: nas bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi bsam par bya ste
T02D1347-2:32a-2: sbyin pa dang snyan par smra ba dang don spyod
T02D1347-2:32a-4: de nas mi dge ba bcu yongs su spang ba
T02D1347-2:32a-5: bsgom par bya ste srog gcod pa dang ma byin
T02D1347-2:32a-6: par len pa dang 'dod pa log par g-yem pa
T02D1347-2:32a-7: dang brdzun du smra ba dang tshig rtsub dang phra
T02D1347-2:32a-8: ma dang tshig 'khyal pa dang brnab sems dang gnod
T02D1347-2:32a-10: de bzhin du 'gyod pa dang rmugs pa dang gnyid
T02D1347-2:32a-11: dang rgod pa dang the tshom ste sgrib pa lnga
T02D1347-2:32a-13: de bzhin du 'dod chags dang zhes sngar dang gti
T02D1347-2:32a-14: mug dang nga rgyal te nyon mongs pa rnams yongs
T02D1347-2:32a-16: de bzhin du 'dod pa'i zag pa dang srid pa'i
T02D1347-2:32a-17: zag pa dang ma rig pa'i zag pa dang lta
T02D1347-2:32a-18: ba'i zag pa spang bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:32a-19: de nas rnam par thar pa bzhi bsgom par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:32a-20: stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon
T02D1347-2:32a-21: pa med pa dang mngon par 'dus ma byas pa
T02D1347-2:32a-22: bsgom par bya'o // rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba
T02D1347-2:32a-23: dang bcas pa'i khams gsum po tshigs su bcad pa
T02D1347-2:32a-24: 'dis rnam par dpyad par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:32a-25: dngos po med la bsgom pa med //
T02D1347-2:32a-26: sgom pa sgom pa nyid ma yin //
T02D1347-2:32a-27: de ltar dngos po dngos min pas //
T02D1347-2:32a-28: sgom pa dmigs su med pa'o zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:32a-29: 'di'i don ni 'chad par 'gyur pa las brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:32a-30: da ni stong pa zhes pa la sogs pas yang
T02D1347-2:32a-31: srid pa gzung ba'i slad du stong pa nyid kyi
T02D1347-2:32a-33: stong pa dngos po'i ngo bo'i rang bzhin 'gro ba
T02D1347-2:32a-34: mtha' dag 'di ni dngos po dag gis rnam par
T02D1347-2:32a-35: dman pa gang yin pa'i stong pa chen po de
T02D1347-2:32a-36: las kyang sangs rgyas byang chub med cing gzhan pa
T02D1347-2:32a-37: na snying rje dag kyang med do //
T02D1347-2:32a-38: de bzhin du 'gro ba la phan pa'i phyir sangs
T02D1347-2:32a-39: rgyas su bya'o zhes pa mtshan ma'i dam bca' med
T02D1347-2:32a-40: pa ste mtha' dag de ltar shes nas sangs rgyas
T02D1347-2:32a-41: nyid kyi slad du de lta na yang mi yi
T02D1347-2:32a-42: bdag po sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni //
T02D1347-2:32a-43: dpag med yon tan dkyil 'khor dbang po dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:32a-44: la ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsgom par
T02D1347-2:32a-45: bya zhes pa ste 'jig rten pa'i 'bras bu bsgrub
T02D1347-2:32b-0: pa dang sems can thams cad la yang dag @32b
T02D1347-2:32b-1: par bstan pa'i slad du sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil
T02D1347-2:32b-2: 'khor la gtso bo sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
T02D1347-2:32b-3: bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1347-2:32b-4: nges pa'o // da ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1347-2:32b-5: phung po gzung ba dang 'khor ba pa'i phung po
T02D1347-2:32b-6: yongs su spang ba'i slad du ting nge 'dzin gsungs
T02D1347-2:32b-7: pa chu yis zhes pa la sogs pa ste mi
T02D1347-2:32b-8: yi 'jig rten 'dir mngal nas skyes pa rnams 'chi
T02D1347-2:32b-9: ba'i dus su chu yis me rnam par nyams par
T02D1347-2:32b-10: nges pa'o // byed do // de'i phyir ting nge
T02D1347-2:32b-11: 'dzin de nyid kyis chu yis me ni rnam par
T02D1347-2:32b-12: nyams pa dang por 'dir ni lus kyi dbus su
T02D1347-2:32b-14: phyi nas me med pa'i phyir 'dzin ma dag ni
T02D1347-2:32b-15: sra ba nyid spangs te lan tshva bzhin du zhu
T02D1347-2:32b-16: bar gyur nas chur 'gyur te chu yi dbus su
T02D1347-2:32b-18: de nas rlung ni chu de rnams mtha' dag bskams nas nam mkha' la mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:32b-19: de ltar khams kyi tshogs myur du rnam par nyams
T02D1347-2:32b-20: te de nas sems ni me dang mun pa'i mtha'
T02D1347-2:32b-21: ste / nam mkha'i khams rnam pa thams cad pa'i
T02D1347-2:32b-22: gzugs yul dang rnam par bral ba dbus kyis la
T02D1347-2:32b-23: kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:32b-24: de nas sngags 'di brjod par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:32b-25: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'tma ko& ham /
T02D1347-2:32b-26: aom aa ni mi tta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1347-2:32b-27: aom aa pra ni hi ta dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1347-2:32b-28: aom aa na bhi sam sk'a ra dzny'a na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1347-2:32b-29: zhes pa brjod nas khams gsum po rdul phra rab
T02D1347-2:32b-30: kyi chos nyid las das pa'i stong pa nyid rnam
T02D1347-2:32b-32: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:32b-33: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:32b-34: rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-2:32b-35: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-2:32b-36: las gnas bsrung ba dang sdig pa bshags pa la
T02D1347-2:32b-37: sogs pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste dang pa'o /
T02D1347-2:32b-39: // / da ni smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya
T02D1347-2:32b-40: ba dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du
T02D1347-2:32b-41: mngal du 'jug pa'i tshul gyis skyed pa'i rim pas
T02D1347-2:32b-42: bcom ldan 'das kyi sgrub thabs gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:32b-43: stong pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:33a-0: 'dir phyi dang nang du bskyed pa'i mtshan ma ni nam mkha'i khams mtha' yas @33a * //
T02D1347-2:33a-1: pa dang shes rab kyi chos 'byung gru gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:33a-2: phyi rol du mi yul la rdo rje'i rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:33a-3: rtsibs bcu zlum po ste nang du ma'i lus so
T02D1347-2:33a-4: // de la phyi rol du yom yig yongs su
T02D1347-2:33a-5: gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor nag po dbus
T02D1347-2:33a-6: su gzhu'i rnam pa thad kar dpag tshad 'bum phrag
T02D1347-2:33a-7: bzhi pa 'og dang steng du h'um yig yongs su
T02D1347-2:33a-8: gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis dang bcas pa
T02D1347-2:33a-10: de'i steng du rom yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1347-2:33a-11: me'i dkyil 'khor dmar po gru gsum rgyar dpag tshad
T02D1347-2:33a-12: 'bum phrag gsum pa 'og dang steng du h'um yig
T02D1347-2:33a-13: yongs su gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis dang
T02D1347-2:33a-14: bcas pa'i bkra shis kyis mtshan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:33a-15: de'i steng du wom yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1347-2:33a-16: chu'i dkyil 'khor dkar po zlum po dpag tshad 'bum
T02D1347-2:33a-17: phrag gnyis pa steng dang 'og tu h'um yig yongs
T02D1347-2:33a-18: su gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis dang bcas
T02D1347-2:33a-20: de'i steng du lom yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1347-2:33a-21: sa'i dkyil 'khor kha dog ser po gru bzhi pa
T02D1347-2:33a-22: dpag tshad 'bum yod pa 'og dang steng du h'um
T02D1347-2:33a-23: yig yongs su gyur pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje gnyis
T02D1347-2:33a-24: dang bcas pa rdo rjes mtshan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:33a-25: de'i steng du mam yig yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1347-2:33a-26: lhun po chen po rdo rje'i rang bzhin 'og gi
T02D1347-2:33a-27: rgyar stong phrag bcu drug dang steng la stong phrag
T02D1347-2:33a-28: lnga bcu pa'o // de'i dbus su kshom yig yongs
T02D1347-2:33a-29: su gyur pa las lhun po'i tshad phyed kyis sna
T02D1347-2:33a-31: de'i sum cha ni lte ba'o //
T02D1347-2:33a-32: de'i steng du hom yig yongs su gyur pa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lte ba dang mnyam pa'o ;
T02D1347-2:33a-33: / de'i steng du rnam par bcad pa yongs su gyur pa las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:33a-34: de'i steng du thig le yongs su gyur pa las
T02D1347-2:33a-35: me zhes pa sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor kha dog
T02D1347-2:33a-36: mthon mthing ste de ltar mtha' dag gcig tu 'dres
T02D1347-2:33a-37: par gyur pa ni hkshmlwryom zhes pa sa bon gyi
T02D1347-2:33a-38: yi ger rnam par bsgom par bya ste de las
T02D1347-2:33a-39: 'jig rten gyi khams grub par bsam par bya'o zhes
T02D1347-2:33a-41: nang du ni sngar gsungs pa'i rnam pas mi'i lus la dpral bar rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1347-2:33b-1: lte ba nas gsang ba'i padma'i mthar thug pa lhun po chen po'o //
T02D1347-2:33b-2: gsang ba'i padma ni bcom ldan 'das kyi padma bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:33b-3: bshang ba dang gci ba dang khu ba 'bab pa'i
T02D1347-2:33b-4: rtsa gsum ni zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra
T02D1347-2:33b-5: gcan gyi dkyil 'khor te gsang ba'i padma'i lte bar
T02D1347-2:33b-7: de bzhin du de'i steng du khang pa brtsegs pa
T02D1347-2:33b-8: kun nas dri med 'od zer 'phro ba'am rdo rje
T02D1347-2:33b-9: las skyes te hum yig las skyes pa'i rdo rje
T02D1347-2:33b-10: gur ni yum gyi skye gnas su ste /
T02D1347-2:33b-11: rdo rje dang bcas padma zhes pa'i shas par byed pa las so //
T02D1347-2:33b-12: de nyid kyis na yang na rdo rje'i rang bzhin gyi gur ro //
T02D1347-2:33b-13: de'i dbus su rdo rje'i sa la bhrum yig yongs
T02D1347-2:33b-14: su gyur pa 'am aom yig yongs su gyur pa
T02D1347-2:33b-15: las nor bu'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'od zer rnam
T02D1347-2:33b-17: aom yig ye shes las skyes rgyal ba mchog gi
T02D1347-2:33b-18: padma zla ba dang ni nyi ma dag gi gdan
T02D1347-2:33b-19: zhes pa sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug par thugs
T02D1347-2:33b-21: de'i phyi rol du ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor rgya
T02D1347-2:33b-22: mtsho'i dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa ste nor gyi
T02D1347-2:33b-23: padma zhes pa padma brgyad po 'di ni zla ba
T02D1347-2:33b-24: nyi mas rnam par dman pa'o //
T02D1347-2:33b-25: de nyid kyi phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor rlung
T02D1347-2:33b-26: gi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar thug pa ste nyin mor
T02D1347-2:33b-27: byed pa'i padma zhes pa padma bcu gnyis zla ba
T02D1347-2:33b-28: nyi mas rnam par dman pa dang de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:33b-29: sgo bzhir shing rta rnams so //
T02D1347-2:33b-30: de ltar sku'i dkyil 'khor ni zheng du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum mo //
T02D1347-2:33b-31: de'i phyed ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang de'i yang
T02D1347-2:33b-32: phyed ni thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dang de'i yang phyed
T02D1347-2:33b-33: ni bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dang de'i yang
T02D1347-2:33b-34: phyed ni bcom ldan 'das kyi padma'o //
T02D1347-2:33b-35: padma'i sum cha ni lte ba ste de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:33b-36: zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi dkyil
T02D1347-2:33b-37: 'khor rnams so // de bzhin du nang du ni
T02D1347-2:33b-38: snying kha nas 'og dang steng du gsang ba'i padma
T02D1347-2:33b-39: dang spyi bo ji srid par ro //
T02D1347-2:33b-40: yang na snying kha nas dpung pa dang nye ba'i
T02D1347-2:33b-41: dpung pa dang san [?] mo'i mtha' ji srid par
T02D1347-2:33b-42: te ma'i lus la rnam par brtags pa bsgom pa'i
T02D1347-2:33b-43: phyir ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:33b-44: de ltar dkyil 'khor re re la sgo bzhi bzhi
T02D1347-2:33b-45: ste de ltar sgo bcu gnyis rnams ni nyi ma'i
T02D1347-2:33b-46: sgo rnams su ste rgyal po zhes pa bod pa'o
T02D1347-2:34a-0: // @34a * // nor bu dang gser gyi rang bzhin rta babs rnams
T02D1347-2:34a-1: dang sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du dur khrod
T02D1347-2:34a-2: brgyad dang snying por brgyad gnyis ka ba rnams te
T02D1347-2:34a-3: cha bcu drug gi dbye bas ka ba bcu drug
