T02D1347-2:34a-5: rgyal ba'i shin tu longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1347-2:34a-6: 'di la lus kyi khams rnams kyi rnam par dag
T02D1347-2:34a-7: pa ni ye shes kyi le'u las brjod par bya'o
T02D1347-2:34a-8: // 'dir rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brangs nas
T02D1347-2:34a-9: chos kyi phung po rnam par dag pa brjod par
T02D1347-2:34a-10: bya ste 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa //
T02D1347-2:34a-11: sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun ches //
T02D1347-2:34a-12: thugs gsung sku yi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:34a-13: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi rnams kyis ni //
T02D1347-2:34a-14: rdo rje'i thig ni bzhi po ste //
T02D1347-2:34a-15: dran pa nyer gzhag bzhi rnams kyis //
T02D1347-2:34a-16: kun nas gru bzhi pa nyid do //
T02D1347-2:34a-17: yan lag bcu gnyis 'gags pa yis //
T02D1347-2:34a-18: sgo ni bcu gnyis po rnams te //
T02D1347-2:34a-19: de bzhin sa ni bcu gnyis kyis //
T02D1347-2:34a-20: rta babs rnams ni mdzes pa rnams //
T02D1347-2:34a-21: 'phags lam yan lag brgyad rnams kyis //
T02D1347-2:34a-22: phyogs brgyad du ni dur khrod rnams //
T02D1347-2:34a-23: stong nyid bcu drug ka ba rnams //
T02D1347-2:34a-24: khams rnams kyis kyang khang pa brtsegs //
T02D1347-2:34a-25: rnam thar brgyad kyis sgo khyud rnams //
T02D1347-2:34a-26: gzugs can yon tan brgyad rnams kyis //
T02D1347-2:34a-27: 'gram rnams dang ni logs rnams nyid //
T02D1347-2:34a-28: thugs gsungs sku yi dbye bas so //
T02D1347-2:34a-29: tshul khrims la sogs phung po lngas //
T02D1347-2:34a-30: kha dog lnga ni rnam par dag / theg pa gsum gyis rab gsum //
T02D1347-2:34a-31: dad pa'i dbang po sogs kyis lnga //
T02D1347-2:34a-32: dad sogs stobs rnams dag gis lnga //
T02D1347-2:34a-33: thugs gsung sku yi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1347-2:34a-34: ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs rnams kyis //
T02D1347-2:34a-35: dkyil 'khor gsum la stegs bu ste //
T02D1347-2:34a-36: pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs pa yis //
T02D1347-2:34a-37: rin chen snam bu rnam par bkra ;
T02D1347-2:34a-38: / ma 'dres chos ni bcva brgyad kyis //
T02D1347-2:34a-39: do shal do shal phyed pa rnams //
T02D1347-2:34a-40: dbang rnams kyis kyang ba ku l'i //
T02D1347-2:34a-41: dge bas kra ma sh'a ri sha'o //
T02D1347-2:34a-42: stong nyid la sogs rna thar gyis //
T02D1347-2:34a-43: dril bu'i sgras ni gang ba ste //
T02D1347-2:34a-44: rdzu 'phrul rkang pas rgyal mtshan gtams //
T02D1347-2:34b-0: spong bas me long @34b rab tu 'bar //
T02D1347-2:34b-1: byang chub yan lag rnga yab g-yo //
T02D1347-2:34b-2: yan lag dgu yi phreng bas brgyan //
T02D1347-2:34b-3: bsdu ba bzhi po rnams kyis ni //
T02D1347-2:34b-4: zur du sna tshogs rdo rjes brgyan //
T02D1347-2:34b-5: bden bzhis rin po che rnams kyis //
T02D1347-2:34b-6: sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams su sbras //
T02D1347-2:34b-7: mngon shes lnga yis rtag tu ni //
T02D1347-2:34b-8: khor yug chen po lnga yis bskor //
T02D1347-2:34b-9: rnam pa kun mkhyen byang chub pas //
T02D1347-2:34b-10: rdo rje phreng bas legs par bskor //
T02D1347-2:34b-11: bde ba gcig pu'i khor yug gis //
T02D1347-2:34b-12: de bzhin ye shes rdo rje 'bar //
T02D1347-2:34b-13: thabs dang shes rab cha yis ni //
T02D1347-2:34b-14: zla ba nyi ma rtag tu shar //
T02D1347-2:34b-15: thugs gsung sku dang dag pa yis //
T02D1347-2:34b-16: chos kyi 'khor lo bum pa che //
T02D1347-2:34b-17: rnga bo che dang byang chub shing //
T02D1347-2:34b-18: de bzhin yid bzhin nor bu sogs //
T02D1347-2:34b-20: dkyil 'khor chos kyi dbyings nyid do //
T02D1347-2:34b-21: phun tshogs kun byed bsgoms nas ni //
T02D1347-2:34b-22: de nas aa sogs ka sogs dgod //
T02D1347-2:34b-24: bcom ldan 'das mngal du 'jug pa'i dus sum mngal sbyang ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:34b-25: da ni zla ba zhes pa la sogs pas phyi
T02D1347-2:34b-26: rol du lha rdzogs pa dang nang du mngal rdzogs
T02D1347-2:34b-27: pa gsungs te / 'dir dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i
T02D1347-2:34b-28: steng gi zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan
T02D1347-2:34b-29: gyi dkyil 'khor gyi steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:34b-30: la aa sogs dbyangs sum cu dang thig le dang
T02D1347-2:34b-31: rnam par bcad pa ste sum cu rtsa gnyis po
T02D1347-2:34b-32: rnams mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi don du g-yon
T02D1347-2:34b-33: dang g-yas su bskor bas dgod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:34b-34: de la aa ai ri au li zhes pa ni dang po'i cha lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:34b-35: de nas yon tan gyi dbye bas aa ae aar
T02D1347-2:34b-36: ao aa la zhes pa ni gnyis pa'i cha lnga'o
T02D1347-2:34b-37: // de nas ya nar bsgyur pas ha ya ra wa la zhes pa ni gsum pa'i cha lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:34b-38: cha bcva lnga'i mthar thig le aam zhes pa ste bcu drug ni g-yon skor gyis so //
T02D1347-2:34b-39: de nas g-yas skor gyis nag po'i tshes gcig la sogs pa'i cha rnams dgod par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:34b-40: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a a'a la aoo a'ar aee
T02D1347-2:34b-41: a'a l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa ste bcva
T02D1347-2:34b-42: lnga pa gnam stong gi mthar rnam par bcad pa
T02D1347-2:34b-43: aa:zhes pa ste dbyangs bcu drug go //
T02D1347-2:34b-44: 'di rnams ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
T02D1347-2:34b-45: rtsa gnyis po rnams te zla ba'i yan lag dang
T02D1347-2:35a-2: de nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ka sogs gsal
T02D1347-2:35a-3: byed gcig gi bdag nyid bzhi bcu dang brtsegs pa
T02D1347-2:35a-5: de la ha ya ra wa la dang bcas pa'i
T02D1347-2:35a-6: sde pa drug po rnams ni sum cu rtsa lngar
T02D1347-2:35a-7: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du lan gnyis brjod pa'i
T02D1347-2:35a-8: dbang gis la wa ya da dha rnams gzung bar
T02D1347-2:35a-9: bya ste lla wwa yya dda dhdha /
T02D1347-2:35a-18: g-yas bskor du sa la sogs pa'i dbye bas brtsegs pa rnams so //
T02D1347-2:35a-19: de nas g-yon skor gyis nga gha ga kha ka /
T02D1347-2:35a-25: ha ya ra wa la dha da ya wa la
T02D1347-2:35a-26: zhes pa gsal byed gcig gi bdag nyid bzhi bcu'o
T02D1347-2:35a-27: // de ltar nyi ma dang mngal 'dzin pa'i rdul
T02D1347-2:35a-28: la dpe byad brgyad cu rnams so zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:35a-29: // nges pa'o // de ltar zla ba nyi ma
T02D1347-2:35a-30: la yang aa sogs ka sogs rdo rje dang bcas
T02D1347-2:35a-31: zhes pa ni de dag las 'og tu nyi ma'o
T02D1347-2:35a-32: // nges pa'o // // nyi ma'i steng du zla ba'o //
T02D1347-2:35a-33: zla ba'i dbus su h'um yig zla ba'i mtshan ma lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:35a-34: de bzhin du rdul gyi steng du khu ba'o //
T02D1347-2:35a-35: khu ba'i dbus su kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa dri za'i sems can no //
T02D1347-2:35a-36: de nas me long la sogs lnga rnams kyis zhes
T02D1347-2:35a-37: pa ni de la zla ba dang khu ba dbyangs
T02D1347-2:35a-38: dang ldan pa ni me long lta bu'i ye shes
T02D1347-2:35a-39: te gzugs kyi phung po skyed par byed pa rnam
T02D1347-2:35a-41: nyi ma dang rdul gsal byed dang ldan pa ni
T02D1347-2:35a-42: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes te tshor ba'i phung
T02D1347-2:35a-43: po skyed par byed pa rin chen 'byung ldan no
T02D1347-2:35a-44: // dri za'i sems can hum yig dang lnga pa
T02D1347-2:35a-45: ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes 'du shes kyi
T02D1347-2:35a-46: phung po skyed par byed pa snang ba mtha' yas
T02D1347-2:35a-47: // so // de rnams gcig pa nyid dang srog
T02D1347-2:35a-48: gi rlung hi yig dang ldan pa ni bya ba
T02D1347-2:35a-49: grub pa'i ye shes te 'du byed kyi phung po
T02D1347-2:35a-50: skyed par byed pa don yod grub pa'o //
T02D1347-2:35a-51: de nas yan lag thams cad kyi cha shas yongs
T02D1347-2:35a-52: su rdzogs pa dang rnam par shes pa ham yig
T02D1347-2:35a-53: dang ldan pa ni chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam
T02D1347-2:35a-54: par dag pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1347-2:35b-0: rnam par shes pa'i phung po skyed par @35b byed
T02D1347-2:35b-1: pa mi bskyod pa ste phyi dang nang du ye
T02D1347-2:35b-3: 'di rnams gcig tu 'dres par gyur pa ni sa
T02D1347-2:35b-4: bon te dbyangs rnams kyi thig le dang gsal byed
T02D1347-2:35b-5: rnams kyi rnam par bcad pa dang rnam par shes
T02D1347-2:35b-6: pa gzhom du med pa dang srog gi aa yig
T02D1347-2:35b-7: go // de ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas bcom ldan
T02D1347-2:35b-8: 'das 'od zer lnga rnams 'gyed par byed cing dri
T02D1347-2:35b-9: ma med pa'i 'od 'phro dus kyi 'khor lo bsgom
T02D1347-2:35b-10: par bya zhes pa ste phyi rol dang mngal du
T02D1347-2:35b-12: da ni lha'i sku la dus kyi cha yis dbyibs
T02D1347-2:35b-13: gsungs pa rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:35b-14: 'dir lha rnams skye ba'i dus su rgyan thams cad
T02D1347-2:35b-15: dang bcas par skye ste de rnams kyang lus kyi
T02D1347-2:35b-16: cha shas sna tshogs dang kha dog sna tshogs dang
T02D1347-2:35b-17: dbyibs sna tshogs nyid du skye'o //
T02D1347-2:35b-18: de'i phyir rdo rje'i rgyan dang ldan pa'i sku dang
T02D1347-2:35b-19: rgyal ba'i phyag gi padma ni phyag nyi shu rtsa
T02D1347-2:35b-20: bzhi'o // nyi ma zhes pa dpung pa bcu gnyis so ;
T02D1347-2:35b-21: / dus kyi zhal ni zhal bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:35b-22: mgrin pa gsum dang spyan bcu gnyis te rnam par
T02D1347-2:35b-23: rgyas pa'i zhal yang mche ba phyed ni gtsigs pa'o
T02D1347-2:35b-24: zhes pa'o // nang du lus rdzogs pa la rnam
T02D1347-2:35b-25: par shes pa lus kyi bdag po'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D1347-2:35b-26: dkyil 'khor la padma'i te bar dang rang gi lus
T02D1347-2:35b-27: mthar gyis 'byung ba ni dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pas
T02D1347-2:35b-28: lha rnams rnam par dgod pa gsungs pa dpal ldan
T02D1347-2:35b-29: aom yig las skyes rgyal ba'i bdag po'i padmar zhes
T02D1347-2:35b-30: pa snying po'i padmar zla ba nyi ma me yi
T02D1347-2:35b-31: steng du ni zhes pa la la n'a dang ra
T02D1347-2:35b-32: sa n'a dang aa ba dh'u t'i'i steng du drag
T02D1347-2:35b-33: po lus med gnyis kyi zhes pa bdud dang nyon
T02D1347-2:35b-35: g-yon dang g-yas par rab tu 'bab pa dag gi
T02D1347-2:35b-36: snying khar rgyal ba'i dbang po shin tu rol pa'i
T02D1347-2:35b-37: zhabs ni g-yas brkyang stabs zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:35b-38: de la bdud ni 'dod pa'i lha kha dog dmar
T02D1347-2:35b-39: po gdong gcig pa lag pa bzhi pa lag na
T02D1347-2:35b-40: me tog gi mda' lnga dang gzhu dang zhags pa
T02D1347-2:35b-41: dang lcags kyu 'dzin pa ste zhabs g-yas pa kha
T02D1347-2:35b-43: de bzhin du drag po dkar po mig gsum pa
T02D1347-2:35b-44: gdong gcig pa lag pa bzhi pa rtse gsum dang
T02D1347-2:35b-45: da ma ru dang thod pa dang kha tv'am ga
T02D1347-2:36a-2: 'di ltar sku mdog sngon po ste de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:36a-3: dbus kyi mgrin pa mthon mthing dang g-yas pa nyi
T02D1347-2:36a-4: ma dang mtshungs pa dmar po dang g-yas min te
T02D1347-2:36a-5: g-yon pa ni zla ba'i mdog can dkar po ste
T02D1347-2:36a-6: de ltar mgrin pa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:36a-7: sngar gsungs pa'i rnam pas shar gyi zhal ni nag
T02D1347-2:36a-8: po mche ba gtsigs pa drag po dang g-yas pa
T02D1347-2:36a-9: ni chags pa dang bcas pa dmar po dang g-yon
T02D1347-2:36a-10: pa ni rab tu zhi ba dkar po dang nub
T02D1347-2:36a-11: ni ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa ser po'o //
T02D1347-2:36a-12: ral pa'i cod pan la sna tshogs rdo rje dang
T02D1347-2:36a-13: zla ba phyed pa dang rdo rje sems dpa'i dbu
T02D1347-2:36a-14: rgyan can rdo rje nor bu dang rdo rje rna
T02D1347-2:36a-15: rgyan dang rdo rje mgul rgyan dang rdo rje gdu
T02D1347-2:36a-16: bu dang rdo rje ska rags dang rdo rje rkang
T02D1347-2:36a-17: gdub dang rdo rje dar dphyangs [?] dang rdo rje
T02D1347-2:36a-18: phreng ba dang stag gi pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa'o
T02D1347-2:36a-19: // de bzhin du g-yas kyi phrag pa dang po
T02D1347-2:36a-20: mthon mthing dang gnyis pa dmar po dang gsum pa
T02D1347-2:36a-21: dkar po ste de bzhin du g-yon du yang ngo
T02D1347-2:36a-22: // // de bzhin du g-yas dang g-yon du yang
T02D1347-2:36a-23: dpung pa gnyis mthon mthing dang gnyis dmar po dang
T02D1347-2:36a-24: // // gnyis dkar po'o // de bzhin du g-yas
T02D1347-2:36a-25: dang g-yon du yang phyag bzhi nag po dang bzhi
T02D1347-2:36a-26: dmar po dang bzhi dkar po ste de rnams kyang
T02D1347-2:36a-27: 'chad par 'gyur pa'i mtshon cha dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:36a-28: de bzhin du phyag re re la sor mo lnga
T02D1347-2:36a-29: ste mthe bo ser po dang mdzub mo dkar po
T02D1347-2:36a-30: dang gung mo dmar po dang ming med nag po
T02D1347-2:36a-32: de rnams re re la tshigs gsum ste phyag gi
T02D1347-2:36a-33: mthil nas sor mo thams cad kyi tshigs kyi phreng
T02D1347-2:36a-34: ba dang po nag po dang gnyis pa dmar po
T02D1347-2:36a-36: de ltar phyag gi padma ri bong can so so
T02D1347-2:36a-37: la kha dog lnga ste de dag sor gdub rnams
T02D1347-2:36a-38: kyis 'phro ba'o // de ltar ma rig pa dang
T02D1347-2:36a-39: 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa rnams rab tu
T02D1347-2:36a-40: zhugs pa'i nges pa ste mngal gyi zla ba gsum
T02D1347-2:36a-41: pa dang gnas skabs dang po'o //
T02D1347-2:36a-42: da ni nag ces pa la sogs pas mtshon cha'i
T02D1347-2:36a-43: tshogs gsungs te nag po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la
T02D1347-2:36a-44: dang por rdo rje dang gnyis par ral gri dang
T02D1347-2:36a-45: gsum par rtse gsum dang bzhi par gri gug go
T02D1347-2:36a-46: // de bzhin du dmar po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi
T02D1347-2:36a-47: la dang por me yi mda' dang gnyis par rdo
T02D1347-2:36b-0: rje lcags kyu @36b dang gsum par sgra dang bcas
T02D1347-2:36b-1: pa'i da ma ru dang bzhi par tho ba'o //
T02D1347-2:36b-2: gsum pa dkar po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la dang
T02D1347-2:36b-3: po'i phyag gi mthil du 'khor lo dang gnyis par
T02D1347-2:36b-4: mdung dang gsum par dbyug pa dang bzhi par dgra
T02D1347-2:36b-5: sta'o zhes pa ni g-yas pa'i mtshon cha'i tshogs te
T02D1347-2:36b-6: rdo rje can gyi nyi ma'i phyag gi padma g-yas
T02D1347-2:36b-7: la'o zhes so // da ni g-yon pa'i nag po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la mtshan ma gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:36b-8: dang por rdo rje dril bu dang gnyis par phub
T02D1347-2:36b-9: dang gsum par kha t'am ga rnam par rgyas pa'i
T02D1347-2:36b-10: kha can dang bzhi par khrag gis gang ba'i thod
T02D1347-2:36b-11: pa'o // de bzhin du dmar po'i phyag gi mthil
T02D1347-2:36b-12: bzhi la dang por gzhu dang gnyis par zhags pa
T02D1347-2:36b-13: dang gsum par nor bu rin chen dang bzhi par
T02D1347-2:36b-14: pa'o // padma dkar po'o // de bzhin du dkar
T02D1347-2:36b-15: po'i phyag gi mthil bzhi la dang po'i phyag gi
T02D1347-2:36b-16: mthil du chu na rgyu ba zhes pa dung dang
T02D1347-2:36b-17: pa'o // padma dkar po'o // / gnyis par me long dang /
T02D1347-2:36b-18: gsum par rdo rje lcags sgrog dang /
T02D1347-2:36b-19: bzhi par tshangs pa'i mgo bo zhes pa 'di ltar
T02D1347-2:36b-20: rig byed gdong ldan tshangs pa'i mgo bo gang yin
T02D1347-2:36b-21: pa padmas brgyan pa ste spras pa rgyal ba'i g-yon
T02D1347-2:36b-23: der bdud dang drag po la yang dag par nye
T02D1347-2:36b-24: ba na bdud dang drag po dang gi rang gi
T02D1347-2:36b-25: lha mo dag ni zhabs kyi mthil la 'dzin cing
T02D1347-2:36b-26: gdong ni dman pa dag tu byed de bdud kyi
T02D1347-2:36b-27: dga' ma dang drag po'i au ma'o //
T02D1347-2:36b-28: mi bskyod pa rab tu zhugs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:36b-29: da ni sna tshogs yum gyi mtshan nyid gsungs pa gser mdog ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:36b-30: de la ro mnyam pa gcig las zla ba dang
T02D1347-2:36b-31: khu ba'i rang bzhin gyis bcom ldan 'das skyed cing
T02D1347-2:36b-32: nyi ma dang rdul gyi rang bzhin gyis lha mo
T02D1347-2:36b-33: skyed do // de la dkar po dang nag po'i
T02D1347-2:36b-34: chos can ni zla ba ste dmar po dang ser
T02D1347-2:36b-35: po'i chos can ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1347-2:36b-37: rig byed zhal ldan ni zhal bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:36b-38: nor gyi phyag gi padma ni phyag brgyad de mdun nas 'khyud pa dag ni sna tshogs yum mo //
T02D1347-2:36b-39: de'i g-yas kyi phyag dang po na gri gug dang
T02D1347-2:36b-40: gnyis pa na lcags kyu dang gsum pa na sgra
T02D1347-2:36b-41: dang bcas pa'i da ma ru dang bzhi pa na
T02D1347-2:36b-42: bgrang phreng ngo // g-yon gyi phyag dang po na
T02D1347-2:36b-43: thod pa dang gnyis pa na zhags pa dang gsum
T02D1347-2:36b-44: pa na 'dab ma brgya pa'i padma dkar po dang
T02D1347-2:37a-1: mchog gi rin chen de bzhin nyid du'o //
T02D1347-2:37a-2: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das ni g-yas brkyang ste sna tshogs yum ni g-yon brkyang ngo //
T02D1347-2:37a-3: nyi ma'i spyan ni spyan bcu gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:37a-4: rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan ni rdo rje sems dpa'i cod pan can no //
T02D1347-2:37a-5: phyag rgya lnga po rnams kyi rgya yis btab pa snyoms par zhugs pas gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:37a-6: ye shes kyi pha rol du phyin pa ni sna
T02D1347-2:37a-7: tshogs yum de'i nang du 'dus shing pha rol tu
T02D1347-2:37a-8: phyin pa gzhan sbyin pa la sogs pa rnams te
T02D1347-2:37a-9: / pha rol du phyin pa brgyad ni 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:37a-10: rnams la lha mo brgyad de de rnams nor gyi
T02D1347-2:37a-11: phyag gi padma ni phyag brgyad do //
T02D1347-2:37a-12: rig byed zhal ni zhal bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:37a-13: nyi ma'i spyan ni spyan bcu gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:37a-14: de dag rnams kyi nang nas bzhi ni klu yi
T02D1347-2:37a-15: rnga yab 'dzin te phyag brgyad kyis rnga yab brgyad
T02D1347-2:37a-16: 'dzin pa'o // zur bzhir rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye
T02D1347-2:37a-17: bas so zhes pa ni mer nag mo dang bden
T02D1347-2:37a-18: bral du dmar mo dang rlung du ser mo dang
T02D1347-2:37a-20: de bzhin du de rnams kyi rgyab tu dbang ldan
T02D1347-2:37a-21: du chos kyi dung dkar po dang bden bral du
T02D1347-2:37a-22: chos kyi gand'i dmar po dang mer yid bzhin gyi
T02D1347-2:37a-23: nor bu nag po dang rlung du dpag bsam gyi
T02D1347-2:37a-24: shing ser po'o // de bzhin du shar gyi 'dab
T02D1347-2:37a-25: ma la nag mo dang lhor dmar mo dang byang
T02D1347-2:37a-26: du dkar mo dang nub tu ser mo 'bar ma'o
T02D1347-2:37a-27: shing ser po'o // // phyogs bzhi'i dbye bas bcom
T02D1347-2:37a-28: ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi dbye ba ji lta ba
T02D1347-2:37a-29: de bzhin du lha mo rnams kyi ste sna tshogs
T02D1347-2:37a-30: yum gyi dang po'i zhal gser gyi mdog dang g-yas
T02D1347-2:37a-31: pa dkar po dang g-yon pa dmar po dang rgyab
T02D1347-2:37a-32: mthon mthing ste de bzhin du lha mo ser mo
T02D1347-2:37a-33: shing ser po'o // // rnams kyi'o // dkar mo
T02D1347-2:37a-34: rnams kyi mdun dkar po dang g-yas nag po dang
T02D1347-2:37a-35: rgyab dmar po dang g-yon ser po'o //
T02D1347-2:37a-36: dmar mo rnams kyi dang po dmar po dang g-yas
T02D1347-2:37a-37: ser po dang g-yon mthon mthing dang rgyab dkar po'o
T02D1347-2:37a-38: // nag mo rnams kyi mdun nag po dang g-yas
T02D1347-2:37a-39: dmar po dang g-yon dkar po dang rgyab ser po'o
T02D1347-2:37a-40: // // snying po'i padma'i lha mo rnams kyi rgyan
T02D1347-2:37a-41: dang phyag rgya lnga po rnams ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1347-2:37a-42: ma'i ji lta ba de bzhin du shes par bya'o
T02D1347-2:37a-44: da ni nag mo 'bar ma la sogs pa rnams
T02D1347-2:37b-0: kyi g-yas dang g-yon gyi phyag gi mtshan @37b ma
T02D1347-2:37b-1: rnams gsungs pa nag mo zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:37b-2: ste / nag mo yi ni dang po'i phyag gi
T02D1347-2:37b-3: mthil na spos kyi snod dang gnyis pa dag na
T02D1347-2:37b-4: bsil ba'i snod de tsandan gyi snod dang dmar po
T02D1347-2:37b-5: sbyar ba gur gum gyi gsum pa na'o //
T02D1347-2:37b-6: myos byed dang bcas ri bong 'dzin pa zhes pa
T02D1347-2:37b-7: gla rtsi dang bcas pa'i ga pur gyi snod ni
T02D1347-2:37b-8: bzhi pa na ste g-yas kyi phyag rnams na'o //
T02D1347-2:37b-9: g-yon pa'i dang po na dril bu dang gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:37b-10: na padma dang gsum pa na lha'i shing gi me
T02D1347-2:37b-11: tog dang bzhi pa na me tog sna tshogs kyi
T02D1347-2:37b-12: phreng ba rim pas so zhes pa ste shar gyi
T02D1347-2:37b-13: 'dab ma la'o // dmar mo 'bar ma'i g-yas kyi
T02D1347-2:37b-14: phyag dang po na mar me dang gnyis pa na
T02D1347-2:37b-15: do shal dang gsum pa na cod pan dang bzhi
T02D1347-2:37b-17: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i phyag dang po na gos
T02D1347-2:37b-18: dang gnyis pa na ska rags dang gsum pa na
T02D1347-2:37b-19: rin po che'i rna rgyan dang bzhi pa na rkang
T02D1347-2:37b-20: gdub bo // de bzhin du ser mo 'bar ma'i g-yas kyi dang po na dung dang /
T02D1347-2:37b-21: gnyis pa na gling bu dang /
T02D1347-2:37b-22: gsum pa na nor bu dang /
T02D1347-2:37b-23: bzhi pa na da ma ru'o //
T02D1347-2:37b-24: g-yon gyi dang po na rgyud mangs dang gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:37b-25: na rda dang gsum pa na sgra sgrogs pa'i khar
T02D1347-2:37b-26: rnga dang bzhi pa na zangs dung ngo //
T02D1347-2:37b-27: de bzhin du dkar mo 'bar ma'i dang po na'o ma'i snod dang /
T02D1347-2:37b-28: gnyis pa na chu'i snod dang /
T02D1347-2:37b-29: gsum pa na mchog gi sman dang /
T02D1347-2:37b-30: bzhi pa na chang gi snod do //
T02D1347-2:37b-31: g-yon gyi dang po na bdud rtsi'i snod dang gnyis pa na grub pa'i ro'i snod dang /
T02D1347-2:37b-32: gsum pa na bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu dang /
T02D1347-2:37b-33: bzhi pa na zas kyi snod de dkar mo yi'o //
T02D1347-2:37b-34: rang gi phyag rgya dang bcas pa ste rdo rje sems dpa' rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:37b-35: da ni ming dang gzugs la sogs pa skyed pa'i
T02D1347-2:37b-36: slad du 'dod chags chen pos gdul bar bya ba'i
T02D1347-2:37b-37: sems can gyi 'jig rten dang po'i sangs rgyas bstan
T02D1347-2:37b-38: par bya ba'i snod du mngon par gzigs nas shin
T02D1347-2:37b-39: tu dga' ba'i sgras rang gi lus la mi bskyod
T02D1347-2:37b-40: pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba'i tshogs rnams dang nam
T02D1347-2:37b-41: mkha' la sogs pa'i khams kyi tshogs rnams te skyes
T02D1347-2:37b-42: bu dang rig ma dang mig la sogs pa dang
T02D1347-2:37b-43: / gzugs la sogs pa yul gyi rang bzhin gyis
T02D1347-2:37b-44: lha'i rang gi ngo bor gyur pa rnams gzhug par
T02D1347-2:38a-1: rnams rang gi lus las spros nas sna tshogs yum
T02D1347-2:38a-2: gyi nang du ji lta ba bzhin du bsgom par
T02D1347-2:38a-3: bya'o // de nas de bzhin nyid du spros nas
T02D1347-2:38a-4: slar yang khams dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1347-2:38a-5: rnams dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam pas rang gi
T02D1347-2:38a-6: lus la gzhug par bya ste zhu bzla bar gyur
T02D1347-2:38a-7: pa rnams rang gi rdo rje nas spros te rang
T02D1347-2:38a-8: gi rig ma'i padmar de rnams yongs su gyur pa
T02D1347-2:38a-9: las lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor rten
T02D1347-2:38a-10: dang brten pa'i mtshan nyid can no //
T02D1347-2:38a-11: mi bskyod pa lhag pa'i bdag por bsgoms nas dang
T02D1347-2:38a-12: por bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gzhug par bya'o
T02D1347-2:38a-13: // de nas phyogs kyi padmar chu gter sangs rgyas
T02D1347-2:38a-14: bzhi rnams ni nges par spyan dgu pa me'i zhal
T02D1347-2:38a-15: zhes pa zhal gsum pa dus kyi phyag ces pa
T02D1347-2:38a-16: phyag drug pa rnams spro bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:38a-17: de la shar gyi padmar nyi ma'i steng du don
T02D1347-2:38a-18: yod grub pa nag po ste g-yas skor gyis nag
T02D1347-2:38a-19: po dang dmar po dang dkar po'i zhal can no
T02D1347-2:38a-20: // lhor rin chen 'byung ldan kha dog dmar po
T02D1347-2:38a-21: ste g-yas skor gyis dmar po dang dkar po dang
T02D1347-2:38a-23: byang du snang ba mtha' yas dkar po ste g-yas
T02D1347-2:38a-24: skor gyis dkar po dang nag po dang dmar po'i
T02D1347-2:38a-25: zhal can no // nub tu rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1347-2:38a-26: ser po ste g-yas skor gyis ser po dang dkar
T02D1347-2:38a-27: po dang nag po'i zhal can no //
T02D1347-2:38a-28: de ltar bzhi ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ste
T02D1347-2:38a-29: nyin mo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can zhes pa'i
T02D1347-2:38a-30: shes par byed pa las so //
T02D1347-2:38a-31: mer sgrol ma don yod grub pa lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:38a-32: bden bral du gos dkar mo rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:38a-33: dbang ldan du m'a ma k'i snang ba mtha' yas lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:38a-34: rlung du spyan ma rnam par snang mdzad lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:38a-35: de ltar bzhi ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ste
T02D1347-2:38a-36: mtshan mo shes rab rab tu grags zhes pa'i shes
T02D1347-2:38a-38: slar yang lha dang lha mo de dag gi bar
T02D1347-2:38a-39: gyi mtshams brgyad du bdud rtsi'i bum pa brgyad do
T02D1347-2:38a-40: // de ltar lha dang lha mo nag dang dmar
T02D1347-2:38a-41: dang ser ba dang ni ri bong 'dzin pa lta
T02D1347-2:38a-42: bur dkar ba ste zhes so //
T02D1347-2:38a-43: shar gyi sgor khro bo shin tu stobs te kha
T02D1347-2:38a-44: dog dang zhal dang phyag ni don yod grub pa
T02D1347-2:38b-0: lho'i @38b sgor rmugs byed de kha dog dang zhal
T02D1347-2:38b-1: dang phyag ni rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu dmar
T02D1347-2:38b-2: po'o // nub kyi sgor rengs byed de kha dog
T02D1347-2:38b-3: dang zhal dang phyag ni rnam par snang mdzad lta
T02D1347-2:38b-4: po'o // bu ser po'o // byang du khengs byed
T02D1347-2:38b-5: de kha dog dang zhal dang phyag ni snang ba
T02D1347-2:38b-6: mtha' yas lta bu dkar po'o //
T02D1347-2:38b-7: steng du gtsug tor te kha dog dang zhal dang phyag ni mi bskyod pa lta bu ljang khu'o //
T02D1347-2:38b-8: 'on kyang khro bo 'di rnams g-yas brkyang pa ste khro bo'i lha mo rnams ni g-yon brkyang ngo //
T02D1347-2:38b-9: zla ba bzhi pa la ming dang gzugs skye ba'i
T02D1347-2:38b-10: dus su gzugs 'byung ba chen po bzhi'i bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:38b-11: dang rlung dang me dang sa dang chu'i khams kyi
T02D1347-2:38b-12: bdag nyid de des na khams dang phung po dang
T02D1347-2:38b-14: de nas zla ba lnga pa la skye mched drug
T02D1347-2:38b-15: skye ba'i dus su nam mkha'i snying po la sogs
T02D1347-2:38b-16: pa spro bar bya ste mkha' snying la sogs zhes
T02D1347-2:38b-17: pa ni 'dir rlung las skyes pa sna ni nam
T02D1347-2:38b-18: mkha'i snying po dbyibs la sogs pa don yod grub
T02D1347-2:38b-19: pa lta bu ste shar gyi sgo'i g-yas su ra
T02D1347-2:38b-20: ba'i rtsig pa la ste phyogs su'o //
T02D1347-2:38b-21: phyogs bral du gnas ni me'i zur du rlung las
T02D1347-2:38b-22: skyes pa reg bya rdo rje ma ste dbyibs la
T02D1347-2:38b-23: sogs pa sgrol ma lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:38b-24: de bzhin du lho'i sgo'i g-yas su me las skyes
T02D1347-2:38b-25: pa mig ni sa'i snying po ste dbyibs la sogs
T02D1347-2:38b-26: pa rin chen 'byung ldan lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:38b-27: de bzhin du bden bral gyi zur du me'i khams
T02D1347-2:38b-28: las skyes pa ro rdo rje ma ni gos dkar
T02D1347-2:38b-29: mo lta bu'o // nub kyi sgo'i g-yas su sa
T02D1347-2:38b-30: las skyes pa lus kyi dbang po ni sgrib pa
T02D1347-2:38b-31: thams cad rnam par sel ba ste rnam par snang
T02D1347-2:38b-32: mo lta bu'o // mdzad lta bu'o // de bzhin
T02D1347-2:38b-33: du rlung gi zur du sa'i khams las skyes pa
T02D1347-2:38b-34: dri rdo rje ma ni spyan ma lta bu'o //
T02D1347-2:38b-35: byang gi sgo'i g-yas su chu las skyes pa lce
T02D1347-2:38b-36: ni 'jig rten dbang phyug ste snang ba mtha' yas
T02D1347-2:38b-37: lta bu'o // dbang ldan du chu las skyes pa
T02D1347-2:38b-38: gzugs rdo rje ma ni m'a ma k'i lta bu'o
T02D1347-2:38b-39: lta bu'o // // 'og tu ye shes kyi khams
T02D1347-2:38b-40: las skyes pa yid ni kun tu bzang po kha
T02D1347-2:38b-41: dog sngon po zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa kha
T02D1347-2:38b-42: dog dus kyi 'khor lo lta bu ste shar gyi
T02D1347-2:38b-43: sgo'i g-yon du ra ba'i rtsig pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:38b-44: de bzhin du ye shes kyi khams las skyes pa
T02D1347-2:39a-0: sgra rdo rje ma ni kun tu bzang po @39a
T02D1347-2:39a-1: * // lta bu ste byang gi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-2: steng du nam mkha'i khams las skyes pa rna ba
T02D1347-2:39a-3: ni phyag na rdo rje ljang khu mi bskyod pa
T02D1347-2:39a-4: lta bu ste lho'i sgo'i g-yon du'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-5: de bzhin du nam mkha'i khams las skyes pa chos
T02D1347-2:39a-6: kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ni phyag na rdo
T02D1347-2:39a-7: rje lta bu ste nub kyi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-8: de ltar zla ba lnga pa la skye mched drug
T02D1347-2:39a-9: dang drug pa la reg pa zhes pa'i shes par
T02D1347-2:39a-10: byed pas reg bya la sogs pa'i yul rnams te
T02D1347-2:39a-11: de ltar skye mched bcu gnyis spro ba'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-12: sku rdo rje'i gnas skabs gnyis pa'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-13: 'dir shar dang byang dang steng na gnas pa'i lha
T02D1347-2:39a-14: dang lha mo nag po dang dkar po rnams ni
T02D1347-2:39a-15: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya ste nam
T02D1347-2:39a-16: mkha' dang rlung dang chu'i khams rnams khu ba'i chos
T02D1347-2:39a-18: yang na phyogs bral du gnas pa zur gyi lha
T02D1347-2:39a-19: mo rnams zla ba la ste mtshan mo shes rab
T02D1347-2:39a-20: rab tu grags zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:39a-21: de bzhin du lho dang nub dang 'og na gnas
T02D1347-2:39a-22: pa'i lha dang lha mo dmar ba dang ser ba
T02D1347-2:39a-23: rnams ni nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ste ye shes
T02D1347-2:39a-24: dang me dang sa'i khams rnams rdul gyi chos can
T02D1347-2:39a-26: yang na phyogs na gnas pa'i lha rnams nyi ma
T02D1347-2:39a-27: la ste nyin mo bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can
T02D1347-2:39a-29: de ltar gang zhig bcom ldan 'das la mngon du
T02D1347-2:39a-30: phyogs pa de ni gtso bo ste phyogs rnams su'o
T02D1347-2:39a-31: // bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa'i lha mo ni gtso mo ste phyogs bral rnams su'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-32: gzhan du phyogs pa ni gtso bo ma yin pa'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-33: de'i phyir shes rab phang bar thabs ni gtso bo
T02D1347-2:39a-34: ma yin pa ste padma dang zla ba la zur
T02D1347-2:39a-35: gyi char phyogs bral rnams su'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-36: de bzhin du thabs kyi lha rnams kyi phang par
T02D1347-2:39a-37: yang lha mo gtso mo ma yin pa ste nyi
T02D1347-2:39a-38: ma'i dkyil 'khor la phyogs rnams su'o //
T02D1347-2:39a-39: gnyis po dag gi rang gi phyag gi chu skyes
T02D1347-2:39a-40: 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rang rang mtshan mas mtshan pa
T02D1347-2:39a-42: mtshan ma gang zhig gang gi g-yas kyi dang po'i
T02D1347-2:39a-43: phyag mthil na de de yi phyag rgya chus skyes
T02D1347-2:39a-44: dman // chus skyes kyi mtshan ma dang rin po
T02D1347-2:39a-45: che dang ral gri ni g-yon dang g-yas su yang
T02D1347-2:39b-0: dman // thun mong ngo // de ltar @39b shar
T02D1347-2:39b-1: dang nub dang g-yon dang g-yas dang 'og dang steng
T02D1347-2:39b-2: du shes rab thabs kyis 'khor lo mchog gi bde
T02D1347-2:39b-3: bar gnas pa'i rdo rje'i 'dug stangs dag gis bzhugs
T02D1347-2:39b-4: pa ni thabs 'dren pa ste padma'i 'dug stangs kyis
T02D1347-2:39b-5: bzhugs pa ni lha mo'i tshogs 'dren ma'o zhes pa
T02D1347-2:39b-6: dman // thun mong ngo // nges pa'o // da
T02D1347-2:39b-7: ni nag po rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1347-2:39b-9: 'dir rigs drug gi phung po rnam par dag pas mtshan ma drug rnams so //
T02D1347-2:39b-10: de la 'du byed kyi rigs las skyes pa don
T02D1347-2:39b-11: yod grub pa dang sgrol ma dang shin tu stobs
T02D1347-2:39b-12: dang nam mkha'i snying po dang reg bya rdo rje
T02D1347-2:39b-13: ma ste nag po rnams kyi g-yas kyi phyag dang
T02D1347-2:39b-14: po na ral gri dang gnyis pa na gri gug
T02D1347-2:39b-15: dang gsum pa na rtsa gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:39b-16: g-yon gyi dang po na phub dang gnyis pa na
T02D1347-2:39b-17: thod pa dang gsum pa'i phyag gi mthil na kha
T02D1347-2:39b-19: de bzhin du tshor ba'i rigs las skyes pa rin
T02D1347-2:39b-20: chen 'byung ldan dang gos dkar mo dang rmugs byed
T02D1347-2:39b-21: dang sa'i snying po dang ro rdo rje ma ste
T02D1347-2:39b-22: dmar po rnams kyi g-yas kyi phyag dang po na
T02D1347-2:39b-23: me'i mda' dang gnyis pa na rdo rje lcags kyu
T02D1347-2:39b-24: dang gsum pa na sgra dang bcas pa'i da ma
T02D1347-2:39b-25: ru ste rim pa yis so //
T02D1347-2:39b-26: g-yon gyi dang po na gzhu dang gnyis pa na
T02D1347-2:39b-27: rdo rje zhags pa dang gsum pa na dri med
T02D1347-2:39b-28: 'phro ba'i nor bu rin po che rtse mo dgu
T02D1347-2:39b-29: pa'o // de bzhin du gzugs kyi rigs las skyes
T02D1347-2:39b-30: pa rnam par snang mdzad dang spyan ma dang rengs
T02D1347-2:39b-31: byed dang sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
T02D1347-2:39b-32: dang dri rdo rje ma ste ser po rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:39b-33: g-yas kyi phyag dang po na 'khor lo dang gnyis
T02D1347-2:39b-34: pa na dbyug pa dang gsum pa na 'jigs byed
T02D1347-2:39b-35: pa'o // rdo rje'o // g-yon gyi dang po na
T02D1347-2:39b-36: dung dang gnyis pa na rdo rje lcags sgrog dang
T02D1347-2:39b-37: gsum pa na sgra dang bcas pa'i rdo rje dril
T02D1347-2:39b-38: pa'o // rdo rje'o // bu'o // de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:39b-39: 'du shes kyi rigs las skyes pa snang ba mtha'
T02D1347-2:39b-40: yas dang m'a ma k'i dang padma mthar byed dang
T02D1347-2:39b-41: 'jig rten dbang phyug dang gzugs rdo rje ma ste
T02D1347-2:39b-42: dkar po rnams kyi g-yas kyi phyag dang po na
T02D1347-2:39b-43: tho ba dang gnyis po na mdung dang gsum pa
T02D1347-2:39b-45: g-yon pa'i dang po na padma dkar po 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:39b-46: brgya pa dang gnyis pa na me long dang gsum
T02D1347-2:40a-2: / de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i rigs las
T02D1347-2:40a-3: skyes pa mi bskyod pa dang rdo rje dbyings kyi
T02D1347-2:40a-4: dbang phyug ma dang gtsug tor dang phyag na rdo
T02D1347-2:40a-5: rje dang chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ste
T02D1347-2:40a-6: ljang khu rnams kyi g-yas kyi dang po na rdo
T02D1347-2:40a-7: rje dang gnyis pa na gri gug dang gsum pa
T02D1347-2:40a-8: na dgra sta'o // g-yon gyi dang po na dril
T02D1347-2:40a-9: bu dang gnyis pa na thod pa dang gsum pa
T02D1347-2:40a-11: de bzhin du ye shes kyi rigs las skyes pa
T02D1347-2:40a-12: rdo rje sems dpa' dang sna tshogs yum dang gnod
T02D1347-2:40a-13: mdzes rgyal po dang kun du bzang po dang sgra
T02D1347-2:40a-14: rdo rje ma ste sngon po rnams kyi yang ngo
T02D1347-2:40a-16: yang na sgrol ma dang kun du bzang po'i kha
T02D1347-2:40a-17: t'am ga'i gnas dang tshangs pa'i mgo bo'i gnas su
T02D1347-2:40a-18: autpala'o // gang gi tshe du ba la sogs lha
T02D1347-2:40a-19: mo brgyad po dang bum pa brgyad dang chos kyi
T02D1347-2:40a-20: dung la sogs pa res 'ga' dor nas rgyal ba'i
T02D1347-2:40a-21: bdag po'i padma dag la dpal ldan 'khor lo ste
T02D1347-2:40a-22: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni snying po'i dbus su mi
T02D1347-2:40a-23: yi bdag po nyi shur tsa lnga'i bdag nyid du
T02D1347-2:40a-24: yang 'gyur te de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nye bar
T02D1347-2:40a-25: bskor ba yang dpal 'dus pa lta bur 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:40a-26: autpala'o // // 'di la skyon med de ris med pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:40a-27: de ltar sgrub pa po rnams kyis rang gi sems
T02D1347-2:40a-28: kyi nus pa shes nas bcom ldan 'das 'di yang
T02D1347-2:40a-29: rnal 'byor pa rnams dag gis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:40a-30: dbang gi don du yang na dkyil 'khor rigs kyi
T02D1347-2:40a-31: dbang gis phyi yi 'khor los rab tu dman par
T02D1347-2:40a-32: 'gyur ro // 'dir lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba
T02D1347-2:40a-33: rdo rje sems dpa' khu ba mngal du zhugs pa
T02D1347-2:40a-34: ni zla ba dang po la ma rig pa dang
T02D1347-2:40a-35: gnyis pa la 'du byed dang gsum pa la rnam
T02D1347-2:40a-36: par shes pa dang bzhi pa la ming dang gzugs
T02D1347-2:40a-37: 'gyur ro // so // gzugs dang 'brel pa skye
T02D1347-2:40a-38: mched drug dang reg pa la sogs pa ni zla
T02D1347-2:40a-39: ba drug pa ji srid bar te rigs kyi dbang
T02D1347-2:40a-40: gis so zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:40a-41: 'gyur ro // so // // de bzhin du snying
T02D1347-2:40a-42: khar thugs kyi dkyil 'khor khams lnga lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:40a-44: zla ba bdun pa la tshor ba skye ba'i dus
T02D1347-2:40a-45: su skabs gsum pa ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor la
T02D1347-2:40b-0: rtsa'i lha mo rnams spro ba ste de la @40b
T02D1347-2:40b-1: gsung gi dkyil 'khor ni mgrin pa nas sprul pa'i
T02D1347-2:40b-2: 'khor lo'i mthar thug pa grub bzhir gzung bar bya'o
T02D1347-2:40b-4: pa'i 'khor lo de la rtsa rnam pa bzhi ste
T02D1347-2:40b-5: snying po'i zlum skor dang po la bzhi dang gnyis
T02D1347-2:40b-6: pa la brgyad dang gsum pa la bcu gnyis te
T02D1347-2:40b-7: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i rang bzhin gyis so //
T02D1347-2:40b-8: de nas zlum skor bzhi pa la rdo rje gsum
T02D1347-2:40b-9: thun mong gi rtsa drug cu rtsa bzhi ste de
T02D1347-2:40b-10: la drug ci ni dkyil 'khor 'bab pa yin ao
T02D1347-2:40b-11: bzhi stong pa'o // de bzhin du mgrin par sum
T02D1347-2:40b-12: cu ni yud tsam 'bab pa ste gnyis ni stong
T02D1347-2:40b-13: bzhi stong pa'o // pa'o // de ltar sprul pa'i
T02D1347-2:40b-14: 'khor lo nas gsung gi rtsa thun tshod brgyad kyi
T02D1347-2:40b-15: dbye ba 'bab bzlum skra gnyis pa la gnas pa
T02D1347-2:40b-16: rnams drug cu rtsa bzhi po rnams dang lhan cig
T02D1347-2:40b-17: tu mgrin pa'i bar du spro bar bya'o zhes pa
T02D1347-2:40b-18: bzhi stong pa'o // pa'o // ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:40b-19: da ni phyi rol zhes pa la sogs pas gsung
T02D1347-2:40b-20: gi dkyil 'khor gyi lha spro ba gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:40b-21: 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol ni gsung
T02D1347-2:40b-22: gi dkyil 'khor te phyi rol der ni brgyad pa
T02D1347-2:40b-23: brgyad kyis pad 'dab brgyad pa rnams la phyogs brgyad
T02D1347-2:40b-24: kyi lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu tsa rtsi
T02D1347-2:40b-25: k'a sogs rnal 'byor ma rnams zla ba nyi ma
T02D1347-2:40b-26: dang bral zhing rang rang gi bzhon pa la gnas
T02D1347-2:40b-27: pa rig byed phyag ces pa phyag bzhi dang spyan
T02D1347-2:40b-28: gsum ma gdong sna tshogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:40b-29: de la shar gyi padmar tsa rtsi k'a zhal gcig ma nag mo'o //
T02D1347-2:40b-30: me ra ni mkha' 'gro'i bdag po 'gro ma khyab 'jug ma'o //
T02D1347-2:40b-31: phag mo dang gdong drug ma ni kha dog dmar mo ste gshin rje dang bden bral du'o //
T02D1347-2:40b-33: / rlung du chu gter gdong ma ste tshang ma ser mo'o //
T02D1347-2:40b-34: byang du drag mo dkar mo zhal gcig ma'o //
T02D1347-2:40b-35: dbang ldan du dpal mo dkar mo'o //
T02D1347-2:40b-36: de ltar lte ba la gnas pa'i gtso mo'i kha
T02D1347-2:40b-37: dog dang dbyibs ji lta ba de bzhin du de
T02D1347-2:40b-38: rnams kyi 'dab ma la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams
T02D1347-2:40b-39: so // de ltar brgyad pa brgyad kyi rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:40b-40: ma gang padma'i 'dab ma la gnas gtso mo'i kha
T02D1347-2:40b-42: da ni shar la sogs par zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:40b-43: pas tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa rnams kyi g-yas
T02D1347-2:40b-44: kyi phyag gnyis la mtshan ma rnams rim pa bzhin
T02D1347-2:41a-2: 'dir shar du tsarci [*tsartsi] k'a'i phyag dang po na gri gug dang gnyis pa na rtse gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:41a-3: khyab 'jug ma'i 'khor lo dang be con no //
T02D1347-2:41a-4: phag mo'i dbyug pa dang ral gri'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-5: gzhon nu ma'i sha ka ti dang lcags kyu'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-6: dbang mo'i rdo rje dang mda'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-7: tshangs ma'i padma dang tshangs pa'i dbyug pa'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-8: drag mo'i rtse gsum dang da ma ru'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-9: dpal chen mo'i padma dang bgrang phreng ngo zhes pa ste g-yas kyi phyag gnyis la'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-10: de bzhin du 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams kyi yang ngo //
T02D1347-2:41a-11: de nas g-yon gyi phyag gnyis la shar la sogs
T02D1347-2:41a-12: pa rim pa bzhin du ste tsartsi k'a'i g-yon gyi
T02D1347-2:41a-13: phyag dang po na thod pa dang gnyis pa na
T02D1347-2:41a-14: kha tv'am ga'o // khyab 'jug ma'i padma dang dung ngo //
T02D1347-2:41a-15: phag mo'i lcags sgrog dang phub bo //
T02D1347-2:41a-16: gzhon nu ma'i rin po che dang zhags pa'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-17: dbang mo'i dril bu dang gzhu'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-18: tshangs ma'i spyi blugs dang snod do //
T02D1347-2:41a-19: drag mo'i kha tv'am [*tv'om?] ga dang sbrul lo //
T02D1347-2:41a-20: dpal chen mo'i padma dang rin po che nyid do //
T02D1347-2:41a-21: de bzhin du padma nor 'dab la ni brgyad pa
T02D1347-2:41a-22: brgyad kyi rnal 'byor ma'i phyag gi mtshon cha de
T02D1347-2:41a-23: bzhin no ste gtso mo'i ji lta ba de bzhin
T02D1347-2:41a-25: da ni de rnams kyi ming du 'gyur te de
T02D1347-2:41a-26: la tsartsi k'a la sogs pa'i padma'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D1347-2:41a-27: la shar la sogs pa g-yas skor gyis tsartsi k'a
T02D1347-2:41a-28: la sogs pa rnams kyi 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams
T02D1347-2:41a-29: rig par bya'o // de la 'dab ma dang po
T02D1347-2:41a-30: la 'jigs ma ste gnyis pa la sogs pa la
T02D1347-2:41a-31: rig par bya'o // drag mo dang / dus kyi mche ba ma dang /
T02D1347-2:41a-36: sna chen ma ste tsartsi k'a'i nor 'dab padma la rang gi phyogs rnams su'o //
T02D1347-2:41a-37: khyab 'jug ma'i 'dab ma dang po la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:41a-38: la g-yang mo dang sgyu ma dang grags mo dang
T02D1347-2:41a-39: dpal mo dang rnam par rgyal ma dang dpal ldan
T02D1347-2:41a-40: rgyal ma dang dpal ldan rgyal byed ma dang brgyad
T02D1347-2:41a-41: pa dpal ldan 'khor lo can ma ste nor 'dab
T02D1347-2:41a-42: padma la ni khyab 'jug ma'i phyogs kyi char zhes
T02D1347-2:41a-43: pa mer ro // de nas phag mo'i 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:41a-44: dang po la sogs pa la keng rus ma dang
T02D1347-2:41b-0: rab tu khros pa'i gdong ma dang @41b dus kyi
T02D1347-2:41b-1: lce dang gtsigs ma dang nag mo dang 'jigs rung
T02D1347-2:41b-2: ma dang gzugs ngan ma rnams nor bdag padma la
T02D1347-2:41b-3: ste phag mo'i 'dab ma'i lha mo'i zhes pa lhor
T02D1347-2:41b-4: ro // de bzhin du gzhon nu ma'i mdun gyi
T02D1347-2:41b-5: 'dab ma la sogs pa la padma dang lus med
T02D1347-2:41b-6: ma dang gzhon nu ma dang ri dags bdag pos
T02D1347-2:41b-7: 'gro ma dang rin chen phreng ba ma dang mig
T02D1347-2:41b-8: bzang ma dang rul ma dang bzang mo ste gang
T02D1347-2:41b-9: na gtso mo mchog gi rma byas 'gro ma'i chu
T02D1347-2:41b-10: skyes 'dab ma la'o rgyal po kye zhes pa ste
T02D1347-2:41b-11: ro // bden bral du'o // de bzhin du dbang
T02D1347-2:41b-12: mo'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la sogs pa la rdo
T02D1347-2:41b-13: rje 'od dang rdo rje lus dang gser ldan ma
T02D1347-2:41b-14: dang a'ur ba s'i dang bkra ba'i ri mo dang
T02D1347-2:41b-15: ram bh'a dang zug rngu med dang shin tu sgrol
T02D1347-2:41b-16: ma ste padma nor 'dab rdo rje lag ma lhag
T02D1347-2:41b-17: pa'i lha can la'o zhes pa nub tu'o //
T02D1347-2:41b-18: de nas tshangs ma'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la sogs
T02D1347-2:41b-19: pa la sa b'i tr'i dang padma'i spyan ma dang
T02D1347-2:41b-20: chu skyes can ma dang blo gros ma dang ngag
T02D1347-2:41b-21: gi dbang phyug ma dang g'a ya tr'i dang glog
T02D1347-2:41b-22: ma dang dran ma rnams kyang padma rigs byed gdong
T02D1347-2:41b-23: ma lhag pa'i lha can la'o zhes pa rlung du'o
T02D1347-2:41b-24: // de nas drag mo'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la
T02D1347-2:41b-25: sogs pa la goo r'i dang gam g'a dang rtag
T02D1347-2:41b-26: ma dang myur ma dang to ta l'a dag mtshan
T02D1347-2:41b-27: byed ma dang dmar ser ma dang nag mo ste
T02D1347-2:41b-28: // / de bzhin gang na drag mo gtso mo'i
T02D1347-2:41b-29: padma nor gyi 'dab ma la'o zhes pa byang du'o
T02D1347-2:41b-30: // / // de nas dpal mo'i mdun gyi 'dab
T02D1347-2:41b-31: ma la sogs pa la dpal ldan dkar mo dang
T02D1347-2:41b-32: zla ba'i ri mo dang ri bong 'dzin pa'i gdong
T02D1347-2:41b-33: ma dang ngang pa'i mdog ma dang 'dzin ma dang
T02D1347-2:41b-34: padma'i dbang mo dang skar mig ma dang dri med
T02D1347-2:41b-35: ri bod 'dzin ma ste dbang ldan padma dag la
T02D1347-2:41b-37: de ltar gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi gtso mo tsartsi
T02D1347-2:41b-38: k'a la sogs pa rnams kyi padma'i 'dab ma rnams
T02D1347-2:41b-39: la rnal 'byor ma drug cu rtsa bzhi po rnams
T02D1347-2:41b-40: te tshor ba'i yan lag la'o //
T02D1347-2:41b-41: sred pa'i yan lag la sku rdo rje thams cad
T02D1347-2:41b-42: rdzogs pa ste sku rdzogs pa la dpral ba nas
T02D1347-2:41b-43: gsang ba'i padma'i mthar gru bzhir rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-0: de la lag pa dang rkang ba'i las kyi 'khor lo dang bya ba'i 'khor lo'i tshigs @42a * //
T02D1347-2:42a-1: bcu gnyis la 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'i
T02D1347-2:42a-2: padma bcu gnyis po gang yin pa de rnams ni
T02D1347-2:42a-3: zla ba brgyad pa la rtsa dang lha'i gzugs kyis
T02D1347-2:42a-4: spro bar bya'o // de yi phyi rol nyi ma'i
T02D1347-2:42a-5: padma la zhes pa ni de'i phyi rol du sku'i
T02D1347-2:42a-6: dkyil 'khor gyi padma bcu gnyis po rnams la shar
T02D1347-2:42a-7: gyi sgo'i g-yas kyi cha la sogs par ra ba'i
T02D1347-2:42a-8: rtsig pa la nam mkha'i snying po la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:42a-9: bzhen du bden bral la sogs pa rnam grangs bzhin
T02D1347-2:42a-10: du gsungs te lha min bden bral te shar gyi
T02D1347-2:42a-11: spro bar bya'o // sgo'i g-yas su'o // g-yo ba zhes pa rlung ste mer ro //
T02D1347-2:42a-12: gshin rje zhes pa lho'i sgo'i g-yon du'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-13: g-yas su me dang bden bral du gdong drug go //
T02D1347-2:42a-14: nub kyi sgo'i g-yon du gnod sbyin dang g-yas su brgya byin dang rlung du tshangs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-15: byang gi sgo'i g-yon du drag po dang g-yas su
T02D1347-2:42a-16: rgya mtsho dang dbang ldan du tshogs kyi bdag po'o
T02D1347-2:42a-17: // shar gyi sgo'i g-yon du khyab 'jug ste thams cad phyag bzhi pa'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-18: bcu gnyis po 'di rnams kyi g-yas kyi phyag gnyis
T02D1347-2:42a-19: la rim pa bzhin mtshan ma rnams su 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:42a-20: bden bral gyi dang po na ral gri dang gnyis
T02D1347-2:42a-22: rlung gi dang po na ljon shing dbang po ste
T02D1347-2:42a-23: dpag bsam gyi shing dang gnyis pa na yongs 'du'i
T02D1347-2:42a-24: me tog go // gshin rje'i dang po na dbyug pa dang gnyis pa na ral gri'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-25: me'i dang po na sha ka ti dang gnyis pa na dbyug pa'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-26: gdong drug gi dang po na sha ka ti dang gnyis pa na mdung ngo //
T02D1347-2:42a-27: nor sbyin gyi dang po na nor bu rin po che dang gnyis pa na be con no //
T02D1347-2:42a-28: dbang po'i dang po na rdo rje dang gnyis pa na me'i mda'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-29: changs pa'i dang po na khab dang gnyis pa na bgrang phreng ngo //
T02D1347-2:42a-30: drag po'i dang po na rtse gsum dang gnyis pa na mda'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-31: chu lha'i dang po na zhags pa dang gnyis pa na rin po che'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-32: log 'dren gyi dang po na dgra sta dang gnyis pa na rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-33: khyab 'jug gi dang po na 'khor lo dang gnyis pa na dbyug tho'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-34: de nas g-yon du bden bral gyi phyag dang po na phub dang gnyis pa na thod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:42a-35: rlung gi dang po na aindra n'i la dang gnyis pa na autpala sngon po'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-0: gshin @42b rje'i dang po na lcags sgrog dang gnyis pa na zhags pa'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-1: me'i dang po na padma dang gnyis pa na ril ba spyi blugs so //
T02D1347-2:42b-2: gdong drug pa'i dang po na rin po che dang gnyis pa na me long ngo //
T02D1347-2:42b-3: gnod sbyin gyi dang po na ne'u le dang gnyis pa na padma'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-4: dbang po'i dang po na dril bu dang gnyis pa na gzhu'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-5: tshangs pa'i dang po na padma dang gnyis pa na spyi blugs so //
T02D1347-2:42b-6: drag po'i dang po na sbrul dang bcas pa'i kha tv'am ga dang gnyis pa na gzhu'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-7: rgya mtsho'i dang po na sbrul gyi zhags pa dang
T02D1347-2:42b-8: gnyis pa na zla ba chu shel gyi nor bu
T02D1347-2:42b-9: rin po che'o // log 'dren gyi dang po na zhags pa dang gnyis pa na rin po che'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-10: nor lha'i dang po na padma dang gnyis pa na
T02D1347-2:42b-11: skye ba lnga pa'i dung ste thams cad kyi phyag
T02D1347-2:42b-12: g-yon pa gnyis la rim pa bzhin du mtshan ma
T02D1347-2:42b-13: rnams so // bden bral la sogs pa padma'i lte
T02D1347-2:42b-14: ba la gnas pa de rnams kyi padma'i 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:42b-15: ni 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad de g-yas skor
T02D1347-2:42b-16: gyis 'dab ma'i zlum skor gsum las zlum skor dang
T02D1347-2:42b-17: po la 'dab ma bzhi dang gnyis pa la brgyad
T02D1347-2:42b-18: dang gsum pa la bcu drug go //
T02D1347-2:42b-19: de ltar 'dab ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad po rnams
T02D1347-2:42b-20: la nag pa la sogs pa'i zla ba'i tshes rnams
T02D1347-2:42b-21: te dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs rnams kyi nya
T02D1347-2:42b-22: dang gnam stong gi gtso bo nyid kyi lte ba
T02D1347-2:42b-23: la gnas so // de ltar nag pa'i zla ba'i tshes rnams bden bral gyi padma'i 'dab ma la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-24: sa ga'i zla ba'i tshes rnams rlung gi la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-25: snon gyi zla ba'i tshes rnams me'i la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-26: chu stod kyi zla ba'i tshes rnams gdong drug gi la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-27: gro bzhin gyi zla ba'i tshes rnams rgya mtsho'i la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-28: khrums stod kyi zla ba'i tshes rnams log 'dren gyi la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-29: tha skar gyi zla ba'i tshes rnams dbang po'i la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-30: smin drug gi zla ba'i tshes rnams tshangs pa'i la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-31: mgo'i zla ba'i tshes rnams drag po'i la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-32: rgyal gyi zla ba'i tshes rnams gnod sbyin gyi la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-33: mchu'i zla ba'i tshes rnams khyab 'jug gi la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-34: dbo'i zla ba'i tshes rnams gshin rje'i la'o //
T02D1347-2:42b-35: lha mo rnams kyi kha dog dang mtshon cha dang dbyibs ni de bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:43a-1: ma rnams la nag pa sogs kyi nor lag tshes rnams dang ni lte bar rdzogs pa gnyis /
T02D1347-2:43a-2: mchog gi zla ba'i cha rnams thams cad stong pa
T02D1347-2:43a-3: dus dang 'jig rten zhes pa sum brgya drug cu
T02D1347-2:43a-4: ste de rnams lo yi sbyor bas rig par bya'o
T02D1347-2:43a-5: // 'chad par 'gyur pa'i sa bon dang por gyur
T02D1347-2:43a-6: pa rdo rje'i mtha' can ni 'di rnams kyi ming
T02D1347-2:43a-7: du 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:43a-8: da ni lag pa dang rkang pa'i mthil dang gtsug
T02D1347-2:43a-9: tor dang bshang lam gyi rtsa spro ba'i dag pas
T02D1347-2:43a-10: sgor ni lha mo shing rta la gnas 'od zer
T02D1347-2:43a-11: can la sogs pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma rnams
T02D1347-2:43a-12: te / 'di rnams ni gzhan gyi gnas su 'gro ba'i phyir gtso mo ma yin pa nyid do //
T02D1347-2:43a-13: dbyug pa sngon po la sogs pa rnams ni rang gi gnas kyi phyir gtso bo nyid do //
T02D1347-2:43a-14: de'i phyir rdo rje lcags sgrog ma la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:43a-15: 'di rnams mngon du phyogs pa'i gnas su 'gro ba
T02D1347-2:43a-16: ni shar la sogs pa'i rigs so //
T02D1347-2:43a-17: rigs kyi dbang des na lcags sgrog ma'i g-yas kyi
T02D1347-2:43a-18: phyag dang po na ral gri dang gnyis pa na
T02D1347-2:43a-19: rdo rje ste don yod grub pa'i rigs kyi dbang
T02D1347-2:43a-20: gis so // de bzhin du rin chen rigs kyi
T02D1347-2:43a-21: dbang gis khro gnyer can gyi phyag dang po na
T02D1347-2:43a-22: mda' dang gnyis pa na lcags kyu dang bcas pa'o
T02D1347-2:43a-23: gis so // // rnam par snang mdzad kyi rigs
T02D1347-2:43a-24: kyi dbang gis 'od zer can gyi g-yas kyi phyag
T02D1347-2:43a-25: dang po na 'khor lo dang gnyis pa na dbyug
T02D1347-2:43a-26: gis so // // pa'o // rang bzhin yon tan
T02D1347-2:43a-27: dbang gis zhes pa padma'i rigs kyi dbang gis tsun
T02D1347-2:43a-28: d'a'i phyag dang po na thob dang gnyis pa na
T02D1347-2:43a-29: gis so // // pa'o // mdung ngo // ye
T02D1347-2:43a-30: shes kyi rigs kyi dbang gis shin tu sngon mo'i
T02D1347-2:43a-31: dang po na gri gug dang gnyis pa na rdo
T02D1347-2:43a-32: gis so // // pa'o // mdung ngo // rje'o
T02D1347-2:43a-33: // nam mkha'i rigs kyi dbang gis drag spyan ma'i
T02D1347-2:43a-34: dang po na dgra sta dang gnyis pa na rtse
T02D1347-2:43a-35: gis so // // pa'o // mdung ngo // rje'o
T02D1347-2:43a-36: // gsum mo // de bzhin du lcags sgrog ma'i
T02D1347-2:43a-37: g-yon gyi phyag na phub dang sbrul lo //
T02D1347-2:43a-38: khro gnyer can gyi dang po na gzhu dang gnyis pa na zhags pa'o //
T02D1347-2:43a-39: 'od zer can gyi dung dang rin chen no //
T02D1347-2:43a-40: tsun d'a'i padma dang me long ngo //
T02D1347-2:43a-41: shin tu sngon mo'i thod pa dang dril bu'o //
T02D1347-2:43a-42: drag spyan ma'i sbrul gyi zhags pa dang kha tv'am [*tv'om?] ga'o //
T02D1347-2:43b-0: de bzhin @43b du shar dang lho dang nub dang
T02D1347-2:43b-1: byang gi sgor gnas pa dbyug pa sngon po dang
T02D1347-2:43b-2: 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang stobs po che dang mi
T02D1347-2:43b-3: g-yo ba'i'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:43b-4: de nas zla ba dgu pa len pa la bya
T02D1347-2:43b-5: ba'i 'khor lo'i sor mo nyi shu'i rtsa rnam par
T02D1347-2:43b-6: dag pas klu bcu dang rab gtum ma bcu spro
T02D1347-2:43b-7: bar bya ste sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol tu
T02D1347-2:43b-8: rta babs bzhi'i ka ba brgyad kyi 'og tu klu
T02D1347-2:43b-9: brgyad dang 'og dang steng du rgyal ba dang rnam
T02D1347-2:43b-11: thams cad phyag bzhi pa ste g-yas kyi dang po
T02D1347-2:43b-12: na bdud rtsi'i bum pa dang gnyis pa na rdo
T02D1347-2:43b-13: rje'o // g-yon gyi dang po na padma dang gnyis pa na rin po che'o //
T02D1347-2:43b-14: de'i phyir bum pa rdo rje'i phyag dang padma nor
T02D1347-2:43b-15: bu dag gi phyag rlung la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:43b-16: la ni zhes pa ste shar gyi rlung gi dkyil
T02D1347-2:43b-17: 'khor gnyis la padma dang stobs kyi rgyu dag go
T02D1347-2:43b-18: // lhor me'i dkyil 'khor la nor rgyas kyi bu dang dung skyong ngo //
T02D1347-2:43b-19: nub tu sa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jog po dang padma chen po'o //
T02D1347-2:43b-20: byang du chu'i dkyil 'khor la mtha' yas dang rigs ldan no //
T02D1347-2:43b-22: ye shes la rnam par rgyal ba'o zhes pa ste rkang pa'i sor mo bcu'o //
T02D1347-2:43b-23: de nas lag pa'i sor mo rnam par dag pas
T02D1347-2:43b-24: shar du khyi gdong ma dang lhor phag gdong ma
T02D1347-2:43b-25: dang nub tu ce sbyang gdong ma dang byang du
T02D1347-2:43b-26: stag gdong ma ste rlung dang me'i khor yug gi
T02D1347-2:43b-27: dbus su dur khrod chen po la zhal gcig phyag
T02D1347-2:43b-28: gnyis ma phyag na gri gug dang thod pa can
T02D1347-2:43b-29: no // de bzhin du mer bya rog gdong ma
T02D1347-2:43b-30: dang bden bral du bya rgod gdong ma dang rlung
T02D1347-2:43b-31: du mkha' lding gdong ma dang dbang ldan du 'ug
T02D1347-2:43b-32: gdong ma dang sa 'og tu rdo rje'i mig dang
T02D1347-2:43b-33: nam mkhar sngon mo ste 'di rnams thams cad phyag
T02D1347-2:43b-34: na gri gug dang thod pa can gcer bu phyag
T02D1347-2:43b-35: rgya lngas brgyan pa mgo'i phreng ba 'phyang ba'o //
T02D1347-2:43b-36: de bzhin du ba sbu dang skra rnam par dag
T02D1347-2:43b-37: pas phyed dang bcas pa bye ba phrag gsum gyi
T02D1347-2:43b-38: 'byung po'i skye gnas g-yo ba'i mthar zhes pa rlung
T02D1347-2:43b-39: gi dkyil 'khor gyi mthar te pags pa'i mthar ba
T02D1347-2:43b-40: spu rnams so // zhes pa sngags pas phyi rol
T02D1347-2:43b-41: du spro bar bya ste de ltar zla ba dgu'i
T02D1347-2:44a-2: da ni yi dags dmar dang zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:44a-3: pas ts'a mun d'a la sogs pa rnams kyi padmar
T02D1347-2:44a-5: 'dir shar gyi padma'i lte ba la ts'a mun d'a'i gdan yi dags chen po dmar po'o //
T02D1347-2:44a-6: lte ba dang 'dab ma brgyad ts'a mun d'a la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams so //
T02D1347-2:44a-7: de bzhin du khyab 'jug ma'i mkha' lding dang phag
T02D1347-2:44a-8: mo'i ma he dang gzhon nu ma'i rma bya dang
T02D1347-2:44a-9: dbang mo'i glang po dang tshangs ma'i ngang pa dang
T02D1347-2:44a-10: drag mo'i khyu mchog dang dpal chen mo'i seng ge
T02D1347-2:44a-11: ni nim pas gdan te phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi
T02D1347-2:44a-12: padma rnams su'o // lha min la sogs rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:44a-13: de bzhin zhes gsungs pa'i phyir bden bral gyi padmar
T02D1347-2:44a-14: gdan ni yi dags dmar po'o //
T02D1347-2:44a-15: khyab 'jug gi mkha' lding dang gshin rje'i ma he
T02D1347-2:44a-16: dang gzhon nu'i rma bya dang dbang po'i glang po
T02D1347-2:44a-17: dang changs pa'i ngang pa dang drag po'i khyu mchog
T02D1347-2:44a-18: go zhes pa ni bden bral la sogs pa rnams
T02D1347-2:44a-19: kyi nges pa'o // de bzhin du nor bdag rtse
T02D1347-2:44a-20: mo can dang chu gter rlung dang tshogs kyi ni
T02D1347-2:44a-21: zhes pa lnga po rnams kyi grangs bzhin du ste
T02D1347-2:44a-22: nor bdag gi glang po che dang me'i lug dang
T02D1347-2:44a-23: rgya mtsho'i chu srin dang rlung gi ri dags dang
T02D1347-2:44a-24: tshogs kyi bdag po'i byi ba'o //
T02D1347-2:44a-25: de bzhin du bya rog gdong ma'i 'khor lo'i 'og
T02D1347-2:44a-26: tu bhe runda dang bya rgod gdong ma'i khrung khrung
T02D1347-2:44a-27: dang mkha' lding gdong ma'i mig sngon dang 'ug gdong
T02D1347-2:44a-28: ma'i bya ma byi ste zur du'o //
T02D1347-2:44a-29: de bzhin du phyogs rnams su khyi gdong ma'i 'khor
T02D1347-2:44a-30: lo'i 'og tu bse dang phag gdong ma'i dom dang
T02D1347-2:44a-31: ce sbyang gdong ma'i seng ge dang stag gdong ma'i
T02D1347-2:44a-32: 'bri'o zhes pa khyi gdong ma la sogs pa yi
T02D1347-2:44a-34: rdo rje'i mig ma'i rkang pa brgyad pa sa 'og shing rta la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:44a-35: mkha' la sngon mo'i shing rta yi mkhar bgrod khro
T02D1347-2:44a-36: ba dang bcas kha dog lnga pa lus rgyas mig
T02D1347-2:44a-37: gsum ldan pa aa ni la zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:44a-38: de bzhin du shar gyi sgor 'od zer can gyi
T02D1347-2:44a-39: shing rta la phag bdun dang lhor tsun d'a'i shing
T02D1347-2:44a-40: rta la rta bdun dang nub tu lcags sgrog ma'i
T02D1347-2:44a-41: shing rta la glang po bdun dang byang du khro
T02D1347-2:44a-42: gnyer can gyi shing rta la seng ge bdun no
T02D1347-2:44b-0: // de bzhin du @44b de nas snying kha'i rtsa
T02D1347-2:44b-1: bcu'i rang bzhin gyis thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo
T02D1347-2:44b-2: bzhi'i g-yas dang g-yon gyi stegs bu la mchod pa'i
T02D1347-2:44b-3: lha mo spro bar bya ste shar du dri ma
T02D1347-2:44b-4: dang phreng bam dang lhor bdug spos ma dang mar
T02D1347-2:44b-5: me ma dang nub tu sgeg mo dang bzhad ma
T02D1347-2:44b-6: dang byang du rol mo mdang gar mkhan ma dang
T02D1347-2:44b-7: nam mkhar glu ma dang 'dod ma dang 'og tu
T02D1347-2:44b-8: bshang ba dang gci ba'i rtsa'i rang bzhin gyis lha
T02D1347-2:44b-9: bshos ma dang bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ma'o //
T02D1347-2:44b-10: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la mkha' dang 'og na
T02D1347-2:44b-11: gnas pa'i lha mo gang su yang rung ba de
T02D1347-2:44b-12: rnams ni shar dang nub kyi rta babs kyi 'og
T02D1347-2:44b-13: tu blta bar bya ste phyogs skyong la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:44b-14: rnams bsgom pa ni ji ltar gsungs pa'i gnas nyid
T02D1347-2:44b-15: du'o // sgo'i g-yon gyi kun du bzang po la
T02D1347-2:44b-16: sogs pa bzhi yang de bzhin no zhes pa nges
T02D1347-2:44b-17: du'o // pa'o // de ltar mchod pa'i lha mo
T02D1347-2:44b-18: rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du mtha' yas pa'i
T02D1347-2:44b-19: gzungs ma rnams ni snam bu la ste stegs bu
T02D1347-2:44b-20: du'o // pa'o // la'o // de bzhin du gdeng
T02D1347-2:44b-21: sa can rigs dang bcas pa'i phyir 'dod ma rnams
T02D1347-2:44b-22: sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du stegs bu la'o
T02D1347-2:44b-23: du'o // pa'o // la'o // // de'i phyir gsung
T02D1347-2:44b-24: gi dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu la 'dod ma rnams
T02D1347-2:44b-26: de la shar du sgrol ma las skyes pa dbye
T02D1347-2:44b-27: bar 'dod ma dang lhor gos dkar mo las skyes
T02D1347-2:44b-28: pa bskyod par 'dod ma dang byang du m'a ma
T02D1347-2:44b-29: k'i las skyes pa rgyas par 'dod ma dang nub
T02D1347-2:44b-30: tu spyan ma las skyes pa rengs par 'dod ma
T02D1347-2:44b-31: ste de ltar lha mo sgrol ma la sogs dag
T02D1347-2:44b-33: yis so // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
T02D1347-2:44b-34: las skyes pa ni srid gsum skyed ma gsod par
T02D1347-2:44b-36: yis so // 'dod ma'o // sna tshogs yul las
T02D1347-2:44b-37: skyes pa ni skyed par 'dod ma'o //
T02D1347-2:44b-38: de bzhin du sgra las skyes pa rol mo 'dod
T02D1347-2:44b-39: ma dang gzugs las skyes pa rgyan 'dod ma dang
T02D1347-2:44b-40: / ro las skyes pa zas 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:44b-41: dri las skyes pa dri 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:44b-42: reg bya las skyes pa gos 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:44b-43: chos kyi khams las skyes pa 'khrig pa 'dod ma ste /
T02D1347-2:44b-44: shar la sogs pa'i stegs bu rnams la rigs kyi dbye bas so //
T02D1347-2:45a-0: ts'a mu na d'a las skyes pa @45a * //
T02D1347-2:45a-2: khyab 'jug ma las skyes pa kha na gnas pa'i mchil ma 'dor bar 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-3: phag mo las skyes pa lus kyi dri ma 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-4: gzhon nu ma las skyes pa gar 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-5: drag mo las skyes bstan 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-6: tshangs ma las skyes pa chu la rkyal bar 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-7: dbang po las skyes pa mal stan la snyes par 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-8: dpal mo las skyes pa rgyal srid 'dod ma ste
T02D1347-2:45a-9: ts'a mu na d'a la sogs pa brgyad kyi bya
T02D1347-2:45a-10: ba rnams so // de bzhin sa la khro skyes
T02D1347-2:45a-11: rnams kyi 'dod ma ste 'dir shin tu sngon mo
T02D1347-2:45a-12: las skyes pa kun du gdung ba 'dod ma dang
T02D1347-2:45a-13: ba rnams so // / rengs byed ma las skyes pa gnyen pa 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-14: nga rgyal ma las skyes pa 'jam par smra ba 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-15: rmugs byed ma las skyes pa skems 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-16: shin tu stobs ma las skyes pa skrod 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-17: de bzhin du rdo rje lcags sgrog ma las skyes pa reg bya 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-18: khro gnyer can las skyes pa dgug 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-19: tsun d'a las skyes pa 'ching 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-20: 'od zer can las skyes pa phur bus 'debs par 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-21: drag spyan ma las skyes pa rgyug par 'dod ma'o //
T02D1347-2:45a-22: de bzhin du lha min rigs las skyes pa rnams
T02D1347-2:45a-23: kyi 'dod ma rnams ni khyi gdong ma las skyes
T02D1347-2:45a-24: pa yan lag thams cad bskyod par 'dod ma dang
T02D1347-2:45a-25: / phag gdong ma las skyes pa bshang gci zag par 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-26: ce spyang gdod ma las skyes pa sems can rnams la slu bar 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-27: stag gdong ma las skyes pa rtsod pa mad po 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-28: bya rog gdong ma las skyes pa lhag ma za bar 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-29: bya rgod gdong ma las skyes pa g-yul 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-30: mkha' lding gdong ma las skyes pa sbrul 'ching bar 'dod ma dang /
T02D1347-2:45a-31: 'ug gdong ma las skyes pa byis pa khro bar 'dod ma ste /
T02D1347-2:45a-32: 'dod ma sum cu rtsa bdun rnams ni gsung gi
T02D1347-2:45a-33: dkyil 'khor la rang gi rigs kyi dbye bas rang
T02D1347-2:45b-0: de bzhin du @45b sum cu rtsa bdun phyir 'dod
T02D1347-2:45b-1: ma rnams zhes pa 'dod ma rnams las bzlog ba
T02D1347-2:45b-2: ni phyir 'dod ma zhes brjod de /
T02D1347-2:45b-3: de rnams sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu la rang
T02D1347-2:45b-4: gi rigs kyi dbang gis rang rang gi phyogs rnams
T02D1347-2:45b-5: su'o zhes pa ni thams cad du nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:45b-6: de ltar phyi yi dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol gyi
T02D1347-2:45b-7: snam bu la gzhan yang nyin zhag so so'i dus
T02D1347-2:45b-8: su gang zhig cung zad sems can gyi bya ba
T02D1347-2:45b-9: 'dod pa de thams cad 'dir khams kyi dbang gis
T02D1347-2:45b-10: rnal 'byor ma yi bya ba'o zhes pa ni nges
T02D1347-2:45b-11: pa'o // da ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa
T02D1347-2:45b-12: gsungs pa zhes pa de ltar zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:45b-13: pa ste zhes pa de ltar skye ba'i zla ba
T02D1347-2:45b-14: bdun pa la sogs pa rnams kyis phyi rol du
T02D1347-2:45b-15: rdo rje can gyis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag

T02D1347-2:45b-17: mched la sogs pa dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par gsungs
T02D1347-2:45b-18: pa'o // te / byis pa'i skye bo rnams kyi sems brtan par bya ba'i don du'o //

T02D1347-2:45b-20: gzhan brtags pa'i dkyil 'khor la spro ba dang bsdu
T02D1347-2:45b-21: ba ni spro dang bsdu bdag la dngos po'i skye
T02D1347-2:45b-22: pa yang dag gnas zhes pa la 'dir dngos po'i
T02D1347-2:45b-23: skye pa yang dag gnas zhes pa la 'dir dngos
T02D1347-2:45b-24: po ni rdul phra rab kyi rdzas sa dang chu

T02D1347-2:45b-26: dang nam mkha'i khams ni zla ba dang rjes su
T02D1347-2:45b-27: nga ro 'am khu ba'am de bzhin du rdul lam
T02D1347-2:45b-28: thig le gnyis dang nyi ma yang nam mkha'i khams
T02D1347-2:45b-29: dang de bzhin du sgra gcan rnam par shes pa'i
T02D1347-2:45b-30: khams te de ltar khams drug gi bdag nyid can
