T02D1347-2:45b-35: // de ltar sa'i skye ba ni ljon shing la
T02D1347-2:45b-36: sogs pa brtan pa rnams dang chu'i skye ba ni
T02D1347-2:45b-37: drod gsher las skyes pa rnams dang me'i skye ba
T02D1347-2:45b-39: rlung gi skye ba ni sgong skyes rnams dang zla
T02D1347-2:45b-40: ba'i skye ba ni klu dang lha ma yin rnams
T02D1347-2:45b-41: dang nyi ma'i skye ba ni 'byung po dang lha
T02D1347-2:45b-42: rnams dang sgra gcan gyi skye ba ni gzugs med
T02D1347-2:45b-43: rnams dang dus me'i skye ba ni dmyal ba rnams
T02D1347-2:46a-1: de ltar skye ba rnam pa brgyad ni dngos po'i rang bzhin can te dngos po'i skye ba'o //
T02D1347-2:46a-2: de la rtag ba mkha' yi rdo rje zhes pa
T02D1347-2:46a-3: la 'dir mkha' zhes pa ni dgu pa nam mkha'i
T02D1347-2:46a-4: rdul phra rab kyi rdzas dang bral ba mi chos
T02D1347-2:46a-5: pa ste gcad du med pa dang dbyer med pa
T02D1347-2:46a-6: nyid phyir dang rdzas med pa'i phyir mkha' yi rdo
T02D1347-2:46a-7: rje nam mkha'i khams ni rtag pa ste nam mkha'i
T02D1347-2:46a-8: khams de thams cad na gnas pa nyid kyi phyir
T02D1347-2:46a-9: rnam gsum srid pa la gnas kyang mi rtag pa
T02D1347-2:46a-10: nyid du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
T02D1347-2:46a-11: sngar brjod pa'i 'byung po'i tshogs ni rtag pa min
T02D1347-2:46a-12: par 'gyur te mi yi bdag po mig 'phrul ji
T02D1347-2:46a-13: bzhin nyid du brtags na med pa zhes pa'i rigs
T02D1347-2:46a-14: pa las so // de ltar rnam par dpyad kyang
T02D1347-2:46a-15: rtag pa stong pa chen po mthong zhing mi rtag
T02D1347-2:46a-16: pa rdul phra rab phrad pa dang 'bral ba yang
T02D1347-2:46a-17: mthong ste gnyi ga sangs rgyas nyid kyi sgrub thabs
T02D1347-2:46a-19: de lta na yang blun po'i blo can byis pa
T02D1347-2:46a-20: rnams gzhug pa dang sems ni dag pa'i don slad
T02D1347-2:46a-21: du kye mi'i bdag po zla ba bzang po khyod
T02D1347-2:46a-22: kyis sgrub thabs dag ni brjod par bya ste don
T02D1347-2:46a-23: dam par ni rtag pa dang mi rtag pa'i dngos
T02D1347-2:46a-24: po snying por gyur pa 'ga' yang 'dir ni bsgrub
T02D1347-2:46a-26: de'i phyir sangs rgyas nyid kyi slad du gang zhig
T02D1347-2:46a-27: bsgrub par bya ba sgrub pa de nyid ni zhes
T02D1347-2:46a-28: pa nges pa ste 'dir gang zhig brtags pa'i sgrub
T02D1347-2:46a-29: thabs de ni 'khrul pa zhes pa rdo rje can
T02D1347-2:46a-30: gyi sgrub thabs mtha' dag gang yin pa'o //
T02D1347-2:46a-31: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par
T02D1347-2:46a-32: bral ba ste brtags pa dang bral ba dag ni
T02D1347-2:46a-35: da ni dpal ldan zhes pa la sogs pas rten
T02D1347-2:46a-36: dang brten pa gsungs te sku gsungs thugs kyi dkyil
T02D1347-2:46a-37: 'khor dpal ldan rdo rje can gtso bo ni thugs
T02D1347-2:46a-38: rdo rje 'gyur te mi bdag sku gsungs thugs kyi
T02D1347-2:46a-39: mtshan nyid kyi dkyil 'khor ni sku yi rdo rje'o
T02D1347-2:46a-40: // lha rnams 'khor lo a'a li k'a li'i rigs
T02D1347-2:46a-41: skyes gsung gi rdo rje zla ba nyi ma'i steng
T02D1347-2:46a-42: // du'o // de ltar gsungs dang sku'i dkyil 'khor la yang lha'i tshogs ni gsung rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-2:46a-43: de ltar sku'i rnam pas thugs rnam par gsum dang
T02D1347-2:46b-0: @46b dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pas sku rnam pa gsum
T02D1347-2:46b-1: dang so sor brjod pas gsung yang rnam pa gsum
T02D1347-2:46b-2: mo zhes pa ni thams cad du nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:46b-3: 'dir padma rnams kyi rtsa ba dang sdong bu ni aa yig las byung ba'o //
T02D1347-2:46b-4: 'dab ma rnams dang gser rnams ni au yig las yang dag par byung ba'o //
T02D1347-2:46b-5: dbus kyi lte ba dang zla ba'i gdan ni ma yig las so //
T02D1347-2:46b-6: nyi ma'i gdan ni yang na ra yig las so //
T02D1347-2:46b-7: de ltar aom yig pra na ba ni snying por gsungs te padma'o /
T02D1347-2:46b-8: mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba 'di la
T02D1347-2:46b-9: dad po lha'i sku'i dbyibs rdzogs pa'o zhes pa ste
T02D1347-2:46b-10: nges pa'o // de ltar ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:46b-11: bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo rdo rje sems
T02D1347-2:46b-12: pas dbu brgyan pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
T02D1347-2:46b-13: chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid can bsgoms te /
T02D1347-2:46b-14: de nas 'gro ba drug na gnas pa'i sems can
T02D1347-2:46b-15: thams cad bkug nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du bcug
T02D1347-2:46b-17: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs
T02D1347-2:46b-18: pa khams dang bcas pa rnams rang gi snying khar
T02D1347-2:46b-19: bcug nas byang chub kyi sems su zhu bar gyur
T02D1347-2:46b-20: pa rnams rang gi gsang ba'i rdo rje nas spros
T02D1347-2:46b-21: te byang chub kyi sems des sems can de rnams
T02D1347-2:46b-22: thams cad la dbang bskur bar bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:46b-23: de nas byang chub kyi sems kyi 'od zer gyis
T02D1347-2:46b-24: reg pa'i sems can de rnams thams cad zhal gsum
T02D1347-2:46b-25: pa dang zhal sna tshogs pa dang kha dog sna
T02D1347-2:46b-26: tshogs pa'i lha'i rang bzhin shes rab dang thabs kyi
T02D1347-2:46b-27: bdag nyid can mchog gi dga' ba'i bde bas gang
T02D1347-2:46b-29: de nas de rnams kyi rang gi lus dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:46b-30: gyi 'khor lo'i rang bzhin du gyur par skad cig
T02D1347-2:46b-32: de la sngags kyi sa bon rnams ni gsal byed
T02D1347-2:46b-33: sna tshogs brtsegs pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams so
T02D1347-2:46b-34: // 'dir gsal byed thams cad kyi tshogs ni kasha
T02D1347-2:46b-35: yig ste shes par byed pa des gang gi ming
T02D1347-2:46b-36: gi gsal byed dang po gang yin pa de sa
T02D1347-2:47a-0: 'dir ksha kshi kshar kshu kshli zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa la sogs pa de @47a * //
T02D1347-2:47a-2: de bzhin du ksh'a ksh'i ksh'i ksh'u kshl'i zhes pa ni nam mkha' la sogs pa khams lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:47a-3: de bzhin du ksha kshe kshar ksho kshal ksham zhes
T02D1347-2:47a-4: ba ni rna ba la sogs pa byang chub sems
T02D1347-2:47a-5: dpa' drug go // de bzhin du ksh'a kshee ksh'ar kshoo ksh'a ksha ;
T02D1347-2:47a-6: zhes pa ni yul drug go ;
T02D1347-2:47a-7: / kshha kshya kshwa kshla zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:47a-8: de bzhin du khro bo rnams ni kshh'a kshy'a kshr'a
T02D1347-2:47a-9: kshw'a kshl'a zhes pa ni las kyi dbang po'i yul
T02D1347-2:47a-10: lnga'o // de ltar phung po lnga dang khams lnga
T02D1347-2:47a-11: dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang las kyi dbang po
T02D1347-2:47a-12: ldan dang las kyi dbang po'i yod lnga ste de
T02D1347-2:47a-13: ltar skyes bu zhen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
T02D1347-2:47a-14: su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i rnam par
T02D1347-2:47a-15: sems can thams cad skad cig gis bsgom par bya'o
T02D1347-2:47a-16: lnga'o // // yang na rgyas par te lha mo'i
T02D1347-2:47a-17: gsang bar sa bon so sor re res de rnams
T02D1347-2:47a-18: so sor rdzogs par byas nas spro bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:47a-19: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyis rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:47a-20: sangs rgyas zhing na sems can gang //
T02D1347-2:47a-21: sku gsum dam tshig bdud rtsi yis //
T02D1347-2:47a-22: bskyed cing rdo rje dpal gyis reg / thams cad der ni de bzhin gshegs //
T02D1347-2:47a-23: rdo rje gsum gyi ye shes thob //
T02D1347-2:47a-24: 'dir ni rdzogs sangs rgyas gyur par //
T02D1347-2:47a-25: bsgoms te de nas de dag rnams //
T02D1347-2:47a-26: rang rang zhing du rab tu gzhug ces pa'o //
T02D1347-2:47a-27: sems can rnams la brtse ba'i don du dbang bskur sbyin pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:47a-28: da ni zla ba bcu ba srid pa'i yan lag
T02D1347-2:47a-29: la srog spro ba dang gsung gi rdo rje bskyed
T02D1347-2:47a-30: pa'i slad du btsa' ba gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:47a-31: phyi rol du yang skyed pa gnyis pa'o //
T02D1347-2:47a-32: de la lte ba dang gtsug tor du yang ho:
T02D1347-2:47a-33: yig ste 'di gnyis kyi dbus su chud pa'i dpral
T02D1347-2:47a-34: bar sku rdo rje aom mgrin par gsung rdo rje
T02D1347-2:47a-35: a'a: snying gar thugs rdo rje h'um zhes pa'i yi
T02D1347-2:47a-36: ge gsum po'i 'di ni su gsung thugs kyi mtshan
T02D1347-2:47a-37: nyid rtsa gsum skyed par byed pa'o /
T02D1347-2:47a-38: lte bar ho: yig ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis
T02D1347-2:47a-39: zhub bde mnyam padma la ni sku gsungs thugs kyi
T02D1347-2:47a-40: rdo rje ste de shes rab chags pas zhu ba
T02D1347-2:47a-41: khyab bdag rdo rje can yang zhes pa yang yig
T02D1347-2:47a-42: gis shes rab dang lhan cig ri bong 'dzin pa
T02D1347-2:47a-43: bzhin du rnam par bltas nas nang du dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:47b-0: lnga 'bab pa'i don dang @47b phyi rol gyi yul
T02D1347-2:47b-1: thams cad nye bar longs spyod pa'i don dang phyir
T02D1347-2:47b-2: rol du lha rdzogs pa na 'gro ba mtha' dag
T02D1347-2:47b-3: gi don byed pa'i slad du byas /
T02D1347-2:47b-4: pa dang snying rje dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin can /
T02D1347-2:47b-5: sgrol ma dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar mo
T02D1347-2:47b-6: dang spyan ma ste lha mo rnams kyis glu dag
T02D1347-2:47b-7: mdzad pa / bcom ldan khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa po //
T02D1347-2:47b-8: bdag cag srungs shig lha mi'i bla ma rdo rje
T02D1347-2:47b-9: ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod pa
T02D1347-2:47b-11: byams pa'i rang bzhin sgrol mas thugs rdo rje dang /
T02D1347-2:47b-12: snying rje'i rang bzhin m'a ma k'is sku rdo rje dang /
T02D1347-2:47b-13: dga' ba'i rang bzhin gos dkar mos gsungs rdo rje dang /
T02D1347-2:47b-14: btang snyoms kyi rang bzhin spyan mas ye shas rdo rje skul bar byed do //
T02D1347-2:47b-15: de ltar thugs dang sku dang gsung ye shes kyi
T02D1347-2:47b-16: bdag nyid can bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can des
T02D1347-2:47b-17: rnams kyi glu dag gsan nas 'dod pa dang gzugs
T02D1347-2:47b-18: dang gzugs med pa'i mtshan nyis srid pa gsum po
T02D1347-2:47b-19: mtha' dag rnams kyang mig 'phrul lta bur gzigs nas
T02D1347-2:47b-20: zla ba zhu ba de la h'um yig kha dog
T02D1347-2:47b-21: sngon po dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba
T02D1347-2:47b-22: ltas te de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje'o
T02D1347-2:47b-23: // de las spros pa zhes pa ni rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:47b-24: pa bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i rgyan dang
T02D1347-2:47b-25: ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod pan can shes
T02D1347-2:47b-26: rab kyis 'khyud par gyur pa yang rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:47b-27: sngar bzhin du slar yang shes rab thabs kyi bdag
T02D1347-2:47b-28: nyid thugs dang gsung dang su'i chos kyis dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:47b-29: rab tu spro bar bya ste skyes pa'i byis pa
T02D1347-2:47b-30: rab tu sad pa du bar byed pa'i phyir ro
T02D1347-2:47b-31: // 'dir sngags kyi tshul la mngal nas skyes pa
T02D1347-2:47b-32: skye ba'i rim pas bla ba dgus byis pa'i lus
T02D1347-2:47b-33: rdzogs shing rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par byang
T02D1347-2:47b-34: chub pa'i mtshan nyid ni lha rnams kyi sku rdzogs
T02D1347-2:47b-35: pa ste pa ste snyen pa'i yan lag dang po'o
T02D1347-2:47b-36: // // 'dir lha'i nga rgyal gyi slad du sngags
T02D1347-2:47b-37: kyi tshig na aom su bi shud dha dha rmma
T02D1347-2:47b-38: dh'a tu sva bh'a ba a'atma ko nya ham zhes
T02D1347-2:47b-39: brjod de de nas gsung rdo re bskyed pa'i slad
T02D1347-2:47b-40: du rnal 'byor pas bsnyen pa'i yan lag gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:47b-41: // // bsgom par bya'o // bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi
T02D1347-2:47b-42: rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyas 'brel rtsa ba'i
T02D1347-2:48a-1: 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med
T02D1347-2:48a-2: pa'i 'od las bskyed pa'i rim pas sku rdzogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:48a-3: mdor bsdus chen po ste gnyis pa'o /
T02D1347-2:48a-5: // /'dir ni srog gi kun sbyor dag las gsung gi rdo rje dkyil 'khor bcu'i bdag nyid de //
T02D1347-2:48a-6: stong pa la sogs dbye ba dbyangs kyi rang bzhin can las rtag tu gnas lnga la gnas shing //
T02D1347-2:48a-7: srid pa'i 'jigs las sems can rnams kyi lhag par mos pas dam pa'i lam ni stong byed pa //
T02D1347-2:48a-8: 'di yi skyed pa 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs brgyad 'grel gyis ni rnam par rgyas par bya //
T02D1347-2:48a-9: ho: yig ces pa la sogs pa ni 'dir mi'i
T02D1347-2:48a-10: 'jig rten du mngal nas skyes pa rnams kyi srog
T02D1347-2:48a-11: gi rlung bskyed pa'i slad du rang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:48a-12: 'bab pas la sogs pa'i khams rnams kyis rmi lam
T02D1347-2:48a-13: gyi gnas skabs su zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa
T02D1347-2:48a-14: la sad pa'i gnas skabs kyi don du skul bar
T02D1347-2:48a-15: byed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can
T02D1347-2:48a-16: don gyi slad du spyan ma la sogs pa'i lha
T02D1347-2:48a-18: 'dir lha la lte ba rang gtsug tor gyi aa
T02D1347-2:48a-19: ba dh'u t'i'i lam du he: yig thog ma tha
T02D1347-2:48a-20: mar bkod de de nas dpral bar sku rdo rje
T02D1347-2:48a-21: aom dang mgrin par gsung rdo rje a'a: dang snying
T02D1347-2:48a-22: gar thugs rdo rje ste de ltar su gsung thugs
T02D1347-2:48a-23: las yang dag par byung ba zla ba dang nyi
T02D1347-2:48a-24: ma dang sgra gcan gyi mtshan nyid do //
T02D1347-2:48a-25: dus kyi mes 'og dang steng nas shes rab kyi
T02D1347-2:48a-26: 'od zer gyis zhu ba ste shes rab chags pas
T02D1347-2:48a-27: zhu ba zhes pa la shes rab ni gtum mo
T02D1347-2:48a-29: 'dir bskul ba rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni srog
T02D1347-2:48a-30: rdzogs pa'i slad du yin la gnyis pa ni lo
T02D1347-2:48a-31: bcu drug gi mthar bde ba rdzogs pa'i slad du'o
T02D1347-2:48a-32: // des na rdo rje can yang ri bor 'dzin
T02D1347-2:48a-33: pa zhu ba bzhin bltas nas yang yig gis shes
T02D1347-2:48a-34: rab kyang ste shes rab dang bcas pa'i thugs dang
T02D1347-2:48a-35: ye shes rdo rje aa ba dh'u t'i dang dung
T02D1347-2:48a-37: lha mo rnams kyis glu dag mdzad de bcom ldan
T02D1347-2:48a-38: khyod ni sems can kun la phan par mdzad pa'o
T02D1347-2:48a-39: // bdag cag srung shig lha mi'i zla ba rdo
T02D1347-2:48a-40: rje ldan pa 'dod pa don gnyer rnams la 'dod
T02D1347-2:48a-41: // pa mdzod // 'dir byams pa dang snying rje
T02D1347-2:48b-0: dang dga' ba dang btang snyoms kyi @48b rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:48b-1: can sgrol ma dang m'a ma k'i dang gos dkar
T02D1347-2:48b-2: mo dang spyan ma ste lha mo rnams kyis byis
T02D1347-2:48b-3: pa rnams la dkyil 'khor bab pa'i don dang bcom
T02D1347-2:48b-4: ldas la 'gro ba'i don gyi slad du skul bar
T02D1347-2:48b-5: // pa mdzod // byed do // lha mo'i rdo rje glus bskul ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:48b-6: de bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud las /
T02D1347-2:48b-7: spyan ma bdag ni 'gro ba'i yul //
T02D1347-2:48b-8: rnal 'byor pa yi rgyu mthun gnas /
T02D1347-2:48b-9: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1347-2:48b-11: m'a ma k'i bdag srid mo ste //
T02D1347-2:48b-12: rnal 'byor pa yi rnam smin gnas /
T02D1347-2:48b-13: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis /
T02D1347-2:48b-15: gos dkar mo bdag bu mo ste /
T02D1347-2:48b-16: rnal 'byor pa ye shes bur gnas /
T02D1347-2:48b-17: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1347-2:48b-19: sgrol ma bdag ni tsha mo ste /
T02D1347-2:48b-20: rnal 'byor ba yi dri bral gnas //
T02D1347-2:48b-21: bdag gi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis //
T02D1347-2:48b-22: dus khro bzhengs la bdag 'dod mdzod //
T02D1347-2:48b-23: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams myong nas /
T02D1347-2:48b-24: sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni //
T02D1347-2:48b-25: 'gro ba gdon pa'i bsam ba yis //
T02D1347-2:48b-26: 'gro ba'i mgon po sgro bar mdzod //
T02D1347-2:48b-27: ces pa ste de ltar bde mnyam 'bras bu ster
T02D1347-2:48b-28: ba lte ba dang gsang ba la sogs pa'i padma
T02D1347-2:48b-29: la byis pa rnams kyi rnam par shes pa brgyal
T02D1347-2:48b-30: bar gyur pa sad par byed pa'i bzhin du lha'i
T02D1347-2:48b-31: sku gnas so zhes pa ni nges pa'i don to
T02D1347-2:48b-32: // da ni rdo rje des glu zhes pa la
T02D1347-2:48b-33: sogs pas lha bzhengs pa gsungs te 'dir stong pa
T02D1347-2:48b-34: nyid la rab tu zhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das glu
T02D1347-2:48b-35: rnams kyis rab tu sad par gyur pa na 'gro
T02D1347-2:48b-36: ba mtha' dag sgyu ma lta bur gzigs nas sems
T02D1347-2:48b-37: can gyi don gyi slad du slar yang skyed pa
T02D1347-2:48b-38: mdzad de dri ma med pa'i 'od zer 'phro ba
T02D1347-2:48b-39: rang gi mtshan ma h'um yig yongs su gyur pa'i
T02D1347-2:48b-40: rdo rje rtse lnga pa spros byas nas des rdo
T02D1347-2:48b-41: rje'i rgyan dang ldan zhing rgyal ba'i bdag po'i cod
T02D1347-2:48b-42: pan zhes pa mi bskyod pa'i cod pan can no
T02D1347-2:48b-43: // // shes rab kyis ni 'khyud par gyur pa
T02D1347-2:48b-44: zhes pa ni stong pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab pa rdo
T02D1347-2:48b-45: rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma sna tshogs yul gyis
T02D1347-2:48b-46: te de'i snying gar byis pa rnams kyi bzhin no
T02D1347-2:49a-1: po zhes pa bod pa ste shes rab thabs kyis
T02D1347-2:49a-2: ni shes rab dang thabs snyom par zhugs pas dkyil
T02D1347-2:49a-3: 'khor lnga'i rang bzhin gyis sangs rgyas nam mkhar gnas
T02D1347-2:49a-4: pa rnams phung po khams dang skye mched la sogs
T02D1347-2:49a-5: pa'i rang bzhin gyis dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1347-2:49a-6: don du rang gi lus la bcug ste shes rab
T02D1347-2:49a-7: kyi padmar sngags kyi rang bzhin yi ge so so
T02D1347-2:49a-8: rnams so // de nas padma las sngon bzhin du
T02D1347-2:49a-9: zhal dang phyag dang mtshan ma dang dbyings kyi mtshan
T02D1347-2:49a-10: nyid can rnams ye shes dang thugs dang gsung dang
T02D1347-2:49a-11: sku'i dkyil 'khor rnams la spro par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:49a-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor rab tu spro ba dag kyang ngo //
T02D1347-2:49a-13: kyang yig gis sngon bzhin zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:49a-14: byis pa mngal nas 'byung 'ba'i dus su srog la sogs pa'i rlung bcu skye'o /
T02D1347-2:49a-15: slob ma rnams dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i dus su me tog 'thor ro //
T02D1347-2:49a-16: gcer bu mngal gyi phru ma'i gos 'dzin pa byis
T02D1347-2:49a-17: pa zhes pa'i rnam par dag pas lha'i dam tshig
T02D1347-2:49a-19: de nas dbang po rab tu sad pa ni ye
T02D1347-2:49a-20: shes sems dpa' gzhug pa ste byis pa la ji
T02D1347-2:49a-21: lta ba de bzhin du lha la rna pa nyi
T02D1347-2:49a-22: shus rdzogs par byang chub pa'i mtshan nyid rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:49a-23: pa rnam gyis bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:49a-24: de ltar rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par byang
T02D1347-2:49a-25: chub pas sku rdzogs pa ni bsnyen pa'i yan lag
T02D1347-2:49a-26: ste / rnam pa nyi shus rdzogs par byang chub pas gsung rdzogs pa ni nye ba'i sgrub pa'o //
T02D1347-2:49a-27: de ltar skyed pa'i rim pa rnam pa gnyis te
T02D1347-2:49a-28: gcig ni mngal nas skyes pa dang gnyis pa sgo
T02D1347-2:49a-30: gang sgo nga las skyes pa de ni 'jig rten
T02D1347-2:49a-31: gyi khams skyed pa ste tshangs pa'i sgo nga zhes
T02D1347-2:49a-33: gang mngal na sa skyes pa de ni mi rnams skyed pa'o //
T02D1347-2:49a-34: gang skad cig gis gang yin pa de ni sems can rnams rdzus skyes las skyed pa'o //
T02D1347-2:49a-35: de ni skyed pa'i rim pa gcig ste skad cig
T02D1347-2:49a-36: gi rnam pa sems can gyi bsam pas bcom ldan
T02D1347-2:49a-38: rdzogs pa'i rim pa ni rtog pa dang bral ba ste /
T02D1347-2:49a-39: nam mkha' las byung rang byung ba //
T02D1347-2:49a-40: shes rab ye shes me bo che //
T02D1347-2:49b-0: 'od chen rnam @49b par snang par byed //
T02D1347-2:49b-1: ye shes snang pa lam me pa /
T02D1347-2:49b-2: zhes pa la sogs pa rnam pa lngas mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:49b-3: da ni 'od zer sngon po zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:49b-4: pas ye shes kyi 'khor lo dgug pa gsungs te
T02D1347-2:49b-5: / 'dir byis ba skyes pa'i dbu ma'i srog 'byung
T02D1347-2:49b-6: ba ni 'od zer sngon po ste de'i 'byung bas
T02D1347-2:49b-7: dbang po rnams rab tu sad cing phyi rol gyi
T02D1347-2:49b-8: yul rnams la rnam par shes pa drug po rnams
T02D1347-2:49b-10: de'i phyir phyi rol gyi lha rdzogs pa la dbu
T02D1347-2:49b-11: ma'i srog rnam par dag pas rdo rje shugs 'od
T02D1347-2:49b-12: zer sngon po 'jigs pa'i sku rab tu bzhad pa'i
T02D1347-2:49b-13: zhal mche ba phyed gtsigs pa sgra drag po sgrogs
T02D1347-2:49b-15: gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste phyag nyi shu rtsa
T02D1347-2:49b-16: drug pa zhal bzhi pa zhabs gnyis pa shes rab
T02D1347-2:49b-17: dang thabs las rab tu byung ba gtso bo bzhin
T02D1347-2:49b-18: du mtshon cha rnams dang bcas pa glang po che'i
T02D1347-2:49b-19: pags pa'i gos 'dzin pa phyag rgya ldas rnam par
T02D1347-2:49b-20: brgyan pa mi bskyod pas dbu brgyan pa thod pa
T02D1347-2:49b-21: dang mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa sbrul gyis brgyan
T02D1347-2:49b-22: pa h'um yig rdo rje'i sprul pa rkang pa brgyad
T02D1347-2:49b-23: pa'i shing rta dag la gnas zhes pa sgra dang
T02D1347-2:49b-24: reg bya dang ro dang gzugs dang dri dang snying
T02D1347-2:49b-25: stobs dang rdul dang mun pa'i yon tan la gnas
T02D1347-2:49b-26: pa rgyal ba'i dgra ni 'joms par byed pa ste
T02D1347-2:49b-27: / bdud dang nyon mongs pa 'joms par byed pa'i
T02D1347-2:49b-28: rdo rje shugs de ni ye shes 'khor lo'i slad
T02D1347-2:49b-29: du zhes pa yul lnga'i shes pa 'jug pa'i slad
T02D1347-2:49b-30: du bskul bar bya ste kun gzhi'i rnam par shes
T02D1347-2:49b-31: pa las 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:49b-32: de nas lte pa'i padma las phyi rol du 'byung
T02D1347-2:49b-33: pa'i srog gis phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams bkug
T02D1347-2:49b-35: de'i phyir rnam par dag pas dri med 'od zer
T02D1347-2:49b-36: 'phro pa ye shes 'khor lo'i dbang phyug nges par
T02D1347-2:49b-37: lte par rdo rje lcags kyus bsnun byas shing /
T02D1347-2:49b-38: phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams rang gi rdo
T02D1347-2:49b-39: rje sbrul gyi zhags pa dag gis bcings nas rang
T02D1347-2:49b-40: gi mtshon cha rnams kyis 'jigs par byas te /
T02D1347-2:49b-41: de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor lo bsgrub byar byas
T02D1347-2:49b-42: shing dngos po'i mtshan nyid sna tshogs pa'i 'khor lo
T02D1347-2:50a-1: nas slar yang rang gi gnas su 'gro'o //
T02D1347-2:50a-2: de nas gzhug pa ni kun gzhi rnam par shes
T02D1347-2:50a-3: pa dang mig gi dbang po las skyes pa mig
T02D1347-2:50a-4: gi rnam par shes pa rmugs byed kyis byed do
T02D1347-2:50a-5: // bcing ba ni lus kyi dbang po las skyes
T02D1347-2:50a-6: pa lus kyi rnam par shes pa rings byed kyis
T02D1347-2:50a-7: // byed do // mnyes pa ni lce'i dbang po
T02D1347-2:50a-8: las skyes pa lce'i rnam par shes pa khengs byed
T02D1347-2:50a-9: // byed do // kyis byed do // ro mnyam
T02D1347-2:50a-10: par byed pa ni snga'i dbang po las skyes pa
T02D1347-2:50a-11: sna'i rnam par shes pa shin tu stobs kyis byed
T02D1347-2:50a-12: // byed do // kyis byed do // do //
T02D1347-2:50a-13: de ltar na rnam pa lnga ni dza: yig gis
T02D1347-2:50a-14: dgug pa dang h'um yig gis gzhug pa dang bam
T02D1347-2:50a-15: yig gis bcing ba dang ho: yig gis mnyes pa
T02D1347-2:50a-16: dang h'i yig gis ro mnyam par byas te /
T02D1347-2:50a-17: rdo rje lcags kyu dang rdo rje dang rdo rje
T02D1347-2:50a-18: zhags pa dang rdo rje dril bu dang rdo rje
T02D1347-2:50a-19: dbyug pas so // de ltar ye shes kyi 'khor
T02D1347-2:50a-20: lo yang dag par mchod de sngar bzhin dam tshig
T02D1347-2:50a-21: gi 'khor lo la ro mnyam pa nyid du gyur
T02D1347-2:50a-22: pa bsgom par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:50a-23: da ni skyed pa'i zhes pa sogs pas skyed pa'i
T02D1347-2:50a-24: rim pas gnas so sor ye shes kyi lha rnams
T02D1347-2:50a-25: dam tshig gi lha rnams dang lhan cig tu gcig
T02D1347-2:50a-27: 'dir skyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi skyed pa'i rim pa
T02D1347-2:50a-28: dag la rnam par shes pa na nam mkha' dang
T02D1347-2:50a-29: bcas zhes pa rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma
T02D1347-2:50a-30: dang lhan cig tu snying po'i padmar zhes pa bde
T02D1347-2:50a-31: ba chen po la me'i steng du ste zla ba
T02D1347-2:50a-32: dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan nam dus me'i dkyil
T02D1347-2:50a-33: 'khor gyi steng du dam tshig sems dpa' dang ye
T02D1347-2:50a-34: shes sems dpa' ro ma nyam pa nyid du 'gyur
T02D1347-2:50a-35: ro // de bzhin du shar gyi 'dab ma la nag mo 'bar ma ro mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:50a-36: mchog gi pad 'dab la ni lhor dmar mo 'bar
T02D1347-2:50a-37: ma dang byang du dkar mo 'bar ma dang nub
T02D1347-2:50a-38: tu ser mo 'bar mar 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang
T02D1347-2:50a-39: gis zhes pa ye shes kyi zhal gyi dbang gis
T02D1347-2:50a-40: so // de bzhin du mer du ba ma dang
T02D1347-2:50a-41: bden bral du smig rgyu ma dang dbang ldan du
T02D1347-2:50a-42: mkha' snang ma dang rlung du mar me ma ro
T02D1347-2:50a-43: so // mnyam pa'o // de bzhin du me'i zur
T02D1347-2:50a-44: du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang bden bral du
T02D1347-2:50a-45: chos kyi gand'i dang dbang ldan du chos kyi dung
T02D1347-2:50a-46: dang rlung du dpag bsam gyi shing ste rdo rje
T02D1347-2:50a-47: phreng ba dang padma'i 'dab ma dag gi bar du
T02D1347-2:50b-0: de @50b bzhin du shar gyi padma'i gdan gyi lte
T02D1347-2:50b-1: bar nyi ma la 'du byed dang sa gnyis po
T02D1347-2:50b-2: dam tshig sems dpa' dag dang lhan cig ro mnyam
T02D1347-2:50b-3: pa'o // lhor tshor ba dang chu'i khams dang byang
T02D1347-2:50b-4: du 'du shes dang me'i khams dang nub tu rlung
T02D1347-2:50b-5: dang bcas pa'i gzugs ro mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:50b-7: de bzhin du me'i phyogs su rlung dang gzug dag ro mnyam par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:50b-8: bden bral du me'i khams dang 'du shes dang dbang
T02D1347-2:50b-9: ldan du chu'i khams dang tshor ba dang rlung du
T02D1347-2:50b-10: sa'i khams dang 'du byed dang ro mnyam pa ste
T02D1347-2:50b-11: zur du lha mo rnams gtso mo'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-12: de bzhin du lha mo sangs rgyas par rnams su
T02D1347-2:50b-13: ni le tshe brgyad kyi gnas su bdud rtsi'i ro'i
T02D1347-2:50b-14: bum pa rnams ro mnyam par 'gyur ro zhes pa
T02D1347-2:50b-15: nges pa ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phar ma la'o
T02D1347-2:50b-16: // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'phar ma'i sher gyi padma la sna dang dri ro mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-17: lhor mig dang yul gzugs dang byang du lce dang
T02D1347-2:50b-18: ro dang chur lus kyi dbang po dang reg bya
T02D1347-2:50b-19: dang nam mkhar rna ba dang sgra dag ste lho
T02D1347-2:50b-21: sa 'og tu ni nges par yid dang chos kyi khams su 'gyur te shar gyi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-22: de ltar dang por thabs ni drug po dag kyang
T02D1347-2:50b-23: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang gis dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:50b-24: gyi lhag pa'i lha ru 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:50b-25: phyi nas shes rab la sogs drug ces pa ni
T02D1347-2:50b-26: chos kyi khams la sogs pa ste 'dir mer reg
T02D1347-2:50b-27: bya rdo rje ma dang lus kyi dbang po'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-28: bden bral du ro rdo rje ma dang lce'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-29: dbang ldan du gzugs rdo rje ma dang mig go //
T02D1347-2:50b-30: rlung du dri rdo rje ma dang sna'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-31: sa 'og tu sgra rdo rje ma dang rna ba ste byang gi sgo'i g-yon du'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-32: nam mkha' la chos kyi khams dang yid de nub
T02D1347-2:50b-33: kyi sgo'i g-yon du rang rang gi padma'i gdan la
T02D1347-2:50b-34: zla ba'i steng du ye shes sems dpa' dang ro
T02D1347-2:50b-36: de ltar skye mched bcu gnyis po rnams ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'phar ma la'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-37: da ni khro bo'i rgyal po rnams kyi ro mnyam pa nyid gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:50b-38: shar gyis gor ni rab gtum ral gri 'dzin pa shin tu stobs te /
T02D1347-2:50b-39: de'i phyag rgya rengs byed ma'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-40: lho'i sgor rmugs byed dang phyag rgyal ma'o //
T02D1347-2:50b-41: byang gi sgor khengs byed dang phyag rgya rmugs byed ma'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-0: @51a * // nub kyi sgor rengs byed dang de'i phyag rgya mtha'
T02D1347-2:51a-1: yas brtson 'grus mar 'gyur te sgo'i dbus na gnas
T02D1347-2:51a-2: pa'i padma la ro mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-3: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la ro mnyam par byed pa
T02D1347-2:51a-4: ste skye ba can gyi lte ba'i 'khor lo dang
T02D1347-2:51a-5: snying ga'i padma la'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-6: de bzhin du khro bo'i zhar las byung ba phyi
T02D1347-2:51a-7: rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo skyong ste shar
T02D1347-2:51a-8: du dbyug pa sngon po dang 'od zer can ro
T02D1347-2:51a-9: mnyam pa'o // lhor 'dod pa dang tsun d'a shing rta la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-10: byang du mi g-yo ba dang khro gnyer can ma'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-11: nub tu brtson 'grus mtha' yas te ;
T02D1347-2:51a-12: stobs po che dang lcags sgrog ma ro mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-13: sa 'og tu gnod mdzes rgyal po dang drag spyan ma'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-14: steng du gtsug tor dang shin tu sngon mo'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-15: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la shar gyi sgo'i steng du gtsug tor dang nub tu gnod mdzes te /
T02D1347-2:51a-16: gnyis po dag gi shing rta yang ngo zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-17: bsgom pa la ni 'og dang steng du shing rta'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-18: snying po'i dkyil 'khor la kha dang dbang po dang
T02D1347-2:51a-19: bshang lam dang gtsug tor ni sgo rnams te dbang
T02D1347-2:51a-20: po zhes pa ni gci ba dang khu ba'i sgro'o
T02D1347-2:51a-21: // phyi rol du sku'i dkyil 'khor la sna dang
T02D1347-2:51a-22: mig dang lce dang lus dang rna ba rnams te
T02D1347-2:51a-23: byis pa'i lus la ji lta ba de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:51a-24: dkyil 'khor la'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-25: de bzhin du gnas lnga nas brjod pa'i dbang gis
T02D1347-2:51a-26: gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgo lnga ste de ltar
T02D1347-2:51a-27: 'og dang steng du stong pa'i sgo gsum po khu
T02D1347-2:51a-28: ba'i sgo dang lus dang mgrin pa'i gnas kyi mtshan
T02D1347-2:51a-29: nyid spangs nas dkyil 'khor gsum po rnams la sgo
T02D1347-2:51a-30: bcu gnyis so // de ltar nyi ma'i dus sbyor
T02D1347-2:51a-31: gyi dbye bas sgo bcu gnyis dang zla ba'i cha'i
T02D1347-2:51a-32: dbye bas bco lnga ste sems can thams cad kyi
T02D1347-2:51a-33: sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi chos kyis so zhes
T02D1347-2:51a-35: 'dir gsung gi dkyil 'khor la sogs pa ro mnyam
T02D1347-2:51a-36: pa nyid dang g-yon brkyang la sogs pa'i stabs rnams
T02D1347-2:51a-38: gsung las skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du ni zhes pa
T02D1347-2:51a-39: nas brtsams te rdo rje gar gyi slad du'o zhes
T02D1347-2:51a-40: pa'i mthar thug pa tshigs su bcad pa phyed dang
T02D1347-2:51a-41: bcas pa dgu ni go sla'o //
T02D1347-2:51a-42: da ni cod pan zhes pa la sogs pas lha
T02D1347-2:51b-0: @51b rnams kyi rigs kyi rgyas gdab pa gsungs pa
T02D1347-2:51b-1: 'dir mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:51b-2: du cod pan dag la phan tshun rdo rje yi
T02D1347-2:51b-3: ni rdo rjer 'gyur te de ci'i phyir zhe na
T02D1347-2:51b-4: ye shes dang rnam par shes pa phan tshun yang
T02D1347-2:51b-5: dag par sbyor ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:51b-6: de bas na ye shes kyis rnam par shes pa
T02D1347-2:51b-7: dang rnam par shes pas ye shes la ste gnyis
T02D1347-2:51b-8: ka'i spyi bo la thugs rdo rje chos gos dang
T02D1347-2:51b-9: gtsug tor 'dzin pa rdo rje skyil krung gis gnas
T02D1347-2:51b-10: pa sa la reg pa'i phyag rgas de bzhin gshegs
T02D1347-2:51b-12: ngo bo nyid kyi rigs la ni rigs lngas rgyas
T02D1347-2:51b-13: gdab pa bkag ste sangs rgyas rnams kyi skyed par
T02D1347-2:51b-14: byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:51b-15: yang na ye shes dang rnam par shes pa'i chos
T02D1347-2:51b-16: kyis sangs rgyas lnga'i bdag nyid kyi cod pan ni
T02D1347-2:51b-17: res 'ga' na'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:51b-18: gzugs kyi steng du mi bskyod pa ste sku'i rnam pa thugs kyis zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:51b-19: gsal bar padma 'dzin pa'i rnam par snang mdzad nyid
T02D1347-2:51b-20: du 'gyur te lus kyis gsung so sor brjod pas
T02D1347-2:51b-22: rin chen dbang po'i chu skyes 'dzin te rdul gyi chos can nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:51b-23: don yod grub pa'i cod pan la ni rab mchog
T02D1347-2:51b-24: nor bu'i phyag ste khrag las sha 'byung ba'i phyir
T02D1347-2:51b-25: ro // drug ni ral pa'i cod pan du 'gyur
T02D1347-2:51b-26: te yon tan dbang gis zhes pa la yon tan
T02D1347-2:51b-27: ni mu stegs pa rnams gzhug par bya ba'i slad
T02D1347-2:51b-28: du dbang phyug gi zhal rnam par dag pas zhal
T02D1347-2:51b-29: drug gam tshangs pa'i mtshan nyid lnga'i zhal lnga ni
T02D1347-2:51b-31: 'dir de ma thag pa ste rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1347-2:51b-32: dang g-yon gyi lha ste snang ba mtha' yas dang
T02D1347-2:51b-33: mi 'jigs pa ste rin chen 'byung ldan dang de'i
T02D1347-2:51b-34: skyes bu ste don yod grub pa dang dbang ldan
T02D1347-2:51b-35: te mi bskyod pa dang dus kyi me ste rdo
T02D1347-2:51b-36: rje sems dpa' rnams ni sa dang chu dang me
T02D1347-2:51b-37: dang rlung dang nam mkha' dang ye shes kyi rang
T02D1347-2:51b-38: bzhin tha mal pa'i phung po rnams te dag pa'i
T02D1347-2:51b-39: phung po gtsug tor dang chos gos 'dzin pa rnams
T02D1347-2:51b-41: de ltar drug ni ral pa'i cod pan can zhes bya'o //
T02D1347-2:51b-42: lhag ma'i 'khor lo'i lha dang lha mo rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:51b-43: cod pan ni rin po che sna tshogs pa'i rang
T02D1347-2:51b-44: bzhin dang rang rang gi rigs kyis rgyas btab pa
T02D1347-2:52a-1: par 'gyur pa las gang zhig gang gis bskyed pa de ni des rgyas gdab bo //
T02D1347-2:52a-2: da ni 'khor lo la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams
T02D1347-2:52a-3: kyi rab tu skye ba gsungs pa sa las zhes
T02D1347-2:52a-4: pa la sogs pa ste 'dir sa'i sa bon li
T02D1347-2:52a-5: yig las 'khor lo rab tu skye'o //
T02D1347-2:52a-6: chu las te au yig las padma dang me las
T02D1347-2:52a-7: te ri yig las nor bu dang rlung las te
T02D1347-2:52a-8: ai yig las ral gri dang stong pa las te
T02D1347-2:52a-9: aa yig las rdo rje dang ye shes las te
T02D1347-2:52a-10: aam yig las gri gug tu 'gyur zhes pa bya
T02D1347-2:52a-12: de bzhin du l'i yig las gos su 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:52a-13: a'u yig las bdud rtsi'i snod dang r'i yig las
T02D1347-2:52a-14: me long dang a'i yig las dri dang a'a yig
T02D1347-2:52a-15: las rgyud mangs dang rnam par bcad pa can aa:yig
T02D1347-2:52a-16: las chos 'byung ste sa la sogs pa'i yon tan
T02D1347-2:52a-17: gyi dbye bas mtshan ma rnams so //
T02D1347-2:52a-18: de bzhin du l'i yig las phu ba dang ao
T02D1347-2:52a-19: yig las mdung dang aar yig las mda' dang ae
T02D1347-2:52a-20: yig las dgra sta dang aa yig las da ma
T02D1347-2:52a-21: ru ste yon tan gyi dbye bas mtshan ma lnga'o
T02D1347-2:52a-22: // de bzhin du a'a la yig las dbyug pa
T02D1347-2:52a-23: dang aoo yig las zhags pa dang a'a ra yig
T02D1347-2:52a-24: las lcags kyu dang aee yig las tho ba dang
T02D1347-2:52a-25: a'a yig las rtse gsum ste 'phel ba'i dbyangs kyis
T02D1347-2:52a-26: // mtshan ma lnga'o // de bzhin du la yig
T02D1347-2:52a-27: las gzhu dang wa yig las autpala dang ra yig
T02D1347-2:52a-28: las mgo bo dang ya yig las kha tv'am ga
T02D1347-2:52a-29: dang ha yig las dril bu'o //
T02D1347-2:52a-30: de bzhin du l'a yig las lcags sgrog dang w'a
T02D1347-2:52a-31: yig las dung dang r'a yig las thod pa dang
T02D1347-2:52a-32: y'a yig las stag gi pags pa dang h'a yig
T02D1347-2:52a-33: las glang po che'i pags pa ste ya nar 'gyur
T02D1347-2:52a-34: pa ring po rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-2:52a-35: mtshan ma sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbyangs kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:52a-36: 'dir ni lhag ma nye ba'i mtshan mas dang chu
T02D1347-2:52a-37: dang sreg za rlung dang nam mkha' las skyes pa
T02D1347-2:52a-38: de rnams rang bzhin yon tan dbang gis shes par
T02D1347-2:52a-39: bya ba nyid de lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o
T02D1347-2:52a-40: zhes pa tsa rtsi k'a la sogs pa thams cad
T02D1347-2:52a-41: kyi mtshan ma rnams rlung la sogs pa'i dbye bas
T02D1347-2:52a-42: rig par bya'o // 'dir gsungs pa gang zhig li
T02D1347-2:52a-43: la sogs pa sa dang chu dang sreg za rlung
T02D1347-2:52a-44: dang nam mkha' las skyes thung du dang /
T02D1347-2:52b-0: ring po'i rab dbyes rim bar @52b yongs bkod sum
T02D1347-2:52b-1: cu'i dbyangs ni nges par padma la gnas zla ba
T02D1347-2:52b-2: dang // nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa 'khor lo
T02D1347-2:52b-3: la sogs mtshan ma de rnams mtha' dag rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:52b-4: dang // rang gi sngags // gang zhig kho nar
T02D1347-2:52b-5: mtshan ma drug par gyur pa der ni yon tan
T02D1347-2:52b-6: dbang gis gzhom du med par 'gyur ;
T02D1347-2:52b-7: de ltar sa bon gyis mtshan ma bskyed pa dang
T02D1347-2:52b-8: mtshan mas lha skyed pa ni rnal 'byor pas thams
T02D1347-2:52b-9: cad du rtogs par bya'o zhes pa rgyud kyi nges
T02D1347-2:52b-10: pa'o // da ni n'a da zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:52b-11: pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:52b-12: skye ba'i sa bon gyi yi ge gsungs te n'a
T02D1347-2:52b-13: da ni gzhom du med pa'o //
T02D1347-2:52b-14: dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' ni ye shes kyi phung po'o //
T02D1347-2:52b-15: de ltar thams cad du ming dang ming can gyi
T02D1347-2:52b-16: 'brel pa ste 'di ltar aa ni mi bskyod pa
T02D1347-2:52b-17: dang ai ni don yod grub pa dang ri ni
T02D1347-2:52b-18: rin chen 'byung ldan dang au ni snang ba mtha'
T02D1347-2:52b-19: yas dang li ni rnam par snang mdzad dang l'i
T02D1347-2:52b-20: ni spyan ma dang a'u ni m'a ma k'i dang
T02D1347-2:52b-21: r'i ni gos dkar mo ma dang a'u ni sgrol
T02D1347-2:52b-22: ma dang a'a ni rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug
T02D1347-2:52b-23: ma dang gzhom du med pa zhes pa ni dpal
T02D1347-2:52b-24: ldan yum ste shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin
T02D1347-2:52b-25: ma'o // de ltar lus dang bsam pa'i dbye bas
T02D1347-2:52b-26: thung du dang ring po'i dbyangs rnams kyi skye ba'o
T02D1347-2:52b-27: ma'o // / de bzhin du mchog gi rgyal ba'i
T02D1347-2:52b-28: bdag po ye shes kyi phung po dang sna tshogs
T02D1347-2:52b-29: yum ye shes kyi khams ni phan tshun lus dang
T02D1347-2:52b-30: ma'o // / bsam pa'o // rnam par shes pa dang nam mkha'i khams so //
T02D1347-2:52b-31: 'du byed dang sa'i khams dang tshor ba dang chu'i
T02D1347-2:52b-32: khams dang 'du shes dang me'i khams dang gzugs dang
T02D1347-2:52b-34: de bzhin du aam yig ni kun du bzang po
T02D1347-2:52b-35: dang aa yig ni phyag na rdo rje dang ae
T02D1347-2:52b-36: ni nam mkha'i snying po dang aar na si'i snying
T02D1347-2:52b-37: po dang ao ni 'jig rten dbang phyug dang aal
T02D1347-2:52b-38: ni sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'o //
T02D1347-2:52b-39: de bzhin du a'a ni chos kyi khams dang a'a:ni
T02D1347-2:52b-40: sgra rdo rje ma dang aee ni reg bya rdo
T02D1347-2:52b-41: rje ma dang a'a ra ni ro rdo rje ma
T02D1347-2:52b-42: dang aoo ni gzugs rdo rje ma dang a'a la
T02D1347-2:52b-44: kun du bzang po dang chos kyi khams ni phan tshun du lus dang bsam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:52b-45: phyag na rdo rje dang sgra'i rdo rje ma zung ste lus dang bsam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:52b-46: nam mkha'i snying po dang dri rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-1: rten dbang phyug dang ro rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-2: sa'i snying po dang gzugs rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-3: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang reg bya rdo rje ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-4: de ltar rigs ni drug po nges par rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:53a-5: yon tan dbang gis yang dag par ni rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:53a-6: pas rig par bya zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-7: de ni hom zhes pa la sogs pa khro bo
T02D1347-2:53a-8: rnams kyi rigs lnga'i sa bon gsungs pa 'dir ham
T02D1347-2:53a-9: yig ni gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur par 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:53a-10: lus kyi dbang gis zhes pa lus kyi dbye ba
T02D1347-2:53a-11: las so // de ltar gzhan rnams kyang ngo //
T02D1347-2:53a-13: ha ni gnod mdzes dang h'a ni drag spyan ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-14: yam ni shin tu stobs dang l'a:ni rengs byed ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-15: rom ni rmugs byed dang w'a:ni nga rgyal ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-16: wom ni khengs byed dang r'a:ni rmugs byed ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-17: lam ni rengs byed dang y'a:ni shin tu brtson 'grus ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-18: de bzhin du ya wa ra la ni grangs bzhin
T02D1347-2:53a-19: du dbyug pa sngon po dang mi g-yo ba dang
T02D1347-2:53a-20: 'dod pa dang stobs po cher 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:53a-21: lus kyi dbang gis lha mo rnams kyi ring po
T02D1347-2:53a-22: ste glang po che'i shing rta la y'a ni rdo
T02D1347-2:53a-23: rje lcags sgrog ma dang rta'i shing rta la w'a
T02D1347-2:53a-24: ni tsun d'a dang seng ge'i shing rta la r'a
T02D1347-2:53a-25: ni khro gnyer can ma dang phag gi shing rta
T02D1347-2:53a-26: la l'a ni 'od zer can ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-27: de bzhin du dbyug sngon dang 'od zer can ni zung ste phan tshun lus dang bsam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-28: mi g-yo ba dang khro gnyer can ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-29: shin tu stobs dang rdo rje lcags sgrog ma'o //
T02D1347-2:53a-30: 'dod pa'i rgyal po dang tsun d'a ni zung ste
T02D1347-2:53a-31: dkyil 'khor la ni bde ba dam pa'i don du'o
T02D1347-2:53a-32: zhes pa ni gzhan gyi rigs la 'khyud pas so
T02D1347-2:53a-33: // de bzhin du nus ma'i sa bon rnams te
T02D1347-2:53a-34: nus ma ni du ba la sogs pa mtshan ma'i
T02D1347-2:53a-36: de la aa yig dag dang aom dang rnam par
T02D1347-2:53a-37: bcad pa ni aa a'a aom aa:ste rim pa bzhin
T02D1347-2:53a-38: du nag mo 'bar ma dang ser mo 'bar ma
T02D1347-2:53a-39: dang dkar mo 'bar ma dang dmar mo 'bar ma'o
T02D1347-2:53a-40: // de bzhin du ham dang ha:dang ha h'a ste
T02D1347-2:53a-41: hom ni mkha' gsal ma dang ha:ni smig rgyu ma
T02D1347-2:53a-42: dang ha ni du ba ma dang h'a ni mar
T02D1347-2:53a-43: me ma ste de ltar yi ge brgyad las skyes
T02D1347-2:53a-45: bum pa rnams la de bzhin ta yig rlung dang
T02D1347-2:53a-46: me dang chu dang sa yi dbyangs kyis phye bar
T02D1347-2:53b-0: 'gyur zhes pa ni @53b shar gyi bum pa dag
T02D1347-2:53b-1: la hi h'i dang lho'i bum pa dag la hri
T02D1347-2:53b-2: hr'i dang byang gi bum pa dag la hu h'u
T02D1347-2:53b-3: dang nub kyi bum pa dag la hli lh'i ste
T02D1347-2:53b-4: rlung la sogs pa'i dbye ba'o //
T02D1347-2:53b-5: de bzhin dang ha ni dpag bsam gyi shing dang
T02D1347-2:53b-6: a'a:ni chos kyi gand'i dang ha ni dpag bsam gyi
T02D1347-2:53b-7: shing dang a'a: ni chos kyi gand'i ste thugs kyi
T02D1347-2:53b-8: dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sa bon gyi yi ge'o //
T02D1347-2:53b-9: da ni gsung gi dkyil 'khor la tsa rtsi k'a
T02D1347-2:53b-10: la sogs pa'i sa bon gyi yi ge rnams gsungs
T02D1347-2:53b-11: te ha yig ni ts'a mund'a'o //
T02D1347-2:53b-12: hom ni dbang phyug chen mo dang ha:ni phag mo
T02D1347-2:53b-13: dang h'a ni dbang mo dang ksha ni khyab 'jug
T02D1347-2:53b-14: ma dang kshth'a ni tshangs ma dang kshom ni dpal
T02D1347-2:53b-15: chen mo dang ksha:ni gzhon nu ma ste gtso mo
T02D1347-2:53b-17: de bzhin du 'dab ma'i lha mo rnams kyi ni
T02D1347-2:53b-18: rim pa bzhin du shar la sogs pa phyogs brgyad
T02D1347-2:53b-19: kyi rgyab kyi padma'i 'dab ma rnams la h'i hr'i
T02D1347-2:53b-20: h'u hl'i ksh'i kshr'i ksh'u kshl'i'o //
T02D1347-2:53b-21: thung ngu'i dbyangs rnams mdun du'o zhes pa 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:53b-22: brgyad po rnams la hi hri hu hli ksh'i kshri
T02D1347-2:53b-23: kshu kshli zhes pa ste shar gyi padma'i 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:53b-24: dag dang lho'i dag dang byang gi dag dang nub
T02D1347-2:53b-25: kyi dag dang me'i dag dang bden bral gyi dag
T02D1347-2:53b-26: dang dbang ldan gyi dag dang rlung gi dag la'o
T02D1347-2:53b-27: // lhag ma'i 'dab ma drug po rnams la ni
T02D1347-2:53b-28: 'dab ma drug la ya sogs dbyangs drug gis phye
T02D1347-2:53b-29: thung du ring po rnams ni rim par yongs bkod
T02D1347-2:53b-30: pa zhes pa ste phyogs dang phyogs bral gyi padma'i
T02D1347-2:53b-32: de la ts'a mund'a padma'i 'dab ma la mdun du
T02D1347-2:53b-33: hi yig sngar bkod pa ste de nas g-yas skor
T02D1347-2:53b-34: gyis 'dab ma gnyis pa la ya dang gsum pa
T02D1347-2:53b-35: la yi dang bzhi pa la yri dang lnga pa
T02D1347-2:53b-36: la sngar bkod pa'i h'i dang drug pa la yu
T02D1347-2:53b-37: dang bdun pa la yli dang brgyad pa la yom
T02D1347-2:53b-38: ngo // de bzhin du khyab 'jug ma'i kshi y'a y'i yr'i ksh'i ksh'i y'u yl'i ye: 'o //
T02D1347-2:53b-39: de bzhin du phag mo'i mdun gyi 'dab ma la
T02D1347-2:53b-40: hri ste de nas ra ri rri hr'i ru rli
T02D1347-2:53b-41: ram ngo // gzhon nu ma'i kshri r'a r'i rr'i kshr'i r'u rl'i ra: 'o //
T02D1347-2:53b-42: drag mo'i hu wa wi wri hu wu wli wom ngo //
T02D1347-2:53b-43: de bzhin du dpal chen mo'i kshu w'a w'i wr'i ksh'u w'u wl'i wa: 'o //
T02D1347-2:53b-44: dbang mo'i hli la li lri hl'i lu lli la ngo //
T02D1347-2:53b-45: tshangs ma'i kshli l'a l'i lr'i kshl'i l'u ll'i la:'o //
T02D1347-2:53b-46: de ltar hi kshi la sogs la mtha' thams cad
T02D1347-2:53b-47: nor ni gdengs can gyis bsgyur zhes pa brgyad la
T02D1347-2:54a-1: la sogs pa lha mo rnams kyi 'dab ma la
T02D1347-2:54a-2: go rims bzhin du'o zhes pa nges pa ste phyogs
T02D1347-2:54a-3: rnams su hi la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:54a-4: kshi la sogs pa ni phyogs bral gyi padma'i dang po rnams la'o //
T02D1347-2:54a-5: 'dir rigs kyi dbang gis mngon phyogs ts'a mund'a la
T02D1347-2:54a-6: sogs pa'i thabs su 'gyur te sngags kyi dbye bas
T02D1347-2:54a-7: so zhes pa ni 'dir ts'a mund'a dang khyab 'jug
T02D1347-2:54a-8: ma ni 'du byed kyi rigs can ma'o //
T02D1347-2:54a-9: de dag la mngon du phyogs pa gzugs kyi rigs
T02D1347-2:54a-10: can ni thabs te sngags kyi dbye bas zhes pa
T02D1347-2:54a-11: li yig gi rigs can nyid do //
T02D1347-2:54a-12: phag mo dang gzhon nu ma ni tshor ba'i rigs can ma'o //
T02D1347-2:54a-13: de dag la mngon du phyogs pa 'du shes kyi
T02D1347-2:54a-14: rigs can ni thabs te au yig las skyes pa'o
T02D1347-2:54a-15: // dbang mo dang tshangs ma ni gzugs kyi rigs can ma'o //
T02D1347-2:54a-16: de dag la mngon du phyogs pa 'du byed kyi
T02D1347-2:54a-17: rigs can ni thabs te ai yig las skyes pa'o
T02D1347-2:54a-18: // drag mo dang dpal chen mo ni 'du shes kyi rigs can ma'o //
T02D1347-2:54a-19: de dag la mngon du phyogs pa tshor ba'i rigs can ni thabs te ri yig las skyes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:54a-20: de ltar gsung gi dkyil 'khor la rigs bzhi'i rnam par gzhag pa'o //
T02D1347-2:54a-21: da ni sku'i dkyil 'khor la brgya byin la sogs
T02D1347-2:54a-22: pa rnams kyi sa bon gsungs te tom ni brgya
T02D1347-2:54a-23: byin dang na:ni tshangs pa dang pom ni rgya mtsho
T02D1347-2:54a-24: dang ma:ni tshogs kyi dbang po dang tom ni me
T02D1347-2:54a-25: dang na:ni gzhon nu dang tsom ni srin po'i dbang
T02D1347-2:54a-26: po dang nya:ni rlung dang kom ni khyab 'jug dang
T02D1347-2:54a-27: nga:ni gshin rje dang som ni drag po dang ka:ni
T02D1347-2:54a-28: gnod sbyin no // de ltar tsa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:54a-29: sde pa drug po rnams ni thung du dang ring
T02D1347-2:54a-30: po'i dbye bas nag pa'i zla ba la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:54a-31: rnams kyi gnam stong gi sa bon te tsom nya:/
T02D1347-2:54a-32: zhes pa la sogs pas nag pa zla ba'i gnam
T02D1347-2:54a-33: stong dang sa ga'i zla ba'i gnam stong la gzung
T02D1347-2:54a-34: bar bya'o // de bzhin du tsa la sogs sde
T02D1347-2:54a-35: pa dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams ni lha yi padma'i
T02D1347-2:54a-37: nag pa'i zla ba sogs kyi tshes rnams dus kyi
T02D1347-2:54a-38: nges pa'i dbang gis stong pa drug dang me yi
T02D1347-2:54a-39: grangs zhes pa sum brgya drug cu'i grangs te lo
T02D1347-2:54a-41: 'dir nag pa zla ba'i lha mo rnams ni dang
T02D1347-2:54b-0: po'i zlum skor @54b gyi 'dab ma bcu bzhi po
T02D1347-2:54b-1: rnams la'o // de la dang po'i 'dab ma la
T02D1347-2:54b-2: nya rdo rje ma dang gnyis pa la nyi rdo
T02D1347-2:54b-3: rje ma dang de bzhin du nyri rdo rje ma
T02D1347-2:54b-4: dang nyu rdo rje ma dang nyli rdo rje ma
T02D1347-2:54b-5: dang nyom rdo rje ma dang de bzhin du dzha
T02D1347-2:54b-6: rdo rje ma dang dzhi rdo rje ma dang dzhri
T02D1347-2:54b-7: rdo rje ma dang dzhu rdo rje ma dang dzhom

T02D1347-2:54b-36: mchu'i zla ba dang bo'i zla ba dag la ka sde'o //

T02D1347-2:55a-3: de ltar rlung me chu dang sa rnams kyi dkyil
T02D1347-2:55a-4: 'khor rnams la shar la sogs pa'i klu rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:55a-5: zhes so // da ni khyi gdong ma la sogs pa rnams kyi sa bon gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:55a-6: brtsegs pa zhes pa ni yi ge so sor yi ge lnga'i bdag nyid brtsegs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:55a-7: sde bdun brtsegs pa la gnas de rnams ksha ya
T02D1347-2:55a-8: ra wa lar ldan pa ni brgyad de dur khrod

T02D1347-2:55a-14: // de ltar thams cad du shes rab thabs kyi

T02D1347-2:55a-25: // // // da ni sku bzhi rnam par dag

T02D1347-2:55b-0: dang rnam par snang @55b mdzad do //

T02D1347-2:55b-8: dbye bas bshang ba dang gci ba dang khrag dang
T02D1347-2:55b-9: rkang gi bum pa brgyad do //

T02D1347-2:55b-11: de nas phyi rol gyi 'phar ma la thugs kyi
T02D1347-2:55b-12: dkyil 'khor gyi sgo rnams su khro bo'i dbang po

T02D1347-2:55b-14: padma mthar byed dang gshin rje mthar byed dang gtsug
T02D1347-2:55b-15: tor ro // byang chub sems dpa' ni phyag na
T02D1347-2:55b-16: rdo rje dang nam mkha'i snying po dang sa'i snying
T02D1347-2:55b-17: po dang 'jig rten dbang phyug dang rnam par sel

T02D1347-2:55b-23: rdo rje ma ste 'di rnams ni chos kyi sku

T02D1347-2:56a-6: rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa ji lta ba de bzhin
T02D1347-2:56a-7: du dkyil 'khor la yang nges par sgra rdo rje

T02D1347-2:56a-15: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la thugs kyi rigs kyi dbang

T02D1347-2:56a-19: ba lhan cig skyes pa'i sku yin pa ji lta

T02D1347-2:56a-22: po 'khor dang bcas pa zhes pa lha mo drug

T02D1347-2:56a-25: pa bskum pa dang tshig mi gsal ba chos kyi
T02D1347-2:56a-26: sku yin pa ji lta ba de bzhin du lha
T02D1347-2:56a-27: bcu gnyis te sogs pa'i sgras shing rta la gnas
T02D1347-2:56a-29: 'dir byis pa'i so skyes pa dang tshig gsal bar
T02D1347-2:56a-30: gyur pa na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa
T02D1347-2:56a-31: ji lta ba de bzhin du dkyil 'khor la mtha'
T02D1347-2:56a-33: 'dir byis pa'i so lhung ste slar yang skyes pa
T02D1347-2:56a-34: nas 'chi ba'i bar du sprul pa'i sku yin pa
T02D1347-2:56a-35: ji lta ba de bzhin du dkyil 'khor la gtum
T02D1347-2:56a-36: mo khyi gdong ma la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas
T02D1347-2:56a-37: pa ste 'byung po bye ba phrag phyed dang bcas
T02D1347-2:56a-38: pa'i gsum dang bcas pa ni sprul pa'i skur 'gyur
T02D1347-2:56a-39: mi yi bdag po sems can kun gyi don gyi
T02D1347-2:56a-40: slad du'o zhes pa phyi rol du sku bzhi rnam

T02D1347-2:56a-44: la sogs pa ste 'dir byis pa'i gzugs rdzogs pa'i

T02D1347-2:56b-18: ster ba'o // srog chags rnams kyi ye shes dang
T02D1347-2:56b-19: sprul pa'i sku'i mtshan nyid zung yin pa ji lta
T02D1347-2:56b-20: ba de bzhin du de'i chos mi mthun pas rgyu
T02D1347-2:56b-21: dang 'bras bu'i yan lag bcu gnyis 'gags pa ni
T02D1347-2:56b-22: thar pa ster ba'o zhes pa sangs rgyas kyi nges
T02D1347-2:56b-23: ster ba'o // pa'o // slar yang sku bzhi dang
T02D1347-2:56b-24: rdo rje bzhi po rnams kyi shes rab thabs kyi
T02D1347-2:56b-25: lus dang bsam pa mnyam pa dang mi mnyam rigs
T02D1347-2:56b-26: zhes pa la mnyam pa'i rigs ni rdul las byung
T02D1347-2:56b-27: ba'i khams kyi rigs dang mi mnyam pa'i rigs ni
T02D1347-2:56b-28: khu ba las byung ba'i khams kyi rigs te nyi
T02D1347-2:56b-29: zla ka sogs aa sogs dang rnam gsum srid pa

T02D1347-2:56b-32: bcu gnyis kyi dbye ba dag gis rnal 'byor pa

T02D1347-2:56b-34: las byis pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du

T02D1347-2:56b-38: brlab pa gsungs pa rdo rje zhes pa la sogs

T02D1347-2:56b-40: dang sems byin gyis brlab pa sad pa dang rmi
T02D1347-2:56b-41: lam dang shin tu gnyid log pa'i mtshan nyid du
T02D1347-2:56b-42: 'gyur pa ji lta ba de bzhin du dpral ba

T02D1347-2:57a-3: ni byis pa mas 'khru bar byed pa ji lta
T02D1347-2:57a-4: ba de bzhin du rab mchog rgyal ba'i bdag po'i

T02D1347-2:57a-7: 'dir byin gyis brlab pa ni dpral bar aa yig

T02D1347-2:57a-9: // de'i steng du aom yig yongs su gyur pa las 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'o //
T02D1347-2:57a-10: de yongs su gyur pa las sku rdo rje kha
T02D1347-2:57a-11: dog dkar po zhal gsum pa rtsa ba dkar po

T02D1347-2:57a-19: sems can rnams la chos bstan pa mdzad nas slar
T02D1347-2:57a-20: log ste bdag nyid kyi mdun du yang dag par

T02D1347-2:57a-22: bskur du gsol zhes dbang bskur bar gsol ba gdab

T02D1347-2:57a-26: de nas dbang bskur bar gyur pa la byin gyis

T02D1347-2:66b-4: tu zhugs shing gnyis ka'i bgrod pa bcom pa zhes

T02D1347-2:66b-9: rjes su dran pa ste rnam pa bcur sngar gsungs

T02D1347-2:66b-32: kyi slad du sbyor ba yan lag drug bsgom par
T02D1347-2:66b-33: sbyin pa mo'o // bya'o // da ni so sor

T02D1347-2:66b-39: te tshig gi mchog sbyin pa la sogs pa sbyin

T02D1347-2:66b-41: mngon par shes pa lnga ni thob par 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:67a-0: mi yi bdag po bsam gtan sbyor @67a * //

T02D1347-2:67a-23: ba'o // 'gyur ro // kyang gi sgra las ba

T02D1347-2:67a-25: ba'o // 'gyur ro // par rgyu'o // ye shes

T02D1347-2:75a-8: t'i la srog gnas pa gzugs rnam par gsal ba
T02D1347-2:75a-9: mthong ba de'i tshe gzugs de ji ltar rnam par

T02D1347-2:75a-11: // gtso bo zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i dus kyi 'khor lo rdzogs par byas te /
T02D1347-2:75a-12: de nas de'i thugs khar padma'i dbus kyi lte ba
T02D1347-2:75a-13: la ri bong can dang nyi ma me zhes pa
T02D1347-2:75a-14: zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan te gsum

T02D1347-2:75a-28: nas / rdo rje lcags kyu de rnams kyis srid
T02D1347-2:75a-29: pa gsum gyi rnam ba can dang ba khyab byed
T02D1347-2:75a-30: nyid kyis rnam gsum srid par gnas pa'i ye shes

T02D1347-2:75a-41: dang ldan par spro bar byed pa ji lta ba

T02D1347-2:75b-4: ji lta ba de bzhin nyid do //

T02D1347-2:75b-7: tu zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sems khrag dang lhan

T02D1347-2:75b-30: dang bde ba thams cad rnal 'byor pas 'grub par

T02D1347-2:76a-0: de yongs su gyur pa las lha 'am lha mo @76a * //

T02D1347-2:77a-23: pa'i dkyil 'khor la aa yig gi rigs kyi dbang

T02D1347-2:78a-12: pa'i yul la rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi bde ba

T02D1347-2:78a-14: pa'i slad du bsam gtan gyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:78a-15: da ni las bsgrub pa'i slad du dang po'i nges
T02D1347-2:78a-16: pa gsungs pa khyab bdag ces pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:78a-17: ste / 'dir rnal 'byor pas las 'grub pa'i slad du dang por bsgrub par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:78a-18: sngags gzhan 'grub pa'i slad du 'chad par 'gyur pa'i
T02D1347-2:78a-19: bzlas pa dang sbyin sreg gi cho gas dpal ldan
T02D1347-2:78a-20: sngags zhes pa ste aom a'a: hum zhes pa bsgrub
T02D1347-2:78a-21: par bya'o // de bzhin du bsam gtan gzhan 'grub
T02D1347-2:78a-22: pa'i slad du sangs rgyas gzugs zhes pa stong pa
T02D1347-2:78a-23: nyid kyi gzugs mngon sum du bya ste /
T02D1347-2:78a-24: de ltar khyab bdag gi ni dpal ldan sngags dang
T02D1347-2:78a-25: sangs rgyas gzugs kyang rnal 'byor pa yis dang por
T02D1347-2:78a-26: bsgrub par bya'o // phyi nas nyi ma'i dbye ba
T02D1347-2:78a-27: rnams kyis zhes pa dbye ba bcu gnyis kyis gnas
T02D1347-2:78a-28: pa yon tan dpag tu med pa'i las rnams 'grub
T02D1347-2:78a-29: bsgrub par bya'o // par 'gyur ro // sngags dang
T02D1347-2:78a-30: gzugs brnyan ma grub par ni srid gsum gnas su
T02D1347-2:78a-31: ci yang 'grub par 'gyur pa nyid ma yin /
T02D1347-2:78a-32: de phyir rgyal po rang sems dri ma rnam par
T02D1347-2:78a-33: bral ba dag las dang por khyab bdag gi sngags
T02D1347-2:78a-34: dang gzugs ni bsgrub par bya'o zhes pa nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:78a-35: // da ni ral gri la sogs pa'i dngos grub
T02D1347-2:78a-36: kyi don du lha min dbang po'i sgrub pa gsungs
T02D1347-2:78a-37: pa dpa' bo zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:78b-0: 'dir g-yul gyi sar @78b dpa' bo zhes pa rgyal po'i bu'am /
T02D1347-2:78b-1: 'thab mo pa gzhan lcags mda' gcig bsnun pas lhung bar gyur pa'am /
T02D1347-2:78b-2: de bzhin du chom rkun nam dpa' bo shing la
T02D1347-2:78b-3: dpyangs pa ni nag po'i phyogs kyi brgyad dam 'byung
T02D1347-2:78b-4: po'i mtshan mo zhes pa bcu bzhi la ste /
T02D1347-2:78b-5: mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:78b-6: ro sreg sar ni zhes pa dur khrod du dbang
T02D1347-2:78b-7: gi las la gsungs pa'i bum pa brgyad dang rgyal
T02D1347-2:78b-8: ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dag gis
T02D1347-2:78b-9: kyang ro de bkru bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:78b-10: de nas dri dang spos dang mar me dang ni
T02D1347-2:78b-11: rnam mang kha zas me tog dmar po rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:78b-12: rab mchod nas / gos dmar po bskon par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:78b-13: mgo dang snying kha dang ni spyi bo lte ba
T02D1347-2:78b-14: la sogs su yang rdo rje dgod pa rab byas
T02D1347-2:78b-15: te zhes pa ni dpral bar aom /
T02D1347-2:78b-21: de bzhin du sngar gsungs pa'i snying kha dang mgo
T02D1347-2:78b-22: bo dang gtsug tor dang go cha dang mig dang
T02D1347-2:78b-23: mtshon cha ste / yan lag drug dgod pa byas
T02D1347-2:78b-24: nas ro dang bdag nyid kyi lus kyang lha'i rnal
T02D1347-2:78b-26: de nas sngar gsungs pa'i thab khung zur gsum du
T02D1347-2:78b-27: rdul tshon dmar pos snying po'i padma dmar po gang
T02D1347-2:78b-28: yin pa de ni mtshan mar bcas pa zhes pa
T02D1347-2:78b-29: ste / lte ba la mda'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D1347-2:78b-30: yang na las thams cad la rdo rje zhes gsungs pa'i phyir rdo rje dmar po'o //
T02D1347-2:78b-31: 'dab mar rgyal rnams mtshan ma zhes pa ni shar gyi 'dab mar ral gri dang /
T02D1347-2:78b-34: nub tu 'khor lo ste phyogs su'o //
T02D1347-2:78b-35: phyogs bral du ni de bzhin lha mo rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:78b-36: rang mtshan ma zhes pa ni sngar gsungs pa'i ma
T02D1347-2:78b-37: mo'i skyon la ji lta ba bzhin du mer gri
T02D1347-2:78b-38: gug dang / bden bral gyi 'dab mar rdo rje lcags kyu dang /
T02D1347-2:78b-39: rlung du rdo rje zhags pa dang dbang ldan du rtse gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:78b-40: phyi rol re kh'a gsum la phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:78b-41: du ni de bzhin khro bo'i mtshan ma rnams zhes
T02D1347-2:79a-0: pa ni / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs rnams @79a * //
T02D1347-2:79a-2: / lha mo rnams kyi ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bral rnams su'o //
T02D1347-2:79a-3: steng du gtsug tor gyi rdo rje dang 'og tu
T02D1347-2:79a-4: gnod mdzes rgyal po'i dgra sta ste ra ba gsum
T02D1347-2:79a-5: po rnams bsrung ba'i slad du'o //
T02D1347-2:79a-6: de bzhin du rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la sngar
T02D1347-2:79a-7: gsungs pa'i cho gas mtshan ma rnams bkod cing dur
T02D1347-2:79a-8: khrod kyi sa gzhi la dkyil 'khor gyi bum pa
T02D1347-2:79a-9: la sogs pa yang dag par bzhag ste rab tu
T02D1347-2:79a-10: gnas pa byas la dri la sogs pa rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:79a-11: 'dod pa'i lha rnams la mchod pa byas nas /
T02D1347-2:79a-12: zhing skyong la sogs pa rnams la gtor ma sbyin
T02D1347-2:79a-13: zhing de nas ro ni de yi g-yas min du
T02D1347-2:79a-14: ste zhes pa thab khung gi byang rdul tshon gyi
T02D1347-2:79a-16: de ltar dkyil 'khor dang thab khung dag gi dbus su ro'o //
T02D1347-2:79a-17: g-yas su rkang pa'o zhes pa ni lhor rkang pa dang byang du mgo bo'o //
T02D1347-2:79a-18: lag pad ral gri zhes pa ni lag na ral
T02D1347-2:79a-19: gri can gan rkyal te ri mo gsum gyis yongs

T02D1347-2:79a-21: skyon las dkyil 'khor du rgyal ba'i bdag po'i rdo

T02D1347-2:79a-24: dang bcas pa'i sha rnams dag gis sbyin sreg nyid
T02D1347-2:79a-25: ni rab byed pa zhes pa ni 'dir thab khung
T02D1347-2:79a-26: du rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas blangs pa'i me seng
T02D1347-2:79a-27: ldeng gi shing gis rab tu sbar te /
T02D1347-2:79a-28: de nas sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas me lha spyan
T02D1347-2:79a-29: drang ba la sogs pa byas nas lha'i rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:79a-30: gyis sha chen po khrag dang bcas pa bcu yis

T02D1347-2:79a-33: de yi sngags zhes pa aom hrim phrem h'um phat ces pa 'di ni de'i sngags so //
T02D1347-2:79a-34: 'dis de la dgod pa yang bya ste dpral bar aom /
T02D1347-2:79a-38: gsang bar phat ces pa dgod do //
T02D1347-2:79a-39: rdo rje skyil krung bcas nas 'chi med ri bo
T02D1347-2:79a-40: bzhin du g-yo ba med pa nyid kyis mtshan mo
T02D1347-2:79a-41: phyed na thun gcig ji srid par sbyin sreg bya'o
T02D1347-2:79b-0: // des sbyin sreg stong phrag @79b rdzogs par gyur

T02D1347-2:79b-2: 'bar la mche ba rnon po mig gsum pa /

T02D1347-2:79b-13: 'gyur / / lha min dbang po bsgrub par bya
T02D1347-2:79b-14: zhes pa'i mthar thug pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum
T02D1347-2:79b-15: 'gyur / / ni go sla'o // de ltar lha min dbang po bsgrub pa'i nges pa'o //

T02D1347-2:79b-32: aom lo tsa ne ba su de sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:79b-33: zhes pa la sogs pa ming gi yi ge las

T02D1347-2:79b-35: dang bcas pa rnams ni sku rdo rje'o //

T02D1347-2:81a-42: lus la nad la sogs pa byed //

T02D1347-2:81b-20: de nas rgyas dang mnyes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:81b-21: rnam par bcad bcas stong pa yis //

T02D1347-2:81b-28: sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur //
T02D1347-2:81b-29: de bzhin rlung gis mnan na de //

T02D1347-2:81b-32: de bzhin chu yis bslang bar 'gyur //

T02D1347-2:82a-0: dang por rnam snang mdzad byin @82a * //

T02D1347-2:82b-4: rdo rje'i bzlas pa 'bum phrag bcu dang sbyin sreg

T02D1347-2:82b-12: thugs dang gsung dang sku'i dbye ba rnams kyis bsgom

T02D1347-2:82b-14: par bya ba'i sngags so sor 'bum phrag drug dang

T02D1347-2:82b-21: de nas ril bu bsgrub pa'i slang du lhas rab

T02D1347-2:82b-26: dang brgyad ni sde tshan te /

T02D1347-2:82b-38: 'gyur pa'i rim pas bsgrubs pa na mkha' la spyod
T02D1347-2:82b-40: de bzhin du khyi dang rta la sogs pa sa
T02D1347-2:82b-41: la spyod pa dang chu la spyod pa rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:83a-0: lus kyi sha rnams kyi ril bu @83a * //

T02D1347-2:83b-9: de bzhin du rin po che la sogs pa rnams
T02D1347-2:83b-10: la dang por k'a la tsakra zhes pa nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:83b-11: // de la lcags kyi ral gri byas nas lha'i nges pas bsgrub par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:83b-12: shel gyi rin po che dang /
T02D1347-2:83b-15: lcags thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi rdo rje dang /

T02D1347-2:83b-17: lcags kyi gri gug byas nas so //

T02D1347-2:84a-5: ji ltar lus la gtsug tor dang /
T02D1347-2:84a-10: gsang ba na 'khor lo drug yod pa de bzhin

T02D1347-2:84a-13: rig byed ces pa 'dab ma bzhi la phyogs su
T02D1347-2:84a-14: dang por aa aam zung zhes pa ni shar du

T02D1347-2:84a-23: de bzhin du mi yi bdag po zhes pa ni

T02D1347-2:84b-3: chu gter drug ces pa 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi la ste /

T02D1347-2:84b-7: nub tu bsgrub bya'i ming ste dbus su ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:84b-8: de ltar gnas lngar bsgrub bya'i ming ngo //
T02D1347-2:84b-9: tshes kyis bsgyur pa'i dus la zhes pa 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:84b-10: drug cu po rnams la grangs bzhin du la mtha'
T02D1347-2:84b-11: dbyangs dang bcas pa rnams zhes pa ni ha ya
T02D1347-2:84b-12: ra wa la rnams dbyangs dang bcas pa zhes pa
T02D1347-2:84b-13: dbyangs bcu gnyis dang bcas pa ste 'dab ma drug
T02D1347-2:84b-15: de nas shar la sogs pa'i bsgrub bya'i ming las
T02D1347-2:84b-16: g-yas skor gyis ya y'a yi y'i yir yr'i yu
T02D1347-2:84b-17: y'u yli yl'i yam ya: zhes pa 'dab ma bcu
T02D1347-2:84b-18: gnyis la'o // de nas lhor bsgrub bya'i ming las
T02D1347-2:84b-19: ra r'a ri r'i rri rr'i ru r'u rli rl'i
T02D1347-2:84b-20: ram ra: zhes pa 'dab ma bcu gnyis la'o //
T02D1347-2:84b-21: byang du bsgrub bya'i ming las wa w'a wi w'i
T02D1347-2:84b-22: wri wr'i wu w'u wli wl'i wam wa: zhes pa
T02D1347-2:84b-24: nub tu bsgrub bya'i ming las la l'a li l'i
T02D1347-2:84b-25: lri lr'i lu l'u lli ll'i lam la:zhes pa 'dab
T02D1347-2:84b-27: de nas shar du bsgrub bya'i pha rol gyi 'dab ma la ha'o //
T02D1347-2:84b-28: nub tu h'a lhor ha: byang du ham ste /
T02D1347-2:84b-29: de bzhin du g-yon skor gyis hi h'i dbang ldan gyi mthar ro //
T02D1347-2:84b-31: hu h'u rlung gi mthar ro //
T02D1347-2:84b-32: hli hl'i bden bral gyi mthar ro //

T02D1347-2:84b-35: gsum pa ni lhor dang bzhi pa ni byang du dang lnga pa ni nub tu ste /
T02D1347-2:84b-36: de rnams h'um a'a: aom ho zhes pa thugs dang
T02D1347-2:84b-37: gsung dang sku dang ye shes kyi yi ge ming
T02D1347-2:84b-38: gi yi ge dang po dang bcas pa rnams bri

T02D1347-2:84b-40: re dag gis chu srin bum pa'i dbang las ring
T02D1347-2:84b-41: po thung ngu dag kyang lnga zhes pa ste /

T02D1347-2:85a-1: lha ni k'a kh'a g'a gh'a ng'a zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:85a-2: shar du bsgrub bya'i thugs kyi yi ge nas g-yas skor gyis nya la ts'a tsh'a dz'a dzh'a ny'a'o //

T02D1347-2:85a-5: byang du sku rdo rje nas p'a la sogs pa bcu dang /
T02D1347-2:85a-6: nub tu ye shes rdo rje nas t'a la sogs pa bcu'o //
T02D1347-2:85a-7: lhag ma'i 'dab ma nyi shu po rnams kyi nub
T02D1347-2:85a-8: kyi 'dab ma lnga la k'a la sogs pa ring
T02D1347-2:85a-9: po lnga'o // shar du nga la sogs pa thung du lnga dang ;
T02D1347-2:85a-10: lhor s'a la sogs pa ring po lnga dang /
T02D1347-2:85a-11: byang du ska la sogs pa thung du lnga ste /
T02D1347-2:85a-12: de ltar yi ge drug cu rnams zlum skor lnga pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:85a-13: phyi rol 'dab ma sum cu gnyis la zhes pa
T02D1347-2:85a-14: ni 'dir gsang ba'i padma'i 'dab ma sum cu rtsa
T02D1347-2:85a-15: gnyis rnam par dag pas zlum skor drug pa'i 'dab
T02D1347-2:85a-16: ma sum cu rtsa gnyis po rnams la bdag gi

T02D1347-2:85a-19: badzra t'i kshna du:kha tstshe da zhes pa ni dbang ldan nas brtsams nas me'i mthar thug par ro //

T02D1347-2:85a-21: / de bzhin du nub tu na k'a ya b'a g'i shva ra aa zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:85a-22: de bzhin du byang du ra pa tsa n'a ya
T02D1347-2:85a-23: te na ma:zhes pa ste badzra t'i kshna la sogs
T02D1347-2:85a-25: de ltar 'khor lo drug gi bdag nyid kyi 'khrul
T02D1347-2:85a-26: 'khor dbang gi le'u las gsungs pa'i cho gas bris
T02D1347-2:85a-27: nas de dag rnams kyi phyi rol du yang zhi

T02D1347-2:85a-30: rgyas pa dang rims 'phrog pa dang dug med par

T02D1347-2:85a-33: de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus sam glang po che'i dbus su gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:85a-34: de bzhin du gsang pa la sogs pa la rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1347-2:85a-35: dbang la sogs pa la me'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1347-2:85b-0: rengs pa la sogs pa la sa'i dkyil 'khor gyis @85b bskor bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:85b-1: lhag ma dbang gi le'u las gsungs pa dag bya'o //
T02D1347-2:85b-2: 'dir 'khrul 'khor la snying por yi ge'i yan lag
T02D1347-2:85b-3: mchog ces pa ni snying por mgo bo bri bar
T02D1347-2:85b-4: bya'o // rtse mo ldan par rkang pa dag ni
T02D1347-2:85b-5: zhes pa lhun po thams cad kyi byang na gnas
T02D1347-2:85b-6: pa snying po'i lte ba yin pa'i phyir lhor rkang

T02D1347-2:85b-8: de bzhin du zhi ba sogs la snying por rkang
T02D1347-2:85b-9: pa zhes pa ni byang du rkang pa ste lhun

T02D1347-2:85b-11: rtse mo ldan par mgo bo zhes pa ni lhor mgo bo'o //
T02D1347-2:85b-12: de bzhin du gsad pa la sogs pa la shar du rkang pa dang nub tu mgo bo'o //
T02D1347-2:85b-13: rengs pa la sogs pa la shar du mgo bo
T02D1347-2:85b-14: dang nub tu rkang pa ste de ltar 'khrul 'khor

T02D1347-2:85b-16: zhi ba zhes pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //

T02D1347-2:85b-18: da ni gshin rje mthar byed kyi 'khrul 'khor gsungs pa rtsibs brgyad ces pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:85b-19: 'dir n+ya gro dha'i 'dab ma la sogs pa la
T02D1347-2:85b-20: 'khrul 'khor bri bar bya ste zlum skor dang po

T02D1347-2:85b-24: de la rtsibs brgyad po rnams la phyogs dang phyogs
T02D1347-2:85b-25: bral du gnas zhes pa ni phyogs su ya ma
T02D1347-2:85b-26: la sogs pa'i yi ge gnas pa dang phyogs bral

T02D1347-2:85b-28: gnas shing bcu drug rtsibs la yang bar bar gyi
T02D1347-2:85b-30: de ltar zlum skor dang po la bsgrub bya zur rnams su ste /
T02D1347-2:85b-31: dbus su lte bar rab tu 'gyur pa ya dang
T02D1347-2:85b-32: shar du ma dang rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i shar du

T02D1347-2:85b-36: slar yang rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i 'dab ma lnga par ru drug pa na dang bdun par yo'o //
T02D1347-2:85b-37: slar yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i nub kyi 'dab mar da'o //
T02D1347-2:86a-1: gnyis pa'i brgyad par ni dang dgu par ra dang bcu par ya'o //
T02D1347-2:86a-2: slar yang rtsibs brgyad pa'i byang du kshe'o //
T02D1347-2:86a-3: slar yang rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i bcu gcig par tstsha dang bcu gnyis par ni'o //
T02D1347-2:86a-4: de bzhin du rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:86a-5: ya ma r'a dz'a sa do me ya /
T02D1347-2:86a-6: ya me do ru na yo da ya /
T02D1347-2:86a-7: ya da yo ni ra ya kshe ya /
T02D1347-2:86a-8: ya kshe yatstsha ni r'a ma ya zhes so //
T02D1347-2:86a-9: gcig bdag po yis yi ge bcu drug po rnams 'dab ma bcu drug la'o //
T02D1347-2:86a-10: de ltar dbus su rab 'gyur ya ma r'a dz'a sa do me ru na las yo'o //
T02D1347-2:86a-11: de nas snying po'i rtsibs kyi dbus nas da ni
T02D1347-2:86a-12: ra ya kshe tstsha de nas mthar ni ni ru
T02D1347-2:86a-13: 'gyur zhes pa rtsibs brgyad pa dang rtsibs bcu gnyis
T02D1347-2:86a-15: de nas rtsibs bcu drug pa la bsgrub bya'i ming
T02D1347-2:86a-16: gi bar bar gyi 'dab ma la sngags 'de bri

T02D1347-2:86a-22: dbye ba la dbus su lhag pa'i lha ya dang
T02D1347-2:86a-23: gsad pa la ma dang dbang la r'a rab tu
T02D1347-2:86a-24: 'gyur ro // de bzhin du kshe da me do

T02D1347-2:86a-26: kshe dang dgug pa la da dang rmongs pa la

T02D1347-2:86a-30: ba la dz'a dang gdung ba zhi bar byed pa

T02D1347-2:86a-32: der ni snying po ngag nas ya yig 'gro ste
T02D1347-2:86a-33: yon tan dbang gis zhes pa ni 'dir las kyi
T02D1347-2:86a-34: rang bzhin gyis yi ge gang zhig snying por bdag
T02D1347-2:86a-35: por gyur pa de'i gnas su ya yig bri bar
T02D1347-2:86a-36: bya'o // phyi rol thams cad snga ma bzhin te
T02D1347-2:86a-37: gshin rje mthar byed kyi 'khrul 'khor gyi nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:86a-39: gsungs pa yi ge rnams kyi zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:86a-40: pa ste 'dir yi ge rnams kyi yan lag mchog
T02D1347-2:86a-41: las zhes pa ni yi ge rnams kyi mgo la
T02D1347-2:86a-42: bya'o // // thig le'o // yan lag mchog de

T02D1347-2:86b-4: yig la sogs pa'i yi ge rnams kyis 'khyud pa

T02D1347-2:86b-6: rnams su 'gyur te rdo rje rigs kyi dbang gis
T02D1347-2:86b-7: lnga pa ham dang sam du gsungs so //
T02D1347-2:86b-8: de'i phyir thig le ni bdag go //
T02D1347-2:86b-9: rnam par bcad pa thig le gnyis kyis dbyangs mchog
T02D1347-2:86b-10: sbyar ba la ni zhes pa aa yig gnyis kyi
T02D1347-2:86b-11: dbus su 'di yang bdag gi shes rab yi ge

T02D1347-2:86b-14: de bzhin du ham hu:sam su:mam dzu:zhes pa yi ge brgyad po rnams 'dab ma brgyad la'o //
T02D1347-2:86b-15: nyi ma'i 'dab ma la zhes pa rtsibs bcu gnyis pa'i zlum skor gnyis pa la /
T02D1347-2:86b-16: phyi rol du 'dab ma dang po la shr'i dang gnyis pa la ba'o //
T02D1347-2:86b-17: de bzhin du rim pas dzra gho sha sa manta

T02D1347-2:86b-23: su dpal ldan zhi ba sogs la bskul zhes pa

T02D1347-2:86b-27: phat h'um pa sha ta boo sha ta ces pa

T02D1347-2:86b-31: rtag tu bsgrub bya'i ming ni bri bar bya bar
T02D1347-2:86b-32: 'gyur / 'di rnams thams cad bdag gi drin las

T02D1347-2:86b-41: 'ga' zhig ni go sla zhing tshigs su bcad pa

T02D1347-2:87a-0: 'gyur / cho ga'o // @87a * // kha bskangs te brjod zin to //
T02D1347-2:87a-1: da ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
T02D1347-2:87a-2: dngos grub kyi slad du lha yi dmigs pa gsungs
T02D1347-2:87a-3: pa lha yi zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir
T02D1347-2:87a-4: sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i dbang gis rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:87a-5: pa rnams kyi lha yi dmigs pa gang yin mngon
T02D1347-2:87a-6: sum dang ni rjes su dpag pa rnam pa gnyis
T02D1347-2:87a-8: mngon sum dang rjes su dpag pa de dag las
T02D1347-2:87a-9: mngon sum gang yin pa dag ni de nyid sbyor

T02D1347-2:87a-16: mngon par shes pa med par sha'i mig gis sna

T02D1347-2:87a-19: de nas byang chub sems dpa'i mtshams kyi dbang gis shes rab kyi spyan gyis gzigs so //
T02D1347-2:87a-20: de nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
T02D1347-2:87a-21: mtshams kyi thugs kyi dbang gis ye shes kyi spyan
T02D1347-2:87a-22: gyis gzigs te lhag ma kun las rnam grol zhing

T02D1347-2:87a-25: nyid gzigs pa'i slad du ste ;

T02D1347-2:87a-27: 'dir nams kyi rgyas pa ni mchog tu mi 'gyur
T02D1347-2:87a-28: pa'i ye shes grub pa las brjod par bya ste
T02D1347-2:87a-29: de kho na nyid bsgom pa'i nges pa'o //

T02D1347-2:87b-3: gang / // da ni rnam par rtog pa'i sgom

T02D1347-2:93b-19: gnyis pa nag pa'i nya la shr'i dh'a n+ya ka
