T02D1347-2:93b-21: gi dkyil 'khor cha bcu drug gi rnam par dbye
T02D1347-2:93b-23: de'i steng du dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:93b-24: cha bcu drug gi rnam par dbye ba can dang
T02D1347-2:93b-25: po'i sangs rgyas rnam par spros so //
T02D1347-2:93b-26: 'dir rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor zhes ci ltar shes par bya zhe na brjod par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:93b-27: 'dir mchod rten gyi phyi rol du rgyu skar nyi
T02D1347-2:93b-28: shu rtsa brgyad rnam par dag pas ka ba nyi
T02D1347-2:93b-29: shu rtsa brgyad de phyogs bzhi rnams su thur ma
T02D1347-2:93b-30: bdun gyi dbye bas shar du khyab 'jug gis khyer
T02D1347-2:93b-31: nas 'ongs pa dang lhor k'a rti kas dang nub
T02D1347-2:93b-32: tu tshangs pas dang byang du bde byed kyis khyer
T02D1347-2:93b-33: nas 'ongs pa rnams btsugs pa gang yin pa des
T02D1347-2:93b-34: na mchod rten gyi phyi rol rgyu skar gyi rnam
T02D1347-2:93b-35: par dbye bas mchod rten gyi nang gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:93b-36: ni dpal ldan rgyu skar gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:93b-37: de bzhin du sgo logs nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni phyogs kyi cha'i dbye bas so ;
T02D1347-2:93b-38: / gzhan 'og gi dkyil 'khor sku dang gsung dang
T02D1347-2:93b-39: thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid cha bcu drug
T02D1347-2:93b-40: dang ldan pa ni stong pa nyid dang snying rje
T02D1347-2:93b-41: bcu drug rnam par dag pas so zhes pa dkyil
T02D1347-2:94a-0: gnas der nyin zhag de nyid la de bzhin gshegs pas sangs @94a * //
T02D1347-2:94a-1: rgyas kyi dbang byin nas lha dang lha ma yin
T02D1347-2:94a-2: la sogs pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid du lung bstan
T02D1347-2:94a-3: te / des na ma 'ongs pa'i dus su nya
T02D1347-2:94a-4: 'di ni dus kyi 'khor lo las rdo rje slob
T02D1347-2:94a-5: dpon rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges par gyur
T02D1347-2:94a-6: te / to // nag pa'i mthar ni dkar po'i
T02D1347-2:94a-7: tshigs la gzhan la phan pa'i bla mas dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:94a-9: sdig pa'i dri ma 'phrog pa'i dbang bdun rnams ni
T02D1347-2:94a-10: bsod nams don du bu rnams dag la sbyin par
T02D1347-2:94a-12: 'dir dang por dbang bdun sbyin pa ni gzhug pa'i
T02D1347-2:94a-13: don dang sngags bzlas pa dang dkyil 'khor sgom pa'i
T02D1347-2:94a-14: don du ste des bsod nams kyi tshogs so //
T02D1347-2:94a-15: de'i phyir bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi rgyur dbang bdun
T02D1347-2:94a-16: sbyin par bya zhing mi 'tshe ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:94a-17: brtul zhugs nyi shu rtsa lnga sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:94a-18: de nas ye shes kyi tshogs kyi don du dbang
T02D1347-2:94a-19: gong ma gsum sbyin pa ni rang gi sha la
T02D1347-2:94a-20: sogs pa dang shin tu 'dod pa sbyin pa la
T02D1347-2:94a-21: sogs pa'i don dang rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
T02D1347-2:94a-22: dang ldan pa'i stong pa nyid sgom pa'i don dang
T02D1347-2:94a-23: byang chub kyi sems mi 'gyur pa'i don te des
T02D1347-2:94a-25: de'i phyir ye shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyur dbang gong ma rnams sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:94a-26: de dag kyang dbang bzhi pa dang bcas pa ste bzhi pa ni man ngag gis brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:94a-27: zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang gi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:94a-28: de ltar nag pa'i nya gtso bor byas nas nya
T02D1347-2:94a-29: bcu gnyis po rnams la rdo rje slob dpon gyis
T02D1347-2:94a-30: dbang sbyin par bya zhing sku gzugs la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:94a-31: rnams rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:94a-32: de bzhin du rgyu skar dang sbyor ba dge ba
T02D1347-2:94a-33: dang bcas pa'i nyin zhag gzhan la yang bya'o zhes
T02D1347-2:94a-34: pa ni dbang la sogs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:94a-35: da ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyud bstan pa'i don
T02D1347-2:94a-36: du rnal 'byor ma rnams mchod pa'i nges pa gsungs
T02D1347-2:94a-37: te / nag pa'i nya la dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas
T02D1347-2:94a-38: sam yang na dkyil 'khor bris pa med par mtha'
T02D1347-2:94a-39: dag yon tan gter gyur rgyud kyi rgyal po bstan
T02D1347-2:94a-40: pa'i slad du rnal 'byor ma rnams dag la bza'
T02D1347-2:94a-41: ba dang btung ba la sogs pas mchod pa bya'o
T02D1347-2:94a-42: te / // ci ste ma tshogs pa'i dbang gis
T02D1347-2:94b-0: nag pa'i nya la mchod pa med par gyur @94b
T02D1347-2:94b-1: na de'i tshe lo gcig tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal
T02D1347-2:94b-2: po dag ni bla ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis
T02D1347-2:94b-4: ci ste mchod pa med par gyur pa la 'os
T02D1347-2:94b-5: pa'i slob ma 'ga' zhig thos pa don du gnyer
T02D1347-2:94b-6: na de'i tshe des nya bcu gnyis po rnams la
T02D1347-2:94b-7: rnal 'byor ma rnams la mchod pa byas nas mnyan
T02D1347-2:94b-8: par bya ste / de'i bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis gzhan rnams kyis kyang mnyan no //
T02D1347-2:94b-9: 'dir rnal 'byor ma rnams la mchod pa ni phyi'i
T02D1347-2:94b-10: bgegs nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i don du ste
T02D1347-2:94b-11: rtag tu brgyad dang bcu bzhi la ji ltar 'byor
T02D1347-2:94b-12: pa bya ba dang 'byung po la sogs pa rnams
T02D1347-2:94b-13: la nyin zhag so sor gtor ma sbyin par bya
T02D1347-2:94b-14: ba dang / sangs rgyas mchod pa mandala la sogs
T02D1347-2:94b-15: pa bya ba ni khyim na gnas pa nor dang
T02D1347-2:94b-16: ldan pa rnams kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:94b-17: kun spangs kyi slob ma rnams la ni mchod pa
T02D1347-2:94b-18: des pa med cing de rnams la bstan pa'i don
T02D1347-2:94b-19: du bla ma rnams kyis kyang nges pa mi bya'o
T02D1347-2:94b-20: // gang gis phyir sangs rgyas dang rdo rje rnal
T02D1347-2:94b-21: 'byor ma rnams kyang bsam pa 'dzin par byed pa
T02D1347-2:94b-22: ste mchod pa la sogs pa'i dngos po 'dzin par
T02D1347-2:94b-23: byed pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:94b-24: rgyud bstan pa'i mchod pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:94b-25: da ni dbang gi don du sa la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:94b-26: tshigs su bcad pa 'dir sa la sogs pa gang
T02D1347-2:94b-27: smos pa de mtha' dag 'chad par 'gyur pa las
T02D1347-2:94b-28: brjod par bya'o dge ba dang mi dge ba'i las
T02D1347-2:94b-29: kyi 'bras bu'i don du zhi ba la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:94b-30: bya'o zhes pa ni rdo rje slob dpon gyis so
T02D1347-2:94b-31: // slob ma rnams ni bsdu ba dag dang gang
T02D1347-2:94b-32: yang dkyil 'khor bri ba dag shes nas bya'o zhes
T02D1347-2:94b-34: gdug pa'i slob dpon pha rol slu ba po rdzas
T02D1347-2:94b-35: la chags pas yongs su shes pa med par byed
T02D1347-2:94b-36: na dmyal bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:94b-37: slob dpon la rjes su bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad
T02D1347-2:94b-38: pa'o // dbang gi don dus ni yongs brtag ces pa la sogs pa ni go sla'o //
T02D1347-2:94b-39: da ni sa yi zhes pa la sogs pas sa'i
T02D1347-2:94b-40: mtshan nyid gsungs te 'dir 'jig rten gyi tha snyad
T02D1347-2:94b-41: kyis dngos po rnams kyi rigs rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:94b-42: de yang kha dog bzhis rig par bya ste dmangs
T02D1347-2:94b-43: rigs la sogs pa rnams kha dog nag po la
T02D1347-2:94b-44: sogs pas so // 'dir 'jig rten kun rdzob kyis kha dog nag po'i sa ni dmangs rigs so //
T02D1347-2:95a-1: rje'u rigs dang dmar po ni rgyal rigs dang dkar po ni bram ze'i rigs so //
T02D1347-2:95a-2: de bzhin du dri las te rmag gi dri ni dmangs rigs so //
T02D1347-2:95a-3: lan tshva'i dri ni rje'u rigs dang padma'i dri ni
T02D1347-2:95a-4: rgyal rigs dang mchog gi dri ni bram ze'i rigs
T02D1347-2:95a-6: de bzhin du ro las te sgyur pa dang lan tshva'i ro ni dmangs rigs so //
T02D1347-2:95a-7: mngar dang tshab zhes pa la mngar ba'i ro ni
T02D1347-2:95a-8: rje'u rigs dang tsha ba'i ro ni mi bdag gi
T02D1347-2:95a-9: rigs te rgyal rigs dang gzhan pa'i ro kha ba
T02D1347-2:95a-10: dang bska ba dag ni gnyis skyes kyi rigs so
T02D1347-2:95a-11: zhes pa ste ro las rigs nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:95a-12: da ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i don dus gsungs
T02D1347-2:95a-13: pa dkar po zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir
T02D1347-2:95a-14: zhi ba dang rgyas pa las dkar po dang bsad
T02D1347-2:95a-15: pa dang bskrad pa la kha dog nag po dang
T02D1347-2:95a-16: dbang dang dgug pa la dmar po dang rengs pa
T02D1347-2:95a-17: dang rmongs pa la ser por 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:95a-18: yang yig las dug gzhil ba la sogs pa la yang rim pa ji lta bas te des pa'o //
T02D1347-2:95a-19: 'dir las kyi cha ni thams cad pa las ljang
T02D1347-2:95a-20: gu las thams cad byed par 'gyur te lnga pa
T02D1347-2:95a-21: dang ni mtha' ma dag gi rigs so //
T02D1347-2:95a-22: ro dang dri rnams thams cad dang ldan mtha' dag
T02D1347-2:95a-23: yon tan gter de ni nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan
T02D1347-2:95a-24: nyid du rnal 'byor pas rig par bya'o zhes pa
T02D1347-2:95a-25: ste sa'i mtshan nyid nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:95a-26: 'dir gal te 'di 'dra ba'i sa'i mtshan nyid nges
T02D1347-2:95a-27: pa zhi ba la sogs pa'i don du yin na
T02D1347-2:95a-28: de'i tshe nags dang grong khyer la sogs pa'i phyogs
T02D1347-2:95a-29: kyi cha thams cad du mtshan nyid 'di rnams dang
T02D1347-2:95a-31: de nas rtsa ba'i rgyud las bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:95a-32: 'dir gang du dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i las bya
T02D1347-2:95a-33: ba der gal te las dang rjes su mthun pa'i
T02D1347-2:95a-34: sa med par gyur na de'i tshe khung bu brkos
T02D1347-2:95a-35: nas te chu'i mtha' ma rdo ba'i mthar brko bar
T02D1347-2:95a-36: bya'o // de nas las dang rjes su mthun pa'i sa gzhan gyis khung bu dgang bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95a-37: 'dir sa'i dri'i don du sa dkar po ni tsandan gyi chus bran par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95a-38: sa dmar po ni padma'i chu dang tsandan dmar po'i chus bran par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95a-39: sa ser po ni bong bu dang rta dang mi'i gci bas bran par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95a-40: sa nag po ni sha rul pa'i chus bran par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95b-0: ro @95b bro ba'i don du nag po la lan tshva dang skyur ba bsre bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95b-1: ser po la bu ram dang dmar po la tsha
T02D1347-2:95b-2: ba gsum dang dkar po la kha ba dang bska
T02D1347-2:95b-3: ba'o // ljang gu ni las thams cad pa nyid kyi phyir ci yang bsre bar mi bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95b-4: de bzhin du sa'i nang du gter gzhug par bya
T02D1347-2:95b-5: ste nag po la ni bsad pa la mi rus
T02D1347-2:95b-6: dang bskrad pa la bya rog gi mjug sgro dang
T02D1347-2:95b-7: sdang ba la bong bu'i rus pa'o //
T02D1347-2:95b-8: ser po la ni phur bus gdab pa la lug
T02D1347-2:95b-9: gi rva dang rengs pa la ba bla dang rmongs
T02D1347-2:95b-11: dmar po la ni dbang la gi wang dang dgug
T02D1347-2:95b-12: pa la mtshal dang bskyod pa la ldong ros so
T02D1347-2:95b-13: // dkar po la ni zhi ba la shel dang
T02D1347-2:95b-14: rgyas pa la dung dang rims 'phrog pa dang bsreg
T02D1347-2:95b-16: ljang gu la ni cung zad kyang gzhug par mi bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95b-17: ci ste ljang gu la thun mong gi las thams
T02D1347-2:95b-18: cad pa bya ba yin na de'i tshe sa'i snying
T02D1347-2:95b-19: por rin po che lnga gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95b-20: dkar po dang dmar po la yang ste las thams
T02D1347-2:95b-21: cad pa la drag po'i rdzas rnams spang bar bya'o
T02D1347-2:95b-22: // las thams cad pa'i sgras ni zhi ba la
T02D1347-2:95b-23: sogs pa dang dbang la sogs pa'i las drug ste
T02D1347-2:95b-24: bsad pa la sogs pa dang phur bus gdab pa
T02D1347-2:95b-25: la sogs pa drug ni ma yin no //
T02D1347-2:95b-26: sa yongs su brtag pa'i nges pa'o ;
T02D1347-2:95b-27: / da ni dbang ldan pa la sogs pas zhi
T02D1347-2:95b-28: ba la sogs pa'i don du phyogs kyi cha gsungs
T02D1347-2:95b-29: te 'dir spyi'i grong las grong gi phyi rol dbang
T02D1347-2:95b-30: ldan dang byang du yang zhi ba dang rgyas pa
T02D1347-2:95b-31: dag bya'o // rgyal po chen po'i gnas las ni
T02D1347-2:95b-32: phyogs brgyad na ro sreg pa la sogs pa'i dur
T02D1347-2:95b-33: dag bya'o // khrod brgyad de / des na zhi ba dang rgyas pa 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:95b-34: de'i phyir rgyal po'i khab kyi dbang ldan dang byang du zhi ba dang rgyas pa bya'o //
T02D1347-2:95b-35: las lhag ma rnam ni grong gi bzhin du rgyal
T02D1347-2:95b-36: po'i gnas las phyi rol du'o zhes pa zhi ba
T02D1347-2:95b-37: dang rgyas pa'i las nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:95b-38: de bzhin du mer bsad pa dang shar du rnam
T02D1347-2:95b-39: par dbye ba dang bskrad pa dang bden bral du
T02D1347-2:95b-40: dbang du bya ba dang lhor dgug pa dang rlung
T02D1347-2:95b-41: du rmongs pa dang nub tu rengs pa dang phur
T02D1347-2:95b-42: bus gdab pa'o // grong gi dbus su las thams
T02D1347-2:95b-43: cad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang thab dang sbyin sreg la
T02D1347-2:95b-44: sogs pa sngags pas bya'o zhes pa ni phyogs kyi
T02D1347-2:96a-0: bus gdab pa'o // @96a * // char las byed pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:96a-1: da ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i thab gsungs te
T02D1347-2:96a-2: thab khung grong gi phyogs brgyad dbang ldan la sogs
T02D1347-2:96a-3: pa rnams su rim pa ji lta bas te zhi
T02D1347-2:96a-4: ba la thab khung zlum po'o //
T02D1347-2:96a-5: rgyas pa la gru bzhi dang bsad pa la gzhu'i
T02D1347-2:96a-6: rnam pa dang dbye ba la zur lnga pa dang
T02D1347-2:96a-7: dbang la zur gsum pa dang dgug pa la zur
T02D1347-2:96a-8: bdun pa dang rmongs pa la zur drug pa dang
T02D1347-2:96a-9: rengs pa la zur brgyad pa'o //
T02D1347-2:96a-10: 'di rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni 'chad par 'gyur pa'i
T02D1347-2:96a-11: sbyin sreg gi cho ga las rgyas par brjod par
T02D1347-2:96a-12: bya'o // da ni thab khung gi mtshan ma gsungs
T02D1347-2:96a-13: te 'dir thab khung zlum po'i padma'i lte ba la
T02D1347-2:96a-15: gru bzhi pa la 'khor lo dang gzhu'i rnam pa
T02D1347-2:96a-16: la gri gug dang zur lnga pa la ral gri
T02D1347-2:96a-17: dang zur gsum pa la mda' dang zur bdun pa
T02D1347-2:96a-18: la rdo rje lcags kyu dang zur drug pa la
T02D1347-2:96a-19: rmongs pa la sbrul dang zur brgyad pa la lcags
T02D1347-2:96a-20: sgrog go // 'dir thab khung gnyis kyi mtshan ma
T02D1347-2:96a-21: bzlog pa ni sde ba sbyor gyi dbang gis te
T02D1347-2:96a-23: 'di rnams kyi tshad gsungs pa gcig ces pa la sogs pa ste zlum po ni khru gcig pa'o //
T02D1347-2:96a-24: gru bzhi pa ni khru gnyis pa dang gzhu'i rnam
T02D1347-2:96a-25: pa ni khru phyed pa dang zur lnga pa ni
T02D1347-2:96a-26: zlum po'i tshad dang zur gsum pa ni sor nyi
T02D1347-2:96a-27: shu dang zur bdun pa ni sor bzhi bcu dang
T02D1347-2:96a-28: zur drug pa ni sor sum cu dang zur brgyad
T02D1347-2:96a-30: thab khung gi phyed kyi tshad ni zabs so //
T02D1347-2:96a-31: thab khung gi drug gi cha shas ni kha khyer ro //
T02D1347-2:96a-32: thab khung gi bcu gnyis kyi cha shas ni mchu'o //
T02D1347-2:96a-33: mtshan ma'i phring [?] ba yang kha khyer la kun nas so //
T02D1347-2:96a-34: phyi rol du chu skyes 'dab ma rnams ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:96a-35: lhag ma'i las rnams la ni rtsig pa'i phyi rol du gzhan dang gzhan 'chad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:96a-36: yang na las thams cad la thab khung gi dbus su rdo rje mtshan mar shes bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:96a-37: da ni sa la phur bu gdab ba'i don du
T02D1347-2:96a-38: phur bu gsungs te 'dir phyogs bcur phur bu gdab
T02D1347-2:96a-39: pa'i don du zhi ba la n+ya gro dha'i phur
T02D1347-2:96a-40: bu'o // rgyas pa la aa shva da tha dad
T02D1347-2:96a-41: bsad pa la rus pa'i bdag nyid dang bskrad pa
T02D1347-2:96a-42: la lcags dang dbang la seng ldeng las skyes pa
T02D1347-2:96b-0: dang dgug pa la ts'u ta las skyes pa @96b
T02D1347-2:96b-1: dang rmongs pa la aa rka las skyes pa dang
T02D1347-2:96b-2: rengs pa la bil ba las skyes pa'o zhes pa
T02D1347-2:96b-3: ni phur bu'i nges pa ste las thams cad pa
T02D1347-2:96b-4: la au dum a'a ra las skyes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:96b-5: da ni bum pa gsungs te zhi ba la shel gyi bum pa'o //
T02D1347-2:96b-7: bsad pa la mi'i thod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:96b-8: bskrad pa dang dbye ba la lcags kyi'o //
T02D1347-2:96b-11: rengs pa la sa'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-2:96b-12: rmongs pa la shing las skyes pa'i bum pa bcu'o //
T02D1347-2:96b-13: de nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa'i don du bum

T02D1347-2:99b-4: lo dbu 'phong tshos kyi rtsa ba la reg pa
T02D1347-2:99b-5: dag ste byin pa gnyis dang brla gnyis steng du
T02D1347-2:99b-7: skyil krung phyed pa dbye ba rnam pa gnyis zhes
T02D1347-2:99b-8: pa ni 'dir dbang la rkang ba g-yon pa skyil
T02D1347-2:99b-9: krung bzhin dang g-yas ba tsog bu bzhin te g-yas
T02D1347-2:99b-11: dgug pa la dbye ba gnyis pa ste g-yas pa
T02D1347-2:99b-12: skyil krung bzhin dang g-yon ba tsog pu bzhin te
T02D1347-2:99b-13: g-yon du cung zad dud pa'o zhes pa ni skyil
T02D1347-2:99b-14: krung phyed pa dbye ba gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:99b-15: bshad lam rkang bar gnas pa dag ces pa ni
T02D1347-2:99b-16: 'dir rmongs pa la rkang pa g-yon par bshad lam
T02D1347-2:99b-17: gnas pa ste rkang pa g-yon pa'i steng du bshad
T02D1347-2:99b-18: lam bzhag cing g-yas pa tsog bu bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:99b-19: rengs pa la g-yas par bshad lam gnas pa ste
T02D1347-2:99b-20: rkang pa'i steng du bshad lam bzhag cing g-yon btsog
T02D1347-2:99b-21: pu bzhin no // 'dug stangs kyi dbye ba rnam ba brgyad kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:99b-22: da ni shel dang zhes pa la sogs pas sngags
T02D1347-2:99b-23: bzlas pa'i don du zhi ba la sogs pa'i bgrang
T02D1347-2:99b-24: phreng gsungs te / 'dir zhi ba la shel gyi bgrang phreng ngo //
T02D1347-2:99b-25: rgyas pa la mu tig gi 'bras bu'o //
T02D1347-2:99b-26: bsad pa la mi'i so las byas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:99b-27: bskrad pa la bod bu'i so las byas pa'am rus pa las byas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:99b-28: dbang la bo de tse'i bgrang phreng ngo /
T02D1347-2:99b-29: dgug pa la padma 'am tsandan dmar po'i sa bon gyi bgrad phreng ngo //
T02D1347-2:99b-30: rmongs pa la lung tang gi bgrang phreng ngo //
T02D1347-2:99b-31: rengs pa la dbang po'i mig ces pa ru rag
T02D1347-2:99b-32: sha'i bgrang phreng ngo zhes pa ni bgrang phreng gi
T02D1347-2:99b-33: nges pa ste bde gshegs rigs kyi dbang gis zhes
T02D1347-2:99b-34: ba ni 'chad par 'gyur pa las brjod par bya'o
T02D1347-2:99b-35: // da ni dri zhim zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1347-2:99b-36: mchod pa'i don du zhi ba la sogs pa la
T02D1347-2:99b-37: me tog rnams gsungs te 'dir zhi ba dang rgyas
T02D1347-2:99b-38: pa la dri zhim po'i me tog dkar po rnams
T02D1347-2:99b-39: kyis lha la sogs pa rnams mchod do //
T02D1347-2:99b-40: bsad pa dang bskrad pa dang dbye ba la tsha
T02D1347-2:99b-41: ba dang bcas pa'i nag po tsher ma can rnams
T02D1347-2:99b-42: kyis so // dbang dang dgug pa la dmar pos so //
T02D1347-2:100a-1: la ser pos te mchod pa'i me tog gi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:100a-2: da ni bsil dang zhes pa la sogs pas spos
T02D1347-2:100a-3: gsungs te zhi ba dang rgyas pa dag la bsil
T02D1347-2:100a-4: ba'i sbos te bsil ba ni aa ga ru dang
T02D1347-2:100a-5: shi la ka dang ga bur rnams kyi spos sbrang
T02D1347-2:100a-6: rtsi dang sha ka ra la sogs pa dang bcas
T02D1347-2:100a-7: ba ni bsil pa'i sbos zhes brjod de bsil ba'i
T02D1347-2:100a-9: de bzhin du bsad pa dang bskrad pa la bshad pa dang sha yi spos khrag dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:100a-10: dbang dang dgug pa la drag po'i sbos zhes pa
T02D1347-2:100a-11: ste gu gul dang rgya skyegs dang spos dkar dang
T02D1347-2:100a-12: kun du ru dang thang chu rnams bu ram gyis
T02D1347-2:100a-13: sbyar ba ni drag po'i sbos so //
T02D1347-2:100a-14: de bzhin du rmongs pa dang rengs pa la bska
T02D1347-2:100a-15: ba'i sbos ni aa ru ra'i phye ma bur ma
T02D1347-2:100a-16: dang bcas pa bska ba'i sbos te sbos kyi nges
T02D1347-2:100a-17: pa'o // de bzhin du zhal zas ni zhi ba la 'o ma dang zan no //
T02D1347-2:100a-18: rgyas pa la zho dang zan no //
T02D1347-2:100a-21: dbang la mar dang zan no //
T02D1347-2:100a-22: dgug pa la til gyi 'bru mar dang zan no //
T02D1347-2:100a-23: rmongs pa la sran chung mung+ga dang bsres pa'i zan no //
T02D1347-2:100a-24: rengs pa la tsan ka dang nya dang zan no //
T02D1347-2:100a-25: de bzhin du zhi ba dang rgyas pa dag la tsandan gyi byug pa'o //
T02D1347-2:100a-26: bsad pa dang bskrad pa la khrag dang sol bas so //
T02D1347-2:100a-27: dpad [?] dang dgug pa la gur gum dang gi wang dam tsandan dmar pos so //
T02D1347-2:100a-28: rmongs pa dang rengs pa la yud ba dang ba blas te dri'i des pa'o //
T02D1347-2:100a-29: de bzhin du mar me ni zhi ba dang rgyas pa dag la mar gyi mar me'o //
T02D1347-2:100a-30: bsad pa dang bskrad pa dag la mi'i zhag gis so //
T02D1347-2:100a-31: dbang dang dgug pa dag la til gyi 'bru mar gyis so //
T02D1347-2:100a-32: rmongs pa dang rengs pa la zar ma'i 'bru mar
T02D1347-2:100a-33: dang bse shing gi 'bru mar gyis so zhes pa
T02D1347-2:100a-34: la sogs pa mar me'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:100a-35: de bzhin du zhi ba dang rgyas pa la 'bras s'a lu ma chag ba'o //
T02D1347-2:100a-36: bsad pa dang bskrad ba la skye tshe dang dbang
T02D1347-2:100a-37: dang dgug pa la yungs kar dang rengs pa dang
T02D1347-2:100a-38: rmongs pa la sran chung ngam 'bru gzhan no //
T02D1347-2:100a-39: de bzhin du gos la sogs pa ste zhi ba
T02D1347-2:100a-40: dang rgyas pa dag la mchod pa'i rdzas thams cad
T02D1347-2:100a-41: dkar po'o // bsad pa dang bskrad pa dag la
T02D1347-2:100b-0: nag po dang dbang dang dgug pa la @100b dmar
T02D1347-2:100b-1: dkar po'o // po dang / rengs pa dang rmongs
T02D1347-2:100b-2: pa dag la ser po'i las thams cad pa la
T02D1347-2:100b-3: ljang gu ste mchod pa'i cho ga nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:100b-4: da ni zhi ba la sogs pa'i las la 'chad
T02D1347-2:100b-5: par 'gyur pa'i 'khrul 'khor bri ba'i chog gsungs te
T02D1347-2:100b-7: dang rgyas pa dpal n+ya gro dh'a'i 'dab ma sar
T02D1347-2:100b-8: pa la shr'i khanda dang s'a btags pa'i chus d'ur
T02D1347-2:100b-9: pa'i smyu gur gri par bya ste rgyas pa la
T02D1347-2:100b-10: ni bsil pa'i smyu gus so //
T02D1347-2:100b-11: de bzhin du bsad pa dang bskrad pa la yang
T02D1347-2:100b-12: dur khrod kyi ras la dug dang khrag dang sol
T02D1347-2:100b-13: bas mi'i rus pa'i smyu gus te bskrad pa la
T02D1347-2:100b-14: ni bya rog gi mjug ma'i smyu gus so //
T02D1347-2:100b-15: dbang dang dgug pa la ni gro ga'i 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:100b-16: la gur gum dang gi wang gis gser gyi smyu
T02D1347-2:100b-17: gus te dgug pa la ni sed ldeng gi smyu
T02D1347-2:100b-18: gus tsandan dmar po btags pas so //
T02D1347-2:100b-19: rengs pa dang rmongs pa la ni aa rka'i 'dab
T02D1347-2:100b-20: ma yongs su smin pa kha dog ser po la
T02D1347-2:100b-21: 'bras bu gsum gyi khu ba dang bcas pa'i ba
T02D1347-2:100b-22: bla dang yung bas bil ba'i smyu gus te rmongs
T02D1347-2:100b-23: pa la aa rka'i smyu gus so zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:100b-24: nges pa'o // de ni 'khrul 'khor rab tu gzhag
T02D1347-2:100b-25: pa'i cho ga gsungs te 'dir zhi ba dang rgyas
T02D1347-2:100b-26: pa dag la 'khrul 'khor bris pa'i 'dab ma la
T02D1347-2:100b-27: sogs pa ni ji srid 'khrul 'khor mi mthong gi
T02D1347-2:100b-28: bar du slad bu dkar pos dkri bar bya ste
T02D1347-2:100b-29: nges pa'o // / de bzhin du las kyi dbye
T02D1347-2:100b-30: bas srad bu nag po dang srad bu dmar po
T02D1347-2:100b-31: dang srad bu ser bos dkri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:100b-32: de nas zhi ba dang rgyas pa dag la kham
T02D1347-2:100b-33: phong kha sbyar du mngar gsum ste sbang rtsi dang
T02D1347-2:100b-34: mar dang 'o ma yang dag par bsres pa la
T02D1347-2:100b-35: gzhag par bya'o // bsad pa dang bskrad pa la thod pa khrag gis gang bar gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:100b-36: dbang dang dgug pa la mes gdungs pa'i gyo mo kha sbyar du sbra tshil gyis dkris nas so //
T02D1347-2:100b-37: rengs pa dang rmongs pa la ba bla'i chus gang ba'i so phag gi dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:100b-38: zhi ba dang rgyas pa dag la rlan dang bcas
T02D1347-2:100b-39: pa'i gnas ni gtsang ma dag tu mandala gyi steng
T02D1347-2:100b-41: bsad pa dang bskrad pa la ro bsregs pa'i sa brkos pa'i 'og tu gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:100b-42: dbang dang dgug pa la thab kyi 'og tu'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-0: rengs pa dang rmongs pa las skam po la @101a * //
T02D1347-2:101a-1: gzhug par bya ste dge ba dang mi dge ba'i
T02D1347-2:101a-2: las la 'bras bu sngags pa yis ni rig par
T02D1347-2:101a-3: bya zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-4: da ni bris pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i phyi
T02D1347-2:101a-5: rol gyi nges pa gsungs te 'dir zhi ba la
T02D1347-2:101a-6: 'khor lo'i phyi rol du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis
T02D1347-2:101a-7: bskor par bya ste zlum po'i ri mos so //
T02D1347-2:101a-8: rgyas pa la glang po ches bskor bar bya ste
T02D1347-2:101a-9: ji ltar glang po che'i lus la 'khor lor 'gyur
T02D1347-2:101a-10: pa'o // bsad pa la yi dags kyi lus la'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-11: bskrad pa la rnga mo'i lus la'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-12: dbang la ri dags kyi lus la'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-13: dgug pa la rta'i lus la'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-14: rmongs pa la ra'i lus sam lug gi lus la'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-15: rengs pa la rus sbal gyi lus la ste ji
T02D1347-2:101a-16: ltar 'khrul 'khor gyi 'khor lor 'gyur pa de bzhin
T02D1347-2:101a-17: du phyi rol du gzugs bya'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-18: de nas sngon du gsungs pa'i srad bus dkri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-19: de bzhin du rig pa yang nges pa ste zhi
T02D1347-2:101a-20: ba dang rgyas pa la dngul gyi sbu gu rig
T02D1347-2:101a-21: pa'i dbus su gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-22: bsad pa la mi'i rus pa'i spu gu dang bskrad
T02D1347-2:101a-23: pa la bya rog gi rus pa'i sbu gu dang
T02D1347-2:101a-24: dbang la gser gyi sbu gu dang dgug pa la
T02D1347-2:101a-25: zangs kyi sbu gu dang rmongs pa la lcags kyi
T02D1347-2:101a-26: sbu gu dang rengs pa lar gan gyi sbu gu'o
T02D1347-2:101a-28: 'dir gang gis bskrad par 'gyur ba'i chog de nyid kyis dbye ba'i bya ba bya'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-29: gang gis rengs par 'gyur pa de nyid kyis phur
T02D1347-2:101a-30: bus gdab pa bya ste 'on kyang dgra'i dri ma
T02D1347-2:101a-31: dril ba bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas pas gzugs brnyan
T02D1347-2:101a-32: byas nas 'khor lo drug dang lag pa dang rkang
T02D1347-2:101a-33: pa'i tshigs rnams la myos byed kyi tsher ma rnams
T02D1347-2:101a-34: kyis phur bus gdab par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:101a-35: lha min rengs pa la sogs pa bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:101a-36: gang gis dgug par 'gyur pa de nyid kyis rims
T02D1347-2:101a-37: skyed pa ste 'on kyang skye tshe dang lan tshvas
T02D1347-2:101a-38: gzugs brnyan la byugs nas mes rab gdung bar bya'o
T02D1347-2:101a-39: // gang gis zhi bar 'gyur pa de nyid kyis gdug pa'i lta ba dang dug gzhil ba ste /
T02D1347-2:101a-40: slob dpon gyis las bcu gnyis kyi cho ga shes
T02D1347-2:101a-41: nas gal te gzhan la phan pa'i slad du byed
T02D1347-2:101a-42: na de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pas gdon
T02D1347-2:101a-43: mi za bar de'i 'bras bur 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:101b-0: rang @101b gi don du ni ma yin no //
T02D1347-2:101b-1: gang zhig byed na yang 'dir de'i cung zad kyang
T02D1347-2:101b-2: 'grub par mi 'gyur te gdug pa'i slob dpon rnams
T02D1347-2:101b-3: yongs su ngal ba nyon mongs pa tsam 'ba' zhig
T02D1347-2:101b-4: go // de'i phyir rgyud las gsungs pa'i nges pas
T02D1347-2:101b-5: ltos pa med pa'i slob dpon mngon par shes pa
T02D1347-2:101b-6: thob pas gzhan la phan pa'i don du bya'o //
T02D1347-2:101b-7: nges pa ni 'chad par 'gyur ba las 'byung bar
T02D1347-2:101b-8: 'gyur te nges na 'dir rgyas par ma brjod do
T02D1347-2:101b-9: // bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor
T02D1347-2:101b-10: lo'i rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug
T02D1347-2:101b-11: pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i
T02D1347-2:101b-12: 'od kyi dbang gi le'u las slob dpon la sogs
T02D1347-2:101b-13: pa dang las rab 'byam thams cad bsgrub pa'i mtshan
T02D1347-2:101b-14: nyid kyi mdor bsdus chen po ste dang po'o /
T02D1347-2:101b-17: dpa' bo gdul dka' 'dul ba po //
T02D1347-2:101b-18: dus kyi 'khor lo thod pa can //
T02D1347-2:101b-19: khams gsum rnam rgyal la btud de //
T02D1347-2:101b-20: dkyil 'khor bri ba'i slad du yang //
T02D1347-2:101b-21: gnas ni bsrung ba'i cho ga dang //
T02D1347-2:101b-22: gdug pa rnams ni bsal ba dang //
T02D1347-2:101b-23: sa sogs lhag gnas bshad par bya //
T02D1347-2:101b-24: ji ltar rgyud rgyal las gsungs dang //
T02D1347-2:101b-25: 'jam pa'i rdo rjes gzhan las kyang //
T02D1347-2:101b-26: cho ga thams cang sangs rgyas 'bras //
T02D1347-2:101b-27: thob slad 'grel pas bdag gis dgrol //
T02D1347-2:101b-28: 'dir sngar brjod pa'i rnam pas nyi ma'i shing rtas
T02D1347-2:101b-29: gsol ba btab pa bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gyi
T02D1347-2:101b-30: sprul pa'i sku mi'i dbang po grags pas dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:101b-31: bri ba'i slad du mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas
T02D1347-2:101b-32: las bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu gsungs pa bsrung
T02D1347-2:101b-33: pa'i 'khor lo la sogs pa rnams tshigs su bcad
T02D1347-2:101b-34: pa nyi shu rtsa gsum pa la sogs pas rab
T02D1347-2:101b-35: tu bsdus te / dpal ldan rdo rje rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:101b-36: phyogs kun du zhes la sogs pas rgyud las gang
T02D1347-2:101b-37: gsungs pa de thams cad mdor bsdus chen pos bdag
T02D1347-2:101b-39: dpal ldan rdo rje zhes pa la sogs pa la
T02D1347-2:101b-40: 'dir dang por re zhig dag rdo rje slob dpon
T02D1347-2:101b-41: gyis rang gi lus dang gnas srung ba bsam par
T02D1347-2:101b-42: bya ste phyi nas slob ma la sogs pa bsdu
T02D1347-2:101b-43: ba dang sa yongs su gzung ba yang bya'o //
T02D1347-2:102a-0: de'i phyir dang por sngags pas dkyil @102a * //
T02D1347-2:102a-1: 'khor gyi don du brtags pa'i sar song nas dbugs
T02D1347-2:102a-2: su 'jam pa'i stan la shar du mngon par phyogs
T02D1347-2:102a-3: par gyur pas nye bar 'dug nas dpal ldan rdo
T02D1347-2:102a-4: rje rnams yan lag la dgod par bya ste dpral
T02D1347-2:102a-5: bar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dkar po la aom yig
T02D1347-2:102a-6: dgod do // mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dmar po la a'a: yig dgod do //
T02D1347-2:102a-7: snying gar sgra gcan gyi dkyil 'khor nag po la h'um yig dgod do //
T02D1347-2:102a-8: lte bar dus kyi me'i dkyil 'khor kha dog ser po la ho: yig dgod do //
T02D1347-2:102a-9: gtsug tor dang gsang bar grangs bzhin du nam mkha'
T02D1347-2:102a-10: dang ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ljang gu dang sngon
T02D1347-2:102a-11: po la hom dang ksha: yig dag dgod do //
T02D1347-2:102a-12: de ltar dkyil 'khor drug bsgoms te dkyil 'khor de
T02D1347-2:102a-13: rnams la rim pa ji lta bas sa bon 'di
T02D1347-2:102a-14: rnams yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje rnams bsgom par
T02D1347-2:102a-15: bya ste rtse mo bcu bdun pa dang /
T02D1347-2:102a-16: rtse mo sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang /
T02D1347-2:102a-18: rtse mo drug cu rtsa lnga pa dang /
T02D1347-2:102a-20: rtse mo sum cu rtsa gsum pa'o //
T02D1347-2:102a-21: de bzhin du phyi rol du g-yon pa'i phrag pa
T02D1347-2:102a-22: dang dpung pa'i tshigs la ka sde'i bdag nyid rtse
T02D1347-2:102a-23: mo sum cu rtsa gcig pa'o //
T02D1347-2:102a-24: de bzhin du g-yas pa la ka sde ring po'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-2:102a-25: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs
T02D1347-2:102a-26: la rtsa sde thung ngu'i bdag nyid de g-yas pa
T02D1347-2:102a-27: la ring po'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-2:102a-28: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i phrag pa dang dpung pa'i
T02D1347-2:102a-29: tshigs la ta sde thung ngu'i bdag nyid de g-yas
T02D1347-2:102a-30: pa la ring po'i bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-2:102a-31: g-yon pa'i brla'i tshigs la pa sde thung du'i bdag
T02D1347-2:102a-32: nyid de g-yas pa la ring po'i bdag nyid do
T02D1347-2:102a-33: // g-yon pa'i pus mo'i tshigs la ta sde thung
T02D1347-2:102a-34: ngu'i bdag nyid de g-yas pa la ring po'i bdag
T02D1347-2:102a-35: // nyid do // rkang pa g-yon pa'i tshigs la
T02D1347-2:102a-36: sa sde thung ngu'i bdag nyid de g-yas pa la
T02D1347-2:102a-37: ring po'i bdag nyid do zhes pa ni tshigs la
T02D1347-2:102a-39: de bzhin du sor mo'i tshigs drug cu po rnams
T02D1347-2:102a-40: la so sor rdo rje rtse mo bdun pa bsgom
T02D1347-2:102a-41: par bya ste nang gi le'u las gsungs pa'i sa
T02D1347-2:102a-42: bon gyi yi ge rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-2:102a-43: de bzhin du rna ba dag la aa a'a dag
T02D1347-2:102a-44: gis rdo rje rtse mo gsum pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D1347-2:102b-0: // sna'i bug pa dag @102b la ae aee dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-1: mig dag la aar a'ar dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-2: lce dang lce chud dag la ao aoo dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-3: rdo rje dang gsang ba dag la aa la a'a la dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-4: yid dang khu ba'i rtsa la aom a'a: dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-5: de bzhin du gtsug tor dang mgo bo dag la ha h'a dag gis rtse mo lnga pa'o //
T02D1347-2:102b-6: de nas mchu lce dang rkan dag la ya y'a dag gis rtse mo lnga pa'o //
T02D1347-2:102b-7: lag pa'i mthil dag la ra r'a dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-8: de bzhin du rkang pa'i mthil dag la wa w'a dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-9: de bzhin du bshang lam gyi g-yon dang g-yas su la l'a dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-10: de ltar rdo rje'i skur bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:102b-11: de nas rdo rje de rnams las 'phros pa'i rdo
T02D1347-2:102b-12: rje 'bar ba rnams kyis phyogs bcu na gnas pa'i
T02D1347-2:102b-13: mtha' dag bdud kyi tshogs sems can la rnam par
T02D1347-2:102b-14: 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nges par bsreg par bya
T02D1347-2:102b-15: ste steng du ljang gu 'bar ba rnams dang 'og
T02D1347-2:102b-16: tu sngon po 'bar ba rnams dang shar dang mer
T02D1347-2:102b-17: nag po 'bar ba rnams dang lho dang bden bral
T02D1347-2:102b-18: du dmar po 'bar ba rnams dang byang dang dbang
T02D1347-2:102b-19: ldan du dkar po 'bar ba rnams dang nub dang
T02D1347-2:102b-20: rlung du ser po 'bar ba rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-2:102b-21: bdud kyi tshogs bsregs pa de'i 'og tu phyi nas 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu rnams la /
T02D1347-2:102b-22: phyogs dang phyogs bral du gnas khro bo'i tshogs ni
T02D1347-2:102b-23: bsgom par bya zhes pa ni 'dir 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:102b-24: pa'i rim pas bdud dang bgegs dang log 'dren rnams
T02D1347-2:102b-25: phur bus gdab pa'i don dang gnas bsrung ba'i don
T02D1347-2:102b-26: du sngags pas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya'o
T02D1347-2:102b-27: // 'dir 'chad par 'gyur pa'i tshigs su bcad pa las nges pa gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:102b-28: sa'i phyogs rnams su 'dir dang por rdo rje gsum
T02D1347-2:102b-29: gyis zhing skyong rnams la gtor ma sbyin bya ste
T02D1347-2:102b-30: / phyi nas rdo rje brjod ba bzhi yis phyogs
T02D1347-2:102b-31: dang phyogs bral la gnas pa dud kyi tshogs ni
T02D1347-2:102b-32: nges par bsreg par bya zhes pa ste 'dir bzhi
T02D1347-2:102b-33: yis zhes pa ni gtso bo nyid kyi phyir gsungs
T02D1347-2:102b-34: / pa'o // rgyas par ni rdo rje thams cad
T02D1347-2:102b-35: kyis nges par bsreg par bya'o zhes pa nges pa
T02D1347-2:102b-36: ste yan lag thams cad la sngags dgod par rig
T02D1347-2:102b-37: / pa'o // par bya'o // de'i phyir dang por
T02D1347-2:102b-38: sal zhing skyong gang zhig de'i grong gi ming gis
T02D1347-2:103a-1: mnyam pa'i yi ge ste de'i gtor ma'i sngags ni
T02D1347-2:103a-2: aom a'a: h'um che ger mos par ri w'a r'a
T02D1347-2:103a-3: ya / ai dam ba lim ga na dham pushpam
T02D1347-2:103a-4: dh'u pam pra d'i p'a ksha tam da d'a ma
T02D1347-2:103a-5: ya / he / sa pa ri w'ar: sh'i ghram a'a gatstsha tu /
T02D1347-2:103a-6: dza: h'um bam ho: ai dam ba lim grihn'a tu kh'a da tu bi ba tu /
T02D1347-2:103a-7: sa pa ri w'a ra ka:sarba sa tv'a n'am sh'a
T02D1347-2:103a-8: na tim pushtim raksh'a wa ra na gu pa tim
T02D1347-2:103a-9: ka ro tu / ai dam sth'a nom tya ka
T02D1347-2:103a-10: tr'a b'a hye mandala bh'u myam tishtha tu h'um h'um
T02D1347-2:103a-11: ka ro tu / phat / badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:103a-12: de ltar gtor ma byin nas gnas kyi bdag po
T02D1347-2:103a-13: gshegs te de nas sngar gsungs pa'i chogs bdud kyi
T02D1347-2:103a-14: tshogs bsregs nas bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rnam par bsam
T02D1347-2:103a-15: mo // de la dang por yom yig yongs su
T02D1347-2:103a-16: gyur pa las rlung gi dkyil 'khor te steng dang
T02D1347-2:103a-17: 'og tu h'um yig las rdo rje kha sbyar ba'o
T02D1347-2:103a-18: mo // // de bzhin du ram yig gi bdag nyid me'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1347-2:103a-19: wam yig gi bdag nyid chu'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1347-2:103a-20: lom yig gi bdag nyid sa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:103a-21: de nas dkyil 'khor bzhi po rnams gcig tu byas
T02D1347-2:103a-22: te tho rangs grib ma yi ni mtha' ru zhes
T02D1347-2:103a-23: pa mtshams kyi mthar thug par ro //
T02D1347-2:103a-24: de nas yang khang pa brtsegs pa khru brgya phrag
T02D1347-2:103a-25: gnyis pa bsgom par bya ste phyi rol du ring
T02D1347-2:103a-26: du mthong ba'i mtha' ru ste /
T02D1347-2:103a-27: gang du nam mkha' dang sa 'byar ba zlum po'i
T02D1347-2:103a-28: dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par snang ba der dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:103a-29: bzhi cig tu gyur pa de nyid las rab gsum
T02D1347-2:103a-30: mo // de nas yul 'khor bsrung ba'i don du
T02D1347-2:103a-31: yul 'khor gyi mtshams su ra ba lnga bsgom par
T02D1347-2:103a-32: bya ste thams cad du 'og du mdung rnams dang
T02D1347-2:103a-33: steng du mda'i dra ba rnon po'o //
T02D1347-2:103a-34: dbus su rdo rje'i sa gzhi yul 'khor gyi mtshams kyi mthar thug pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:103a-35: de nas khang pa brtsegs pa'i dbus su chu skyes
T02D1347-2:103a-36: sam 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa khru bcu gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:103a-37: bsgom par bya'o // de'i lte ba'am mu khyud gdan
T02D1347-2:103a-38: dang bcas pa ste nyi ma'i gdan dang bcas pa
T02D1347-2:103a-40: nyi ma de'i steng du bdag nyid 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:103a-41: pa'i khro bo rdo rje shugs kyi sku phyag nyi
T02D1347-2:103a-42: shu rtsa drug dang zhal bzhi pa nyes pa dag
T02D1347-2:103a-43: dang rnam par bral ba ste /
T02D1347-2:103a-44: 'di ltar 'khor lo'i dbus su gnyis lhag rgyal ba'i
T02D1347-2:103b-0: phyag dang dus @103b kyi zhal ldan khro bo'i dbang
T02D1347-2:103b-1: po rdo rje shugs zhes pa ste sgrub thabs kyi
T02D1347-2:103b-2: le'u las 'chad par 'gyur pa sngags pas bsgom par
T02D1347-2:103b-3: bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:103b-4: de nas te khro bo'i rgyal po de bsgoms nas
T02D1347-2:103b-5: bla ma'i nges pa dang ldan zhes pa sangs rgyas
T02D1347-2:103b-6: kyi gsung dang ldan pa gang zhig cung zad 'dod
T02D1347-2:103b-7: pa sgrub pa po yis bsgrub par bya zhes pa
T02D1347-2:103b-8: ste dkyil 'khor gyi sa dang slob ma la sogs
T02D1347-2:103b-9: pa rnams bsrung ba'i don du bsrung ba'i 'khor lo
T02D1347-2:103b-10: la khro bo la sogs pa'i lha'i tshogs spro bar
T02D1347-2:103b-11: bya'o // 'dir ting nge 'dzin ni dang por bdag nyid rdo rje shugs su bsgoms te /
T02D1347-2:103b-12: de nas snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ha
T02D1347-2:103b-13: ya ra wa la rnams brtsegs pa'i rang bzhin bsgom
T02D1347-2:103b-14: par bya'o // de dag gi nang nas ha yig
T02D1347-2:103b-15: las grub pa kha dog ljang gu 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:103b-16: pa'i phyag dang mtshon cha dang zhal dang ldan pa
T02D1347-2:103b-17: zhal gyi gtso bo'i rna ba g-yon pa'i sgo nas
T02D1347-2:103b-18: phyung ste steng du brtsegs pa'i nang du zla ba'i
T02D1347-2:103b-19: dkyil 'khor ram nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gtsug tor
T02D1347-2:103b-20: can g-yas brkyang du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:103b-21: 'dir nyi ma'i rkang pa'i bye bas khro bo rnam dgod pa ni rnam pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:103b-22: 'dir ro dang das dang ri bong can zhes pa'i
T02D1347-2:103b-23: nges pa las nyi ma'i rkang pa ni bcu gcig
T02D1347-2:103b-24: go // de la ri bong can gyis rdo rje shugs kyi'o //
T02D1347-2:103b-25: dus kyis gshin rje mthar byed la sogs pa bzhi yi'o //
T02D1347-2:103b-26: ro yis gtsug tor la sogs pa drug gi'o //
T02D1347-2:103b-27: de'i phyir nyi ma'i bu lon dang nor gyi dbye
T02D1347-2:103b-28: bas thams cad nyi ma la gnas pa'am de bzhin
T02D1347-2:103b-29: du tshes kyi nor dang bu lon gyi dbye bas
T02D1347-2:103b-30: thams cad zla ba la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:103b-31: de bzhin du lus kyi dbye bas phyogs rnams su
T02D1347-2:103b-32: zla ba la gnas pa dang phyogs bral rnams su
T02D1347-2:103b-34: de bzhin du bsam pa'i dbye bas phyogs bral rnams
T02D1347-2:103b-35: su zla ba la gnas pa dang phyogs rnams su
T02D1347-2:103b-37: de bzhin du nub dang lhor nyi ma'i gdan la gnas pa dang /
T02D1347-2:103b-38: byang dang shar du zla ba'i gdan la gnas pa ni nyi ma'i rkang pa'i dbye bas nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:103b-39: des na sngags pas ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa
T02D1347-2:104a-0: bzhin khro bo'i cho gas gzhag par bya'o zhes @104a
T02D1347-2:104a-2: de bzhin du h'a yig ring po las grub pa'i
T02D1347-2:104a-3: gnod mdzes rgyal po kha dog sngon po ni rna
T02D1347-2:104a-4: ba g-yas pa'i sgo nas phyung ste rdo rje'i sa
T02D1347-2:104a-5: gzhir nyi ma la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:104a-6: de bzhin du yi yig las grub pa bgegs mthar
T02D1347-2:104a-7: byed kha dog nag po ni sna g-yon pa'i sgo
T02D1347-2:104a-8: nas phyung ste shar gyi rtsibs su zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1347-2:104a-9: 'khor ram nyi ma la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:104a-10: de bzhin du y'i yig las grub pa dbyug pa
T02D1347-2:104a-11: sngon po nag po ni sna g-yas pa'i sgo nas
T02D1347-2:104a-12: phyung ste me'i rtsibs su nyi ma'am zla ba la
T02D1347-2:104a-13: gzhag par bya'o // rri yig las grub pa shes
T02D1347-2:104a-14: rab mthar byed dmar po ni mig g-yon pa'i sgo
T02D1347-2:104a-15: nas phyung ste lho'i rtsibs su zla ba'am nyi ma'i
T02D1347-2:104a-17: de bzhin du rr'i yig las grub pa 'dod pa'i
T02D1347-2:104a-18: rgyal po dmar po ni mig g-yas pa'i sgo nas
T02D1347-2:104a-19: phyung ste bden bral gyi rtsibs su nyi ma'am zla
T02D1347-2:104a-20: ba'i gdan la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:104a-21: de bzhin du wu yig las grub pa padma mthar
T02D1347-2:104a-22: byed dkar po ni lce'i sgo nas phyung ste byang
T02D1347-2:104a-23: gi rtsibs su zla ba'am nyi ma la gzhag par
T02D1347-2:104a-24: bya'o // de bzhin du w'u yig las grub pa
T02D1347-2:104a-25: mi g-yo ba dkar po ni gci ba'i sgo nas
T02D1347-2:104a-26: phyung ste dbang ldan gyi rtsibs su nyi ma'am zla
T02D1347-2:104a-28: de bzhin du lli yig las grub pa gshin rje
T02D1347-2:104a-29: mthar byed ser po ni bshang lam gyis go nas
T02D1347-2:104a-30: phyung ste / nub kyi rtsibs su zla ba'am nyi ma la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:104a-31: de bzhin du ll'i yig las grub pa stobs po
T02D1347-2:104a-32: che ser po ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi sgo
T02D1347-2:104a-33: nas phyung ste rlung gi rtsibs su nyi ma'am zla
T02D1347-2:104a-35: yang na bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang ba'i
T02D1347-2:104a-36: sngags pas thams cad nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la gzhag
T02D1347-2:104a-37: par bya'o // de ltar na snying po'i 'khor lo dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:104a-38: de nas brtsegs pa'i phyi rol du tshangs ris la
T02D1347-2:104a-39: sogs pa'i zad par sa la sogs pa rnams spro
T02D1347-2:104a-40: bar bya'o // 'dir so sor bsdu ba'i tshig gis
T02D1347-2:104a-41: ha ya ra wa la zhes brjod nas nga nya
T02D1347-2:104a-43: de bzhin du 'dir snying gar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:104a-44: la nga nya na ma nan brtsegs pa'i rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:104a-45: bsgoms nas de dag lang ng'a'i yi ge dag las
T02D1347-2:104a-46: grub pa zad par nam mkha' dag ni sngar brjod
T02D1347-2:104b-0: pa'i sgo @104b dag nas phyung ste brtsegs pa'i steng
T02D1347-2:104b-1: dang gnod mdzes kyi 'og tu stong pa'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:104b-2: la gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:104b-3: de bzhin du nyi ny'i las grub pa'i zad par
T02D1347-2:104b-4: rlung dag ni shar dang me dag tu rlung gi
T02D1347-2:104b-6: de bzhin du nri nr'i las grub pa zad par
T02D1347-2:104b-7: me dag ni lho dang bden bral dag tu me'i
T02D1347-2:104b-9: de bzhin du mu m'u las grub pa zad par
T02D1347-2:104b-10: chu dag ni byang dang dbang ldan dag tu chu'i
T02D1347-2:104b-12: de bzhin du nli nl'i dag las grub pa zad
T02D1347-2:104b-13: par sa dag ni nub dang rlung dag tu sa'i
T02D1347-2:104b-15: de nas gha dzha dha bha dha dha brtsegs pa'i
T02D1347-2:104b-16: rnam pa bsgom par bya zhing de dag las kyang
T02D1347-2:104b-17: phyogs skyong pa bcu spro bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:104b-18: gha gh'a las grub pa tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug
T02D1347-2:104b-19: ljang gu dang sngon po dag ni ra ba'i khyon
T02D1347-2:104b-20: gyi tshad kyis steng du tshangs pa dang 'og tu
T02D1347-2:104b-21: khyab 'jug ste / ngang pa dang mkha' lding la gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:104b-22: de bzhin du dzhi dzh'i las grub pa bden bral
T02D1347-2:104b-23: dang rlung lha kha dog nag po dag ni shar
T02D1347-2:104b-24: dang me dag tu yi dags dang /
T02D1347-2:104b-25: ri dags kyi gdan la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:104b-26: de bzhin du lho dang bden bral du dhri dhr'i
T02D1347-2:104b-27: las grub pa gshin rje dang me lha dag ni
T02D1347-2:104b-28: ma he dang lug la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:104b-29: byang dang dbang ldan du bhu bh'u las grub pa
T02D1347-2:104b-30: rgya mtsho dang bde byed dag ni chu srin dang
T02D1347-2:104b-32: nub dang rlung du dhli dhl'i las grub pa dbang
T02D1347-2:104b-33: po dang gnod sbyin dag ni glang po dang 'khor
T02D1347-2:104b-34: lo'i khang brtsegs la gnas pa ste /
T02D1347-2:104b-35: de ltar phyogs skyong rnams ra ba'i nang la bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:104b-36: de nas rab bsrung ba'i don du gz'a'i 'khor lo spro bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:104b-37: sngar brjod pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ga dza da ba da da bsgoms te /
T02D1347-2:104b-38: de dag las ga g'a las grub pa sgra gcan
T02D1347-2:104b-39: dang dus kyi me dag ni ra ba gsum po
T02D1347-2:104b-40: rnams kyi khyon gyi tshad kyis steng dang 'og tu
T02D1347-2:104b-41: stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D1347-2:104b-42: // de bzhin du dzi dz'i las grub pa zla ba dang /
T02D1347-2:104b-43: nyi ma dag ni shar dang me dag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:105a-2: bkra shis dag ni lho dang bden bral du me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:105a-3: bu b'u las grub pa pa sangs dang phur bu
T02D1347-2:105a-4: dag ni byang dang dbang ldan du chu'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:105a-5: la gnas pa'o // dli dl'i las grub pa mjug rings dang ;
T02D1347-2:105a-6: spen pa dag ni nub dang rlung dag tu sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:105a-7: 'di ni ra ba'i phyi rol du srung zhing skyong ba'i gza' rnams so //
T02D1347-2:105a-8: de nas ra ba lnga bsrung ba'i don du klu'i rgyal po rnams spro bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:105a-9: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de la kha tsha tha pha
T02D1347-2:105a-10: tha tha bsgoms nas de dag las kha kh'a las
T02D1347-2:105a-12: rnam par rgyal ba dag ni ra ba lnga'i nang
T02D1347-2:105a-13: gi khyon gyi tshad kyis steng dang 'og tu stong
T02D1347-2:105a-14: pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:105a-15: de bzhin du tshi tsh'i las grub pa stobs kyi rgyu dang /
T02D1347-2:105a-16: padma dag ni shar dang me dag tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:105a-17: de bzhin du shthi thr'i las grub pa nor rgyas kyi bu dang /
T02D1347-2:105a-18: dung skyong dag ni lho dang bden bral dag tu me'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:105a-19: de bzhin du phu ph'u las grub pa mtha' yas dang /
T02D1347-2:105a-20: rigs ldan dag ni byang dang dbang ldan dag tu chu'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:105a-21: thli thl'i las grub pa padma chen po dang /
T02D1347-2:105a-22: 'jog po dag ni nub dang rlung du sa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:105a-23: de nas ra ba lnga'i phyi rol du /
T02D1347-2:105a-24: bsrung ba'i don du 'byung po dang lha ma yin rnams bsgom par bya ste ;
T02D1347-2:105a-25: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de la ka tsa ta pa ta ta brtsegs pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1347-2:105a-26: de dag las phyi rol du ra ba'i khyon gyi
T02D1347-2:105a-27: tshad kyis steng du ro langs dang 'og tu grul
T02D1347-2:105a-28: bum ste / 'di dag ni ka k'a las grub
T02D1347-2:105a-29: pa stong pa'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa bsgom par
T02D1347-2:105a-30: bum ste / bya'o // shar du tsi las grub pa mi'am ci khyi'i gdong can dang /
T02D1347-2:105a-31: mer ts'i las grub pa skyes bu'am ci bya rog gi gdong can de rlung la gnas pa'o //

T02D1347-2:111b-5: h'um phat sv'a h'a zhes pa 'dis bdag nyid byin
T02D1347-2:111b-6: gyis brlab par bya ste lha'i nga rgyal gyi nges
T02D1347-2:111b-7: sngags pas bya'o // pa'o // de ltar lha'i nga
T02D1347-2:111b-8: rgyal bskyed de rnams yongs su gzung ba dang slob
T02D1347-2:111b-10: dang por yul dang grong gi bdag po'i gtor ma
T02D1347-2:111b-11: sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gis sbyangs nas sbyin par
T02D1347-2:111b-12: bya'o // aom aom badzra tsandra sarba dharmma su bi
T02D1347-2:111b-13: shuddha sva bh'a ba sarba dharm'a na bi sha dha
T02D1347-2:111b-14: bya'o // ya sv'a h'a / aom a'a: badzra s'u
T02D1347-2:111b-15: rya sarba dharmma pra bodha ka sarba dharm'a na pra
T02D1347-2:111b-17: aom hum: badzr'a na la sarba dharmma pra d'i ba
T02D1347-2:111b-18: ka sarba dharm'a na pra d'i pa ya sv'a h'a
T02D1347-2:111b-19: / aom ho sarba dharmma badzr'a mri ta ka ra
T02D1347-2:111b-20: sarba dharm'a na badzr'a mri tam ku ru ku ru
T02D1347-2:111b-21: / sv'a h'a / sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:111b-22: go rims bzhin du lag pa g-yon pas sbyang bar
T02D1347-2:111b-23: / sv'a h'a / bya'o // lag pa g-yas pas rgyas par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:111b-24: yang dag par reg ste snyim pas bkab nas rab tu 'bar bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:111b-25: rdo rje mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas rdo rje bdud
T02D1347-2:111b-26: rtsir byas nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal
T02D1347-2:111b-27: ba'i phyag rgyas yul gyi bdag po spyan drang bar
T02D1347-2:111b-28: bya zhing khyi'i phyag rgyas grong na gnas pa'i bdag
T02D1347-2:111b-29: po rnams dang rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas khro bo'i
T02D1347-2:111b-30: rgyal po rnams dang gri gug gi phyag rgyas zad
T02D1347-2:111b-31: par rnams dang ral gri'i phyag rgyas lha rnams dang
T02D1347-2:111b-32: rin po che'i phyag rgyas gza' rnams dang padma'i phyag
T02D1347-2:111b-33: rgyas klu rnams dang 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas yi dags
T02D1347-2:111b-34: rnams spyan drang bar bya ste de nas aom a'a:hum
T02D1347-2:111b-35: che ge mo a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha sh'i ghram ai
T02D1347-2:111b-36: dam ba lim grihna grihna bhu ga tv'ap'i tv'a hri
T02D1347-2:111b-37: pa tim kri tv'a sarba satv'a n'am /
T02D1347-2:111b-38: sh'anti tsttam kri tv'a aa pa ra sth'a nam gatstsha
T02D1347-2:111b-39: gatstsha sv'a h'a sa yongs su gzung ba'i dus su'o
T02D1347-2:111b-40: // gzhan gyi dus su ni sv'a sth'a na gatstsha zhes brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:111b-41: de ltar thams cad kyi gtor ma so so'i phyogs
T02D1347-2:111b-42: kyi char sngar brjod pa'i cho gas gshegs su gsol
T02D1347-2:111b-43: bar bya ste gtor ma'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:112a-0: de nas rang gi snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la l'om yig yongs su gyur pa @112a * //
T02D1347-2:112a-1: las 'khor lo ser po bsgom par bya ste de
T02D1347-2:112a-2: yongs su gyur pa las sa'i lha mo zhal gsum
T02D1347-2:112a-3: phyag drug ma g-yas pa na 'khor lo dang dbyug
T02D1347-2:112a-4: pa dang rdo rje 'dzin cing g-yon pa na dung
T02D1347-2:112a-5: dang lcags sgrog dang rdo rje dril bu 'dzin ma
T02D1347-2:112a-6: kha dog ser mo gos ser po dang rin po
T02D1347-2:112a-7: che'i rgyan ser po dang ldan pa bsgom par bya'o
T02D1347-2:112a-8: // de nas 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rim pas dam
T02D1347-2:112a-9: tshig sems dpa' dang ye shes sems dpa' gcig tu
T02D1347-2:112a-10: byas te de nas phyi rol du sa'i lha mo
T02D1347-2:112a-11: sngags kyi tshig 'dis spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:112a-12: aom l'om a'a: hum ba su na dha ri sarba
T02D1347-2:112a-13: buddha dza na ni sarba satv'a ba k'a ri ni
T02D1347-2:112a-14: / badzra sv'a a'a dzny'a pa ya ti sh'i gh'am a'a gatstsha a'a gatstsha /
T02D1347-2:112a-15: ai dam ga na dham pushpam dh'u pam d'i pam
T02D1347-2:112a-16: nee bee tyam pha l'a ksha ham da d'a mi
T02D1347-2:112a-17: ta ba hva me ba grihna grihna mandal'a rbam /
T02D1347-2:112a-20: pushtim kri tv'a shu bha tsi ta te na ai
T02D1347-2:112a-21: dam sth'a nam hya ka tp'a aa pa ra sth'a
T02D1347-2:112a-22: nam gatstsha gatstsha sv'a h'a zhes pa ni sa'i lha
T02D1347-2:112a-23: mo gshegs su gsol ba'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:112a-24: de nas sngar gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang sngags
T02D1347-2:112a-25: kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis bdud gzhom par bya ste
T02D1347-2:112a-26: / aom a'a: hum ham: ham ksha: hr'a: hr'a: hr'a:
T02D1347-2:112a-27: ra ra ra ra badzr'a na la sarba ba ra
T02D1347-2:112a-28: ne bha rm'a pra la ya sva bh'a ba sarba
T02D1347-2:112a-29: m'a ra k'a yi ke bishn'a bi n'a ya k'a
T02D1347-2:112a-30: di n'am da sha dig ga t'a ni k'a ya
T02D1347-2:112a-31: b'a katstt'a ni da ha da ha pa tsa pa
T02D1347-2:112a-32: tsa bha sm'i ku ru ku ru hum h'um phat
T02D1347-2:112a-33: phat ces pa ni bdud gzhom pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:112a-34: de nas bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa gzhan
T02D1347-2:112a-35: rnams rdo rje lcags kyus bkug cing rdo rje zhags
T02D1347-2:112a-36: pas bcings nas rdo rje phur pa khro bo'i rgyal
T02D1347-2:112a-37: po lte ba'i 'og rtse mo'i rnam pa ni gnas
T02D1347-2:112a-38: bcu po rnams su gdug pa'i steng du bying bar
T02D1347-2:112a-39: yi ge lnga las bsgom par bya ste sngags kyi
T02D1347-2:112a-41: aom a'a: hum ho: ham ksha:h'um h'um phat phat phat
T02D1347-2:112a-42: badzra k'i la k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a n'a
T02D1347-2:112a-43: dh'i pa te sha ta mu kha sha ta gha
T02D1347-2:112a-44: dza sha ta tsa ra na sarba bighna bi n'a
T02D1347-2:112a-45: ya k'a de dusht'a n'am k'a ya b'a ka tsitta
T02D1347-2:112a-46: dzny'a n'a nam k'i la ya k'i la ya hum
T02D1347-2:112a-47: h'um phat phat / de nas rdo rje tho ba'i
T02D1347-2:112a-48: sngags ni aom ll'i badzra mud ga ra m'a r'a
T02D1347-2:112a-49: dh'i n'am si ra si kanthe hri da ye n'a
T02D1347-2:112a-50: bho gu hye aa na te badzra k'i la k'a
T02D1347-2:112a-51: n'a ko ta y'a ko ta ya ksham ksh'am kshim
T02D1347-2:112a-52: kshrim kshr'im kshr'a kshum ksh'um kshlim kshl'im h'um h'um h'um
T02D1347-2:112b-0: phat @112b phat phat ces pa ni phur bus gdab
T02D1347-2:112b-1: h'um phat phat / pa'i cho ga'o // de nas
T02D1347-2:112b-2: phur bu rnams bsrung ba'i don du khro bo'i rgyal
T02D1347-2:112b-3: po bcu po rnams sngar gsungs pa'i cho gas dgod
T02D1347-2:112b-4: h'um phat phat / pa'i cho ga'o // par bya'o
T02D1347-2:112b-5: // de nas g-yon pa dang g-yas pa'i rkang ba'i
T02D1347-2:112b-6: mthil la hum h'um rnam par bkod de rdo rje
T02D1347-2:112b-7: rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas rkang ba'i mthil du reg
T02D1347-2:112b-8: nas rdo rje'i stabs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyis
T02D1347-2:112b-9: la bcag par bya ste dus kyi 'khor lo'i sku'i
T02D1347-2:112b-10: g-yas brkyang dang g-yon brkyang gi stabs dang mnyam pa'i
T02D1347-2:112b-12: shar du yam y'a: rkang pa'i mthil la bkod cing
T02D1347-2:112b-13: ral gri'i phyag rgyas reg nas zlum po'i stabs kyis
T02D1347-2:112b-14: bcag par bya'o // lhor ram r'a: bkod cing rin
T02D1347-2:112b-15: po che'i phyag rgyas reg nas rol pa'i stabs kyis
T02D1347-2:112b-16: bcag par bya'o // bcag par bya'o // nub tu
T02D1347-2:112b-17: lam l'a: bkod cing 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas reg nas
T02D1347-2:112b-18: rdo rje'i 'dug stangs kyis byin gyis brlab pa'am sa
T02D1347-2:112b-19: ga'i stabs kyis bcag par bya'o ;
T02D1347-2:112b-20: / byang du wam w'a:bkod cing padma'i phyag rgyas reg
T02D1347-2:112b-21: nas padma'i 'dug stangs kyis byin gyis brlab pa'am t'a
T02D1347-2:112b-22: na da ba'i stabs kyis bcag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:112b-23: de nas badzra ga na dha la sogs pa'i sngags
T02D1347-2:112b-24: kyi tshig rnams kyis dri la sogs pa'i rdzas rnams
T02D1347-2:112b-25: kyis dkyil 'khor gyi sa la mchod pa byas nas
T02D1347-2:112b-26: sngar brjod pa'i cho gas rdo rje'i sa spyan drang
T02D1347-2:112b-27: bar bya'o // de la sngags kyi tshig rnams ni
T02D1347-2:112b-28: aom a'a: l'am h'um badzra bh'u mi tishtha ma tsa
T02D1347-2:112b-29: la hum h'um phat badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa
T02D1347-2:112b-31: de nas slar yang sngags pas mchod yon la sogs
T02D1347-2:112b-32: pa bya ste sa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o
T02D1347-2:112b-33: // de nas rdo rje bum pa rnams lhag par
T02D1347-2:112b-34: gnas pa bya ste 'dir sngags kyi tshig rnams ni
T02D1347-2:112b-35: aom ham h'am him hrim hr'im hum h'um hlim hl'im
T02D1347-2:112b-36: badzra padma mri ta ga ta su bi shuddha dharmma
T02D1347-2:112b-37: dh'a tu sva bh'a ba sarba dharm'a na su bi
T02D1347-2:112b-38: shuddha dharmma dh'a tu sva bh'a b'a na ku ru
T02D1347-2:112b-40: dri la sogs pa phul nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus
T02D1347-2:112b-41: su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa gzhag par bya
T02D1347-2:112b-42: ste bum pa lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:112b-43: de nas rdo rje'i thig skud lhag par gnas pa
T02D1347-2:112b-44: bya ste de la sngags kyi tshig rnams ni aom
T02D1347-2:112b-45: a'am a'im r'i a'um l'iom badzra s'u tra sarba dharmee
T02D1347-2:112b-46: ke sva bh'a ba sarba dharm'a na ae ka a'a
T02D1347-2:113a-1: b'a na ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:113a-2: dril sogs pa phul nas shar gyi sar bzhag par
T02D1347-2:113a-3: bya ste thig skud lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o
T02D1347-2:113a-4: // de nas rdo rje'i rdul tshon lhag par gnas
T02D1347-2:113a-5: pa bya ste de la sngags kyi tshig rnams ni
T02D1347-2:113a-6: aom aom aom riom auom liom su bi shuddha panytsa
T02D1347-2:113a-7: ska na dha sva bh'a ba panytsa skan dh'a na
T02D1347-2:113a-8: su bi shuddha dharm'a na ku ru ku ru sv'a
T02D1347-2:113a-9: // h'a / dri la sogs pa phul nas rdul
T02D1347-2:113a-10: tshon gyi snod rnams nub kyi sar gzhag par bya
T02D1347-2:113a-11: ste rdul tshon lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:113a-12: de nas rdo rje lhag par gnas pa bya ste
T02D1347-2:113a-13: de la sngags kyi tshig rnams ni aom hum kro
T02D1347-2:113a-14: dha badzra sarba satva ka ru n'a da ma ka
T02D1347-2:113a-15: sarba dharmee ka su kha sva bh'a ba sarba dharm'a
T02D1347-2:113a-16: na badzra su kha sva bh'a b'a na ku ru
T02D1347-2:113a-18: dri la sogs pa phul nas lhor gzhag par bya ste rdo rje lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:113a-19: de nas rdo rje dril bu lhag par gnas pa
T02D1347-2:113a-20: bya ste de la sngags kyi tshig rnams ni aom
T02D1347-2:113a-21: ho: badzra na te sarba dharmee ka pradzny'a ttva ni
T02D1347-2:113a-22: sva bh'a be sarb'a k'a re sarba dharma bra bo
T02D1347-2:113a-23: dha ni sarba dharm'a na ni: sva bh'a ba na
T02D1347-2:113a-24: pra bo dha ya pra bo dha ya sv'a h'a
T02D1347-2:113a-25: / dri la sogs pa phul nas byang gi sa la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:113a-26: rdo rje dril bu lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga
T02D1347-2:113a-27: ste sa la sogs pa yang dag par gzung ba'i
T02D1347-2:113a-28: cho ga'o // de nas slob ma lhag par gnas
T02D1347-2:113a-29: pa bya ste dang por dkyil 'khor gsol ba gdab
T02D1347-2:113a-30: pa'i dus dang bar du sa la sogs pa gzung
T02D1347-2:113a-31: cho ga'o // ba dang / mthar dkyil 'khor du
T02D1347-2:113a-32: 'jug pa'i dus thams cad du mandala byas nas so
T02D1347-2:113a-33: shing byin te de nas bsrung ba bya'o //
T02D1347-2:113a-34: de la 'di ni cho ga ste khrus byas shing
T02D1347-2:113a-35: gos gtsang ma bgos te zhi ba la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:113a-36: las dang rjes su mthun pas sa de nyid la
T02D1347-2:113a-37: mandala byas nas shar du mngon par phyogs pa la
T02D1347-2:113a-38: au dum b'a ra'i so shing ngam 'o ma can
T02D1347-2:113a-39: gyi shing gzhan las skyes pa sor bcu gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:113a-40: mgo bor me tog gi phreng ba bcings pa dri
T02D1347-2:113a-41: la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod nas sngags 'dis sbyin
T02D1347-2:113a-42: par bya'o // aom a'a: hum ho: hom ksha: badzra
T02D1347-2:113a-43: danta k'ashtha tsa tur bi mo ksha mu kha bisshuddhi
T02D1347-2:113a-44: sva bh'a ba k'a ya b'a ka tsitta dzny'a na
T02D1347-2:113a-45: mu kha dan t'a di ma lom bi sho dha
T02D1347-2:113a-46: ya bi sho dha ya sv'a h'a zhes pas so
T02D1347-2:113a-47: shing byin nas lhag par gnas pa'i mthar steng nas
T02D1347-2:113b-0: rab tu dor zhing mandala du lhung ba'i so @113b
T02D1347-2:113b-1: shing gis mtshon bar bya ste gang du mgo bo
T02D1347-2:113b-2: gang yin pa ltung ba der gnas pa'i las rab
T02D1347-2:113b-3: 'byam la sogs pa der 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1347-2:113b-4: pa ni so shing gi cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:113b-5: de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor gyi sa la bcug
T02D1347-2:113b-6: ste spyi bo dang mgrin pa dang snying kha dang
T02D1347-2:113b-7: lte ba dang gtsug tor dang gsang ba la aom
T02D1347-2:113b-8: a'a: hum ho: ham ksha: rigs drug po rnams dgod
T02D1347-2:113b-9: pa byas nas sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis rdo
T02D1347-2:113b-10: rje sems dpa' bskul bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:113b-11: aom aa a'a aom aa: badzra satva ma h'a su
T02D1347-2:113b-12: kha badzra k'a la tsakra shi shya sya aa bhe
T02D1347-2:113b-13: mu kho bha ba sa na tushto bha ba bar
T02D1347-2:113b-14: do bha ba k'a ya b'a ka tsott'a dhi shtha
T02D1347-2:113b-15: nam ku ru ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:113b-16: slob ma lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:113b-17: de nas slob ma gshegs su bcug nas dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:113b-18: gyi dbus su rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa dang
T02D1347-2:113b-19: shar du rdo rje'i thig skud dang nub tu rdo
T02D1347-2:113b-20: rje rdul tshon gyi snod dang lhor rdo rje dang
T02D1347-2:113b-21: byang du dril bu rnams slob dpon gyis sgo'i cha
T02D1347-2:113b-23: de rnams gnas lngar bkod de de nas lhor dge
T02D1347-2:113b-24: ba dang mi dge ba'i mtshan ma'i don du sngags
T02D1347-2:113b-25: 'dis ma la stan lhag par gnas pa bya'o //
T02D1347-2:113b-26: aom ho:badzra ka ma la da la garbhe shaye badzra
T02D1347-2:113b-27: su kha ma h'a ni dr'am ka roma ya th'a
T02D1347-2:113b-28: ta th'a ga te na kri t'a ha: ha: sv'a
T02D1347-2:113b-29: h'a / mal stan lhag par gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:113b-30: de nas slob dpon nub tu mgo dang shar du rkang pa phyogs pas nyal bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:113b-31: de la bsgoms pa'i stobs sam rmi lam gyis mtshan
T02D1347-2:113b-32: ma blta bar bya ste gal te sangs rgyas dang
T02D1347-2:113b-33: byang chub sems dpa' dag lha mo'i tshogs rgyud mangs
T02D1347-2:113b-34: la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag dang ldan pa mthong
T02D1347-2:113b-36: ci ste rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma phyag na gri
T02D1347-2:113b-37: gug dang thod pa can nam khro bo'i dbang po
T02D1347-2:113b-38: bdud dang bgegs dang log 'dren la sogs pa rnams
T02D1347-2:113b-39: srung ba'i 'khor lo'i mtha' phan chad du nyams par
T02D1347-2:113b-40: byed pa mthong na yang de bzhin du dge ba'o
T02D1347-2:113b-41: // ci ste cung zad kyang ma mthong na de'i tshe 'bring bo'o //
T02D1347-2:113b-42: ci ste bdud kyi ris bkres pa dang skom pas
T02D1347-2:113b-43: gzir ba ring cing skam pa'i lus can lag na
T02D1347-2:113b-44: gri gug dang thod pa thogs pa skye bo legs
T02D1347-2:114a-1: pa la dga' ba rnams slob dpon nam slob mas
T02D1347-2:114a-2: mthong na de'i tshe mtshan ma ngan par 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:114a-3: / de mthong nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis mal
T02D1347-2:114a-4: stan spangs te dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi sar sngar
T02D1347-2:114a-5: brjod pa'i srung pa'i 'khor lo bsgoms nas slar yang
T02D1347-2:114a-6: de rnams la sngar brjod pa'i cho gas gtor ma
T02D1347-2:114a-7: rgya chen po sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:114a-8: slar yang sbyang ba'i sngags gzhan ni aom phrem badzra
T02D1347-2:114a-9: t'a ki n'i badzra dh'a tv'i shva rig ga na
T02D1347-2:114a-10: sva bh'a ba sarba dra bya bi sho dha ni
T02D1347-2:114a-11: sarba dra by'a ni bi sho dha ya hum phrem

T02D1347-2:125a-0: par gyur na sngags pa rnams la srid pa'i @125a

T02D1347-2:128b-11: de nas rjes su nga ro dang /
T02D1347-2:128b-12: de nas a'a: yig ring po'o //
T02D1347-2:128b-13: de ltar snga ma bzhin du rnam par bcad pa las /
T02D1347-2:128b-14: au yig dang snga ma'i dbyangs kyi yon tan te /
T02D1347-2:128b-15: ha yig dang yang dag par sbyar zhing phyi ma'i aa yig dang ma yig dag dbyi'o //
T02D1347-2:128b-16: de ltar na yon tan gsum gyi bdag nyid ho yig ste /
T02D1347-2:128b-17: ha aa au zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-2:128b-18: de ltar ye shes rdo rje la yon tan gsum ni ma rig pa dang /
T02D1347-2:128b-19: 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:128b-20: sku rdo rje la ming dang gzugs dang /
T02D1347-2:128b-21: skye mched drug dang reg pa'o //
T02D1347-2:128b-22: gsung rdo rje la tshor ba dang /
T02D1347-2:128b-24: thugs rdo rje la srid pa dang /
T02D1347-2:128b-25: skye ba dang rga shi ste /
T02D1347-2:128b-26: thig le'i gzugs kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1347-2:128b-27: de ltar ma rig pa la sogs pa skyed par
T02D1347-2:128b-28: byed pa mchog gi bde byed ye shes rdo rje
T02D1347-2:128b-30: zhes pa ni sngags rnams kyi skye gnas te /
T02D1347-2:128b-31: thams cad du rnam pa bcu gnyis pa sku dang
T02D1347-2:128b-32: gsung dang thugs dang ye shes rdo rje'o zhes pa
T02D1347-2:128b-33: ni / bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:128b-34: da ni sngags kyi mtshan ma dgod pa gsungs pa 'dir thams cad du /
T02D1347-2:128b-35: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nyi ma dang /
T02D1347-2:128b-36: zla ba'i gdan rnams la rags pa dang phra ba dang /
T02D1347-2:128b-37: gzhan gyi dbye bas dgod pa rnam pa gsum ste /
T02D1347-2:128b-38: de la gzhan gyi dbye ba ni sngags kyi sa bon dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:128b-39: phra ba'i dbye ba ni sngags kyi sa bon yongs
T02D1347-2:128b-40: su gyur pa rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma
T02D1347-2:128b-41: dgod pa'o // rags pa'i dbye ba ni rdo rje
T02D1347-2:128b-42: la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yongs su gyur pa'i lha'i
T02D1347-2:129a-1: de ltar go rims ji lta bas sngags kyi sa bon dgod par byas pas /
T02D1347-2:129a-2: mtshan ma dgod pa la sogs pa rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:129a-3: zhes pa ni nges pa ste /
T02D1347-2:129a-4: des na 'dir gtso bo nyid kyis sngags kyis bon dgod pa gsungs so //
T02D1347-2:129a-5: rgyal ba'i bdag po'i padma sna tshogs mdog la zhes
T02D1347-2:129a-6: pa ljang khu'i mdog la zla ba nyi ma me
T02D1347-2:129a-7: yi steng du h'um yig ste zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-2:129a-8: 'dir gnam stong gi mthar 'dzin pa'i dus su zla ba dang nyi ma dang /
T02D1347-2:129a-9: sgra gcan rnams sbyor ba ste /
T02D1347-2:129a-10: zla ba dang nyi ma dang me yang dag par ldan pa de nyid dkyil 'khor gyi gdan no //
T02D1347-2:129a-11: nang du ni la la n'a dang ra sa na dang aa ba dh'u t'i dang /
T02D1347-2:129a-12: yang dag par ldan pa snying kha'i padma ste /
T02D1347-2:129a-13: de'i lte bar zla ba nyi ma sgra gcan gyi steng du /
T02D1347-2:129a-14: h'um yig gis bon rdul tshon sngon pos bri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:129a-15: yang na de yongs su gyur pa'i rdo rje sngon po rtse gsum pa bri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:129a-16: gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor la
T02D1347-2:129a-17: 'jig rten gyi smod pa yongs su spang pa'i slang
T02D1347-2:129a-18: du lha'i gzugs ni bri bar mi bya'o //
T02D1347-2:129a-19: bdag po'i sa bon dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:129a-20: de nas padma'i 'dab ma la sbyin pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:129a-21: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dgod par bya
T02D1347-2:129a-22: ste / phyogs 'dab rnams la aa sogs stong pa zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-2:129a-23: shar gyi 'dab ma la aa lho'i 'dab ma la aa: byang du a'am /
T02D1347-2:129a-25: yang na mtshan ma rnams te /
T02D1347-2:129a-26: shar gyi 'dab ma la sbos kyi snod dang lhor
T02D1347-2:129a-27: mar me dang byang du lta bshos dang nub tu
T02D1347-2:129a-28: dung ngo // 'dir 'chad par 'gyur pa las mtshan
T02D1347-2:129a-29: ma gang zhig gang gi g-yas pa'i phyag mthil du
T02D1347-2:129a-30: 'gyur phyag rgya de ni chu skyes dag gis dman
T02D1347-2:129a-31: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir 'chad par 'gyur pa'i das pas
T02D1347-2:129a-33: de bzhin du phyogs bral 'dab ma la yang ha sogs stong pa rnam pa bzhi zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-2:129a-34: 'dir me ru ha bden bral du ha:dbang ldan du ham rlung du h'a'o //
T02D1347-2:129a-35: yang na nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po dang ser po'i rnga yab rnams bri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:129a-36: de nas phyogs bral 'di la phyi rol gyi zur
T02D1347-2:129a-37: bzhi rnams su grangs bzhin du dbang ldan du sku
T02D1347-2:129a-38: rdo rje aom yig gam chos kyi dung ngo //
T02D1347-2:129b-0: bden bral gyi zur du gsung rdo rje @129b a'a: 'am chos kyi gandi'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-1: rtse mo can du thugs rdo rje hum ngam yid bzhin gyi nor bu'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-2: rlung du chags pa ste ye shes rdo rje ho'am dpag bsam gyi shing bri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-3: snying po'i padma la dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-4: da ni 'phang ma gnyis pa la dgod pa gsungs
T02D1347-2:129b-5: pa 'dir 'phar ma gnyis pa la shar la sogs
T02D1347-2:129b-6: pa'i le tshe'i gnas brgyad po rnams su ste /
T02D1347-2:129b-7: shar gyi lha'i padma'i gnas kyi byang dang lho ru hi h'i 'am bum pa gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:129b-8: lho'i lha'i shar dang nub tu hri hr'i 'am bum pa dag go //
T02D1347-2:129b-9: nub kyi lha'i lho dang byang du hli hl'i 'am bum pa dag go //
T02D1347-2:129b-10: byang gi lha'i nub dang shar du hu h'u'am bum pa dag go //
T02D1347-2:129b-11: ham ha: ni shar dang nub kyi sgor 'byung ba la ste /
T02D1347-2:129b-12: khro bo'i steng du steng 'og dag pas so //
T02D1347-2:129b-13: hi yig la sogs bcu ru 'gyur te zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-2:129b-14: bum pa'i sa bon dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-15: de nas lha'i sa bon dgod pa ste /
T02D1347-2:129b-16: 'dir shar gyi chu skyes steng du nyi ma'i gdan la 'du byed kyi ai yig gam ral gri'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-17: rtse mo can du padma la gnas te /
T02D1347-2:129b-18: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa rlung gi khams kyi a'i yig ring po'am ral gri'am /
T02D1347-2:129b-20: de bzhin du gshin rjer tshor ba'i ri yig gam rin po che'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-21: bden bral du zla ba la me'i khams kyi r'i'am padma dmar po'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-22: de bzhin du nor sbyin du 'du shes kyi au yig gam padma dkar po'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-23: dbang ldan du chu'i khams kyi a'u 'am autpala dkar po'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-24: de bzhin du chu ru yang gzugs kyi li yig gam 'khor lo'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-25: rlung gi zur du sa'i khams kyi l'i 'am 'khor lo'o zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-2:129b-26: phung po dang khams dgod pa ste /
T02D1347-2:129b-27: nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa dag gcig
T02D1347-2:129b-28: pa nyid kyis mtshan ma ni lte ba la rdo
T02D1347-2:129b-29: rje'o // shar dang mer nag po dang lho dang
T02D1347-2:129b-30: lha min du dmar po dang byang dang dbang ldan
T02D1347-2:129b-32: nub dang rlung du ser po ste /
T02D1347-2:129b-33: rgyal ba'i zhal gyi dbye ba dag gis dgod par bya zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:129b-34: da ni 'phar ma gsum pa la dbang po drug dang /
T02D1347-2:129b-35: yul drug rnam par dag pa lha dang lha mo rnams kyi sa bon gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:130a-0: 'dir shar gyi sgo'i lhor padma'i steng @130a * //
T02D1347-2:130a-1: du gnas pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la sna'i ae yig go //
T02D1347-2:130a-2: me yi padma la gnas te me'i zur du zla
T02D1347-2:130a-3: ba'i dkyil 'khor la reg bya rdo rje ma'i aee
T02D1347-2:130a-4: yig go // de bzhin du lho'i sgo'i nub tu mig gi aar yig go //
T02D1347-2:130a-5: de bzhin du bden bral du ro rdo rje ma'i aar yig go zhes pa ste zung ngo //
T02D1347-2:130a-6: de bzhin du nub tu lus kyi dbang po'i aa la yig dang /
T02D1347-2:130a-7: rlung du dri rdo rje ma'i a'a la yig dang
T02D1347-2:130a-8: gnod sbyin du lce'i ao dang drag por gzugs rdo
T02D1347-2:130a-9: rje ma'i aoo'o // lha chu gshin rje'i gnod sbyin
T02D1347-2:130a-10: dang bcas sgo yi g-yon du ni zhes pa la
T02D1347-2:130a-11: rje ma'i aoo'o // / 'dir shar gyi sgo'i byang
T02D1347-2:130a-12: du nyi ma'i steng du yid kyi dbang po'i aam
T02D1347-2:130a-13: rje ma'i aoo'o // / ngo // chu'i sgo'i lhor
T02D1347-2:130a-14: zla ba la chos kyi khams kyi a'a yig go
T02D1347-2:130a-15: rje ma'i aoo'o // / ngo // // gshin rje
T02D1347-2:130a-16: zhes pa lho'i sgo'i shar du nyi ma la rna
T02D1347-2:130a-17: ba'i dbang po'i aa yig go //
T02D1347-2:130a-18: thams cad du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal bzhi'i dbye bas g-yon du'o //
T02D1347-2:130a-19: gnod sbyin du byang gi sgo'i nub tu sgra rdo rje ma'i a'a: yig go //
T02D1347-2:130a-20: skye mched bcu gnyis kyis bon dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130a-21: da ni sgo skyong gi sa bon dgod pa gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:130a-22: rim pa yis ni slar yang ya wa la lha sogs sgo yi padma la ste /
T02D1347-2:130a-23: 'dir shar gyi sgor nyi ma'am zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:130a-24: la ngag gi dbang po'i ya yig dang lhor nyi
T02D1347-2:130a-25: ma la lag pa'i dbang po'i ra yig dang byang
T02D1347-2:130a-26: du rkang pa'i dbang po'i wa yig dang /
T02D1347-2:130a-27: nub tu bshang lam gyi dbang po'i la yig go zhes pa ste dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130a-28: da ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan gyi nges pa gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:130a-29: 'dir shar gyi sgo dang byang gi sgor ni ri
T02D1347-2:130a-30: bong 'dzin pa dag kyang khro bo dag gi gdan
T02D1347-2:130a-32: zhes pa ni kyang yig gis yang na nyi ma'o //
T02D1347-2:130a-33: lho dang nub tu yang nyi mar 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:130a-34: shes rab dang thabs kyi yan lag gi dbye bas so //
T02D1347-2:130a-35: yang na rang rang gi padma rnams la thabs kyi
T02D1347-2:130a-36: gdan nyi ma dang shes rab kyi gdan zla ba'o
T02D1347-2:130a-37: / de nas shar dang me'i lha rnams kyi ral gri dang /
T02D1347-2:130a-38: lho dang bden bral gyi rnams kyi rin po che
T02D1347-2:130a-39: dang byang dang dbang ldan gyi rnams kyi padma dang
T02D1347-2:130a-40: nub dang rlung gi rnams kyi 'khor lo dang /
T02D1347-2:130a-41: steng dang 'og gi lha rnams kyi rdo rje'o //
T02D1347-2:130a-42: yang na yul gyi dbye bas te /
T02D1347-2:130b-0: sgra'i rgyud mangs dang reg @130b bya'i gos dang gzugs kyi me long dang ro'i snod dang /
T02D1347-2:130b-1: ri'i dung dang chos kyi khams kyi chos 'byung ngo //
T02D1347-2:130b-2: de bzhin du ngag gi dbang po'i ral gri dang lag pa'i dbang po'i dbyug pa dang /
T02D1347-2:130b-3: rkang pa'i dbang po'i padma dang bshang lam gyi dbang po'i thob ste /
T02D1347-2:130b-4: snying po'i dkyil 'khor la mtshan ma dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-5: da ni thig le'i rnam pa dag gis zhes pa
T02D1347-2:130b-6: la sogs pas padma'i sa bon rnams gsungs pa 'dir
T02D1347-2:130b-7: padma nyi shu rtsa bzhi po rnams kyi rtsa ba
T02D1347-2:130b-8: la sogs pa rnams la ka la sogs pa'i sde
T02D1347-2:130b-9: pa'i yi ge rnams thig le la sogs pas phye
T02D1347-2:130b-10: ba ni aam aa:aa a'a zhes pa 'di dag gis
T02D1347-2:130b-11: phye ba lha'i rigs kyi dbang gis sbyin par bya
T02D1347-2:130b-12: ste / rna ba'i padma'i rtsa ba la kam sdong
T02D1347-2:130b-13: bu la kham 'dab ma la gam ge sar la
T02D1347-2:130b-14: gham lte ba la ngam zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-15: chos kyi khams kyi k'a kh'a g'a gh'a d'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-16: yid kyi dbang po'i sam nytham sham thgam zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-18: yi ge lnga po 'di rnams yongs su gyur pa las padma'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-19: 'du byed kyi padma la tsa tsha dza dzha nya zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-20: de bzhin du sna'i tsam tsham dzam dznyam nyam zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-21: de bzhin du rlung gi khams kyi ts'a tsh'a dz'a dzh'a ny'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-23: tshor ba'i ta tha da dha na zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-24: mig gi tam tham dam dham nam zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-25: me'i khams kyi t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-26: ro rdo rje ma'i ta:tha:da:na:zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-27: 'du shes kyi pa pha ba bha ma zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-28: lce'i pam pham bam bham mam zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-29: chu'i khams kyi p'a ph'a b'a bh'a m'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-30: gzugs rdo rje ma'i pa:pha:ba:bha:ma:zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-31: gzugs kyi ta tha da dha na zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-32: lus kyi dbang po'i tam tham dam dham nam zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-33: sa'i khams kyi t'a th'a d'a dh'a n'a zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-35: de bzhin du tsa tsha dza dzha nya ngag gi dbang po dang /
T02D1347-2:130b-36: ta tha da dha na lag pa'i dbang po dang /
T02D1347-2:130b-37: pa pha ba bha ma rkang pa'i dbang po dang /
T02D1347-2:130b-38: ta tha da dha na bshang lam gyi dbang po'i padma la rnam par shes par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-39: padma'i sa bon dgod pa ste /
T02D1347-2:130b-40: thung du ring po rang gi sa la'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:130b-41: de bzhin du thig le'am aa yig gam /
T02D1347-2:131a-2: rnam par bcad pa'am ra yig gam ksha yig gis nyi ma'i gdan rnams te lte ba'i steng du'o //
T02D1347-2:131a-3: bdag po'i padma la s'om nyp'om sh'om sh'om thk'om zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:131a-4: lte ba'i steng du aom a'a:aa ste zla ba dang nyi ma dang sgra gcan gyi gdan rnams so //
T02D1347-2:131a-6: da ni sde drug ces pa la sogs pas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi sa bon gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:131a-7: 'dir thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi shar gyi stegs bu
T02D1347-2:131a-8: la rta babs kyi ka ba'i byang du dri ma'i
T02D1347-2:131a-9: tstshdzdzhnya dang lhor phreng ba ma'i tstshdzdzhny'a'o //
T02D1347-2:131a-10: de bzhin du lhor spos ma'i tthddhna dang mar me ma'i tthddhn'a'o //
T02D1347-2:131a-11: nub tu sgeg mo'i tthddhna dang bzhad ma'i tthddhn'a'o //
T02D1347-2:131a-12: byang du bdud rtsi ma'i pphbbhma dang 'bras bu ma nyams ma'i pphbbhm'a'o //
T02D1347-2:131a-13: shar gyi sgo'i rta babs kyi steng du gar ma'i
T02D1347-2:131a-14: kkhgghnga dang nub kyi sgo'i rta babs kyi steng du
T02D1347-2:131a-16: byang gi sgo'i rta babs kyi steng du glu ma'i
T02D1347-2:131a-17: swpshshthka dang lho'i sgo'i rta babs kyi steng du 'dod
T02D1347-2:131a-18: ma'i snypshshthk'a'o // yang na mtshan ma rnams te /
T02D1347-2:131a-20: spos snod dang mar me dang dbu rgyan dang do
T02D1347-2:131a-21: shal dang 'bras bu dang snod dang gos dang rda
T02D1347-2:131a-22: dang rdo rje dang padma rnams shar gyi cha la
T02D1347-2:131a-23: sogs par sbyar bar bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:131a-24: // da ni phyi rol du zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:131a-25: pas 'dod ma sum cu rtsa drug rnams kyi sa
T02D1347-2:131a-26: bon gsungs pa 'dir phyi rol du gsung gi dkyil
T02D1347-2:131a-27: 'khor gyi stegs bu la ste shar gyi sgo'i lho'i
T02D1347-2:131a-28: // stegs bu la tsa:tsha:dza:dzha:nya:/ lho ru ta:tha:da:dha:na:/
T02D1347-2:131a-31: shar gyi sgo'i byang du sa: wa: sha: sha: thka:/
T02D1347-2:131a-32: byang gi sgo'i nub tu la:wa:ra:ya:ha:/
T02D1347-2:131a-33: lho'i sgo'i shar gyi stegs bu la ka:kha:ga: gha:nga:/
T02D1347-2:131a-34: nub kyi sgo'i lhor ksha:zhes pa ste gsung gi dkyil 'khor la'o //
T02D1347-2:131a-35: sku'i dkyil 'khor la yi ge 'di rnams thig le
T02D1347-2:131a-36: dang bcas pa ste tsa yig la sogs pa'i yi
T02D1347-2:131a-37: ge rnams kyis phyir 'dod ma rnams kyi sa bon
T02D1347-2:131a-38: nam mtshan ma'am gzugs bri bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:131b-0: snying @131b po'i stegs bu la mchod pa'i lha mo
T02D1347-2:131b-1: du ma ste gzungs ma mtha' dag bri bar bya'o
T02D1347-2:131b-2: // gzungs ma dang 'dod ma'i sa bon dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:131b-3: de ltar 'dod ma thams cad kun nas rang rig
T02D1347-2:131b-4: phyogs su gnas te rgyal ba rnams kyi kha dog
T02D1347-2:131b-5: dbye bas kha dog rig par bya ste kha dog
T02D1347-2:131b-6: lnga'i rdul tshon gyis zhes pa ni thams cad du
T02D1347-2:131b-7: des pa'o // da ni thung zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:131b-8: pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor la tsartsi k'a la sogs
T02D1347-2:131b-9: pa rnams kyi sa bon gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:131b-10: 'dir 'chad par 'gyur pa'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u las
