T02D1347-2:134b-24: lo'i h'um ngo // lhor bum pa bzang po'i a'a:'o //
T02D1347-2:134b-25: byang du rda bo che'i aom mo //
T02D1347-2:134b-26: nub tu byang chub shing gi ho'o //
T02D1347-2:134b-27: zhes pa de ltar dbyangs ldan rnams ni rigs kyi
T02D1347-2:134b-28: dbang gis dkyil 'khor dag la sngags kyi dbye par
T02D1347-2:134b-29: 'gyur // phyag rgya mtshan ma rnams kyi kha dog
T02D1347-2:134b-30: mtha' dag rdo rje can gyi zhal gyi dbye ba
T02D1347-2:134b-31: 'gyur // dag gis 'gyur // thab tu sbyin sreg
T02D1347-2:134b-32: dag kyang de bzhin nyid du 'gyur te slar yang
T02D1347-2:134b-33: 'jug dogs pa rnams spyan drangs dang /
T02D1347-2:134b-34: dpal ldan sa la bsang ba dang ni mchod yon
T02D1347-2:134b-35: cho ga de bzhin bdud ni gzhom pa dag kyang
T02D1347-2:134b-36: ngo // zhes pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'dir yang
T02D1347-2:134b-37: dag par bsdus pa thams cad 'chad par 'gyur pa'i
T02D1347-2:134b-38: rim pas rig par bya'o zhes pa ni thams cad
T02D1347-2:134b-39: ngo // du nges pa'o // da ni sgo zhes
T02D1347-2:134b-40: pa la sogs pas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bsrung ba'i
T02D1347-2:134b-41: slad du slob ma rnams gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:134b-42: 'dir shar la sogs pa'i sgo rnams bsrung ba'i don
T02D1347-2:135a-0: du brtul zhugs nges pa dang ldan zhes pa @135a
T02D1347-2:135a-1: * // la brtul zhugs ni 'chad par 'gyur pa nyi shu rtsa lnga po rnams so //
T02D1347-2:135a-2: de rnams la nges pa ni sangs rgyas kyis rjes
T02D1347-2:135a-3: su gnang ba ste de dang ldan pa ni brtul
T02D1347-2:135a-4: zhugs nges pa dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:135a-5: dag pa'i slob ma ni rtsa ba'i ltung ba bcu
T02D1347-2:135a-6: pa bzhi dang bral ba ste lag na rdo rje
T02D1347-2:135a-7: dang rdo rje dril bu thogs pa mngon par dbang
T02D1347-2:135a-8: bskur zhing rjes su gnang ba de rnams sgo rnams
T02D1347-2:135a-9: su rab tu dgod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:135a-10: dpal ldan bum pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams me dang
T02D1347-2:135a-11: lha min rlung dang dbang ldan zur du rim pas
T02D1347-2:135a-12: so // zhes pa ni sngar gyi brtul zhugs la sogs pa yongs su dag pa dgod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:135a-13: de nas rdo rje slob dpon dpal ldan tshogs kyi
T02D1347-2:135a-14: dbang por 'gyur te mi bdag las kyi rdo rje
T02D1347-2:135a-15: can ni rab byas nas zhes pa ni 'dir lnga
T02D1347-2:135a-16: pa slob ma bzang po las thams cad la mkhas
T02D1347-2:135a-17: shing de nyid bcu yongs su shes pa de sbyin
T02D1347-2:135a-18: sreg la sogs pa'i las kyi tshogs la las kyi
T02D1347-2:135a-19: rdo rje can du byas nas bla mas dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:135a-20: la rab tu gnas par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:135a-21: de ltar gyur pa'i slob ma med na tshogs kyi
T02D1347-2:135a-22: dbang po rang gis kyang ni sbyin sreg la sogs
T02D1347-2:135a-23: pa'i las bya ste kyang yig gis 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:135a-25: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:135a-26: rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-2:135a-27: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-2:135a-28: las dkyil 'khor bri ba zhes bya ba'i mdor bsdus
T02D1347-2:135a-31: // / phung po sogs kyi yam shing sogs //
T02D1347-2:135a-32: bsregs pa thams cad gsol ba gang //
T02D1347-2:135a-33: ye shes me de la btud nas //
T02D1347-2:135a-34: de yi thab kyi mtshan nyid bshad //
T02D1347-2:135a-35: zhi ba la sogs rab dbye las //
T02D1347-2:135a-36: so so'i phyogs kyi cha yis ni //
T02D1347-2:135a-37: thab khung rnam brgyad rab gsungs dang //
T02D1347-2:135a-38: dgu pa las ni thams cad pa //
T02D1347-2:135a-39: 'dzam [*'jam?] pa'i rdo rjes rtsa rgyud las //
T02D1347-2:135a-40: phyung ste mdor bsdus bstan pa gang //
T02D1347-2:135a-41: de rnams rtsa rgyud rjes su ni //
T02D1347-2:135a-42: 'jug pas rnam par rgyas par bya //
T02D1347-2:135a-43: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa bdun cu rtsa gcig pa
T02D1347-2:135a-44: la sogs pas gsungs pa las thams cad pa la
T02D1347-2:135b-0: sogs pa'i thab rnams kyi mtshan nyid @135b zlum po
T02D1347-2:135b-1: 'am zhes pa la sogs pas gsungs te 'dir thams
T02D1347-2:135b-2: cad du khru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor la las thams
T02D1347-2:135b-3: cad pa'i thab ni zhi ba la zlum po dkyil
T02D1347-2:135b-5: rgyas pa la gru bzhi dkyil 'khor dang mnyam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:135b-6: de la re zhig rigs kyi dbang gis ye shes
T02D1347-2:135b-7: kyi 'khor lo ni thams cad du snying por te
T02D1347-2:135b-8: rdo rje phreng ba dang ka ba'i mthar dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:135b-9: las phyed kyi char 'gyur te phyi rol 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:135b-10: phyed kyi tshad kyis zhes pa'i nges pa las so
T02D1347-2:135b-11: // de'i phyed kyis rtsa ba'i padma ste de'i phyir snying po'i padma'i nyis 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:135b-12: rgyas pa la khru gnyis pa gru bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:135b-13: zlum po dang snying po'i padma'i tshad ni khru gcig go //
T02D1347-2:135b-14: thams cad du grong la sogs pa'i dbus su bsod nams kyi don du'o //
T02D1347-2:135b-15: yang na las kyi rjes su mthun pas byang dang
T02D1347-2:135b-16: drag po'i zur 'am gzhan yang dkar po'i sa la
T02D1347-2:135b-17: rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyi
T02D1347-2:135b-18: rol khru gnyis kyi bar du'o //
T02D1347-2:135b-19: de la thab gru bzhi ni khru gnyis pa ste
T02D1347-2:135b-20: rgyar phyi rol gyi 'khor lo'i phyed kyi tshad kyis
T02D1347-2:135b-21: so // zabs ni padma'i tshad ces pa ni 'dir
T02D1347-2:135b-22: rgyas pa'i thab la zabs ni padma'i tshad de mtho
T02D1347-2:135b-23: gnyis su 'gyur zhing zlum po la mtho'i tshad du
T02D1347-2:135b-24: so // 'gyur ro // de'i nang du snying por
T02D1347-2:135b-25: padma ste khru bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor la ji lta
T02D1347-2:135b-26: ba de bzhin du thab gru bzhi dang khru gnyis
T02D1347-2:135b-27: pa'i dkyil 'khor la ji lta ba de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:135b-28: thab zlum po'i snying po la mtshan ma dang bcas
T02D1347-2:135b-30: ltar na dkyil 'khor la padma phyed dang padma'i phyi
T02D1347-2:135b-31: ru phyogs dang phyogs bral rnams su bum pa dang
T02D1347-2:135b-32: bcas ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshan ma ji lta
T02D1347-2:135b-33: ba de bzhin du thab khung gi snying por rtsa
T02D1347-2:135b-34: ba'i padma la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1347-2:135b-35: rdul tshon dkar po la sogs pa'am 'jim pas te
T02D1347-2:135b-36: thab khung thams cad la phyi nas las kyi rjes
T02D1347-2:135b-37: su mthun pas kha dog bya ba ni rgyas pa'i
T02D1347-2:135b-38: dkyil 'khor la 'bras btags pa la sogs pas so
T02D1347-2:135b-39: // mtshan ma rnams ni dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan ma ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:135b-40: de ltar thab khung gi gzhi la tshangs ba'i gnas
T02D1347-2:135b-41: nas thad ka'i cha khru gcig ste gru bzhi'i phyed
T02D1347-2:136a-1: bzhin du thab kyi rtsig pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:136a-2: de ltar cha gnyis dang gnyis ni shar dang nub
T02D1347-2:136a-3: dag dang de bzhin du lho dang byang la yang
T02D1347-2:136a-4: ngo // de ltar na thab khru bzhi ni ra
T02D1347-2:136a-5: ba'i mtshams su ste mig la sogs pa'i gnas kyi
T02D1347-2:136a-6: mthar thug par ro zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:136a-7: khru bzhi pa ni gru bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:136a-8: de'i phyed ni zlum po ste khru gnyis pa'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:136a-9: de yi phyed kyis kyang ni mchu ste zhes pa
T02D1347-2:136a-10: ni padma'i phyed de de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas de'i
T02D1347-2:136a-11: phyed kyis thad ka dang dpangs su ster ba'i tshad
T02D1347-2:136a-12: kyi thad ka'i cha yis nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:136a-13: tshad de nyid kyis dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu'i phyed ji srid pa'o //
T02D1347-2:136a-14: de'i steng du de'i phyed kyis 'byung ba dang dpangs
T02D1347-2:136a-15: te mchu'i phyi rol gyi steng du re kh'a'i dkyil
T02D1347-2:136a-16: 'khor ro // de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi stegs bu'i mthar yongs su dag pa'o //
T02D1347-2:136a-17: de las nyis 'gyur dag kyang kha khyer dag gi
T02D1347-2:136a-18: rgya yi cha zhes pa ni snying po'i mchu'i tshad
T02D1347-2:136a-19: de las nyis 'gyur thad ka'i char bkyed pa ni
T02D1347-2:136a-20: kha khyer te de bzhin du rin po che'i snam
T02D1347-2:136a-21: bu dang do shal dang do shal phyed pa'i sa
T02D1347-2:136a-22: dang ba ku l'i'i mthar thug par thams cad du
T02D1347-2:136a-23: kha khyer bya'o // de nas bku l'i dang kra
T02D1347-2:136a-24: ma sh'irsha'i cha tshad phyed thang ka'i char bkyed pa'o
T02D1347-2:136a-25: kha khyer bya'o // // kha khyer gyi steng gi
T02D1347-2:136a-26: dbus kyi cha de la kha khyer cha lngar byas
T02D1347-2:136a-27: nas dbus kyi cha gsum gyi kha khyer gyi steng
T02D1347-2:136a-28: du rdo rje phreng ba ste las thams cad pa'i
T02D1347-2:136a-29: kha khyer bya'o // // thab la'o // mchu'i tshad
T02D1347-2:136a-30: phyed kyis dpangs te gang gi tshe 'jim pa'i rang
T02D1347-2:136a-31: bzhin yin pa de'i tshe dbus ma'i rva ni mchu'i
T02D1347-2:136a-33: gang gi tshe rdul tshon gyis yin pa de'i tshe dpangs nges pa med do //
T02D1347-2:136a-34: phyi rol 'og tu ste 'og tu rtse mo yod
T02D1347-2:136a-35: pa'i 'dab ma rnams sa'i mthar thug par kha khyer
T02D1347-2:136a-36: gyi phyed kyi tshad kyis bya'o //
T02D1347-2:136a-37: de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs rnams kun dus la ku sha dgod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:136a-38: ku sha bkram pa de yi phyi rol du ri
T02D1347-2:136a-39: mo gsum dang nub kyi phyogs kyi char nges par
T02D1347-2:136a-40: sgo gcig tu ni rab tu 'gyur zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:136a-41: 'dir thab kyi phyi rol du khru gnyis dor nas
T02D1347-2:136a-42: phyi rol tu dkar po dang dmar po dang nag
T02D1347-2:136a-43: po'i rdul tshon gyis rab gsum bya ste de nas
T02D1347-2:136b-0: nub tu @136b rab ring ba'i tshad kyi brgyad cha'i
T02D1347-2:136b-1: sgo ni dkyil 'khor gyi sgo bzhin du rta babs
T02D1347-2:136b-2: dang bcas pa'o // de ltar thab che ba dang
T02D1347-2:136b-3: chung ba thams cad la khru gnyis dor nas rab
T02D1347-2:136b-5: slob dpon dag gi gdan ni nges par mnyam pa
T02D1347-2:136b-6: gru bzhir 'gyur te thab kyi snying po'i padma dag
T02D1347-2:136b-7: las nyis 'gyur ro zhes pa ni khru gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:136b-8: grub zhi'o // de bzhin du thab thams cad la khru gang gi khyon no //
T02D1347-2:136b-9: de bzhin du g-yon du mchod yon gyi gdan khru gang du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:136b-10: de bzhin du g-yas su sbyin sreg snod dag gi
T02D1347-2:136b-11: gdan yang khru gang ste rgyas pa la khru gnyis
T02D1347-2:136b-12: so ; ; gdan rnams kun la dbus su padma'i 'dab ma rnams bkod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:136b-13: gdan gyi dbus su sna tshogs rdo rje'i mtshan ma
T02D1347-2:136b-14: dgod par bya ste rgyal ba'i bdag po rdo rje
T02D1347-2:136b-15: sems dpa'i'o // yang na mkha' yi padma yum gyi'o
T02D1347-2:136b-16: zhes pa chos 'byung dgod par bya ste las thams
T02D1347-2:136b-17: sems dpa'i'o // cad pa la'o // 'bru la sogs
T02D1347-2:136b-18: pa rnams bsreg pa'i don du zhal thab khung ngo
T02D1347-2:136b-19: sems dpa'i'o // cad pa la'o // // mar la
T02D1347-2:136b-20: sogs pa bdud rtsi'i sreg blugs sbyin pa'i slad du
T02D1347-2:136b-22: de ltar phyi dang lus la thab khung rnam pa
T02D1347-2:136b-23: gnyis su 'gyur te rgyal po zhes pa ni bod
T02D1347-2:136b-24: pa'o // de ltar na las thams cad pa'i thab kyi mtshan nyid nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:136b-25: da ni sngar mdor bstan pa'i zhi ba la sogs
T02D1347-2:136b-26: pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid rgyas par bshad par bya
T02D1347-2:136b-27: ste 'dir zlum po'i thab khru'i tshad la snying po'i
T02D1347-2:136b-28: padma dkar po khru'i tshad de lte ba la padma
T02D1347-2:136b-29: dang 'dab ma rnams la rdo rje la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:136b-30: mtshan ma'o // padma'i phyed kyis zabs so //
T02D1347-2:136b-31: padma'i bcu gnyis cha ni mchu'i thad kar zhal bkyed pa ste steng du de'i phyed kyis so //
T02D1347-2:136b-32: thad kar 'byung ba'i kha khyer gyi dpangs la yang ste padma'i drug cha ni kha khyer ro //
T02D1347-2:136b-33: kha khyer cha lnga rnams las mdun dang rgyab kyi
T02D1347-2:136b-34: cha gnyis dor nas cha gsum gyis padma'i phreng ba'o
T02D1347-2:136b-35: // kha khyer gyi 'og gi phyi rol du padma'i
T02D1347-2:136b-36: 'dab ma rnams dang d'u ra ba dgram par bya
T02D1347-2:136b-37: ste ra ba gsum dang sgo dang rta babs ni
T02D1347-2:136b-39: slob dpon gyi gdan te mchod yon gyi gdan dang
T02D1347-2:136b-40: sbyin sreg gi gdan ni slob dpon gyi gdan gyi
T02D1347-2:137a-1: rgyas pa la padma khru gnyis pa ste thams cad
T02D1347-2:137a-2: du mchu la sogs pa ni bcu gnyis la sogs
T02D1347-2:137a-3: pa'i cha'o // lte ba la 'khor lo dang 'dab ma la rdo rje la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-4: zur du spyan ma la sogs pa'i mtshan ma'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-5: kha khyer la 'khor lo'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-6: lhag ma ni sngar gyi las bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:137a-7: de bzhin du gzhu'i rnam pa ni zhi ba'i thab
T02D1347-2:137a-8: dbus nas bcad pa ste dbus su padma sor bcu
T02D1347-2:137a-9: gnyis pa'o // de'i phyed kyis zabs so //
T02D1347-2:137a-10: mchu la sogs pa thams cad sngar bzhin du bcu gnyis la sogs pa'i cha'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-11: padma'i 'dab ma'i gnas su mtshan ma ni lag mthil gyi sor mo'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-12: 'og gi phyi rol du ro'i skras spras pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-13: lte ba la gri gug dang kha khyer gyi steng du gri gug gi phreng ba'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-14: slob dpon gyi gdan ni gzhu'i rnam pa gri gug
T02D1347-2:137a-15: gis mtshan pa ste zhi ba la padmas mtshan pa
T02D1347-2:137a-16: dang rgyas pa la 'khor los mtshan pa ji lta
T02D1347-2:137a-17: ba bzhin no // zur lnga pa ni zhi ba'i
T02D1347-2:137a-18: thab kyi tshad de zur lnga'i steng du kha khyer
T02D1347-2:137a-19: la ral gri'i phreng ba dang snying po'i mtshan ma
T02D1347-2:137a-20: ba bzhin no // yang ral gri'o // phyi rol
T02D1347-2:137a-21: gyi 'og tu bya rog gi mjug ma'i phreng ba
T02D1347-2:137a-22: sa'i rang bzhin kha dog nag po bya ste phyi
T02D1347-2:137a-23: rol du 'byung po'i shing gi 'dab ma dgod do
T02D1347-2:137a-24: ba bzhin no // yang ral gri'o // // zur
T02D1347-2:137a-25: gsum pa ni rna ba nas rna bar khru gang
T02D1347-2:137a-26: dang rna ba nas dbus ma'i char sor mo nyi
T02D1347-2:137a-28: tshad de nyid kyis padma'i phyed sor mo bcu ni zabs so //
T02D1347-2:137a-29: lhag ma mchu la sogs pa ni bcu gnyis kyi cha la sogs pas snga ma bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:137a-30: kha khyer la mda'i phreng ba dang 'og tu padma dmar po rnams so //
T02D1347-2:137a-31: phyi rol du me tog dmar pos spras pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-32: zur bdun pa ni 'di'i nyis 'gyur te kha khyer la rdo rje lcags khyu'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-33: lhag ma ni zur gsum pa bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:137a-34: snying po'i mtshan ma ni zur gsum pa la mda' ste dgug pa la rdo rje lcags kyu'o //
T02D1347-2:137a-35: zur drug pa ni sor sum cu ste zur drug
T02D1347-2:137a-36: pa'i steng du kha khyer la spral gyi zhags pa'i
T02D1347-2:137a-37: phreng ba'o // snying po'i mtshan ma ni sbrul gyi zhags pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-0: aarka ser po'i 'dab ma rnams dang phyi rol du me tog ser pos spras @137b pa'o ;
T02D1347-2:137b-1: / zur brgyad pa ni snga ma nyis 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:137b-2: snying po'i mtshan ma ni rdo rje lcags sgrog go
T02D1347-2:137b-3: // kha khyer la rdo rje lcags sgrog gi phreng ba'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-4: 'og tu zur drug pa bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:137b-5: rab gsum ni thams cad du khru gnyis dor nas so //
T02D1347-2:137b-6: slob dpon gyi gdan dang mchod yon gyi gdan dang
T02D1347-2:137b-7: spyin sreg gi gdan ni thams cad du thab kyi
T02D1347-2:137b-8: rnam pas so // thab rnams kyi rna ba nas rna ba'i tshad kyis thad ka'i cha nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-9: da ni thab rnams kyi rang bzhin brjod par bya
T02D1347-2:137b-10: ste 'dir zhi ba'i thab ni zla ba'i rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:137b-11: nyi ma'i mtshan mas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-12: rgyas pa'i thab ni nyi ma'i chos can nyis 'gyur
T02D1347-2:137b-13: nyid kyi phyir zla ba nyis 'gyur te zla bas
T02D1347-2:137b-14: mchan pa'o // gsad pa'i thab ni sgra gcan gyi mtshan nyid de dus me'i mtshan mas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-15: bskrad pa'i thab ni rlung gi mtshan nyid me'i rang
T02D1347-2:137b-16: bzhin dang 'dres pa ste rang gi mtshan mas mtshan
T02D1347-2:137b-17: pa'o // zur gsum pa'i thab ni dus me'i mtshan nyid de rang gi mtshan mas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-18: dgug pa'i thab ni sa dang me'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid de lcags kyu'i mtshan mas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-19: zur drug pa ni sgra gcan dang sa'i bdag nyid de sprul gyi mtshan mas mtshan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-20: rmongs pa la sgra gcan gyi'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-21: rengs pa'i thab ni lhun po dang sa gnyi ga
T02D1347-2:137b-22: kha sbyar ba gnyi ga'i mtshan mas mtshan pa'o zhes
T02D1347-2:137b-23: pa ni thab kyi mtshan nyid nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:137b-24: sngar gsungs pa'i 'dug stangs dang sbyin sreg gi rdzas
T02D1347-2:137b-25: la sogs pa'i nges pa sngags pas rig par bya'o
T02D1347-2:137b-26: zhes pa ni rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
T02D1347-2:137b-27: la sogs pa thams cad la bcom ldan 'das kyi
T02D1347-2:137b-28: nges pa'o // da ni thab ces pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:137b-29: pas sbyin sreg gi chog gsungs pa 'dir dang por
T02D1347-2:137b-30: thab kyi phyogs bcu rnams su khro bo'i rgyal po
T02D1347-2:137b-31: lha mor bcas pas zhes pa khro bo rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:137b-32: lha mo rnams dang thabs cig tu bsrung ba byas
T02D1347-2:137b-33: nas sngar brjod pa'i sngags kyi tshig rnams kyis phur
T02D1347-2:137b-34: pa btab ste de nas dpal ldan rdo rje rnams
T02D1347-2:137b-35: kyis bsang ba sogs dang aom a'a:hum hri:phat ces pa
T02D1347-2:137b-36: 'dis thab kyi phyogs bcu rnams su ku shas mchod
T02D1347-2:137b-37: yon gyi snod nas dri'i chu blangs te dang por
T02D1347-2:138a-1: de nas de'i rnal 'byor dmigs par bya ste rang
T02D1347-2:138a-2: gi snying kha dang thab tu me lta rab tu
T02D1347-2:138a-3: bzhag cing de nas chur bcas me tog rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:138a-5: de yi rnal 'byor ldan pas sbyin par bya ste
T02D1347-2:138a-6: rang snying padmar zla ba'i steng du bsgoms nas so
T02D1347-2:138a-7: // las thams cad pa la zhal gcig pa kha dog ljang gu phyag bzhi pa zhabs gnyis pa'o //
T02D1347-2:138a-8: 'dir las thams cad ba la g-yas pa'i phyag dang
T02D1347-2:138a-9: po na rdo rje dang gnyis pa na bgrang phreng
T02D1347-2:138a-10: ngo // g-yon na dril bu dang padma'o //
T02D1347-2:138a-11: ral pa shin tu ser skya dang mig dmar ser
T02D1347-2:138a-12: dang gos dmar ser te las thams cad pa la
T02D1347-2:138a-13: mi bskyod pa spyi bor 'dzin pa'o //
T02D1347-2:138a-14: dam tshig sems dpa' rdzogs par byas te de nas de'i snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:138a-15: de'i steng du dza:yig gi sa bon yongs su gyur
T02D1347-2:138a-16: pa las rdo rje lcags kyu dri med 'phro byed
T02D1347-2:138a-17: bsgom par bya'o // de yis kun 'gro ye shes
T02D1347-2:138a-18: sems dpa' bkug nas dam tshig sems dpa' dang lhan
T02D1347-2:138a-19: cig ro mnyam par mdzod cig / de ltar thab
T02D1347-2:138a-20: la yang ni yang dag 'gyur te rang gi snying
T02D1347-2:138a-21: kha las phyir 'byung ba'i dbugs dang 'chad par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:138a-22: pa'i rdo rje lcags khyu'i phyag rgyas spyan drang pa
T02D1347-2:138a-23: byas nas rdo rje khu tshur steng du mthe bos
T02D1347-2:138a-24: padma'i lte ba la gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:138a-25: zhi ba la kha dog dkar po gos dang bcas
T02D1347-2:138a-26: pa snang ba mtha' yas kyis dbu brgyan pa te
T02D1347-2:138a-27: g-yas pa na padma dang shel gyi bgrang phreng 'dzin
T02D1347-2:138a-28: zhing g-yon pa na ril ba dang dung 'dzin pa'o
T02D1347-2:138a-29: // rgyas pa la g-yas na 'khor lo dang mu
T02D1347-2:138a-30: tig gi bgrang 'phreng 'dzin zhing g-yon na padma dang
T02D1347-2:138a-32: gsad pa la kha dog nag po gos dang bcas
T02D1347-2:138a-33: pa don yod grub pas dbu brgyan pa ste phyag
T02D1347-2:138a-34: g-yas pa na gri gug dang rtse gsum pa phyag
T02D1347-2:138a-35: g-yon pa na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
T02D1347-2:138a-36: bskrad pa dang dbye ba la yang phyag g-yas pa
T02D1347-2:138a-37: na ral gri dang rtse gsum pa dang phyag g-yon
T02D1347-2:138a-38: pa na thod pa dang kha tv'am ga'o //
T02D1347-2:138a-39: dbang la gur gum gyi mdog can gos dang bcas
T02D1347-2:138a-40: pa phyag g-yas pa na mda' dang rin po che
T02D1347-2:138a-41: dang phyag g-yon pa na gzhu dang me long ste
T02D1347-2:138b-0: rin chen dbang phyug gis dbu @138b brgyan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:138b-1: dgug pa la g-yas na rdo rje lcags kyu dang
T02D1347-2:138b-2: rin po che 'dzin zhing g-yon na rdo rje zhags
T02D1347-2:138b-4: rmongs pa la g-yas na sprul dang dbyug pa 'dzin
T02D1347-2:138b-5: zhing phyag g-yon pa na 'khor lo dang tho ba'o
T02D1347-2:138b-6: // rengs pa dang phur bus gdab pa la g-yas
T02D1347-2:138b-7: na lcags sgrog dang thob 'dzin zhing phyag g-yon na
T02D1347-2:138b-8: 'khor lo dang rdo rje phur bu ste kha dog
T02D1347-2:138b-9: ser po gos dang bcas pa rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1347-2:138b-11: 'dir dang por las thams cad pa la lha khang
T02D1347-2:138b-12: nas me blangs nas tsandan gyi shing gis rab tu
T02D1347-2:138b-13: sbar bar bya'o ; / zhi ba dang rgyas pa la bram ze'i khyim nas so //
T02D1347-2:138b-14: gsad pa la sogs pa la dmangs rigs kyi khyim nas so //
T02D1347-2:138b-15: dbang la sogs pa la rgyal rigs kyi khyim nas so //
T02D1347-2:138b-16: rengs pa la sogs pa la rje'u rigs kyi khyim nas so //
T02D1347-2:138b-17: gsad pa la ni gdol pa'i khyim nas blangs te
T02D1347-2:138b-18: tsher ma can gyi shing gis rab tu sbar bar
T02D1347-2:138b-19: bya'o // rengs pa la bska ba'i shing gis so //
T02D1347-2:138b-20: dbang la seng ldeng la sogs pa dmar po'i shing gis so //
T02D1347-2:138b-21: zhi ba la'o ma can gyi shing gis so //
T02D1347-2:138b-22: las thams cad pa la tsandan dang aa ga ru
T02D1347-2:138b-23: dang thad shing la sogs pa dri bzang po'i shing
T02D1347-2:138b-24: rnams sam shing 'o ma can rnams kyis so //
T02D1347-2:138b-25: de nas sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis me lha
T02D1347-2:138b-26: spyan drang bar bya ste aom ae hi ae hi
T02D1347-2:138b-27: ma h'a bh'u ta de ba ri shi dvi dza
T02D1347-2:138b-28: sa ta ta ma gri h'i tv'a yu dham ma
T02D1347-2:138b-29: h'a ra smi aa smin sam ni hi to bha
T02D1347-2:138b-30: pa badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya yi sv'a
T02D1347-2:138b-31: h'a zhes pa brjod cing lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas dgug
T02D1347-2:138b-32: par bya ste rdo rje'i phyag rgyas gzhug par bya
T02D1347-2:138b-33: zhing zhags pa'i phyag rgyas bcing bar bya ste dril
T02D1347-2:138b-34: bu'i phyag rgya 'chad par 'gyur pas mnyes par bya'o
T02D1347-2:138b-35: / 'di rnams la so sor sa bon gyi yi ge dza:h'um bam ho:zhes pa brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:138b-36: de nas rdo rje dril bu dkrol nas dbang du bya'o //
T02D1347-2:138b-37: 'dir mchod yon dbul bar bya ste aom pra wa
T02D1347-2:138b-38: ra sa ta k'a ram ma h'a ra smin pra
T02D1347-2:138b-39: t'i tstsha sv'a h'a zhes pa ni mchod yon dbul
T02D1347-2:138b-40: ba'i sngags so // de nas mchod pa ni de
T02D1347-2:138b-41: bzhin du badzra gan dham pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a
T02D1347-2:138b-42: ba'i sngags so // / badzra pushpam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:138b-43: badzra dh'a pam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-0: @139a * // badzra pra d'i pam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-1: badzra aa ksha tam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-2: badzra nee be tyam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-3: badzra l'a syam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-4: badzra h'a syam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-5: badzra p'a dyam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-6: badzra nri dyam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-7: badzra g'i tam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-8: badzra k'a mam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1347-2:139a-9: de bzhin du sngar gsungs pa'i rdzas las kyi rjes
T02D1347-2:139a-10: su mthun pas me mchod pa'i yul la sngags kyi
T02D1347-2:139a-11: tshig 'di rnams sv'a h'a'i mtha' can gyis mchod par
T02D1347-2:139a-12: bya ste dkyil 'khor mchod pa la na ma:'i mtha'
T02D1347-2:139a-13: can gyis so zhes pa ni thams cad du nges
T02D1347-2:139a-14: pa'o // de bzhin du zhabs bsil thams cad rab
T02D1347-2:139a-15: tu phul te sil snyan thams cad rab tu dkrol
T02D1347-2:139a-16: pa'o // te / de nas sngar gsungs pa'i yam
T02D1347-2:139a-17: shing la sogs pa dang sngar gsungs pa'i 'dug stangs
T02D1347-2:139a-18: kyi cho ga dang sngar gsungs pa'i sbyin sreg gi
T02D1347-2:139a-19: rdzas rnams kyis las kyi rjes su mthun pas ting
T02D1347-2:139a-20: nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i rdo rje slob dpon gyis
T02D1347-2:139a-21: pa'o // te / sbyin sreg bya'o // lag pas
T02D1347-2:139a-22: yam shing bsregs te de nas blugs gzar gyis sbyin
T02D1347-2:139a-23: sreg gi rdzas thams cad dang dgang gzar gyis sreg
T02D1347-2:139a-24: blugs dbul bar bya zhing de med na rang gi
T02D1347-2:139a-25: lag pa mchog sbyin gyi mthe bong gis me'i zhal
T02D1347-2:139a-26: du thams cad sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D1347-2:139a-27: 'dir me lha'i rnam par dag pa brjod par bya
T02D1347-2:139a-28: ste 'dir me rnam pa gsum ni lho'i me dang
T02D1347-2:139a-29: khyim bdag gi me dang mchod sbyin gyi me'o //
T02D1347-2:139a-31: khyim bdag gi me ni nyi ma'o //
T02D1347-2:139a-32: mchod sbyin gyi me ni mi bzad pa'o //
T02D1347-2:139a-33: bzhi pa'i ye shes kyi me ni bden pa ste kun du dga' ba'i chos so //
T02D1347-2:139a-34: de'i phyir de'i don du thams cad nyid sbyin sreg byed do //
T02D1347-2:139a-35: de bzhin du rig byed kyi mtha' las smras pa /
T02D1347-2:139a-36: mi bzad me ni ring du bdag spong ste //
T02D1347-2:139a-37: ri ka rab 'dzin gshin rje'i rgyal srid 'gro //
T02D1347-2:139a-38: 'di nyid du ni gzhan skyes rigs byed 'di //
T02D1347-2:139a-39: lha dang skye dgu sogs las bsreg bya 'dzin //
T02D1347-2:139a-40: zhes pa rig byed kyi don de 'dir yang don de nyid mi bzad pa'i me'o ;
T02D1347-2:139a-41: / sngags kyi tshig 'dis 'dod pa'i me spyan drang bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:139a-42: aom sarba p'a pa dang ha na badzr'a ga ni
T02D1347-2:139a-43: badzra satva sarba p'a pa dang ha da ha sv'a
T02D1347-2:139a-44: h'a zhes pa'i nges pa las so //
T02D1347-2:139a-45: de bzhin du nyi ma'i yang 'dri bsreg bya 'dzin
T02D1347-2:139a-46: pa'i sngags kyi dam tshig ni aom badzra na la
T02D1347-2:139a-47: sarba bh'u t'a na dzv'a la ya sarba na bha
T02D1347-2:139b-0: sm'i ku ru sarba dz'a na @139b dushta na hum
T02D1347-2:139b-1: phat sv'a h'a zhes pa'i nges pa la nyi ma
T02D1347-2:139b-2: de nyid gza' bdun gyi bdag po rta bdun pa'i
T02D1347-2:139b-3: shing rta can gza'i dbye bas lce bdun pa ste
T02D1347-2:139b-4: zhi ba la zla ba'i lce'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-5: rgyas pa la nyi ma'i lce'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-6: gsad pa dang bskrad pa dang dbye ba la spen pa'i lce'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-7: dbang la ba sangs kyi le'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-8: dgug pa la phur bu'i lce'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-9: rmongs pa la gza' lag gi lce'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-10: rengs pa la bkra shis kyi lce'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-11: de bzhin du res gza' so so rnam par dag
T02D1347-2:139b-12: pas las so so re re la zhal gcig pa'o
T02D1347-2:139b-13: // nyin mo dang mtshan mo rnam par dag pas zhabs gnyis pa'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-14: thun mtshams bzhi rnam par dag pas phyag bzhi pa'o
T02D1347-2:139b-15: zhes pa ni nges pa ste zhi ba la sogs
T02D1347-2:139b-16: pa'i las la'o // gsad pa la 'jug rings rnam
T02D1347-2:139b-17: par dag pas phyag gnyis pa ste phyag na gri
T02D1347-2:139b-19: dbye ba la spen pa rnam par dag pas phyag
T02D1347-2:139b-20: na ral gri dang thod pa zhes pa phyogs gzhan
T02D1347-2:139b-21: gyi nges pa ste gza' spen pa la snga ma
T02D1347-2:139b-22: phyed dang phyi ma phyed kyi dbye bas so //
T02D1347-2:139b-23: las thams cad pa la sgra gcan rnam par dag
T02D1347-2:139b-24: pa dang dus me rnam par dag pa ste skye
T02D1347-2:139b-25: ba dang 'jig pa'i chos nyid kyi phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:139b-26: 'dod pa'i me dang mchod sbyin gyi me ni rang gi lha'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-27: ye shes kyi me ni gza' thams cad la khyab
T02D1347-2:139b-28: par byed pa nyid kyi phyir rdo rje slob dpon
T02D1347-2:139b-29: gyis sngar gyi cho gas mchod par bya ba'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-30: me lha spyan drang pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:139b-31: da ni mchog sbyin zhes pa la sogs pas sbyin
T02D1347-2:139b-32: sreg gi phyag rgyal sogs pa gsungs te 'dir gang
T02D1347-2:139b-33: gi tshe blugs gzar med pa na de'i tshe rdo
T02D1347-2:139b-34: rje slob dpon sngar brjod pa'i 'dug stangs kyis gnas
T02D1347-2:139b-35: pas lag pa g-yon pa gan rkyal du byas nas
T02D1347-2:139b-36: g-yas pa mchog sbyin gyi phyag gi mthe bos sbyin
T02D1347-2:139b-37: sreg gi rdzas bskyod cing zhal phye ba'i me yi
T02D1347-2:139b-38: zhal du sbyin sreg bya ste de yang gsol bar
T02D1347-2:139b-39: bsam par bya'o // rdo rje yis zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:139b-40: aom a'a:hum ho:ham ksha:sv'a h'a 'di rnams kyis yam shing
T02D1347-2:139b-41: lnga brgya po de rnams las brgya rtsa brgyad bsreg
T02D1347-2:139b-42: bsam par bya'o // par bya'o // de nas yan
T02D1347-2:139b-43: lag gis zhes pa ni hr'ii h'um hr'im hr'im hr'im
T02D1347-2:139b-44: hra:sv'a h'a zhes pa'i yan lag gis brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D1347-2:139b-45: bsam par bya'o // par bya'o // do // kyang
T02D1347-2:139b-46: yig gis phung po drug dang khams rnams kyis te
T02D1347-2:139b-47: aa a'a ai a'i ri r'i au a'u li l'i
T02D1347-2:139b-48: aam aa:sv'a h'a 'di rnams kyis brgya rtsa brgyad do
T02D1347-2:139b-49: bsam par bya'o // par bya'o // do // //
T02D1347-2:139b-50: de bzhin du skye mched rnams kyis kyang ste aa
T02D1347-2:139b-51: a'a ae aee aa ra a'a ra ao aoo aa
T02D1347-2:140a-1: aam aa:sv'a h'a zhes pa skye mched bcu gnyis kyis brgya rtsa brgyad do //
T02D1347-2:140a-2: de nas las kyi dbang po yul dang bcas pa
T02D1347-2:140a-3: rnams kyis kyang ste ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a
T02D1347-2:140a-4: wa w'a la l'a ham ha:'di rnams kyi brgya rtsa
T02D1347-2:140a-5: brgyad do // de ltar bzhi bcu lhag pa'i lnga
T02D1347-2:140a-6: brgya rnams kyis lnga brgya'i grangs su gzung bar bya'o
T02D1347-2:140a-7: brgyad do // // so sor sngags brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D1347-2:140a-8: bzlas par ba ste mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
T02D1347-2:140a-9: dpe byad brgyad cu ni brgya rtsa gcu gnyis so
T02D1347-2:140a-10: brgyad do // // // de rnams la sku dang
T02D1347-2:140a-11: gsungs dang thugs dang ye shes kyi gnas rnams spangs
T02D1347-2:140a-12: nas lhag ma brgya rtsa brgyad po rnams ni bgrang
T02D1347-2:140a-13: phreng la ste lhun po la zhal bzhi'o ;
T02D1347-2:140a-14: / des na thams cad du las thams cad pa'i
T02D1347-2:140a-15: sbyin sreg la bsod nams kyi tshogs kyi don du
T02D1347-2:140a-16: brgya rtsa brgyad kyi tshad do //
T02D1347-2:140a-17: de nas 'bru la sogs pa'i sbyin sreg gi rdzas
T02D1347-2:140a-18: kyang cho ga 'di nyid kyis te 'bru dang d'u
T02D1347-2:140a-19: ra ba mar dang 'o ma yis zhes pa rdo
T02D1347-2:140a-20: rje la sogs pa 'di rnams kyis brgya rtsa brgyad
T02D1347-2:140a-21: kyi dbye bas sbyin sreg bya zhing yam shing dang
T02D1347-2:140a-22: 'bru rnams mar gyis sbrags pa dang d'u ra ba
T02D1347-2:140a-23: 'o mas spangs pa rnams bsreg par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:140a-24: de nas snying po'i sngags kyis gang ba'i sreg blugs
T02D1347-2:140a-25: te gang gzar mar gyis bkang nas skyil krung du
T02D1347-2:140a-26: gnas rab tu zhi zhing g-yo ba med pa'i sems
T02D1347-2:140a-27: ldan gsang sngags rig pa sngags kyi sku /
T02D1347-2:140a-28: slob dpon las kyi rdo rje can gyis slar yang
T02D1347-2:140a-29: me la sreg blugs dag ni nges par dbul bar

T02D1347-2:148a-38: / de nas shar gyi sgor slob dpon gtso bo'i

T02D1347-2:148a-40: lha g-yon brkyang la sogs pa'i stabs kyis bzhengs pa
T02D1347-2:148a-41: yin na de'i tshe slob dpon bzhengs pas slob ma
T02D1347-2:148a-42: la dbang bskur sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:148a-43: ci ste bzhugs pa yin na de'i tshe bzhugs pas sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:148b-0: de nas dge @148b pa'i grogs kyis gtad pa'i slob
T02D1347-2:148b-1: ma'i mgo bo la dung gi chus bsang gtor byas
T02D1347-2:148b-2: te aom a'a:hum zhes pa yi ge gsum gyis lan
T02D1347-2:148b-3: bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i me tog gcig de'i lag
T02D1347-2:148b-4: pa'i padma sbyar bar kun du sbyin par bya ste
T02D1347-2:148b-5: / me tog gi snyim pa rnam par dag pas so //
T02D1347-2:148b-6: de nas lag pa'i padma sbyar ba dag las dkyil
T02D1347-2:148b-7: 'khor gyi phyi rol du rgyal ba'i bum pa'i steng
T02D1347-2:148b-8: du sngar brjod pa'i nges pas me tog dor ba
T02D1347-2:148b-9: dang dus gcig tu mig gi dar dgrol bar bya'o
T02D1347-2:148b-10: // yang na sngar me tog dor ba byas la
T02D1347-2:148b-11: phyi nas dgrol bar bya ste aom di byin tri
T02D1347-2:148b-12: y'a nu ta gh'a ta ya sv'a h'a zhes pa'i
T02D1347-2:148b-13: // sngags 'dis so // mig dbye ba byas nas
T02D1347-2:148b-14: gang gi gnas su me tog bzang po yi ge
T02D1347-2:148b-15: gsum gyis mngon par bsngags pa lhung ba der gnas
T02D1347-2:148b-16: pa'i lha ni de'i rigs kyi lhar 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:148b-17: de'i las kyi phyag rgyas 'grub bo zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:148b-18: de nas de'i rigs kyi lha bstan te phyi nas
T02D1347-2:148b-19: chu la sogs pa dbang bdun po rnams dang rnam
T02D1347-2:148b-20: gsum 'dir ni ji bzhin du bum pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:148b-21: pa ste der las kyi phyag rgya mchod nas so
T02D1347-2:148b-22: // bla med 'chad par 'gyur pa yang dag rab
T02D1347-2:148b-23: sbyin bya zhes pa slob dpon gyis te de bzhin
T02D1347-2:148b-25: da ni klu zhes pa la sogs pas dbang bdun
T02D1347-2:148b-26: gyi cho ga gsungs te 'dir klu zhes pa brgyad
T02D1347-2:148b-27: dang bzhi'i rgyal dang rnam rgyal bum pa dag gis
T02D1347-2:148b-28: zhes pa ni bum pa brgyad kyi phyogs la rgyal
T02D1347-2:148b-29: ba'i bum pa lnga dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum
T02D1347-2:148b-30: pa lngas so // bum pa bzhi'i phyogs la rgyal
T02D1347-2:148b-31: ba'i bum pa gsum dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum
T02D1347-2:148b-33: nor bu gser gyi rang bzhin nam de med nas
T02D1347-2:148b-34: yi rang bzhin rin chen dang bcas pa sman dang
T02D1347-2:148b-35: dri dang ldan pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:148b-36: de la sman ni sngar gsungs pa'i dri'i le tshe
T02D1347-2:148b-37: sbyar ba las mig ces pa la sogs pa'i cha
T02D1347-2:148b-38: shas kyis gzung bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:148b-39: slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i rgyud las gsungs pa'i cho
T02D1347-2:148b-40: gas nyi shu rtsa lnga po rnams kyi nang nas
T02D1347-2:148b-41: ji ltar rnyed pa lnga gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:148b-42: de la bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
T02D1347-2:148b-43: dri yi le tshe sbyar ba la //
T02D1347-2:148b-44: rgyal po tshangs ma la sogs sman //
T02D1347-2:148b-45: mig zla me sogs cha shas dang //
T02D1347-2:148b-46: lnga lnga yis ni rim pas dgod //
T02D1347-2:149a-1: ma sred med drag mo dang //
T02D1347-2:149a-2: dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug ma //
T02D1347-2:149a-3: dbang mo dpal mo phag mo dang //
T02D1347-2:149a-4: gzhon nu tsartsi k'a de bzhin //
T02D1347-2:149a-5: sa mo chu mo me mo dang //
T02D1347-2:149a-6: rlung mo mkha' spyod ma de bzhin //
T02D1347-2:149a-7: ma dang sring mo bu mo dang //
T02D1347-2:149a-8: tsha mo rang skyes ma de bzhin //
T02D1347-2:149a-9: bram ze rgyal rigs rje rigs mo //
T02D1347-2:149a-10: dmangs mo g-yung mo de bzhin bshad //
T02D1347-2:149a-11: ces pa'i sman ni dngos grub che //
T02D1347-2:149a-12: zos pas rtag tu rdzu 'phrul ster //
T02D1347-2:149a-14: da ni 'di rnams kyi rab tu gsal ba'i ming brjod par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:149a-15: 'dir tshangs ma zhes pa ni brahma dandi ste cha
T02D1347-2:149a-16: gnyis dang sred med ma ni bishnu k'ant'a ste cha
T02D1347-2:149a-17: gcig dang drag mo zhes pa ru ta dza t'a
T02D1347-2:149a-18: ste cha gsum dang dbang phyug ma ni rab tu
T02D1347-2:149a-19: grags pa ste cha bzhi dang mchog gi dbang phyug
T02D1347-2:149a-20: ma ni de ba d'a li ste cha lnga'o zhes
T02D1347-2:149a-22: de nas gnyis pa brjod par bya ste dbang mo
T02D1347-2:149a-23: zhes pa ni aintra b'a ru ni ste cha gsum
T02D1347-2:149a-24: dang dpal mo ni la ksha na ste cha bzhi
T02D1347-2:149a-25: dang phag mo zhes ba ni ba r'a ha karnna
T02D1347-2:149a-26: ste cha lnga dang gzhon nu ma zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:149a-27: ka ra ni ka ste cha gnyis dang tsartsi k'a
T02D1347-2:149a-28: zhes pa ni aa dho pushpi ka ste cha gcig
T02D1347-2:149a-29: go zhes pa ni gnyis pa lnga dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:149a-30: de nas gsum pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:149a-31: sa mo zhes pa ni mu sha l'i ste /
T02D1347-2:149a-32: cha lnga dang chu mo zhes pa ni ru dant'i ste /
T02D1347-2:149a-33: cha gnyis dang me mo zhes pa ni dzyo tishma t'i ste /
T02D1347-2:149a-34: cha gcig dang rlung mo ni ladzdz'a lu ste /
T02D1347-2:149a-35: cha gsum dang mkha' spyod ma ni aarka ste cha bzhi'o zhes pa ni gsum pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:149a-36: de nas bzhi pa dgod pa brjod par bya ste ma zhes pa ni pu tram dz'a ri ste /
T02D1347-2:149a-37: cha gcig dang sring mo zhes pa ni sa ha
T02D1347-2:149a-38: de ba ste cha gsum dang bu mo ni kri
T02D1347-2:149a-39: t'anydza li ste cha bzhi dang tsha mo ni aa
T02D1347-2:149a-40: dza karnna ste cha lnga dang rangs skyes ma ni
T02D1347-2:149a-41: mo ha n'i ba ta ba tri k'a ste cha
T02D1347-2:149a-42: gnyis so zhes pa ni bzhi pa lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:149a-43: de nas lnga pa dgod pa brjod par bya ste
T02D1347-2:149a-44: bram ze mo zhes pa ni bri ha t'i ste
T02D1347-2:149a-45: cha bzhi dang rgyal rigs mo zhes pa ni bhri
T02D1347-2:149a-46: ga r'a dz'a ste cha lnga dang rje rigs mo
T02D1347-2:149a-47: ni shing da ngar te cha gnyis dang /
T02D1347-2:149a-48: dmangs rigs mo ni kanda k'a ri ste cha gcig
T02D1347-2:149a-49: dang g-yung mo ni me yu ri shi kh'a ste
T02D1347-2:149a-50: / cha gsum mo zhes pa lnga pa dgod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:149a-51: de bzhin du grangs ji lta bas so pa la
T02D1347-2:149a-52: sogs pa 'bru'i tshogs rnams te so ba dang so
T02D1347-2:149b-0: mon sran dang @149b tsa na ka dkar po dang til nag po ni dang po lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-1: gnyis pa ni kota b'a dang mud ga dang sran ma dang til dkar po dang gro'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-2: gsum pa ni mooshtha dang tri pu ta dang yungs nag dang nas dang mon sran no //
T02D1347-2:149b-3: bzhi pa ni sran chung dang nyungs kar dang kam
T02D1347-2:149b-4: gu dang tu ba ri ka dang bar ba ti
T02D1347-2:149b-5: k'a'o // lnga pa ni zar ma dang ba ra
T02D1347-2:149b-6: t'i dang barnn'a dang ku lan tha dang tsa na
T02D1347-2:149b-7: ka nag po ste le tshe sbyar ba'i chas 'bru
T02D1347-2:149b-8: lnga ji ltar rnyed pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-9: 'dir cha rnams ni ril bu'i grangs so //
T02D1347-2:149b-10: de nas rin po che rnams ni bram ze dang rgyal rigs dang rje rigs dang /
T02D1347-2:149b-11: dmangs rigs dang mthar skyes kyi rigs las skyes pa'i
T02D1347-2:149b-12: rdo rje rnams dang de bzhin du aindra n'i la
T02D1347-2:149b-13: dang padma r'a ga dang zla ba chu shel dang
T02D1347-2:149b-14: / ka ra ke ta ka dang ma ra ka ta ni gtso bo'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-15: de bzhin du lcags rnams ni gser dang dngul dang zangs dang lcags rnon po dang /
T02D1347-2:149b-17: de bzhin du rin po che 'bring po ni mu tig dang byi ru dang mu men dang /
T02D1347-2:149b-18: sh'u la ma ni dang thig le drug pa'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-19: de bzhin du tha ma rnams ni shel dang rdz'i
T02D1347-2:149b-20: ba dz'a ti dang doo ha ri dang mching bu
T02D1347-2:149b-21: dang nor bu ljang khu rnams so //
T02D1347-2:149b-22: 'di rnams las ji ltar 'byor pa gzung bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-23: ci ste bka'i 'khor los sgyur pa rin po che
T02D1347-2:149b-24: chen po'i dbang bskur ba la ni lha dang klu
T02D1347-2:149b-25: rnams kyi rin po che kha dog lngar 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:149b-26: // de med na kha dog lnga'i me tog dri
T02D1347-2:149b-27: bzang bo rnams so zhes pa nges pa ste dbul
T02D1347-2:149b-28: // po rnams kyi'o // de bzhin du sa'i rang bzhin rin chen bcas zhes so //
T02D1347-2:149b-29: 'dir rin po che ljang khu ni rnam par rgyal ba'i dung la'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-30: rin po che sngon po ni shar dang nub kyi
T02D1347-2:149b-31: rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la'o
T02D1347-2:149b-32: // nag po ni shar dang me'i bum pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-33: dmar po ni lho dang bden bral gyi bum pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-34: dkar po ni byang dang dbang ldan gyi bum pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-35: ser po ni nub dang rlung gi bum pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:149b-36: de bzhin du khab len gyi lcags dang /
T02D1347-2:149b-38: zangs dang dngul dang gser ro //
T02D1347-2:149b-39: de bzhin du sman rnams te cha gcig pa ni
T02D1347-2:149b-40: rgyal ba dang rnam par rgyal ba'i bum pa la'o
T02D1347-2:149b-41: // cha gnyis pa ni shar dang mer ro //
T02D1347-2:149b-42: cha gsum pa ni gshin rje dang lha min du'o //
T02D1347-2:150a-0: cha bzhi pa ni byang dang 'phrog @150a * //
T02D1347-2:150a-2: cha lnga pa ni nub dang rlung du'o //
T02D1347-2:150a-3: de bzhin du ril bu'i dbye bas 'bru rnams dang
T02D1347-2:150a-4: de bzhin du sngar gsungs pa'i sman gyi le tshe
T02D1347-2:150a-6: de ltar lcags dang rin po che dang nags kyi
T02D1347-2:150a-7: sman dang 'bru dang dri'i rdzas rnams bum pa rnams
T02D1347-2:150a-8: su blugs nas slar yang nyi shu rtsa lnga bo
T02D1347-2:150a-9: de dag thum por bcings te rnam par rgyal ba'i
T02D1347-2:150a-10: dung chus gang bar gzhug par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:150a-11: des skye ba'i gnas lngar dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:150a-12: gtsug tor dang phrag pa dang dpung pa'i tshigs g-yas
T02D1347-2:150a-13: pa dang g-yon pa dang de bzhin du dpyi dang
T02D1347-2:150a-15: de nas rigs kyi lha rnam par sbyang ba'i don
T02D1347-2:150a-16: du me tog 'dor ba'i sngags ni aom sarba ta
T02D1347-2:150a-17: th'a ga ta ku la bi sho dha ni sv'a
T02D1347-2:150a-18: h'a sngags 'dis slob dpon gyis slob ma me tog
T02D1347-2:150a-20: sngags 'dis mig dbye bar bya ste aom di bya
T02D1347-2:150a-21: na ya na mu da gh'a ta y'a mi sv'a
T02D1347-2:150a-22: h'a / de nas rigs kyi lha dang dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:150a-23: gyi gtso bo dang por byas pa'i dkyil 'khor mtha'
T02D1347-2:150a-25: shar gyi sgor rigs dag par byas te /
T02D1347-2:150a-26: de nas slob dpon gyis slob ma lag pa g-yon
T02D1347-2:150a-27: pa nas bskyod cing las kyi rdo rje can dang
T02D1347-2:150a-28: lhan cig bskor ba byas nas byang gi sgor khrid
T02D1347-2:150a-29: do der lus rnam par dag pa'i don du sgrol
T02D1347-2:150a-30: ma la sogs pa lha mo rnams kyi sngags kyis
T02D1347-2:150a-31: bum pa thams cad nas chu blangs la rnam par
T02D1347-2:150a-32: rgyal ba'i dung du blugs nas slar yang skye ba'i
T02D1347-2:150a-33: gnas lngar sngags 'dis chu'i dbang gis dbang bskur bar
T02D1347-2:150a-34: bya ste / aom a'a a'i r'i a'u l'i panytsa
T02D1347-2:150a-35: dh'a tu bi sho dha ni sv'a h'a zhes pas

T02D1347-2:150a-37: dbang la skye ba'i gnas lngar sngags 'dis dbang bskur
T02D1347-2:150a-38: bya ste / so // bar bya ste / aom
T02D1347-2:150a-39: aa ai ri au li panytsa ta th'a ga ta
T02D1347-2:150a-40: pa ri shuda dha sv'a h'a zhes pas so //
T02D1347-2:150a-41: de nas rin po che dang gser gyi cod pan nam gos kyi cod pan bcing bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:150a-42: de ltar dbang bskur gnyis kyis khams dang phung po
T02D1347-2:150a-43: yongs su dag pas sku rnam par dag par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:150a-44: ro // sku'i zhal gyi sa la sku dag par byas te /
T02D1347-2:150a-45: de nas g-yas skor gyis slar yang lho'i sgor slob
T02D1347-2:150a-46: ma khrid nas gsung rnam par dag pa'i don du
T02D1347-2:150a-47: dar dpyangs kyi dbang la skye ba'i gnas sngar sngags
T02D1347-2:150b-0: aom aa a'a aam aa: ha @150b h'a ham ha:
T02D1347-2:150b-1: ho: phrem da sha p'a ra mi t'a pa ri

T02D1347-2:150b-4: ma rnyed na me tog gi phreng ba dang dpral
T02D1347-2:150b-6: de nas rdo rje dril bu'i dbang la skye ba'i nas lngar sngags 'dis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:150b-7: aom hum ho:s'u rya tsandra bi sho dha ka sv'a h'a zhes pas so //
T02D1347-2:150b-8: de nas rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu spyi

T02D1347-2:150b-13: rje sbyang ba'i don du rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi
T02D1347-2:150b-14: dbang la skye ba'i gnas lngar sngags 'dis dbang bskur

T02D1347-2:150b-16: ra a'ar ao aoo aa la a'a la aam aa:bi

T02D1347-2:150b-19: de nas rna ba la sogs pa la me tog
T02D1347-2:150b-20: bkod nas slar yang ming gi dbang la skye ba'i
T02D1347-2:150b-21: gnas lngar sngags 'dis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:150b-22: aom ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa w'a la
T02D1347-2:150b-23: l'a tsa tu ra brahma bi h'a ra bi shuda
T02D1347-2:150b-24: dha sv'a h'a zhes pas so //
T02D1347-2:150b-25: de nas lag pa dang rkang pa dag la gdu
T02D1347-2:150b-26: bu dang rkang gdub la sogs pa'am de dag med
T02D1347-2:150b-27: na me tog gi phreng ba bcings la de nas
T02D1347-2:150b-29: khyod ni rdo rje che ge mo zhes byas nas lung bstan par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:150b-30: dbang bskur gnyis kyis thugs rdo rje sbyangs te de
T02D1347-2:150b-31: nas slar yang g-yas skor gyis slob ma nub kyi
T02D1347-2:150b-32: sgor khrid cing ye shes rnam par dag pa'i don
T02D1347-2:150b-33: du rjes su gnang ba'i dbang la skye ba'i gnas
T02D1347-2:150b-34: lngar sngags 'dis dbang bskur bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:150b-35: aom ham ksha:dha rmma tsakra pra brta ka sv'a h'a zhes pas so //
T02D1347-2:150b-36: dbang bskur byin pas sku dang gsung dang thugs dang
T02D1347-2:150b-37: ye shes kyi rdo rje rnams dbang bdun gyis rnam
T02D1347-2:150b-38: par sbyangs te / de nas slob ma la lag

T02D1347-2:150b-41: cing rdo rje dril bur rab tu byin nas rab

T02D1347-2:151a-4: rdo rje slob dpon gyis rgan pa dang gzhon pa'i

T02D1347-2:160a-0: @160a * // sogs pa rnams kyis mchog gi dang
T02D1347-2:160a-1: po'i sangs rgyas las 'jam pa'i rdo rjes phyung ba

T02D1347-2:160a-3: 'dir 'gro ba thams cad kyi yid la 'dod pa

T02D1347-2:160a-5: de nas gang ba'i gnas skabs ni shes rab la

T02D1347-2:160b-0: ste des na 'dir @160b rgyas par ma byas so

T02D1347-2:163b-42: khyab 'jug ma ni rdza mkhan ma dang /

T02D1347-2:164a-2: dbang mo ni tshem bu ma dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-3: tshangs ma ni nya pa ma dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-4: drag mo ni gar mkhan ma dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-5: dpal mo ni btso blag mkhan ma ste brgyad do //

T02D1347-2:164a-8: khengs ma ni til mar mkhan ma dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-9: shin tu stobs ma ni lcags mkhan ma dang /

T02D1347-2:164a-11: khro gnyer can ni shing mkhan ma dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-12: tsun d'a ni 'dregs mkhan ma dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-13: rdo rje lcags sgrog ma ni smyug ma mkhan ma ste brgyad ni khro bo'i rigs can rnams so //
T02D1347-2:164a-14: khyi gdong ma ni kla klo ma dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-15: phag gdong ma ni 'phyag pa mo dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-16: ce spyang gdong ma ni gtum mo dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-17: stag gdong ma ni stag gzig ma dang /

T02D1347-2:164a-19: bya rgod gdong ma ni ro sreg ma dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-20: mkha' lding gdong ma ni bhi ll'i dang /
T02D1347-2:164a-21: 'ug gdong ma ni ri khrod ma ste brgyad ni rab gtum ma'o //
T02D1347-2:164a-22: de ltar na sum cu rtsa drug rigs kyi dbye

T02D1347-2:164a-28: sa yi steng du rnal 'byor rnams la dngos grub

T02D1347-2:164a-37: de bzhin du bzhi ni sangs rgyas kyi dbye ba rnams so //

T02D1347-2:164a-39: yi dags rnams ni brgyad kyi dbye ba'o //
T02D1347-2:164a-41: lha min rnams ni brgyad kyi dbye ba ste /

T02D1347-2:164b-0: 'byor pa rnams kyi @164b dbye ba sum cu rtsa

T02D1347-2:166a-10: mi mo ni gzugs rdo rje ma dang srin mo

T02D1347-2:166a-29: thabs kyi le'u las 'chad par 'gyur pa'i cho gas

T02D1347-2:166a-31: mkha' spyod sa spyod rnams ni sum cu rtsa drug

T02D1347-2:166b-9: shes rab chos 'byung la gnas nyin mor byed pa

T02D1347-2:166b-11: du shor ba zos pas kyang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa
T02D1347-2:166b-12: 'phrog na rnal 'byor ldan pa dag ni smos ci
T02D1347-2:166b-13: dgos te mi 'pho bar byas pas so zhes pa'i
T02D1347-2:166b-14: don to // mi bskyod pa ni gci ba dang
T02D1347-2:166b-15: don yod grub pa ni rkang dang rgyal ba mchog
T02D1347-2:166b-16: ni rnam par snang mdzad de de dang ldan pa

T02D1347-2:166b-22: dbyug pa dang skye bo phyugs la 'jigs pa ster
T02D1347-2:166b-23: ba'o // de ltar bshang pa dang gci ba dang
T02D1347-2:166b-24: rkang dang sgrol ma lnga ni dam tshig brgyad de
T02D1347-2:166b-25: gnyis ni nyi ma dang zla ba dag go //

T02D1347-2:166b-27: kyi 'khor lo la mchod pa rnam pa bcur 'gyur

T02D1347-2:166b-29: rtsi za ba zhes pa dam tshig bzhi ni slob
T02D1347-2:166b-31: rnam pa gzhan du na bdud kyi phyogs kyis 'dzin
T02D1347-2:166b-32: pa'i phyir ro zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i

T02D1347-2:167a-1: dbye bas 'di rnams phyogs zhes pa ste bcu'o //

T02D1347-2:167a-8: rus sbal mo ni dbang phyug ma dang /
T02D1347-2:167a-9: dung mo ni dpal chen mo ste 'byung po las skyes pa brgyad do //

T02D1347-2:167a-16: khyi mo ni shin tu sngon mo dang 'brog dgon
T02D1347-2:167a-17: pa'i seng ge mo ni drag spyan ma ste khro
T02D1347-2:167a-19: de bzhin go dh'a ni khyi gdong ma dang byi ba mo ni phag gdong ma dang /

T02D1347-2:167a-21: dang spre'u mo ni stag gdong ma dang ri bong
T02D1347-2:167a-22: mo ni bya rog gdong ma dang /
T02D1347-2:167a-23: gzugs mo ni bya rgod gdong ma dang /
T02D1347-2:167a-24: aishu ka ni mkha' lding gdong ma dang rtsangs pa
T02D1347-2:167a-25: mo ni 'ug gdong ma ste brgyad ni lha min

T02D1347-2:167a-31: skegs te gsal bar chu yi gter zhes pa dam
T02D1347-2:167a-32: tshig bzhi ste sgrol ma la sogs pa rnams so

T02D1347-2:167a-35: dkar dang mchil pa dang dur pa dang dang pa'o

T02D1347-2:167a-43: mundala sogs pa rnams kyi ste rim pas rig par
T02D1347-2:167a-44: bya'o // de bzhin du khro bo las skyes pa
T02D1347-2:167a-45: rnams kyi dam tshig bcu ni bya rog dang bya

T02D1347-2:167b-2: bya'o // bya gag dang / bhe dra zhes pa

T02D1347-2:167b-4: bya'o // bya gag dang / dang / hor pa

T02D1347-2:167b-7: bya'o // bya gag dang / dang / lta bas

T02D1347-2:167b-9: pa lha min rnams kyi dam tshig brgyad ni mig
T02D1347-2:167b-10: sngon dang tsa ko ra dang aa ni la dang

T02D1347-2:167b-16: min mo rnams kyi mchog gi 'dab chags brgyad du

T02D1347-2:168a-0: gi rang gi rang bzhin yon tan dbang @168a *

T02D1347-2:168a-8: ha ya ra wa la ksha zhes pa'o //

T02D1347-2:168a-32: nya so so la bya'o zhes pa de bzhin gshegs

T02D1347-2:168a-37: spos kyi snod dang me tog gi snod dang /
T02D1347-2:168a-38: 'bras bu'i snod dang 'bru ma nyams pa'i snod dang /

T02D1347-2:168a-41: pa bcu ni tshogs kyi 'khor lo la 'dus pa
T02D1347-2:168a-42: dang dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la mchod pa'i don
T02D1347-2:168a-43: du'o // de bzhin du nang gi rdzas rnam pa bcur 'gyur te /

T02D1347-2:168b-35: dri rdo rje ma'i me tog phreng ba dang /
