T02D1347-2:172a-9: k'i dang chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni
T02D1347-2:172a-10: sgrol ma'o zhes pa g-yon dang mdun te /
T02D1347-2:172a-11: lus kyi dbye bas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:172a-12: dus kyi 'khor lor rab tu grags zhes pa rgyud gzhan du rab tu ma grags te /
T02D1347-2:172a-13: bcom ldan 'das kyis spas so zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-2:172a-14: de bzhin du byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gyi
T02D1347-2:172a-15: nang nas byang chub kyi yan lag gcig ni yum
T02D1347-2:172a-16: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma ste /
T02D1347-2:172a-17: rigs kyi gnas btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //
T02D1347-2:172a-18: gzhan pa rnams kyang sgra yi rdo rje ma la sogs pa drug ces pa ste /
T02D1347-2:172a-19: dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni sgra rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172a-20: chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang
T02D1347-2:172a-21: chub kyi yan lag ni reg bya rdo rje ma
T02D1347-2:172a-22: dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni gzugs rdo rje ma ste /
T02D1347-2:172a-23: lus kyi dbye bas nye ba'i zhing ngo //
T02D1347-2:172a-24: de bzhin du dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni dri rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172a-25: shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni rdo rje ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172a-26: ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ni chos kyi khams kyi rdo rje ma ste /
T02D1347-2:172a-28: de bzhin du chu gter yang dag spong ba rnams dang zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-2:172a-29: sdig pa ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir
T02D1347-2:172a-30: spong ba ni tsartsi k'a dang sdig pa skyes pa
T02D1347-2:172a-31: rnams spong ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ni khyab 'jug
T02D1347-2:172a-32: ma dang / mi dge ba ma skyes pa rnams
T02D1347-2:172a-33: spong ba'i dge ba bskyed pa ni dbang phyug ma
T02D1347-2:172a-34: dang dge ba skyes pa rnams sangs rgyas nyid du
T02D1347-2:172a-35: yongs su bsngo bas spong ba ni dpal chen mo
T02D1347-2:172a-36: ma dang / ste / nye ba'i tshan do ha bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:172a-37: gzhan pa chu gter lha mo bzhi ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:172b-0: de la 'dun pa'i @172b rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni tshangs ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-1: brtson 'grus kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni dbang mo dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-2: sems kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni phag mo dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-3: dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa ni gzhon nu ma'o zhes pa tshan do ha'i dbye ba ste /
T02D1347-2:172b-5: de bzhin du khro mo lnga ni stobs rnams dag ste /
T02D1347-2:172b-6: 'dir dad pa'i stobs ni shin tu sngon mo dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-7: brtson 'grus kyi stobs ni shin tu stobs ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-8: dran pa'i stobs ni rdo rje lcags sgrog ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs ni nga rgyal ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-10: shes rab kyi stobs ni tsun d'a ste /
T02D1347-2:172b-12: de bzhin du rab tu gsal zhing nges par dbang po rnams ni lnga nyid do zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-2:172b-13: de bzhin du dad pa'i dbang po ni rengs byed ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-14: brtson 'grus kyi dbang po ni rmugs byed ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-15: dran pa'i dbang po ni 'od zer can dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-16: ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po ni khro gnyer can dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-17: shes rab kyi dbang po ni drag spyan ma'o zhes pa 'dus pa ste /
T02D1347-2:172b-19: yang dag yan lag brgyad kyi lam ni mi yi
T02D1347-2:172b-20: bdag po lha min dag las skyes pa brgyad du
T02D1347-2:172b-21: 'gyur zhes pa la 'dir yang dag pa'i lta ba
T02D1347-2:172b-22: ni khyi gdong ma dang yang dag pa'i rtog pa
T02D1347-2:172b-23: ni bya rog gdong ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-24: yang dag pa'i ngag ni stag gdong ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-25: yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' ni 'ug gdong ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-26: yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba ni ce sbyang gdong ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-27: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba ni mkha' lding gdong ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-28: yang dag pa'i dran pa ni phag gdong ma dang /
T02D1347-2:172b-29: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni bya rgod gdong ma ste /
T02D1347-2:172b-30: de ltar na sum cu rtsa bdun rab tu dbye
T02D1347-2:172b-31: bas srid pa gsum gyi gnas su byang chub phyogs
T02D1347-2:172b-32: kyi chos gang yin pa de rnams mtha' dag rnal
T02D1347-2:172b-33: 'byor ma rnams sa yi steng gi gnas su rnal
T02D1347-2:172b-34: 'byor ba yis rig par bya ste g-yung mo la
T02D1347-2:172b-35: sogs pa'o // de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
T02D1347-2:172b-36: chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyis rnam par sbyangs pa'i
T02D1347-2:172b-37: gnas la sogs pa ni chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid
T02D1347-2:172b-38: sogs pa'o // du 'gyur te / mi yi bdag
T02D1347-2:172b-39: po phyi dang lus la yang de bzhin zhes pa
T02D1347-2:173a-0: @173a * // da ni sangs rgyas pa zhes pa la sogs pas
T02D1347-2:173a-1: 'di rnams bsten pa'i slad du rnal 'byor pa rnams
T02D1347-2:173a-2: kyi spyod pa'i cho ga gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:173a-3: 'dir rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil
T02D1347-2:173a-4: 'khor du dbang bskur ba ni dkyil 'khor thams cad
T02D1347-2:173a-5: du dbang bskur ba ste mu stegs pa rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:173a-6: lha dang / lha mo khyab 'jug dang /
T02D1347-2:173a-7: drag po la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1347-2:173a-8: tsartsi k'a la sogs pa rnam par sbyangs pa rnams kyi dkyil 'khor la yang sgrub pa po'o //
T02D1347-2:173a-9: des na rnal 'byor pa de nyid thob pa ste dbang bskur ba ni ye shes sam /
T02D1347-2:173a-10: 'jig rten pa'i las rab 'byam bsgrub pa'i don du sangs rgyas par gyur kyang rung zhi ba pa'am /
T02D1347-2:173a-11: gcer bu pa dad pa mchog tu gyur pa'am /
T02D1347-2:173a-12: skal ldan nam gtsang gnas sam /
T02D1347-2:173a-13: de bzhin du bram ze'am thod pa can nam skra
T02D1347-2:173a-14: 'bral zhes pa zad byed par gyur kyang rung gos
T02D1347-2:173a-15: dkar pa'am zhing skyong du gyur kyang rung ste dag
T02D1347-2:173a-16: pa'o // thub pa'am bsnyon ba'i gzugs can nam rig
T02D1347-2:173a-17: pa can nam sdig pa med pa'i sems ldan mkhas
T02D1347-2:173a-18: pa'o // pa'am / slob gnyer pa yang rung ste
T02D1347-2:173a-19: rnal 'byor pa ni dngos grub don slad mtha' dag
T02D1347-2:173a-20: yon tan gter te mi yi dbang //
T02D1347-2:173a-21: yid la gang 'dod pa'i spyod pa de ji srid
T02D1347-2:173a-22: grub par gyur gyi bar du spas te bya zhing
T02D1347-2:173a-23: / de nas nus pa las 'jig rten las 'das
T02D1347-2:173a-24: pa mngon du bya'o zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs
T02D1347-2:173a-25: / pa'i nges pa'o // bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal
T02D1347-2:173a-26: po dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1347-2:173a-27: kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:173a-28: dri ma med pa'i 'od las rab tu gnas pa
T02D1347-2:173a-29: dang tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:173a-30: spyod pa'i mdor bsdus chen po ste lnga pa'o /
T02D1347-2:173a-32: // / phyag gi phyag rgya lnga stangs kyis //
T02D1347-2:173a-33: gang gis lha min dbang skrag mdzad //
T02D1347-2:173a-34: dus kyi 'khor lo der btud nas //
T02D1347-2:173a-35: phyag rgya la sogs mtshan nyid bshad //
T02D1347-2:173a-36: smra mkhas kyis ni bsdus rgyud kyis //
T02D1347-2:173a-37: ji ltar rgyud chen las byung ba //
T02D1347-2:173a-38: phyag rgya lta stangs yan lag brnga //
T02D1347-2:173a-39: thams cad 'grel pas rgyas par bya /
T02D1347-2:173b-0: 'dir phyag rgya bcing ba'i don du rgan @173b po
T02D1347-2:173b-1: mthe bo la sogs pa sor mo rnams kyi ming
T02D1347-2:173b-2: ste rgan po ni mthe bo dang /
T02D1347-2:173b-3: de nas gnyis pa ni mdzub mo dang /
T02D1347-2:173b-4: gsum pa ni gung mo dang bzhi pa ni ming med do //
T02D1347-2:173b-5: ming med de'i mthar mthe chung ni mtha' dag yon
T02D1347-2:173b-6: tan gter te nam mkha'i khams nyid kyi phyir ro
T02D1347-2:173b-7: // rnal 'byor pa yis slob dpon gyi man ngag gis rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:173b-8: de ltar phyag rgya bcing ba'i don du ming gi
T02D1347-2:173b-9: dbye bar 'gyur te yon tan dbang gis zhes pa
T02D1347-2:173b-13: sgra'i yon tan gyi dbang gis de rim pas so //
T02D1347-2:173b-14: de bzhin du bcing ba brjod par gyur na rdo
T02D1347-2:173b-15: rje bcing bzhes par 'gyur zhing nges pa las khu
T02D1347-2:173b-16: tshur bcing ba byas par gyur na rdo rje'i khu
T02D1347-2:173b-17: tshur bcing ba zhes pa nges pa ste de bzhin
T02D1347-2:173b-18: du zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:173b-19: da ni rgyal ba'i bdag po'i phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:173b-20: 'dir lag pa gnyi gas rdo rje khu tshur bcings nas /
T02D1347-2:173b-21: khu tshur gyis mthe bo bsdams pa dag brla g-yas
T02D1347-2:173b-22: pa dang g-yon pa'i steng du rdo rje'i 'dug stangs
T02D1347-2:173b-23: la gnas pa ni rdo rje'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:173b-24: // da ni mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:173b-25: sngar skyil krung byas nas skyil krung de la lag
T02D1347-2:173b-26: pa g-yon pa gan rkyal du 'gyur te g-yas pa
T02D1347-2:173b-27: pus mo g-yas pa'i phyogs nas ji srid sa la
T02D1347-2:173b-28: reg pa'i bar du sal son par gyur pa ste
T02D1347-2:173b-29: / de ltar sa la reg pa mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:173b-30: slar yang rim pa de nyid kyis te 'on kyang
T02D1347-2:173b-31: lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal ni phyag na rin
T02D1347-2:173b-32: chen gyi mchog sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:173b-33: de bzhin du skyil krung la lag pa g-yon pa'i
T02D1347-2:173b-34: steng du lag pa g-yas pa gan rkyal mnyam par
T02D1347-2:173b-35: gnas pa ni phyag na padma ste /
T02D1347-2:173b-36: snang ba mtha' yas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:173b-37: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil gan rkyal du skyil krung gi steng du ste /
T02D1347-2:173b-38: gzhan pa lag pa g-yas pa'i mthil pus mo g-yas
T02D1347-2:173b-39: pa'i steng du 'jigs pa med pa rab tu sbyin
T02D1347-2:173b-40: pa ni phyag na ral gri zhes pa don yod
T02D1347-2:173b-41: grub pa'i mi 'jigs pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:174a-0: de bzhin du g-yas pa'i khu tshur g-yas min gyi khu tshur la @174a * //
T02D1347-2:174a-1: ste mdzub mo g-yon pa gang yin pa de slar
T02D1347-2:174a-2: yang gzhan steng du khu tshur bcings pa la mdzub
T02D1347-2:174a-3: mo rab tu zhugs pa 'di ni rnam par snang
T02D1347-2:174a-4: mdzad kyi byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste 'di
T02D1347-2:174a-5: ni gsal bar snying khar son pa'o //
T02D1347-2:174a-6: de bzhin du gzhan pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ni lag pa g-yon pa dang /
T02D1347-2:174a-7: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo mthe bo sbyar ba gdu bu bzhin du gyur cing /
T02D1347-2:174a-8: zlum po g-yon pa'i sen mo 'dus pa la g-yas
T02D1347-2:174a-9: pa'i sen mo 'dus pa ston pa'i sbyor bas gung
T02D1347-2:174a-10: mo la sogs pa brkyang ba ming med dang /
T02D1347-2:174a-11: mthe chung cung zad steng du'o zhes pa snying ga'i phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ste /
T02D1347-2:174a-12: de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa drug gi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:174a-13: da ni mchog gi phyag rgya gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:174a-14: 'dir rang gi lus la go cha chen po'i don
T02D1347-2:174a-15: du lag pa g-yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri
T02D1347-2:174a-16: med ri bong 'dzin pa zhes pa ni 'dir /
T02D1347-2:174a-17: aa yig la sogs pa dbyangs bcva lnga'i bdag nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor te /
T02D1347-2:174a-18: lag pa g-yon la shin tu gang ba'i dri med
T02D1347-2:174a-19: ri bong 'dzin pa cha bcva lnga yongs su rdzogs
T02D1347-2:174a-20: pa'o // aa ai ri au li /
T02D1347-2:174a-21: aa ae aar ao aal ha ya ra wa la zhes pa ni dbyangs rnams so //
T02D1347-2:174a-22: de bzhin du lag pa g-yas la rdo rje nyi ma dbyangs bcva lnga'i bdag nyid de /
T02D1347-2:174a-23: l'a w'a r'a y'a h'a a'a la aoo a'a ra
T02D1347-2:174a-24: aee a'a l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:174a-25: yang dag par gang ba'i nyi ma'o //
T02D1347-2:174a-26: nyi ma dang zla ba 'di dag yang dag sbyar
T02D1347-2:174a-27: ba rdo rje 'jigs byed de drag po'i rdo rje
T02D1347-2:174a-28: khro bo las skyes zhes pa /
T02D1347-2:174a-29: hum yig las skyes pa'i rtse mo lnga pa bsgoms nas /
T02D1347-2:174a-30: rdo rje de dang 'chad par 'gyur pa'i rdo rje'i
T02D1347-2:174a-31: phyag rgyas yan lag thams cad la reg par bya
T02D1347-2:174a-32: ste cod pan dang bcas zhes pa gtsug tor dang
T02D1347-2:174a-33: bcas pa'i mgo nas brtsams te rkang pa'i mthar zhes
T02D1347-2:174a-34: pa rkang pa'i sen mo'i mthar thug pa nyid du'o
T02D1347-2:174a-35: // 'di ni rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i dpal
T02D1347-2:174a-36: ldan mchog gi phyag rgya ste thams cad srung zhing
T02D1347-2:174a-38: de bzhin du phyag rgya 'dis gang zhig cung zad
T02D1347-2:174b-0: gzung bar bya ba'i @174b dngos po sa skyes chu
T02D1347-2:174b-1: skyes kyi dam tshig dang mngal skyes sam /
T02D1347-2:174b-3: sogs pa'i sgras rus ba las skyes pa'i dam tshig gam /
T02D1347-2:174b-4: de bzhin du du bza' ba dang /
T02D1347-2:174b-6: dpa' bo dang bcas te sha dang bcas pa ni
T02D1347-2:174b-7: 'chad par 'gyur ba'i rim pas sbyang ba dang rgyas
T02D1347-2:174b-8: pa dang rab tu 'bar bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:174b-9: de bzhin du bla ma dang ni zhabs dag la
T02D1347-2:174b-10: yang ste lha'i sku la rang gi rkang pa bgrod
T02D1347-2:174b-11: pa'i don du'o // gang gang bya ba nye bar
T02D1347-2:174b-12: sbyor bar 'gyur pa'i dngos po gang yin pa ste
T02D1347-2:174b-13: pa'i don du'o // / yon tan dbang gis zhes
T02D1347-2:174b-14: pa snying stobs dang rdul dang mun pa dang dri
T02D1347-2:174b-15: la sogs pa'i yul gyi dbang gis bya ba de
T02D1347-2:174b-16: la phyag rgya des reg nas sbyar bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:174b-17: sa la sogs la dkyil 'khor gyi don dang /
T02D1347-2:174b-18: rkang pa bgrod pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas phyag
T02D1347-2:174b-19: rgya 'di yis bsnun par bya ste mchog gi phyag
T02D1347-2:174b-20: rgya'o // da ni khro bo'i mgon po'i phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:174b-21: 'dir lag pa dag gis rdo rje bcings pa zhes
T02D1347-2:174b-22: pa la 'dir lag pa g-yas pa dang lag pa
T02D1347-2:174b-23: g-yon pa'i mkhrig ma steng dang 'og tu rab tu
T02D1347-2:174b-25: nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs kyi steng du rdo rje khu tshur gyis gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:174b-26: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pa yang rdo rje bcings pas te /
T02D1347-2:174b-27: nges par khro bo'i mgon po chen po'i phyag rgyar 'gyur zhes pa rdo rje shugs kyi'o //
T02D1347-2:174b-28: de bzhin du mdzub mo thog mtha' bcings shing zhes
T02D1347-2:174b-29: pa ni 'dir mdzub mo dag phan tshun du lcags
T02D1347-2:174b-30: kyu bcings shing mtha' zhes pa mthe chung gnyis po
T02D1347-2:174b-31: dag bcings te lag pa'i rgyab sbyar bas khu tshur
T02D1347-2:174b-32: bcings la mthe bo dag khu tshur gyi nang du'o
T02D1347-2:174b-33: // de ltar gtso bo srid pa gsum las rnam
T02D1347-2:174b-34: par rgyal ba'i zhes pa 'jig rten gsum las rnam
T02D1347-2:174b-35: par rgyal ba'i ste snying khar gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:174b-36: mtshan ma'i rnam pa dag kyang lhag ma rnams te
T02D1347-2:174b-37: rab gsal nges par lha dang lha mo rnams kyi'o
T02D1347-2:174b-38: // de bzhin du klu rnams kyi phyag rgya ni
T02D1347-2:174b-39: lag pa dag gis rdo re bcings pa zhes pa
T02D1347-2:175a-0: // ste / 'dir g-yon pa'i dpung pa dag nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshogs kyi @175a * //
T02D1347-2:175a-1: steng du g-yas pa'i dpung pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs bcings pa dang /
T02D1347-2:175a-2: lag pa g-yon pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs lag
T02D1347-2:175a-3: pa g-yas pa'i nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs kyi steng
T02D1347-2:175a-4: du ste / lag pa g-yon pa dang g-yas pa g-yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa dag go //
T02D1347-2:175a-5: de ltar g-yo ba'i gdengs ka'i rnam pa gdengs can rnams kyi phyag rgya ste /
T02D1347-2:175a-6: de ltar g-yas su bskor bas kyang rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:175a-7: da ni mthe bo zhes pa la sogs pas mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:175a-8: 'dir rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgya la lag
T02D1347-2:175a-9: pa sbyar ba byas nas mthe bo dag sbyar zhing
T02D1347-2:175a-10: mthe chung gnyis sbyar la de dag padma'i 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:175a-11: dang mtshungs la gung mo gnyis mnyam par dbus su
T02D1347-2:175a-12: brkyang ste / mdzub mo gnyis gung mo dag gi
T02D1347-2:175a-13: rgyab kyi char phyed 'khyog pa zla ba phyed pa'i
T02D1347-2:175a-14: brkyang ste / rnam pa dang / ming med 'og
T02D1347-2:175a-15: tu bskum pa rang gi lag mthil son gyur pa
T02D1347-2:175a-16: de ltar phyag rgya 'di ni rdo rje can gyi
T02D1347-2:175a-17: rdo rje rtse mo lnga par 'gyur te bstan par
T02D1347-2:175a-19: sngar gsungs pa'i mchog gi phyag rgya yang 'di'o //
T02D1347-2:175a-20: de bzhin du rtsibs kyi rnam pa sor mo rnams
T02D1347-2:175a-21: te lag pa gnyi ga la gnas mthe bo la
T02D1347-2:175a-22: sogs mtha' dag rnams zhes pa ni rdo rje'i phyag
T02D1347-2:175a-23: rgya gzhan te shes rab la 'khyud pa'i don du'o
T02D1347-2:175a-24: // de bzhin du lag pa gnyis ni rdo rje
T02D1347-2:175a-25: bcings pa snga ma bzhin du rdo rje'i khu tshur
T02D1347-2:175a-27: g-yas pa steng du byas shing g-yon pa gang yin
T02D1347-2:175a-28: pa 'og tu khu tshur gyis dril bur 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:175a-29: // de bzhin du khu tshur phyed pa ming med
T02D1347-2:175a-30: dang mthe chung gi khu tshur gyi nang du mthe
T02D1347-2:175a-31: // bo'o // de ltar khu tshur phyed par mdzub
T02D1347-2:175a-32: mo dang ni gung mo sbyar ba mda' dang mtshungs
T02D1347-2:175a-33: pa dag kyang ral gri rnon por 'gyur zhes pa
T02D1347-2:175a-34: steng du ral gri'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:175a-35: de bzhin du mthe bo khu tshur phyed pa dang /
T02D1347-2:175a-36: mdzub mo la sogs zhes pa mdzub mo dang /
T02D1347-2:175a-38: ming med rtse gsum gyi rnam pa slar yang bkram
T02D1347-2:175a-39: pa dag ste khu tshur phyed pa yis ni rtse
T02D1347-2:175a-41: thams cad du yul gyi don la bdun pa'o //
T02D1347-2:175b-0: @175b de bzhin du dpal ldan gri gug khu tshur
T02D1347-2:175b-1: bcings shing mthe chung zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa
T02D1347-2:175b-2: gdul dka' rnams 'jigs par byed par 'gyur zhes pa
T02D1347-2:175b-4: de bzhin du rna ba'i steng du khu tshur bcings
T02D1347-2:175b-5: shing gung mo'i steng du mthe bo dang 'og tu
T02D1347-2:175b-6: mdzub mo ste mda' yi mchog gi phyag rgya la
T02D1347-2:175b-7: zhes pa ni mda'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:175b-8: lcags kyu la rdo rje khu tshur bcings shing mdzub
T02D1347-2:175b-9: mo khu tshur gyi steng du lcags kyu'i rnam par
T02D1347-2:175b-10: shin tu 'khyog po ni lcags kyu'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:175b-11: de bzhin du mthe cung dang mthe bo dag gis khu tshur dang ;
T02D1347-2:175b-13: ming med 'og tu mda' dang mtshungs par sbyar zhing
T02D1347-2:175b-14: de dag gi steng du gung mo ni mdung las
T02D1347-2:175b-15: te / de ltar mdung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:175b-16: de bzhin du thad kar khu tshur dang dpung pa rab tu brkyang ba dbyug pa la ste /
T02D1347-2:175b-17: de ltar dbyug pa'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:175b-18: de bzhin du lag mthil shin tu mnyam la steng
T02D1347-2:175b-19: du mthe bo rab tu brkyang zhing thad ka'i char
T02D1347-2:175b-20: mdzub mo la sogs pa bzhi sbyar ba ste /
T02D1347-2:175b-21: de ltar dgra sta'i phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:175b-22: de bzhin du steng du khu tshur gnyis dang khu
T02D1347-2:175b-23: tshur gnyis kyi steng du yang mdzub mor 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:175b-24: lha min bdag po glang chen ni log 'dren te
T02D1347-2:175b-25: de'i pags pa dag la'o zhes pa glang po che'i
T02D1347-2:175b-27: de bzhin du mche ba la ni lag pa gnyi
T02D1347-2:175b-28: ga'i mthil du khu tshur bcings shing mthe chung zla
T02D1347-2:175b-29: ba phyed pa'i rnam pa g-yas dang g-yas min ni
T02D1347-2:175b-30: kha la bstan par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:175b-31: de ltar mche ba'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:175b-32: lag pa g-yas kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya dang glang
T02D1347-2:175b-33: po che'i pags pas mche ba'i phyag rgya'i nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:175b-34: // da ni lag pa g-yon pa'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:175b-35: de bzhin du khe ta ka la ste phub la
T02D1347-2:175b-36: dpung pa g-yon pa rab tu brkyang zhing lag pa'i
T02D1347-2:175b-37: mthil ni steng du son pa mi 'jigs pa'i lag
T02D1347-2:175b-39: de ltar phub kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:175b-40: de bzhin du kha tv'am ga la khu tshur bug pa ste /
T02D1347-2:176a-0: @176a * // ming med dang mthe bo rnams sbyar zhing phrag pa'i
T02D1347-2:176a-1: gnas su mthe chung steng du rab tu brkyang pa
T02D1347-2:176a-2: ste / de ltar kha tv'am ga'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-3: de bzhin du thod pa la sor mo bug pa
T02D1347-2:176a-4: med pa'i lag pa pad 'dab lta bu gan rkyal
T02D1347-2:176a-6: de bzhin du gzhu la rab tu brkyang ba'i lag pa gan rkyal khu tshur te /
T02D1347-2:176a-8: de bzhin du g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyi steng du
T02D1347-2:176a-9: gung mo dag ni mdzub mo 'khyog po rten pa
T02D1347-2:176a-10: ste / gnyis kyis dbus su bug pa'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-11: de ltar rdo rje zhags pa ste 'di ni lag pa gcig gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-12: gzhan ni lag pa gnyis kyis cig car gyis te
T02D1347-2:176a-13: chu lha la sogs pa'i g-yas pa gang du rdo
T02D1347-2:176a-14: rje lcags kyu ma mthong ba'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-15: de ltar zhags pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-16: de bzhin du sbyar ba ste 'dus pa'i ser mo
T02D1347-2:176a-17: lnga po rnams kyi dbus su gung mo byas nas
T02D1347-2:176a-18: steng du brkyang pa'i phyag ces pa ni rin po
T02D1347-2:176a-19: che'i phyag rgya'o // lag pa g-yon pa'i padma'i phyag
T02D1347-2:176a-20: rgyal mthe bo dang mthe chung sbyar te mdzub mo
T02D1347-2:176a-21: la sogs pa ni phyogs rnams su'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-22: de ltar sor mo rnams rnam par phye ba padma 'dab ma bzhi pa lta bu ste /
T02D1347-2:176a-23: lag pa gnyi ga dag gis padma 'dab ma brgyad par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:176a-25: de bzhin du da ma ru la gung mo dang ming med dag gis khu tshur bcings shing /
T02D1347-2:176a-26: mdzub mo lcags kyu'i rnam pa dang /
T02D1347-2:176a-27: mthe bo'i sen mo'i steng du mthe chung phyed 'khyog pa'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-28: de bzhin du tho ba la khu tshur bcings pa'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-29: 'khor lo la sor mo thams cad rtsibs kyi rnam
T02D1347-2:176a-30: par rab tu brkyang ba lag pa gcig la ste
T02D1347-2:176a-31: lag pa gnyis ka'i mthil sbyar ba'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-32: de bzhin du mdzub mo dang mthe bo dag sbyar
T02D1347-2:176a-33: te mthe bo'i 'og tu mthe chung la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:176a-34: khu tshur dang / mthe bo dang mdzub mo rab tu brkyang ba dag dung gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-35: me long ni mngon du phyogs shing shin tu mnyam pa'i lag mthil g-yon pa ste /
T02D1347-2:176a-36: me long gi phyag rgyal sor mo rnams bug pa med pa'o //
T02D1347-2:176a-37: de bzhin du mdzub mo dang por byas nas mthe
T02D1347-2:176b-0: chung gi mthar @176b thug pa ste mthe bo'i steng
T02D1347-2:176b-1: du mdzub mo 'khyog po zlum po'i rnam pa'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-3: gung mo'i steng du ming med do //
T02D1347-2:176b-4: ming med kyi steng du mthe chung ngo //
T02D1347-2:176b-5: de ltar lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-6: de bzhin du tshangs pa'i mgo bo la mthe bo
T02D1347-2:176b-7: la sogs bzhi po phan tshun sbyar bas gdong dang
T02D1347-2:176b-8: mtshungs shing 'og tu gdong rnams te mthe chung bskum
T02D1347-2:176b-9: pa ni mgo bo'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-10: de bzhin du lag pa dag gis dung gi phyag rgya sbyar ba cod pan du 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:176b-11: steng du mdzub mo gnyis sbyar ba'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-12: lag pa gnyi ga'i mthil gyi phyi phyogs sbyar te
T02D1347-2:176b-13: rgyab tu sor mo lnga po rnams ni rna rgyan
T02D1347-2:176b-14: la ni rna rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-15: de bzhin du lag pa'i rgyab tu sor mo rnams
T02D1347-2:176b-16: ni rim par yongs su bkod cing phan tshun bcings
T02D1347-2:176b-17: pa mgul pa'i rgyan la ste /
T02D1347-2:176b-18: de ltar mgul rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-19: de bzhin du ske rags la g-yon pa dang g-yas
T02D1347-2:176b-20: pa dag gi sor mo gsum ni ming med dang
T02D1347-2:176b-23: sor mo rtse mo sbyar zhing mthe chung dang /
T02D1347-2:176b-24: mthe bos khu tshur bcings pa ni ske rags kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-25: de bzhin du lag pa gnyi ga'i mthe bo gnyis dang gung mo gnyis sbyar te /
T02D1347-2:176b-26: de dag gis zlum skor lta bur byas shing sor
T02D1347-2:176b-27: mo lhag ma rnams kyis khu tshur bcings pa ni
T02D1347-2:176b-30: de bzhin du dpung rgyan nam /
T02D1347-2:176b-31: gdu bu la mthe bo sbyar ba dang /
T02D1347-2:176b-32: mdzub mo sbyar ba zlum skor lta bur 'gyur zhes te bcom ldan 'das kyi mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-33: da ni mthe bo zhes pa la sogs pas rigs kyi phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:176b-34: 'dir rdo rje khu tshur gyi steng du mthe bo
T02D1347-2:176b-35: bstan pa ni mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi thun
T02D1347-2:176b-36: mong du rigs kyi phyag rgyar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:176b-37: de bzhin du rdo rje khu tshur gyi steng du
T02D1347-2:176b-38: mdzub mo rab tu brkyang ba ni gsang ba pa
T02D1347-2:176b-39: ste / gnod sbyin rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:176b-40: de bzhin du khu tshur bcings pa las gung mo
T02D1347-2:176b-41: rab tu brkyang ste bstan pa ni dri za rnams
T02D1347-2:177a-0: @177a * // de bzhin du ming med ni gdengs can rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:177a-1: mthe chung bstan pa ni 'byung po rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:177a-2: de bzhin nyid du steng du sor mo bzhi po
T02D1347-2:177a-3: rnams kyis khu tshur bcings te lag pa'i mthil rab
T02D1347-2:177a-4: tu gsal bar bstan pa ni srin po rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:177a-6: khu tshur bcings te bstan pa ni grub pa rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:177a-7: de bzhin du dpung pa dang nye ba'i dpung pa'i tshigs ni lha rnams kyi rigs so //
T02D1347-2:177a-8: de bzhin du lag pa'i rgyab kyi mthil ni tshangs pa'i srin po'i'o //
T02D1347-2:177a-9: de bzhin du nye ba'i dpung pa dang /
T02D1347-2:177a-10: lag pa'i tshigs bstan pa ni ro langs rnams kyi rigs su 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:177a-11: de ltar phyag rgya rnam pa brgyad ni rigs brgyad
T02D1347-2:177a-12: las skyes pa rnams la lag pa g-yon pas bstan
T02D1347-2:177a-13: par bya'o // da ni lag pa zhes pa la
T02D1347-2:177a-14: sogs pas dud 'gro'i gdong can rnams kyi rigs kyi
T02D1347-2:177a-17: gnyi ga'i mthil du sor mo lnga po rnams phyed
T02D1347-2:177a-18: 'khyog pa seng ge'i sder mo'i rnam pas sder mo
T02D1347-2:177a-19: can rnams kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:177a-20: de bzhin du khu tshur bcings pa las lag pa
T02D1347-2:177a-21: gnyi ga'i khu tshur gyi steng du mdzub mo gnyis
T02D1347-2:177a-22: po phyed 'khyog pa zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pas
T02D1347-2:177a-23: mgo bor bstan pa ni rva can rnams kyi'o zhes
T02D1347-2:177a-24: pa rva can rnams kyi phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:177a-25: de bzhin du lag pa'i mthil gyi rgyab sbyar nas
T02D1347-2:177a-26: mthe chung gnyis phan tshun bcings shing mdzub mo dang
T02D1347-2:177a-28: srin lag gshibs te brkyang nas mthe bo dag gi
T02D1347-2:177a-29: gdong sbyar ba ni de ltar bya khyung gi phyag
T02D1347-2:177a-30: rgya'o // de bzhin du sor mo lnga po rtse
T02D1347-2:177a-31: mo'i tshigs 'khyog pa bstan pa gdengs can rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:177a-33: / de bzhin du 'bar pa'i phyag rgya la gung mo dang /
T02D1347-2:177a-35: mthe chung brkyang ste lag pa gnyi ga'i mdzub mo
T02D1347-2:177a-36: gnyis po phan tshun mdud de mgo bo'i steng du
T02D1347-2:177b-0: mchog gi lag mthil dag @177b gi rnam pa de nyid kyis te /
T02D1347-2:177b-1: 'on kyang mdzub mo brkyang pa ni gzhan pa ste 'bar ba'i phyag rgya gnyis pa'o //
T02D1347-2:177b-2: rigs kyi phyag rgya dud 'gro'i gdong can rnams la bstan par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:177b-3: da ni mdzub mo zhes pa la sogs pas dpa' bo dang /
T02D1347-2:177b-4: dpa' bo'i dbang phyug ma rnams phan tshun du phebs par smra ba'i phyag rgya gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:177b-5: 'dir yang dang gang du phrad pa tsam gyis khu
T02D1347-2:177b-6: tshur bcings nas steng du phyogs pa'i mdzub mo mthe
T02D1347-2:177b-7: bo la mngon par phyogs shing sbyar ba bstan par
T02D1347-2:177b-8: bya ste / de bstan na legs par 'ongs sam du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:177b-9: rnal 'byor pa la rnal 'byor mas sam /
T02D1347-2:177b-10: rnal 'byor ma la rnal 'byor pas so //
T02D1347-2:177b-11: gnyis kyis te mdzub mo dang /
T02D1347-2:177b-12: gung mo rgyab tu yang dag par ldan pa dag
T02D1347-2:177b-13: gis shin tu legs par 'ongs pa brjod par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:177b-14: ro // de bzhin du g-yon pa'i mthe bo khu
T02D1347-2:177b-15: tshur bcings pas skal bzang dge ba rab tu brjod
T02D1347-2:177b-16: ro // par 'gyur ro // de bzhin du sor mo'i se go la rdebs pa mthe bo dang /
T02D1347-2:177b-17: mdzub mo dag gis khyod ni 'di ru sngags pa mchog tu nges par brjod par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:177b-18: mthe bo dang ni ming med dag gis se gol
T02D1347-2:177b-19: byas na dam tshig bcas pa'i chang gis khyod ni
T02D1347-2:177b-22: de bzhin du phyag 'tshal ba'i sbyor bas sor mo
T02D1347-2:177b-23: thams cad rtse mo brkyang pas skal bzang legs par
T02D1347-2:177b-24: 'ongs pa brjod par 'gyur rnal 'byor pa la yang
T02D1347-2:177b-25: // de bzhin du g-yon gyi yan lag reg pas
T02D1347-2:177b-26: rtag tu khyod ni bdag gi gnyen gcig pu dag
T02D1347-2:177b-27: rab tu gsal bar byed do //
T02D1347-2:177b-28: de bzhin du skye gnas la reg pas khyo bo ste /
T02D1347-2:177b-31: sen mo 'debs pas kyang khyo por brjod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:177b-32: ser mo phan tshun bcings pa zhes pa ni lag
T02D1347-2:177b-33: pa dag sbyar ba byas nas mthe chung la sogs
T02D1347-2:177b-34: pa sor mo phan tshun bcings te bcings pa de
T02D1347-2:177b-36: ming med bcings shing mthe bo dang gung mo rab
T02D1347-2:177b-37: tu brkyang pas dam tshig la 'dus pa brjod par
T02D1347-2:178a-2: da ni mchu dang zhes pa la sogs pas smod pa'i phyag rgya gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:178a-3: 'dir gang gi tshe gang dang gang du pho nya
T02D1347-2:178a-4: mos mthong bar gyur na sgrub pa po mthong nas
T02D1347-2:178a-5: mchu la sogs pa yo ba ston par byed do
T02D1347-2:178a-9: de bzhin du mgo bo la 'phrug par byed na
T02D1347-2:178a-10: khyod shin tu cher rmongs pa rjod par byed de
T02D1347-2:178a-11: gang gi tshe phyag rgya'i brda mi shes pa'i phyir
T02D1347-2:178a-12: ro // de bzhin du gal te des mche ba'i
T02D1347-2:178a-13: dbus su mthe chung bkod na de'i tshe mthe chung
T02D1347-2:178a-14: des 'jigs pa rab tu bar byed do //
T02D1347-2:178a-15: yang na mdzub mo snying ga'am /
T02D1347-2:178a-16: khar bkod na 'jigs pa brjod par byed do //
T02D1347-2:178a-17: de bzhin du mthe bo khu tshur bcings pa byas te /
T02D1347-2:178a-18: khu tshur bcings pa de las de nyid kyis sa la rdebs pas pa'am /
T02D1347-2:178a-20: rkang pa rdebs par gyur na nga yis bza' bar bya'o zhes brjod pa ste /
T02D1347-2:178a-21: phyag rgya'i brda mngon par mi shes pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa smod pa'i phyag rgya'o //
T02D1347-2:178a-22: de bzhin du zas kyi don du ming med kyis lce la reg na zos pa dang /
T02D1347-2:178a-23: de bzhin du lag pa g-yon pas lto dang so la bsnun pa dag gis ma zos pa'o //
T02D1347-2:178a-24: de bzhin du lag pa'i rgyab ston par gyur na
T02D1347-2:178a-25: song zhig ces nges par rab tu brjod pa ste
T02D1347-2:178a-26: / mngon du phyogs pa ston par gyur na 'dug cig ces brjod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:178a-27: de bzhin du byin pa nyid pa dang /
T02D1347-2:178a-28: brla nyed par gyur na skal bzang khyod de ring ngal so zhig pa rjod par byed do //
T02D1347-2:178a-29: de bzhin du rkang pa rab tu skyod pas gnyid log cig ces pa'i nges pa sbyin pa'o //
T02D1347-2:178a-30: de bzhin du bus mo zung ngag skyong bas bdag
T02D1347-2:178a-31: la shin tu dga' ba gyis zhes pa nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:178a-32: // de bzhin du rang gi yan lag kun la lag pa g-yon pas reg pa'am /
T02D1347-2:178a-33: khar lag pa g-yon pa bkab ste /
T02D1347-2:178a-34: de ltar byed na khyod dang lhan cig bdag la 'dus pa med do zhes brjod pa ste /
T02D1347-2:178a-35: rje bo la sogs pas bsrungs pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:178a-36: de bzhin du rang gi lag pa phan tshun bcings te /
T02D1347-2:178a-37: mthe bo dang mdzub mo dbus nas rnam par phyung
T02D1347-2:178a-38: na de'i tshe phyag rgyas de ring bdag gi khyim
T02D1347-2:178a-39: du 'khor lo 'dus pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes
T02D1347-2:178b-0: brjod pa ste / khyod kyang 'dug @178b cig ces pa'i don to //
T02D1347-2:178b-1: mthe bo ming med rtse mo ston pa dag gis
T02D1347-2:178b-2: rnam mang dam tshig rnams kyis khyod la ji ltar
T02D1347-2:178b-3: 'dod par mchod par bya ste zhes brjod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:178b-4: de bzhin du rkang pa la ni 'phrug par byed par gyur na /
T02D1347-2:178b-5: phyi rol gyi 'khor lo 'dus pa rnams la 'gro ba yang brjod pa ste /
T02D1347-2:178b-6: khyod kyang shog cig ces pa dgongs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:178b-7: de bzhin du mdzub mo lcags kyu'i rnams pas phan
T02D1347-2:178b-8: tshun bcings bar gyur na rdo rje'i grogs po khyod
T02D1347-2:178b-9: ni de ring 'jigs pa 'phrog par byed ces pa
T02D1347-2:178b-10: ste / de ltar dam tshig 'dus pa'i phyag rgya nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:178b-11: da ni skra zhes pa la sogs pas shin tu khros pa rnams kyi phyag rgya gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:178b-12: 'dir gang gi tshe sgrub pa po log pa'i nga rgyal gyis brnyas pa byed dam /
T02D1347-2:178b-13: nus pa dang ldan pa ma gtogs par phyag rgya'i lan ston par byed na /
T02D1347-2:178b-14: de'i tshe nus pa dang ldan pa rang gi skra rnams rang gi sos gcod par byed de /
T02D1347-2:178b-15: de ltar skra ni rang gi so yis gcod par
T02D1347-2:178b-16: byed par gyur na phyag rgyas kyi mi yi phyugs
T02D1347-2:178b-17: khyod bdag gis 'dir ni ltung bar bya zhes pa
T02D1347-2:178b-18: 'di brjod pa'o // de bzhin du so la sos phan tshun 'dar bar byed de /
T02D1347-2:178b-19: de 'dar bar gyur na kye mi yi phyugs khyod
T02D1347-2:178b-20: kyi sha ni 'di dag de ring bdag gis bza'
T02D1347-2:178b-21: bar bya zhes pa 'di brjod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:178b-22: de bzhin du lce mchu g-yo bar byed par gyur
T02D1347-2:178b-23: na khyod kyi lus las khrag ni btung bar bya'o
T02D1347-2:178b-25: de bzhin du mchu la so yis 'debs par byed
T02D1347-2:178b-26: na khyod kyi rgyu ma lto bar gnas 'di bdag
T02D1347-2:178b-27: gis bza' bar bya kye mi yi phyogs khyod gang
T02D1347-2:178b-28: du 'gro zhes rjod par byed pa ste khros par
T02D1347-2:178b-29: gyur pa phyag rgya ston par byed na nus pa
T02D1347-2:178b-30: dang phral ba des phyag rgya'i lan bstan par mi
T02D1347-2:178b-31: bya zhing de rnams la phyag byas nas /
T02D1347-2:178b-32: snying gar lag pa g-yon pa'i mthil bzhag la rang
T02D1347-2:178b-33: gi lus g-yon skor gyis yongs su bskor zhing de
T02D1347-2:178b-34: nas lag pa g-yon pas steng du phyag byas nas
T02D1347-2:178b-36: de rnams dang lhan cig rtsod par mi bya'o //
T02D1347-2:178b-37: byis pa'i rnal 'byor pa rnams la nges pa gang byin pa de des bya'o //
T02D1347-2:179a-2: khros pa'i pho nya mo nus pa dang ldan pa'o zhes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:179a-3: da ni phan tshun phyag rgya bstan pa la lan gyi mtshan nyid gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:179a-4: 'dir bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo'i g-yon pa
T02D1347-2:179a-5: dang g-yas pa'i phyag gi mtshan ma gang yin pa
T02D1347-2:179a-6: de'i rang bzhin ni phyag rgya rnams so //
T02D1347-2:179a-7: de las kyang phan tshun du phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan te /
T02D1347-2:179a-8: rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bu dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-9: ral gri dang phu ba dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-10: rtse gsum dang kha tv'am ga dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-11: gri gug dang thod pa dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-13: lcags kyu dang zhags pa dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-14: da ma ru dang rin po che dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-15: tho ba dang padma dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-17: mdung dang mo long dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-18: dbyug pa dang lcags sgrog dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-19: dgra sta dang tshangs pa'i mgo dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-20: glang po che'i pags pa dang sdigs mdzub dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-21: dbu rgyan dang rna rgyan dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-22: mgul rgyan dang lag gdub dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-23: ske rags dang rkang gdub dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-24: rva can dang sen mo can dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-25: klu dang mkha' lding dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-26: lag pa dang rkang pa dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-27: kha dang bshang lam dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-28: bha ga dang rtags dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-29: nu ma dang mchu dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-30: mig dang smin ma dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-31: thig le dang mig sman dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-32: rab tu khro ba dang gtsug pung [*bud?] dgrol ba dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-33: pus mo dang brla dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-34: mgrin pa dang dpral pa dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-35: lte ba dang snying ga dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-36: skra mtshams dang sindhu ra dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-37: mche ba dang mthe chung dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-38: mthe bo dang ming med dag dang /
T02D1347-2:179a-39: mdzub mo dang gung mo dag go //
T02D1347-2:179a-40: de ltar phyag rgya du ma bstan pa na phyag rgya'i lan du mar 'gyur te /
T02D1347-2:179a-41: shes rab dang thabs kyi chos dang sa la sogs
T02D1347-2:179a-42: pa'i de nyid kyi dbye pas thams cad du rnal
T02D1347-2:179a-43: 'byor pas rig par bya'o zhes pa ni nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:179a-44: // da ni sgeg pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya mtha' yas pa rnams te /
T02D1347-2:179a-45: de rnams kyi rang bzhin shes nas de rnams thams cad rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:179b-0: sgeg pa'i sbyor ba yis ni sgeg @179b par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:179b-1: te mi yi bdag po bzhad pa'i sbyor bas bzhad
T02D1347-2:179b-2: pa'o // gar gyi sbyor ba yis ni gar du
T02D1347-2:179b-3: 'gyur te rnam pa mang po'i rol mo'i sbyor bas
T02D1347-2:179b-4: pa'o // rol mo'o // glu yi sbyor ba yis
T02D1347-2:179b-5: ni glu ste mchog gi yon tan rnams mang dri
T02D1347-2:179b-6: yi sbyor ba dag gis dri //
T02D1347-2:179b-7: phreng ba'i sbyor ba yis ni phreng bar 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:179b-8: yon tan dbang gis spos kyi sbyor ba dag gis
T02D1347-2:179b-9: spos // mar me'i rnam pas mar me nges par
T02D1347-2:179b-10: mun pa bcom pa dang ni snod kyi phyag rgya
T02D1347-2:179b-11: spos // bdud rtsir 'gyur // zhes pa de ltar
T02D1347-2:179b-12: phyag rgya thams cad slar yang de nas lnga yi
T02D1347-2:179b-13: dbye bas rnam par phye ba ste //
T02D1347-2:179b-14: gzhan pa phyag rgya mtha' yas rnams kyang mtha' dag
T02D1347-2:179b-15: lus la gnas pa rnal 'byor pa yis rig par
T02D1347-2:179b-16: bya // gang gang dngos po'i rang bzhin du 'gyur
T02D1347-2:179b-17: sa yi steng du de yi rang bzhin dag kyang
T02D1347-2:179b-18: bya // phyag rgya rnams // zhes pa de'i phyir /
T02D1347-2:179b-19: ji snyed mig ni rnam g-yeng ba //
T02D1347-2:179b-20: de snyed phyag rgya rab tu grags //
T02D1347-2:179b-21: phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan la ni //
T02D1347-2:179b-22: nges pa 'dzin par su yis nus //
T02D1347-2:179b-24: ji srid mngon shes ma bskyed pa //
T02D1347-2:179b-25: de srid 'jig rten rtsod don du //
T02D1347-2:179b-26: phyag rgya'i lan ni bstan mi bya //
T02D1347-2:179b-27: zhes pa ni phyag rgya'i brda'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:179b-28: da ni pho nya mo zhes pa la sogs pas lta stangs kyi brda gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:179b-29: 'dir gang gi tshe rnal 'byor pa mthong ba na
T02D1347-2:179b-30: pho nya mo zhes pa rnal 'byor ma 'phred la
T02D1347-2:179b-31: mig lta bar byed na lta stangs des khyod ni
T02D1347-2:179b-32: gnas gang zhig nas 'ongs zhes pa'i dri ba skal
T02D1347-2:179b-33: pa bzang la zhes pa rnal 'byor pa la rjod
T02D1347-2:179b-34: par byed do // de nas mgo bor lag pa
T02D1347-2:179b-35: g-yon pa bzhag ste phyogs su nges par bltas pa
T02D1347-2:179b-36: rnal 'byor pa yis gnas nas 'ongs pa brjod pa
T02D1347-2:179b-38: steng du lta bas khyod ni dge 'am rjod par byed do //
T02D1347-2:179b-39: sa yi steng du gnas pas khyod ni 'dug la ngal so zhig ces pa rjod par byed do //
T02D1347-2:179b-40: yon por lta bas khyod song zhig ces pa'o //
T02D1347-2:179b-41: chags pa'i lta bas pho nya mo ni shin tu dga' ba gyis shig ces rjod par byed do //
T02D1347-2:179b-42: zhi ba'i lta bas khyod ni bdag gi grogs po zhes rjod par byed de /
T02D1347-2:180a-1: par smra ba'i lta stangs kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:180a-2: da ni 'jigs pa'i lta stangs rnams gsungs te /
T02D1347-2:180a-3: 'dir gang gi tshe khro gnyer byas nas khro bo'i lta ba ston par byed na /
T02D1347-2:180a-4: de'i tshe khro gnyer khro bo'i lta ba des rnal
T02D1347-2:180a-5: 'byor pa la 'jigs pa rab tu gsal bar byed
T02D1347-2:180a-6: de mi shes pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:180a-7: de bzhin du skra la lta bas bdag ni ma rungs pa zhes brjod pa ste /
T02D1347-2:180a-8: skal bzang la ni zhes pa rnal 'byor pa la rang gi rang bzhin zur 'di dag gis so //
T02D1347-2:180a-9: de bzhin du mdzod spur lta bas bdag ni mchog go zhes rab tu gsal bar byed do //
T02D1347-2:180a-10: de bzhin du sna la lta bas yon tan rab tu gsal bar byed do //
T02D1347-2:180a-11: mchu la lta bas rang gi skal ba bzang po rab tu gsal bar byed do //
T02D1347-2:180a-12: de bzhin du rang gi nu ma zung la lta
T02D1347-2:180a-13: na bdag ni phyag rgya bzang mo zhes brjod do
T02D1347-2:180a-14: // snying gar lta bas bsgoms pa'i bdag nyid do zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-2:180a-15: de bzhin du lag pa zung la lta na bdag ni rab tu gtum mo zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-2:180a-16: de bzhin du phrag par lta bas bdag ni nus ma zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-2:180a-17: de bzhin du sen mo dang bcas pa'i lag mthil
T02D1347-2:180a-18: la lta na bdag ni srin mo zhes brjod do
T02D1347-2:180a-19: // de bzhin du rgyab tu lta bas bdag ni klu mo zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-2:180a-20: de bzhin du lte bar lta bas bdag ni dam tshig can zhes brjod de /
T02D1347-2:180a-21: mi'i dbang po zhes pa ni bod pa'o //
T02D1347-2:180a-22: de bzhin du gsang bar lta bas bdag ni dag pa zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-2:180a-23: de bzhin du brlab lta bas bdag ni shin tu dga' la gdul bar dka' zhes brjod do ;
T02D1347-2:180a-24: / de bzhin du pus mor lta bas bdag ni grub pa zhes pa brjod do //
T02D1347-2:180a-25: de bzhin du rkang pa la lta bas bdag ni rdzu 'phrul sbyin pa mo zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-2:180a-26: de bzhin du rkang pa'i mthe bor nges par lta
T02D1347-2:180a-27: bar byed na lta stangs des bdag ni srid par
T02D1347-2:180a-28: rdo rje'i sku ste dpa' mo gcig pu'o hes brjod
T02D1347-2:180a-29: do // de bzhin du rkang pa dag gi sor
T02D1347-2:180a-30: mo kun gyi rtse mor lta bas srid pa gsum
T02D1347-2:180a-31: gyi gnas su bdag ni kun du 'gro ma sna
T02D1347-2:180a-32: tshogs yum mo zhes brjod do //
T02D1347-2:180a-33: de bzhin du rnal 'byor pa nus pa dang ldan
T02D1347-2:180a-34: pa yang bdag nyid kyi yon tan rnams pho nya
T02D1347-2:180b-0: mo rnams la rab tu @180b gsal bar byed do
T02D1347-2:180b-1: // de ltar gsungs pa'i rim pas pho nya mo rnams kho na'i lta stangs te /
T02D1347-2:180b-2: slar yang rang bzhin rnams kyis rnam pa mang por
T02D1347-2:180b-3: rig par bya'o zhes pa ni lta stangs kyi brda'i
T02D1347-2:180b-4: nges pa'o // de bzhin du brda dngos po gang
T02D1347-2:180b-5: gi ming gang yin pa de'i yi ge dang pos
T02D1347-2:180b-6: de gzung bar rig par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:180b-7: gnas skabs kyi dbang gis so //
T02D1347-2:180b-8: dper na sandha pa khyer la shog ces brjod pa na khrus la gos dang /
T02D1347-2:180b-11: g-yul la ral gri'o zhes pa'i rigs pas dang po'i
T02D1347-2:180b-12: yi ge'i brda yis dngos po'i chos thams cad rig
T02D1347-2:180b-13: par bya'o // tshogs kyi 'khor lo la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:180b-14: la dam tshig dang mi ldan pa'i sems can gyi
T02D1347-2:180b-15: nang du rnal 'byor pa'am rnal 'byor mas dgongs pa'i
T02D1347-2:180b-16: skad gzhan nam brdas brjod par bya'o zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:180b-18: da ni slob ma rnams kyi sbyin pa'i don du
T02D1347-2:180b-19: rang gi lus la sogs pa'i cha'i nges pa gsungs
T02D1347-2:180b-20: pa / drug pa zhes pa la sogs pa ste /
T02D1347-2:180b-21: 'dir gang gi tshe rdo rje slob dpon gyis khyim pa'am /
T02D1347-2:180b-23: dge slong la dbang bskur ba na des dam bca' ba 'di bya ste /
T02D1347-2:180b-24: bdag gis dus thams cad du dngos po thams cad
T02D1347-2:180b-25: kyi drug cha sbyin par dbul bar bya'o zhes pa
T02D1347-2:180b-26: nges pa'o // de la dang por re zhig drug
T02D1347-2:180b-27: cha lus kyi nang nas lag pa rkang pa lus
T02D1347-2:180b-28: dag las zhes pa lag pa gnyis dang rkang pa
T02D1347-2:180b-30: lnga po 'di rnams kyi nang nas drug pa yan
T02D1347-2:180b-31: lag mchog ni slob dpon la phyag 'tshal ba'i don
T02D1347-2:180b-32: du sbyin par rab tu dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:180b-33: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang ldan pa'i
T02D1347-2:180b-34: bla ma la de phul na mchog gi phyag rgya
T02D1347-2:180b-35: rjes su rig pas 'bul ba po ni bde ba'i
T02D1347-2:180b-37: de bzhin du las kyi dbang po rnams kyi nang nas ngag dbul bar bya ste /
T02D1347-2:180b-41: bha ga la sogs pa'i dbang po rnams las drug
T02D1347-2:180b-42: pa ngag gi dbang po ni bden par smra ba'i
T02D1347-2:180b-43: don du ngag dbul bar bya'o zhes pa bcom ldan
T02D1347-2:181a-0: de bzhin du mig dang rna @181a * //
T02D1347-2:181a-3: lus kyi dbang po rnams kyi nang nas drug pa
T02D1347-2:181a-4: yid de yon tan dang bcas g-yo sgyu'i spros pa
T02D1347-2:181a-5: dang bral ba sems can gyi don du dbul bar
T02D1347-2:181a-6: bya ste sbyin pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:181a-7: de bzhin du khams kyi cha shas zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:181a-8: gser dang rin po che dang 'bru la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:181a-9: sems med pa'i rdzas rnams ni khams te /
T02D1347-2:181a-11: glo bur du byung ba'i khams de rnams las drug
T02D1347-2:181a-12: gi cha shas ni rnal 'byor ma la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:181a-13: mchod pa'i don du dbul bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:181a-14: de bzhin du sems dang bcas pa rkang gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:181a-15: dang rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi drug gi cha shas
T02D1347-2:181a-17: cha shas lnga ni bdag nyid dang rtsa lag nye bar longs spyod pa'i don du gzhag par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:181a-18: de bzhin du de nyid cha yis gzhan zhes pa
T02D1347-2:181a-19: gzugs bzang chung ma la sogs pa zla ba'i nang
T02D1347-2:181a-20: du lan lnga 'dod pa'i sbyin pa dbul bar bya'o
T02D1347-2:181a-21: zhes pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:181a-22: rnam pa gzhan du sngags kyi tshul la 'dod pa
T02D1347-2:181a-23: sbyin pa ma gtogs par bskal pa mtha' yas pa
T02D1347-2:181a-24: dag gis phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub tu mi
T02D1347-2:181a-25: 'gyur zhing las kyi phyag rgya dang /
T02D1347-2:181a-26: ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub tu yang mi
T02D1347-2:181a-27: 'gyur te chags pas zil gyis mnan pa rigs la
T02D1347-2:181a-29: de ltar drug cha dbul ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:181a-30: da ni sems can gang dag ces pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:181a-31: pas snying rje'i dbang bskur ba gsungs pa 'dir 'jig
T02D1347-2:181a-32: rten gyi khams te 'gro ba drug po rnams las
T02D1347-2:181a-33: sems can gang dag dbang ma bskur ba rnam gsum
T02D1347-2:181a-34: srid par gnas rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
T02D1347-2:181a-35: rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas bsgoms pa tsam de
T02D1347-2:181a-36: rnams la mchog gi snying rjes dkyil 'khor du ni
T02D1347-2:181a-37: sangs rgyas rnams te bshang pa dang /
T02D1347-2:181a-40: rkang rnams dang de bzhin du rdo rje'i bdud rtsi
T02D1347-2:181a-41: ste khu bas mngon par dbang bskur ba dri med
T02D1347-2:181a-42: ri bong can gyi lus dang de nas rdo rje
T02D1347-2:181a-43: can gyi lam thob par 'gyur pa zhes rnam par
T02D1347-2:181a-44: bsgoms shing de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis dri
T02D1347-2:181a-45: ma rnam par bral zhing byang chub spyod la rjes
T02D1347-2:181a-46: su gnas pa de rnams thams cad rang gi gnas
T02D1347-2:181a-47: su gtang bar bya'o zhes pa ni snying rje'i dbang
T02D1347-2:181b-0: gi nges pa'o // da ni rdzas @181b rnams mid
T02D1347-2:181b-1: pa'i zhes pa la sogs pas kun spangs kyi slob
T02D1347-2:181b-2: ma la dbang bskur ba'i nges pa gsungs pa /
T02D1347-2:181b-3: 'dir gang gi tshe kun spangs kyi slob ma la
T02D1347-2:181b-4: rdzas med na de'i tshe bla mas rdzas rnams med
T02D1347-2:181b-5: pa'i mngon par dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bka'
T02D1347-2:181b-6: yis kun spangs la ni sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:181b-7: rim pa ji lta bas dbang bdun dang /
T02D1347-2:181b-8: de nas bum pa la sogs pa rnam pa gsum sbyin par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:181b-9: de bzhin du bzhi pa du ba la sogs pa'i lam sbyin par bya zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-2:181b-11: de bzhin du mtha' dag yon tan gter ni rtsa yi rnal 'byor ldan pa ste /

T02D1347-2:182a-1: dpa' rab tu gzhug par bya ste /

T02D1347-2:182b-3: de bzhin du dge slong ma'i gral dang /

T02D1347-2:182b-11: bo'i ston mo la tshogs kyi gtso bo ste rgan

T02D1347-2:182b-14: ston pa po ma yin pa'i man ngag dang ldan
T02D1347-2:182b-15: pa gzhan yang ste sems can gyi don byed mi
T02D1347-2:182b-17: gzhan yang dge tshul dang khyim pa sngon du dbang
T02D1347-2:182b-18: bskur ba rnams ni ji srid mngon par shes pa

T02D1347-2:183a-1: tshogs kyi rigs kun du dga' bar byas pa ni

T02D1347-2:183a-29: gzhan rnams kyang rab tu nyams par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:183a-30: 'di rnams ni rgya cher le'u dang por bstod pa'i sgo nas brjod zin to //

T02D1347-2:183a-44: rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-2:183a-45: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od

T02D1347-2:183a-47: su gsol ba dang dpa' bo'i ston mo'i mdor bsdus
T02D1347-2:183a-49: dbang gi le'u'i rgyas 'grel rdzogs so /
T02D1347-2:183b-0: // / @183b # // dpal dus kyi 'khor lo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1347-2:183b-1: sh'akya thub pa gang gis yid las byung rnams shes rab ye shes stobs kyis rang nyid kyi //

T02D1347-2:183b-5: gang la rgyu dang mtshan nyid med //
T02D1347-2:183b-6: g-yo dang de bzhin rim med pas //

T02D1347-2:183b-8: gnyis med de la btud byas shing //

T02D1347-2:183b-10: longs spyod rdzogs dang bzang po'i chos dang dag pa yi //

T02D1347-2:183b-13: bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan cing //

T02D1347-2:183b-15: drang srong rnams dang 'gro kun gyis //

T02D1347-2:183b-20: padma dkar po bdag gis bri //

T02D1347-2:183b-23: lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi khang pa'i shar sgo'i mthar /
T02D1347-2:183b-24: rin po che'i sgo khyams na nor bu rin po che chen po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa /
T02D1347-2:183b-25: 'jam dpal gyi sprul pa'i sku mi'i dbang po grags
T02D1347-2:183b-26: pa tshangs pa'i drang srong nyi ma'i shing rtas gsol
T02D1347-2:183b-28: mchog gi dang po'i sangs rgyas las ye shes kyi
T02D1347-2:183b-29: le'u la zla ba bzang pos gsol ba btab pa

T02D1347-2:184a-3: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa dang pos dang po'i sangs
T02D1347-2:184a-4: rgyas las zla ba bzang pos gsol ba btab pa
T02D1347-2:184a-5: dang / de bzhin gshegs pas lan gsungs pa /

T02D1347-2:184a-7: dag par bsdus pa de nyid rgyas 'grel gyis dgrol

T02D1347-2:184a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dang bcas pa gang zhig khyod
T02D1347-2:184a-11: kyis gsungs pa de ni bdag gis cung zad shes
T02D1347-2:184a-12: te de'i phyir slar yang bdag ni nyan par 'tshal
T02D1347-2:184a-13: lo kye lha mi'i bla ma sh'akya thub pa lus
T02D1347-2:184a-14: la khams kyi dbye ba rnams kyis zhes pa rus
T02D1347-2:184a-15: pa la sogs pa'i khams rnam par dag pa rnams
T02D1347-2:184a-16: kyis dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dang /

T02D1347-2:184a-22: de bzhin du rnal 'byor ma rnams ngag gi de dag ste /
T02D1347-2:184a-23: phung po drug po rnams kyi rigs drug ji lta
T02D1347-2:184a-24: ba de bzhin du khams drug po rnams kyi yang
T02D1347-2:184a-25: aa la sogs pa dang ka la sogs pa la
T02D1347-2:184a-26: gnas pa'o // zla ba bzang po'i tshig 'di gsan
T02D1347-2:184a-27: nas te de nas rgyal ba'i bdag po zhes pa
T02D1347-2:184a-28: lhan cig skyes pa la sogs pa sku bzhi'i bdag
T02D1347-2:184a-29: nyid sgrib pa med pa'i phung po la sogs pa'o
T02D1347-2:184a-30: gnas pa'o // // de rnams kyi bdag po ni

T02D1347-2:184a-33: khams kyi dbye bas dkyil 'khor la sogs zhes pa

T02D1347-2:184a-39: yongs su rdzogs pa de srid ni de bzhin gshegs

T02D1347-2:184b-2: gyi rnam par dag pa gsungs pa ka ba rnams
T02D1347-2:184b-3: zhes pa la sogs pa ste /

T02D1347-2:184b-7: rtsig pa yang rus pa rnams kyis te mdzod ces pa tshigs su bcad pa gsum du 'brel lo //

T02D1347-2:184b-9: sogs pa rdul tshon gyis nang du blugs par bya'o

T02D1347-2:184b-11: pa ni sha rnam par dag pas lha ste shar

T02D1347-2:187b-14: de bzhin du dang po'i sangs rgyas las /
T02D1347-2:187b-15: thabs kyi lus kyis rnal 'byor min //
T02D1347-2:187b-16: shes rab gcig pus 'gyur ma yin //
T02D1347-2:187b-17: thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug pa //
T02D1347-2:187b-18: de bzhin gshegs pas rnal 'byor gsungs //

T02D1347-2:187b-28: sogs pa'i rgyud rnams la grangs med de sems can

T02D1347-2:187b-32: pa gsungs pa phung po zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:187b-33: ste 'dir phung po lngas lnga'i bdag nyid dag par

T02D1347-2:187b-38: las kyi dbang po'i bya ba lnga dang bcas shing
T02D1347-2:187b-39: las kyi dbang po lnga po rab tu zhugs pa

T02D1347-2:188a-25: la lha rnams kyi rgyas gdab pa'o zhes pa nges
T02D1347-2:188a-26: pa'o // srog gis rgyas gdab pa la ni lte
T02D1347-2:188a-27: bar li dang snying khar au dang mgrin par ri
T02D1347-2:188a-28: dang dpral bar ai dang gtsug tor du aa ste
T02D1347-2:188a-29: sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la dgod par bya'o
T02D1347-2:188a-30: pa'o // // de bzhin du thugs kyi thig le'i
T02D1347-2:188a-31: rgyas gdab pa la ni dpral bar zla ba'i dkyil
T02D1347-2:188a-32: 'khor la aom dang mgrin par nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor

T02D1347-2:188a-34: la h'um dang lte bar dus me'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1347-2:188a-35: pa'o // // ho'o // de bzhin du ye shes
T02D1347-2:188a-36: kyi rgyas gdab pa la aa yig ni gdod ma

T02D1347-2:188a-38: zhes pas rdo rje nor bu la aa zhes pa

T02D1347-2:188b-11: dog dang ni mun pa'i mthar zhes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:188b-12: pa sgrub thabs kyi le'u las gsungs so //
T02D1347-2:188b-13: 'dir phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'i phyag rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:188b-14: dbye ba ni dbyangs kyi dbye ba yis zhes pa

T02D1347-2:188b-26: shes kyi zhal gyi rang bzhin las so zhes pa

T02D1347-2:189a-23: ba dang dro ba dang g-yo ba'i chos skyes pa

T02D1347-2:189b-28: ni skye mched bcu gnyis grub pa'o //

T02D1347-2:189b-49: pa rnams so // nges pa'o // yan lag go
T02D1347-2:189b-50: // ngag skyed pa ji lta ba de bzhin du

T02D1347-2:190a-12: rang bzhin gyi sems kyis sna tshogs pa spro bar

T02D1347-2:193a-0: de la sngar gsungs pa'i dbus kyi cha drug rnams @193a * //
T02D1347-2:193a-1: kyi bzhis padma'i 'dab ma dang gnyis kyis lte ba phyed do //
T02D1347-2:193a-2: de bzhin du bzhis 'khor lo'i rtsibs dang gnyis kyis
T02D1347-2:193a-3: gri gug la sogs pa rnams kyi mtshan ma'i phreng
T02D1347-2:193a-4: ba'o // dbus su padma 'dab ma bcu drug pa'o //
T02D1347-2:193a-5: padma'i 'dab ma'i phyi rol du gri gug gi phreng
T02D1347-2:193a-6: ba sngon po ste de'i 'og tu sa ljang khu'o
T02D1347-2:193a-7: // de bzhin du ye shes kyi khams kyi 'khor lo la 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyang sngon po'o //
T02D1347-2:193a-8: de nas sa'i khams kyi 'khor lo la 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:193a-9: phreng ba ser po dang de bzhin du 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:193a-10: rtsibs te / 'og tu sa nag po'o ;
T02D1347-2:193a-11: / chu'i khams kyi 'khor lo la padma'i phreng ba dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs dkar po ste /
T02D1347-2:193a-13: me'i khams kyi 'khor lo la rin po che'i phreng ba dang /
T02D1347-2:193a-16: rlung gi khams kyi 'khor lo la ral gri'i phreng ba dang /
T02D1347-2:193a-17: 'khor lo'i rtsibs nag po ste 'og tu sa ser po'o //
T02D1347-2:193a-18: nam mkha'i khams kyi 'khor lo la rdo rje phreng ba dang 'khor lo'i rtsibs ljang khu ste /
T02D1347-2:193a-20: de nas cha drug gis ni tshon gyis ste skyed
T02D1347-2:193a-21: byed zhal gyi dbang gis zhes pa ni shar dang
T02D1347-2:193a-23: lho dang bden bral du dmar po dang nub dang
T02D1347-2:193a-24: rlung du ser po dang byang dang dbang ldan du
T02D1347-2:193a-25: dkar po'o // sgo'i 'khor lo de bzhin no zhes pa /
T02D1347-2:193a-26: sgo brgyad kyi mthar dur khrod chen po brgyad kyi
T02D1347-2:193a-27: 'khor lo rnams dang sgo brgyad kyi bar rnams su
T02D1347-2:193a-28: dur khrod brgyad kyi 'khor lo rnams te de ltar
T02D1347-2:193a-29: na dur khrod kyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa bcu
T02D1347-2:193a-30: drug go // snying po'i padma'i 'dab ma brgyad la /
T02D1347-2:193a-31: lha mo brgyad dang lha mo brgyad kyi bar bar
T02D1347-2:193a-32: gyi 'dab ma rnams la thod pa bdud rtsis gang
T02D1347-2:193a-33: ba brgyad do // 'khor lo drug gi rtsibs brgyad
T02D1347-2:193a-34: po rnams la gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs
T02D1347-2:193a-35: pa'i lha mo bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad dang de bzhin
T02D1347-2:193a-36: du dpa' bo rnams kyang rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:193a-37: phyi rol du stegs bul rta babs kyi ka ba'i rtsa bar klu rgyal chen po brgyad dang /
T02D1347-2:193a-38: sgo'i rta babs la sgeg mo la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-0: lhag ma sgo la sogs @193b pa'i mtshan nyid ni
T02D1347-2:193b-1: dus kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du rig par
T02D1347-2:193b-2: bya'o // da ni 'khor lo drug gi rtsibs la
T02D1347-2:193b-3: sogs pa rnams la lha mo'i sa bon rnams gsungs
T02D1347-2:193b-4: bya'o // pa / ring po zhes pa la sogs pa sta /
T02D1347-2:193b-5: ring po'i dbyangs lnga l'i a'u r'i a'i a'a zhes pa dang /
T02D1347-2:193b-6: thung du aa ai ri au li zhes pa 'di
T02D1347-2:193b-7: rnams kyis phye ba sa ta pa ta tsa ka'i
T02D1347-2:193b-8: sde pa drug po rnams kyi sa sogs stong sogs
T02D1347-2:193b-10: rlung sogs rtsibs rnams la ring po zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-2:193b-11: 'dir ye shes kyi 'khor lo la sa'i sde pa
T02D1347-2:193b-12: lhag pa'i lha ste da'i sl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o
T02D1347-2:193b-13: // dbang ldan du w'u dang bden bral du shr'i
T02D1347-2:193b-14: dang mer sh'i dang sa 'og tu thk'a ste rlung
T02D1347-2:193b-15: // dang / byang gi dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-16: mkha' 'gro ma lnga po 'di rnams ni sdig pa'i dus sbyor gyi dkyil 'khor lnga'i gtso mo ste /
T02D1347-2:193b-17: sems can thams cad kyi sna bug g-yas pa las sdud pa'i rim ngas srog 'bab pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:193b-18: de nas gzhu'i dus sbyor la steng du thka ste
T02D1347-2:193b-19: rlung dang nub kyi dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus
T02D1347-2:193b-20: su'o // ye shes kyi 'khor lo'i shar gyi rtsibs la shi dang lhor shri dang /
T02D1347-2:193b-21: byang du wu dang nub tu sli'o zhes pa ni /
T02D1347-2:193b-22: gzhu'i dus sbyor la g-yon pa'i rtsa nas srog 'bab pa'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-23: de nas sa'i 'khor lo la ta'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste de'i tl'i rlung du'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-24: dbang ldan du th'u dang bden bral du dr'i dang mer dh'i dang /
T02D1347-2:193b-25: sa 'og tu n'a ste rlung gi sgo'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i dbus su'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-26: zhes pa ni bu mo'i dus sbyor la'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-27: de bzhin du srang la steng du na ste nub kyi sgor ro //
T02D1347-2:193b-28: shar du dhi dang lhor dri dang byang du thu dang nub tu tli'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-29: de nas chu'i khams kyi 'khor lo la pa'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste de'i pl'i rlung du'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-30: dbang ldan du ph'u dang bden bral du br'i dang
T02D1347-2:193b-31: ser bhi dang sa 'og tu m'a ste dbang ldan
T02D1347-2:193b-32: gyi sgo ru'o // de ltar karka ta'i dus sbyor la lhag pa'i lha rnams so //
T02D1347-2:193b-33: de bzhin du seng ge'i dus sbyor la nam mkhar ma ste byang gi sgo ru'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-34: shar gyi rtsibs la bhi dang lhor bra dang byang du phu dang nub tu pli'o //
T02D1347-2:193b-35: de nas me'i 'khor lo la ta'i sde pa /
T02D1347-2:193b-36: lhag pa'i lha ste de'i tl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-0: @194a * // dbang ldan du sh'u dang bden bral du dr'i dang mer dr'i dang sa 'og tu n'a ste /
T02D1347-2:194a-1: bden bral gyi sgo ru zhes pa glang gi dus sbyor la'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-2: de nas 'khrig pa la steng du na ste //
T02D1347-2:194a-4: shar gyi rtsibs la dhi dang /
T02D1347-2:194a-5: lhor tri dang byang du thu dang nub tu tli'o ;
T02D1347-2:194a-6: / de nas rlung gi 'khor lo la tsa'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste /
T02D1347-2:194a-7: de'i tsl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-8: dbang ldan du tsh'u dang bden bral du dzr'i dang /
T02D1347-2:194a-9: mer dzh'i dang sa 'og tu ny'a ste me'i sgo ru'o zhes pa nya'i dus sbyor la'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-10: de nas lug gi dus sbyor la steng du nya
T02D1347-2:194a-11: ste shar gyi sgo'i dur khrod kyi 'khor lo la'o
T02D1347-2:194a-12: // shar gyi rtsibs la dznyi dang /
T02D1347-2:194a-16: de nas nam mkha'i khams kyi 'khor lo la ka'i sde pa lhag pa'i lha ste /
T02D1347-2:194a-17: de'i kl'i rlung gi rtsibs la'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-18: dbang ldan du kh'u dang bden bral du gr'i dang
T02D1347-2:194a-19: mer gh'i dang 'og tu d'a ste me dang lho'i
T02D1347-2:194a-20: sgo'i dbus kyi dur khrod kyi 'khor lo'i steng du'o
T02D1347-2:194a-21: zhes pa chu srin gyi dus sbyor la'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-22: de nas bum pa'i dus sbyor la steng du nga ste me dang shar gyi sgo'i dbus su'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-23: shar gyi rtsibs la ghi dang lho'i rtsibs la gri
T02D1347-2:194a-24: dang byang gi rtsibs la khu dang nub kyi rtsibs
T02D1347-2:194a-25: la kli'o // sgo dang sgo'i bar du ha ksha
T02D1347-2:194a-26: dang ldan nam mkha'i mthil na gnas pa'i sde par
T02D1347-2:194a-27: bcas pa rnams zhes pa ni 'dir sde pa drug
T02D1347-2:194a-28: po rnams kyi stong pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bab par byed
T02D1347-2:194a-29: pa'i ye ge ring po dang thung du bcu gnyis
T02D1347-2:194a-30: bo rnams te thk'a tthka n'a na m'a ma n'a
T02D1347-2:194a-31: na ny'a nya d'a nga zhes pa ni dur khrod
T02D1347-2:194a-32: bcu gnyis kyi lha mo rnams kyi'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-33: gzhan ni thun mtshams bzhi'i dbye bas dus sbyor gsum
T02D1347-2:194a-34: gsum gyi mthar ha h'a ksha ksh'a zhes pa yi
T02D1347-2:194a-35: ge bzhi ste byang dang dbang ldan dang lho dang
T02D1347-2:194a-36: bden bral gyi dur khrod bzhi rnams su'o //
T02D1347-2:194a-37: de ltar dur khrod bcu drug po rnams la lha
T02D1347-2:194a-38: mo bcu drug dang 'khor lo drug po rnams la
T02D1347-2:194a-40: snying po'i padma'i 'dab ma la lha mo brgyad de
T02D1347-2:194a-41: de rnams kyi sa bon ni shar gyi 'dab ma
T02D1347-2:194a-42: la aa dang lho'i 'dab ma la aa:dang byang gi
T02D1347-2:194a-43: 'dab ma la aam dang nub kyi 'dab ma la
T02D1347-2:194a-44: a'a dang me'i 'dab ma la ha dang bden bral
T02D1347-2:194b-0: gyi 'dab ma la @194b ha:dang dbang ldan gyi 'dab
T02D1347-2:194b-1: ma la ham dang rlung gi 'dab ma la h'a'o
T02D1347-2:194b-2: // de rnams kyi bar bar gyi 'dab ma brgyad po rnams la thod pa brgyad do //
T02D1347-2:194b-3: dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang bcom ldan
T02D1347-2:194b-4: 'das dus kyi 'khor lo he ru ka gtso bo
T02D1347-2:194b-6: mkha' 'gro ma dang mkha' 'gro 'di rnams kyis bon
T02D1347-2:194b-7: gyi mthar rdo rje ste de dang bcas pa'i ming
T02D1347-2:194b-8: sl'i rdo rje ma dang w'u rdo rje ma zhes
T02D1347-2:194b-9: pa la sogs pa kl'i rdo rje ma'i mthar thug
T02D1347-2:194b-10: pa rnams so // 'di rnams kyi mkha' 'gro bzhi
T02D1347-2:194b-11: bcu rtsa brgyad ni bsam pa'i dbye bas shi rdo
T02D1347-2:194b-13: gang du mkha' 'gro ma'i sa bon ring po yin
T02D1347-2:194b-14: pa der mkha' 'gro'i sa bon thung du dang gang
T02D1347-2:194b-15: du thung du yin pa der ring po ste /
T02D1347-2:194b-16: sl'i rdo rje ma dang shi rdo rje zhes pa ni shes rab dang thabs so //
T02D1347-2:194b-17: wu rdo rje ma dang shr'i rdo rje zhes pa
T02D1347-2:194b-18: ste de bzhin du 'chad par 'gyur pa thams cad
T02D1347-2:194b-19: la'o // de ltar na dkyil 'khor la mkha' 'gro
T02D1347-2:194b-20: ma'i dra ba sdom pa nyis 'gyur mchod par bya'o
T02D1347-2:194b-22: 'dir sdig pa dang gzhu la sogs pa lugs las
T02D1347-2:194b-23: bzlog pas dgong pa gang yin pa de spros pas
T02D1347-2:194b-24: gsungs te / 'dir yan lag bcu gnyis 'gags pa
T02D1347-2:194b-25: kun rdzob ma yin pas don dam pa'i bden par
T02D1347-2:194b-26: gzhu dang sdig pa la sogs pa lugs las bzlog
T02D1347-2:194b-27: pas gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa dgod
T02D1347-2:194b-28: gsungs te / pa'o // kun rdzob kyis chu srin
T02D1347-2:194b-29: dang bum pa la sogs pa rim pas nye ba'i
T02D1347-2:194b-30: 'thung gcod la sogs pa dgod pa ste rten 'brel
T02D1347-2:194b-31: yan lag bcu gnyis las so //
T02D1347-2:194b-32: ji ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi sdom pa las gcig
T02D1347-2:194b-33: ni rab gtum ma dang gtum pa'i mig can ma
T02D1347-2:194b-34: la sogs pa lugs las bzlog pas gnas la sogs
T02D1347-2:194b-35: pa dgod pa ste gnyis pa ni brtson 'grus chen
T02D1347-2:194b-36: mo la sogs pa rim pas nye ba'i dur khrod
T02D1347-2:194b-38: 'dir ni 'jig rten pa'i tha snyad la kun rdzob
T02D1347-2:194b-39: gang yin pa de don dam pa zhes pa las
T02D1347-2:194b-40: shes par bya'o / de ltar rlung la sogs rtsibs
T02D1347-2:194b-41: rnams la ni nyi ma'i rgyu ba'i dbang gis zhes
T02D1347-2:194b-42: pa g-yas kyi rtsal srog rgyu ba'i dbang gis ring
T02D1347-2:195a-0: shes par bya'o / po rnams so // steng sogs rtsibs la zla ba'i rgyu ba'i dbang @195a * //
T02D1347-2:195a-1: gis zhes pa g-yon gyi rtsal srog rgyu ba'i dbang
T02D1347-2:195a-2: gis thung du rnams so zhes pa ni dgod pa
T02D1347-2:195a-3: gsungs pa ste rim pa yis kyang kun rdzob kyis
T02D1347-2:195a-4: nye ba'i 'thung gcod la sogs pas chu srin la
T02D1347-2:195a-5: sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams la ka tsa ta pa
T02D1347-2:195a-6: ta sa'i sde pa rnams kyi yi ge ka yig
T02D1347-2:195a-7: la sogs pa rnams l'i yig la sogs pa'i dbyangs
T02D1347-2:195a-8: kyis phye ba ring po dang thung du rnams dgod
T02D1347-2:195a-9: par bya'o // don dam pas thka la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:195a-10: thung du'i aa yig la sogs pa'i dbyangs kyis phye
T02D1347-2:195a-11: ba rnams gzhu dang sdig pa la sogs pa'i dbye
T02D1347-2:195a-12: par bya'o // bas so // de ltar rlung mtshams
T02D1347-2:195a-13: la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams las la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:195a-14: g-yas kyi dkyil 'khor 'bab pa las so //
T02D1347-2:195a-15: steng la sogs pa'i rtsibs rnams la nam mkha' la
T02D1347-2:195a-16: sogs pa ste g-yon gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'bab
T02D1347-2:195a-17: pa las so zhes pa ni nang gi nges pa'o
T02D1347-2:195a-18: // 'dir lhag ma tshigs su bcad pa lnga ni go sla'o //
T02D1347-2:195a-19: da ni lha mo rnams kyi gnas la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:195a-20: gnas gsungs pa lhun po zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:195a-21: ste / 'dir lhun po'i phyogs brgyad rnams la steng
T02D1347-2:195a-22: du rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:195a-23: gyi mthar thug pa ste 'og tu sa la sems
T02D1347-2:195a-24: can gyi don gyi slad du yang dag par rgyu'o
T02D1347-2:195a-25: ste / // de bzhin du rgya mtsho'i dkyil 'khor dang /
T02D1347-2:195a-28: nam mkha'i mthar ro zhes pa ste /
T02D1347-2:195a-29: 'jig rten khams kyi dkyil 'khor la dpag tshad 'bum phrag lnga ji srid par ro //
T02D1347-2:195a-30: sems can rnams kyi lus la skra'i mthar thug par
T02D1347-2:195a-31: khyab par byed pa nyid de bcom ldan 'das dang
T02D1347-2:195a-32: rnal 'byor ma yang dag par rgyu ba las so
T02D1347-2:195a-33: // 'dir lhun po'i steng la dpag tshad stong phrag
T02D1347-2:195a-34: lnga bcu ni bcom ldan 'das kyi snying po'i padma
T02D1347-2:195a-36: de'i sum cha ni lte ba ste lte ba'i steng du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:195a-37: nyi ma'i steng du dus kyi 'khor lo'i zhabs g-yas
T02D1347-2:195a-38: pa'i 'og tu bdud dang zhabs g-yon pa'i 'og tu
T02D1347-2:195a-39: nyon mongs pa ste de yang drag po'o //
T02D1347-2:195b-0: 'dab ma brgyad la dub ma @195b la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:195b-1: rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma brgyad dang de rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:195b-2: bar bar gyi 'dab ma rnams la bdud rtsis gang
T02D1347-2:195b-4: de ltar 'dab ma bcu drug ni dga' ba'i 'khor
T02D1347-2:195b-5: lo ste dga' ba bcu drug gi dbye bas lha
T02D1347-2:195b-6: mo rnams dang thod pa rnams so //
T02D1347-2:195b-7: bcom ldan 'das ni thig le bzhi 'dzin pa'i phyir
T02D1347-2:195b-8: zhal bzhi pa ste phyogs nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'gags
T02D1347-2:195b-9: pa'i phyir phyag nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1347-2:195b-10: lhag pa'i zla ba'i phyogs gnyis 'gags pa'i phyir gnyis
T02D1347-2:195b-11: lhag rgyal ba'i phyag ste sngar gsungs pa'i rdo rje
T02D1347-2:195b-12: shugs so // bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal gcig ni
T02D1347-2:195b-13: stong pa nyid de phyag gnyis ni mtshan ma med
T02D1347-2:195b-14: pa dang smon pa med pa dag go //
T02D1347-2:195b-17: thod pa la sogs pa ni mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:195b-18: de nas padma'i phyi rol du lhun po'i phyogs brgyad
T02D1347-2:195b-19: rnams su thad ka'i char sa'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshad
T02D1347-2:195b-20: kyis dpag tshad stong phrag nyi shu rtsa lnga ni
T02D1347-2:195b-21: ye shes kyi khams kyi 'khor lo ste de'i sum
T02D1347-2:195b-22: cha'i sa la gri gug gi phreng ba'o //
T02D1347-2:195b-23: cha gnyis kyis rtsibs brgyad do //
T02D1347-2:195b-24: de bzhin du rgya mtsho'i phyed la sa'i 'khor lo ste phyed phyi ma la chu'i 'khor lo'o //
T02D1347-2:195b-25: de bzhin du me'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyed la me'i
T02D1347-2:195b-26: 'khor lo ste phyed phyi ma la rlung gi 'khor
T02D1347-2:195b-27: lo'o // de bzhin du rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyi
T02D1347-2:195b-28: phyed la nam mkha'i 'khor lo ste phyed phyi ma
T02D1347-2:195b-30: nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la dur khrod bcu drug rnams so zhes pa ni nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:195b-31: 'dir skra'i mthar khru lnga ni lus so //
T02D1347-2:195b-32: des na nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor la phyi rol gyi
T02D1347-2:195b-33: dur khrod rnams te de'i rnam par dag pas 'jig
T02D1347-2:195b-34: rten gyi khams kyang dpag tshad 'bum phrag lnga'o zhes
T02D1347-2:195b-35: pa 'khor lo sngom pa chen po la'o //
T02D1347-2:195b-36: de ltar rim pa bzhin du lhun po'i phyogs brgyad
T02D1347-2:195b-37: rnams su ye shes kyi khams kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs
T02D1347-2:195b-38: kyi rtsibs rnams la gnas rnams te gzhu 'gags pas
T02D1347-2:196a-0: phyogs bral gyi rtsibs rnams la nye ba'i @196a * //
T02D1347-2:196a-1: gnas rnams te sdig pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:196a-2: de bzhin du dur khrod gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:196a-3: de nas sa'i khams kyi 'khor lo'i phyogs kyi rtsibs
T02D1347-2:196a-4: rnams la zhing bzhi ste srang 'gags pas srid pa

T02D1347-2:204a-26: 'dab ma'i lha mo'i ro'i gdan no //
