T02D1347-2:204a-28: bong can zhes pa bcu gcig ste de rnams las
T02D1347-2:204a-29: gsum ni snying po'i padma'i 'dab ma gsum la'o //
T02D1347-2:204a-30: lhag ma brgyad ni dur khrod brgyad la ro'i gzugs
T02D1347-2:204a-31: kyis gnas pa rnams te rtsibs zhes pa ni rten
T02D1347-2:204a-32: no // ro zhes pa ni lha mo rnams kyi bzhon pa'i ro rnams so //
T02D1347-2:204a-33: de ltar 'khor lo gsum gyi sngom pa'o //
T02D1347-2:204a-34: slar yang lnga ma dang phyi ma'i dbye bas rkang
T02D1347-2:204a-35: pa nyis 'gyur ni sdom pa chen po la lha
T02D1347-2:204a-36: mo rnams kyi gdan bdun cu rtsa gnyis su 'gyur
T02D1347-2:204a-37: te de ltar 'khor lo drug go sngom pa'o //
T02D1347-2:204a-38: sgyu 'phrul dra ba la rdzogs pa nyi shu rtsa
T02D1347-2:204a-39: bzhi ste dkar po dang nag po rnams zla ba
T02D1347-2:204a-40: dang nyi ma'i gdan rnams so //
T02D1347-2:204a-41: de bzhin du gza' bdun te nyi ma'i gdan bdun no //
T02D1347-2:204a-42: nyi ma'i rkang pa rnams ni nyi ma'i gdan bcu gcig go //
T02D1347-2:204a-43: yang na bsam pa'i dbye bas zla ba'i gdan rnams
T02D1347-2:204a-44: te de ltar gdan bzhi bcu rtsa gsum ni gcig
T02D1347-2:204a-45: la'o // mnyam dang mi mnyam rkang bas sngar bzhin
T02D1347-2:204a-46: du zla ba dang nyi ma'i gdan te gdan bzhi
T02D1347-2:204b-0: @204b bcu rtsa lnga ni gnyis ba la'o //
T02D1347-2:204b-1: chu gter rkang pa zhes pa nyi ma'i rkang pa'i
T02D1347-2:204b-2: dbye bas nyi ma'i gdan nam zla ba'i gdan bzhir
T02D1347-2:204b-3: 'gyur te lus dang bsam pa'i dbye bas so //
T02D1347-2:204b-4: de ltar lha rnams kyi gdan bzhi bcu rtsa dgu
T02D1347-2:204b-5: ni sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsum pa la ste mngal
T02D1347-2:204b-6: du byis pa'i srog gi rten du gyur pa'i khams
T02D1347-2:204b-7: rnams ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi rol dang
T02D1347-2:204b-8: gzhan la yang la grub bo /
T02D1347-2:204b-9: de ltar 'dus pa dang sgyu 'phrul dra ba dang
T02D1347-2:204b-10: 'khor lo gsum dang 'khor lo drug gi sdom pa
T02D1347-2:204b-11: yongs su dag pa'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:204b-12: rgyud de rnams la gtso bo ni gzugs med pa'i
T02D1347-2:204b-13: phung po'i chos can nyid kyi phyir nyi ma'am gzugs
T02D1347-2:204b-14: kyi chos can nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi chos
T02D1347-2:204b-15: las zla ba la 'gyur zhing rnam par snang mdzad
T02D1347-2:204b-16: ni snying rje'i chos kyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la
T02D1347-2:204b-17: 'gyur te rigs kyi dbang gis zhes pa shes rab
T02D1347-2:204b-18: dang snying rje'i dbang gis so //
T02D1347-2:204b-19: gtso bo'i yang na kha sbyor la zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:204b-20: dus kyi 'khor lo la shes rab dang snying rje
T02D1347-2:204b-21: gnyis la'o zhes pa ste dang po'i sangs rgyas ris
T02D1347-2:204b-22: med pa nyid kyi phyir ro zhes grub bo //
T02D1347-2:204b-23: da ni rlung la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi zhal
T02D1347-2:204b-24: gyi dag pa gsungs pa rlung zhes pa las sogs
T02D1347-2:204b-25: pa ste 'dir rlung la sogs pa'i lha rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:204b-26: zhal ni rnam pa gnyis te gcig ni yul dag
T02D1347-2:204b-27: pas so // gnyis pa ni yon tan gsum dag pas so //
T02D1347-2:204b-28: de la rlung gi khams la reg bya'i yon tan
T02D1347-2:204b-29: gyi bdag nyid zhal gcig tu 'gyur zhing gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:204b-30: ni sgra'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid rgyas gdab pa
T02D1347-2:204b-31: ste des na 'du byed kyi phung po la rnam
T02D1347-2:204b-32: par shes pa'i phung pos rgyas gdab bo //
T02D1347-2:204b-33: de ltar rlung la reg bya'i zhal gcig dang ni
T02D1347-2:204b-34: yon tan gzhan gyi dbang gis rgyas gdab zhal ni
T02D1347-2:204b-35: gnyis pa zhes pa spyi bor te zhal gyi gnas
T02D1347-2:204b-37: de bzhin du me la ro dang reg bya'i yul
T02D1347-2:204b-38: gyi chos kyis zhal gnyis dang yon tan gyis rgyas
T02D1347-2:204b-39: gdab pa'i zhal ni gsum pa ste des na tshor
T02D1347-2:204b-40: pa la yang rnam par shes pas rgyas gdab bo
T02D1347-2:204b-41: // de bzhin du chu la gzugs dang ro dang
T02D1347-2:204b-42: reg bya yi ni zhal te zhal gsum dang rgyas
T02D1347-2:204b-43: gdab zhal ni bzhi pa nam mkha'i mtshan nyid sgra'o
T02D1347-2:204b-44: // // des na 'du shes la rnam par shes pas rgyas gdab bo //
T02D1347-2:205a-0: sa la dri la sogs pa zhes pa @205a * //
T02D1347-2:205a-1: la sogs pa dri dang gzugs dang ro dang reg
T02D1347-2:205a-2: bya'i yul gyi chos kyis zhal bzhir 'gyur te des
T02D1347-2:205a-3: na gzugs kyi phung po la yang rnam par shes
T02D1347-2:205a-4: pa'i phung pos rgyas gdab bo zhes grub bo //
T02D1347-2:205a-5: nam mkha'i khams dang rnam par shes pa'i phung po
T02D1347-2:205a-6: la ni stong pa chen po'i 'gyur med lnga zhes
T02D1347-2:205a-7: gsungs pa'i phyir stong pa rnam pa lnga zhal lnga
T02D1347-2:205a-8: ste rgya yis gdab pa'i zhal ni drug pa ye
T02D1347-2:205a-10: de bzhin du ni ye shes khams la 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:205a-11: yon tan dbang las zhes pa zhal drug pa la
T02D1347-2:205a-12: stong pa drug gi zhal te de la yang rnam
T02D1347-2:205a-13: par shes pa'i khams kyis rgyas gdab bo zhes pa
T02D1347-2:205a-14: phyag rgya'i nges pa ste khams dang yul gyi yon
T02D1347-2:205a-15: tan gyi dbang gis dag pa'o //
T02D1347-2:205a-16: de nas gcig ni bzhi la bsres pa bde mnyam
T02D1347-2:205a-17: 'bras bu ster ba dag ste gnyis dang gsum ni
T02D1347-2:205a-18: bsres pa lnga zhes pa ni 'dir gang gi tshe
T02D1347-2:205a-19: rlung gi khams reg bya gcig pu'i yon tan gyi
T02D1347-2:205a-20: bdag nyid nam mkha'i khams kyis rgyas btab pa ni
T02D1347-2:205a-21: sa'i khams dri la sogs pa yon tan bzhi'i bdag
T02D1347-2:205a-22: nyid nam mkha'i khams kyis rgyas btab pa la bsres
T02D1347-2:205a-23: par gyur pa de'i tshe bde mnyam 'bras bu ster
T02D1347-2:205a-24: bshes rab dang thabs kyi bdag nyi sbyor bar 'gyur
T02D1347-2:205a-25: ro / de bzhin du me reg bya dang ro'i
T02D1347-2:205a-26: yon tan gnyis kyi bdag nyid nam mkha'i yon tan
T02D1347-2:205a-27: gyis rgyas btab pa dang chu'i khams yon tan gsum
T02D1347-2:205a-28: gyi bdag nyid nam mkha'i yon tan gyis rgyas btab
T02D1347-2:205a-29: pa phan tshun 'dus pa ni lngar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:205a-30: de bzhin dus dang rlung dag la lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:205a-31: de bzhin du shar dang nub dang byang dang lho
T02D1347-2:205a-32: phan tshun 'dus pa ni shes rab dang thabs zhal
T02D1347-2:205a-33: bcu ste 'di'i spros pa ni nang gi le'u las
T02D1347-2:205a-34: shes rab thabs ni rus pa sha dang chu dang
T02D1347-2:205a-35: bcas pa'i khrag dang smin byed dang ni gci ba
T02D1347-2:205a-36: nyid ces pa la sogs pas gsungs so zhes pa
T02D1347-2:205a-37: nges pa'o // gzhan yang yon tan rnam pa gsum
T02D1347-2:205a-38: zhes pa la sogs pas yon tan gsum gyi dbye
T02D1347-2:205a-39: ba gsungs te 'dir khams thams cad la snying stobs
T02D1347-2:205a-40: dang rdul dang mun pa'i yon tan rnams yod de
T02D1347-2:205a-41: de rnams kyi khams thams cad zhal gsum pa'o //
T02D1347-2:205a-42: khams rnams la dri la sogs pa bas chos kyi
T02D1347-2:205a-43: khams kyi mthar thug pa yul drug ste de rnams
T02D1347-2:205b-0: de ltar yon tan rnams pa gsum @205b gyi dbang
T02D1347-2:205b-1: gis bzhi la zhal ni bcu gnyis te shar dang
T02D1347-2:205b-2: nub dang byang dang lho dang 'og dang steng gi
T02D1347-2:205b-3: shes rab dang thabs so zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:205b-4: 'dus pa las thams cad kyi mtshan ma ni khu
T02D1347-2:205b-5: ba dang rtsa dang rus pa rnams par dag pa
T02D1347-2:205b-6: rdo rje dang padma dang 'khor lo ste mi bskyod
T02D1347-2:205b-7: pa'i g-yas na'o // rdul dang khrag dang sha ni
T02D1347-2:205b-8: rdo rje dril bu dang nor bu dang ral gri
T02D1347-2:205b-9: pa'i g-yas na'o // ste g-yon na'o // 'dir lha
T02D1347-2:205b-10: gang gi g-yas kyi phyag dang po'i mthil du rang
T02D1347-2:205b-11: gi mtshan ma song ba de'i gnas su rdo rje'i
T02D1347-2:205b-12: mtshan ma 'gro ba de ltar 'dus pa'i nges pa
T02D1347-2:205b-13: ste 'dus pa la sangs rgyas gang dbus su bzhugs
T02D1347-2:205b-14: pa de'i gnas su mi bskyod pa 'gro ba ji
T02D1347-2:205b-15: lta ba de bzhin du mtshan ma la yang nges
T02D1347-2:205b-16: pa'i g-yas na'o // ste g-yon na'o // pa'o //
T02D1347-2:205b-17: de bzhin du zhal lnga pa dang zhal drug pa
T02D1347-2:205b-18: dag la zhal bcu gnyis pa ste rnam par shes
T02D1347-2:205b-19: pa dang ye shes kyi khams rnams zhal lnga pa
T02D1347-2:205b-20: dang zhal drug pa stong pa chen po 'gyur med
T02D1347-2:205b-21: lnga dang thig le stong pa 'gyur med drug dag
T02D1347-2:205b-22: pa'i g-yas na'o // ste g-yon na'o // pa'o //
T02D1347-2:205b-23: la'o // slar yang de dag phan tshun ltos pa
T02D1347-2:205b-24: dang bcas pa nyid kyis 'dus pa ni zhal nyi
T02D1347-2:205b-25: shu rtsa gnyis pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:205b-26: da ni dus kyi dbye bas zhal la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:205b-27: dag pa gsungs pa thun mtshams zhes pa ste 'dir
T02D1347-2:205b-28: / nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can /
T02D1347-2:205b-29: mtshan mo shes rab rab tu grags zhes pa'i nges
T02D1347-2:205b-30: pa las nam phyed nas nyi ma phyed kyi bar
T02D1347-2:205b-31: la thun mtshams dbye bas thun tshod kyi dbye bas
T02D1347-2:205b-32: phyag brgyad pa'o // de bzhin du nyi ma phyed
T02D1347-2:205b-33: nas nam phyed kyi bar la shes rab kyang zhal
T02D1347-2:205b-35: mnyam pa 'khrud pa ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo dag gi gung gi cha shas la'o //
T02D1347-2:205b-36: mi mnyam pa ni snga dro'i thun mtshams dang phyi de'i thun mtshams dag la'o //
T02D1347-2:205b-37: de la nyin mo dang mtshams mo dag dman pa
T02D1347-2:205b-38: dang lhag pa'i dbang gis 'ga' zhig tu ni nyin
T02D1347-2:205b-39: mo 'phel ba las bcom ldan 'das zhal lnga phyag
T02D1347-2:205b-40: bcu pa dang bcom ldan 'das ma zhal gsum phyag
T02D1347-2:205b-41: drug ma'o // mtshan mo 'phel ba las bcom ldan
T02D1347-2:205b-42: 'das ma zhal lnga dang bcom ldan 'das zhal gsum
T02D1347-2:205b-43: pa'o zhes pa la sogs pa grub bo zhes pa
T02D1347-2:205b-44: ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i rnam par dag pa gcig
T02D1347-2:205b-45: drug ma'o // go // de bzhin du gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:205b-46: gsungs pa rnams pa gsum zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:206a-1: chu srin la sogs pa khyim bcu gnyis po de
T02D1347-2:206a-2: rnams kyi nad nas chu srin dang bum pa dang
T02D1347-2:206a-3: nya'i khyim rnams ni thugs rdo rje'i zhal rnams te
T02D1347-2:206a-4: mun pa dang rdul dang snying stobs kyi dbye bas
T02D1347-2:206a-5: nag po dang dmar po dang dkar po ste dus
T02D1347-2:206a-6: sbyor dbye bas kha dog gsum zhes so //
T02D1347-2:206a-7: de bzhin du lug dang glang dang 'khrig pa rnams
T02D1347-2:206a-8: ni gsung rdo rje'i zhal rnams te rdul dang snying
T02D1347-2:206a-9: stobs dang mun pa'i dbye bas dmar po dang dkar
T02D1347-2:206a-10: po dang nag po'i kha dog rnams so //
T02D1347-2:206a-11: karka ta dang seng ge dang bu mo rnams ni
T02D1347-2:206a-12: sku rdo rje'i zhal te snying stobs dang mun pa
T02D1347-2:206a-13: dang rdul gyi dbye bas dkar po dang nag po
T02D1347-2:206a-15: srad dang sdig pa dang gzhu'i dus sbyor rnams ni
T02D1347-2:206a-16: ye shes rdo rje'i zhal te mun pa dang rdul
T02D1347-2:206a-17: dang snying stobs kyi dbye bas ser po dang dmar
T02D1347-2:206a-18: po dang dkar po'i kha dog rnams so //
T02D1347-2:206a-19: dus sbyor phyed kyis phyag gi dbye bar 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:206a-20: drug po rnams kyi gnyis gnyis la rtsa ba'i zhal
T02D1347-2:206a-21: la sogs pas grangs bzhin du g-yon dang g-yas pa
T02D1347-2:206a-22: dag la kha dog gsum mo //
T02D1347-2:206a-23: de ltar zhal bcu gnyis dang phyag nyi shu rtsa
T02D1347-2:206a-24: bzhi pa ni bcom ldan 'das dus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1347-2:206a-25: gcig go // 'dir sngar gsungs pa'i lha zhal gcig
T02D1347-2:206a-26: pa dang zhal bzhi pa la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:206a-27: mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa 'khyud pa gang yin
T02D1347-2:206a-28: pa de ni thun mtshams cha shas snga phyi la
T02D1347-2:206a-29: ste snga dro'i thun mtshams dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams
T02D1347-2:206a-30: gcig go // la 'dus pa'o // zhal gsum phyag
T02D1347-2:206a-31: drug pa rnams kyi phan tshun 'khyud pa gang yin
T02D1347-2:206a-32: pa de ni gung gi cha shas la ste nyi
T02D1347-2:206a-33: ma gung gi thun mtshams dang mtshan mo phyed kyi
T02D1347-2:206a-34: gcig go // la 'dus pa'o // thun mtshams la'o
T02D1347-2:206a-35: // de ltar lus dang sems la zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:206a-36: lnga pa'i don la bdun pa ste lus dang bsam
T02D1347-2:206a-37: pa'i dbye ba las zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:206a-38: de bzhin du snga dro dang phyi dro'i thun mtshams
T02D1347-2:206a-39: ni rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi 'khyud pa ste zhal
T02D1347-2:206a-40: gcig dang zhal bzhi pa dag gam zhal gcig pa
T02D1347-2:206a-41: la sogs pa dang zhal brgyad pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:206a-42: dag gi mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa snyoms par
T02D1347-2:206a-44: rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la zhal dang phyag mnyam pa
T02D1347-2:206a-45: dag gis 'khyud pa ni nyin mo dang mtshan mo
T02D1347-2:206a-46: mnyam pa'i dus la'o zhes pa dus kyi khyad par
T02D1347-2:206b-0: gyis nges pa'o // de skad du bzang @206b ngan shes shing dus shes la //
T02D1347-2:206b-1: khyab bdag dam shes dam tshig ldan //
T02D1347-2:206b-2: dus shes sems can dbang po shes //
T02D1347-2:206b-3: rnam grol gsum la mkhas pa po zhes pa mtshan
T02D1347-2:206b-4: yang dag par brjod pa las te bcom ldan 'das
T02D1347-2:206b-5: kyi nges pa'o // da ni bya ba'i rgyud rnams
T02D1347-2:206b-6: gsungs pa shes rab ces pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:206b-7: kyi nges pa'o // / 'dir rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
T02D1347-2:206b-8: la shes rab sbyor ba dang rnal 'byor gyi rgyud
T02D1347-2:206b-9: la snyoms par zhugs pa ste snga dro dang phyi
T02D1347-2:206b-10: dro'i thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang nyi ma gung
T02D1347-2:206b-11: nas mtshan dro'i thun mtshams kyi sbyor ba dang nyi
T02D1347-2:206b-12: ma gung nas mtshan gnyis la grub po //
T02D1347-2:206b-13: rgod pa la sogs rnams ni thun gyi mngon mtshams
T02D1347-2:206b-14: la'o zhes pa ni 'dir thun dang po'i mngon mtshams
T02D1347-2:206b-15: la rgod pa'i rgyud dang thun gsum pa'i mngon mtshams
T02D1347-2:206b-16: la lta ba'i rgyud dang thun lnga pa'i mngon mtshams
T02D1347-2:206b-17: la nu ma la reg pa'i rgyud dang thun bdun
T02D1347-2:206b-18: pa'i mngon mtshams la lag pa 'dzin pa'i rgyud de
T02D1347-2:206b-19: de ltar rgyud rnam pa bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:206b-20: de ci'i phyir zhe na 'dir rlung gi zad par
T02D1347-2:206b-21: rnams ni shes rab la rgod pa tsam gyis 'dzag
T02D1347-2:206b-23: me'i zad pa rnams ni bltas pas bde bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:206b-24: chu'i zad par rnams ni nu ma la reg pas bde bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:206b-25: sa'i zad par rnams ni lag pa 'dzin pas bde
T02D1347-2:206b-26: bar 'gyur ro de ltar 'og min la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:206b-27: nas tshangs ris kyi mthar thug pa gzugs na spyod
T02D1347-2:206b-28: pa bcu drug ste 'di rnams kyi rgyas pa ni
T02D1347-2:206b-29: 'chad par 'gyur pa mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i ye
T02D1347-2:206b-30: shes grub pa las brjod par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:206b-31: 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams kyi snyoms par zhugs
T02D1347-2:206b-32: pa ni gnyis gnyis sbyor ba'o zhes pa grub pa'i
T02D1347-2:206b-33: mtha'o // thams cad du gzugs med pa la ni 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams gnas so //
T02D1347-2:206b-34: da ni lus la bsam pa rab tu 'jug pa
T02D1347-2:206b-35: gsungs pa shes rag ces pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:206b-36: 'dir shes rab kyi yan lag dmar po me'i khams
T02D1347-2:206b-37: dang ser po sa'i khams la nges par dus kyi
T02D1347-2:206b-38: 'khor lo'i bsam pa rab tu 'jug go //
T02D1347-2:206b-39: shes rab dang thabs kyi gzung bar bya ba ste
T02D1347-2:206b-40: gang gi phyir snyoms par zhugs pa la shes rab
T02D1347-2:206b-41: gang yin pa de ni thabs kyi bsam pa 'dzin
T02D1347-2:206b-42: pa mo dang thabs gang yin pa de yang shes
T02D1347-2:206b-43: rab kyi bsam pa 'dzin pa po ste bsam pa
T02D1347-2:206b-44: 'dzin pa des na bde ba skye'o //
T02D1347-2:207a-1: lo'i chu'i khams dkar po ni dmar po'i yan lag
T02D1347-2:207a-2: me'i yan lag la rab tu 'jug cing ro mnyam
T02D1347-2:207a-3: par 'gyur te de bzhin du rlung nag po ni
T02D1347-2:207a-4: ser po'i yan lag sa la ro mnyam par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:207a-5: ro // de ltar na lho dang nub tu lha rnams kyi'o //
T02D1347-2:207a-6: de bzhin du rdo rje can dang lha rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:207a-7: g-yon gyi yan lag ste chu'i khams dkar po'i yan
T02D1347-2:207a-8: lag la shes rab bsam pa zhes pa dmar po'i
T02D1347-2:207a-10: mdun du kha dog nag po rlung gi khams la ser po sa'i bsam pa 'jug go //
T02D1347-2:207a-11: de bzhin du steng dang 'og tu ljang khu dang
T02D1347-2:207a-12: sngon po dag phan tshun du yang dag par sbyor
T02D1347-2:207a-13: ba'o // de ltar sems can thams cad kyi yang
T02D1347-2:207a-14: mchog gi lus la shes rab bsam pas phye ba
T02D1347-2:207a-15: g-yon dang mdun ni zhi bar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:207a-16: drag po g-yas dang rgyab kyi yan lag mchog gi
T02D1347-2:207a-17: rgyal ba'i bdag po'i bsam pas phye ba de bzhin
T02D1347-2:207a-18: nyid ces pa ste steng zhi ba dang 'og drag
T02D1347-2:207a-19: por grub bo // de ltar shes rab kyis phye
T02D1347-2:207a-20: rgyal ba dag gi rab mchog tshogs kyi rigs te
T02D1347-2:207a-21: khu ba'i khams las byung ba lus kyi dbye ba
T02D1347-2:207a-22: chu dang rlung dang nam mkha'i mtshan nyid gang yin
T02D1347-2:207a-23: pa de nyid bas pa'i dbye bas rdul gyi khams
T02D1347-2:207a-24: rnams kyis phye ba sa dang me dang ye shes
T02D1347-2:207a-25: kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ba'i phyir rab mchog tshogs
T02D1347-2:207a-26: kyi rigs ni gnyis kyi rang bzhin zhes pa byang
T02D1347-2:207a-27: por grub bo // dang / lhor lha'i tshogs dmar
T02D1347-2:207a-28: po dang dkar por 'gyur zhing shar dang nub tu
T02D1347-2:207a-29: ser po dang nag por 'gyur la steng dang 'og
T02D1347-2:207a-30: tu sngon po dang ljang khur 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:207a-31: de bzhin du shes rab kyi ni tshogs kyi rigs
T02D1347-2:207a-32: gtso bo'i bsam pas phye bas nges par phyogs bral
T02D1347-2:207a-33: du yang gnyis kyi rang bzhin nyid du 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:207a-34: bden bral dang dbang ldan du dkar po dang dmar
T02D1347-2:207a-35: por 'gyur ro // rlung dang me dang ser por 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:207a-36: gnyis kyi rang bzhin zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:207a-37: de ltar thabs kyi tshogs ni phyogs su gnas pa
T02D1347-2:207a-38: ste rnal 'byor ma'i tshogs zhes pa shes rab kyi
T02D1347-2:207a-39: tshogs spyan ma la sogs pa dang sgrol ma la
T02D1347-2:207a-40: sogs pa ni phyogs bral du gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:207a-41: de ltar g-yas dang g-yas min nyi ma ri bong
T02D1347-2:207a-42: can gyi sku dag zung ste shar dang nub nyid
T02D1347-2:207b-0: kyang // nag po ser po @207b dag ste sngon
T02D1347-2:207b-1: po ljang khu dag kyang de bzhin mkha' dang sa
T02D1347-2:207b-2: 'og yang dag gnas pa lha'i tshogs zhes pa nges
T02D1347-2:207b-3: kyang // pa'o // gzhan gyi rigs las 'khyud pa
T02D1347-2:207b-4: de'i phyir thabs dkar po rnams kyi shes rab dmar
T02D1347-2:207b-6: thabs dmar po rnams kyi shes rab ri bong 'dzin
T02D1347-2:207b-7: pa ltar dkar mo rnams dang de bzhin nyid du
T02D1347-2:207b-8: thabs ser po rnams kyi shes rab kha dog nag
T02D1347-2:207b-9: mo rnams dang thabs dkar min zhes pa nag po'i
T02D1347-2:207b-10: rigs rnams kyi shes rab mchog gi gser dang mtshungs
T02D1347-2:207b-11: pa ser mo rnams dang sngon po rnams kyi shes
T02D1347-2:207b-12: rab kha dog sna tshogs zhes pa ldan khu rnams
T02D1347-2:207b-13: so // slar yang thabs ljang khu rnams kyi shes rab sngon mo rnams so //
T02D1347-2:207b-14: de bzhin gsungs zhes pa ni rig pa ste gzhan
T02D1347-2:207b-15: gyi rigs la 'khyud pa las bya ba 'grub par
T02D1347-2:207b-16: 'gyur ro // rang gi rigs la 'khyud pas ni
T02D1347-2:207b-17: bya ba grub pa med de rang gi bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:207b-18: la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:207b-19: bha ga'i sems kyis bha ga'i rigs kyi khams can
T02D1347-2:207b-20: rnams kyi bde ba skye ba dang de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:207b-21: rtags kyi sems kyis skyes pa'i rtags kyi rigs can
T02D1347-2:207b-22: rnams kyi bde ba skye ba ni med do //
T02D1347-2:207b-23: de'i phyir dus kyi 'khor lo la rang 'od kyi
T02D1347-2:207b-24: shes rab rnams su mi 'gyur te rang gi bdag
T02D1347-2:207b-25: nyid la bya ba 'gal ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:207b-26: ci ste me long gi gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyis
T02D1347-2:207b-27: sems kyis sems kyi dngos po 'dzin par byed do
T02D1347-2:207b-28: zhe na / de nyid rnam par dpyad par bya
T02D1347-2:207b-29: ste 'dir me long la skyes bu'i gzugs brnyan ni
T02D1347-2:207b-30: nu ma dang skra dang ldan pa dang mtshungs pa
T02D1347-2:207b-31: ma yin zhing bud med kyi gzugs kyang nu ma
T02D1347-2:207b-32: dang skye gnas dang bral ba ma yin te des
T02D1347-2:207b-33: na re zhig pa 'od ni med do //
T02D1347-2:207b-34: de bzhin du 'gal ba gzhan yang 'dir gzugs kyi
T02D1347-2:207b-35: g-yon pa'i lag pa rnams na mtshan ma gang yod
T02D1347-2:207b-36: pa de dag ni me long gi gzugs brnyan gyi
T02D1347-2:207b-37: lag pa g-yas pa rnams na gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:207b-38: de bzhin du g-yon gyi gdong gang yin pa de
T02D1347-2:207b-39: ni g-yas kyi ste de'i kha dog nyid kyang rang
T02D1347-2:207b-41: des na gzhan yi rigs la 'khyud pas dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:207b-42: gyi sgom pa ste dus kyi 'khor lo'i rigs pa
T02D1347-2:207b-43: las so // rgyud gzhan dang gzhan las ni /
T02D1347-2:207b-44: dngos po gang dang gang gi ni //
T02D1347-2:207b-45: mi rnams yid la yang dag sbyor //
T02D1347-2:208a-2: sna tshogs gzugs kyis nor bu bzhin //
T02D1347-2:208a-4: tshig ni rnam par dpyad mi bzod ces so //
T02D1347-2:208a-5: don dam par ni stong pa nyid kyi gzugs sgom
T02D1347-2:208a-6: pa la gzugs dang sku'i rtog pa med de des
T02D1347-2:208a-7: na rang 'od dang rang 'od ma yin pa zhes
T02D1347-2:208a-8: pa med do // rnam pa thams cad pa dang
T02D1347-2:208a-9: kha dog thams cad pa'i phyir shes pa dang shes
T02D1347-2:208a-10: bya rdul phra rab kyi rdzas dang rnam par rtog
T02D1347-2:208a-11: pa dang bral ba dag la rang bzhin med do
T02D1347-2:208a-12: pa med do // // de'i phyir rang bzhin med
T02D1347-2:208a-13: pa'i srid pa sgom pa ni bum pa dang snam
T02D1347-2:208a-14: bu dang shing rta dang dpung la sogs pa rnams
T02D1347-2:208a-15: kyi bya ba nyi tshe pa ma yin pa 'jig
T02D1347-2:208a-16: rten pa'i tha snyad mtha' dag dang bral ba'o zhes
T02D1347-2:208a-17: pa dbu ma pa yi grub pa'i mtha' ste sngags
T02D1347-2:208a-18: kyi tshul la de kho na nyid kyi skabs su
T02D1347-2:208a-20: 'dir tshigs su bcad pa bzhi bcu rtsa brgyad pa
T02D1347-2:208a-21: nas brtsams te tshigs su bcad pa drug cu rtsa
T02D1347-2:208a-22: gsum pa'i bar tshigs su bcad pa bcu drug ni
T02D1347-2:208a-23: go sla'o // da ni lus la rnam pa bcu'i
T02D1347-2:208a-24: dag pa gsungs pa spu zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:208a-25: ste 'dir ba spu dang skra ni nam mkha'i khams
T02D1347-2:208a-26: dang pags pa dang sha ni rlung gi khams dang
T02D1347-2:208a-27: khrag rnam pa gnyis ni me'i khams dang rdul dang
T02D1347-2:208a-28: gci ba ni chu'i khams dang rus pa dang rkang
T02D1347-2:208a-29: ni sa'i khams dang rtsa dang srog la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:208a-30: ni ye shes kyi khams so //
T02D1347-2:208a-31: sgra gcan gyi mjug ma ni ye shes rdo rje
T02D1347-2:208a-32: dang nyi ma ni gsung rdo rje dang zla ba
T02D1347-2:208a-33: ni sku rdo rje ste bzhi po 'di rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:208a-34: dbus su kun nas srog rgyud pa'o //
T02D1347-2:208a-35: zla ba'i dbus su ste khu ba'i dbus su dri
T02D1347-2:208a-36: med nor bu bzhin du zhes pa nye bar gzhag
T02D1347-2:208a-37: pa dang 'brel pa'i shel bzhin du dngos po kun
T02D1347-2:208a-38: gyis 'khyud pa'i rnam par shes pa ste de ni
T02D1347-2:208a-39: dngos po dang dngos po med pa dag gnyis su
T02D1347-2:208a-40: med pa nyid skyu ma lta bu stong pa nyid
T02D1347-2:208a-41: kyi gzugs tsam 'gyur pa med pa'i bde ba mchog
T02D1347-2:208a-42: gi bdud rtsi'i go 'phang khyab byed gzhom du med
T02D1347-2:208a-43: pa'o zhes pa nges pa ste lus la rnam pa
T02D1347-2:208a-44: bcu dag pa'o // da ni sa bcu rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:208a-45: khams de rnams dag pa gsungs pa spu la sogs
T02D1347-2:208a-46: pa zhes pa ste 'dir ba spu dang skra ni
T02D1347-2:208a-48: pags pa dang sha ni dri ma med pa dang
T02D1347-2:208b-0: khrag rnam @208b pa gnyis ni 'od byed pa dang
T02D1347-2:208b-1: ro dang chu ni 'od 'phro ba dang rus pa
T02D1347-2:208b-2: dang rkang ni spyad dka' ba dang rtsa ba dang
T02D1347-2:208b-3: srog ni mngon du gyur pa dang dus kyi me
T02D1347-2:208b-4: dang chags pa'i khams ni ring du song ba dang
T02D1347-2:208b-5: sgra gcan ni mi g-yo ba dang nyi ma ni
T02D1347-2:208b-6: legs pa'i blo gros dang zla ba ni chos kyi
T02D1347-2:208b-7: sprin te chags pa dang mun pa dang rdul dang
T02D1347-2:208b-8: snying stobs kyi chos kyis kun rdzob la 'jug pa'o
T02D1347-2:208b-9: // de ltar spu la sogs pa zla ba'i mtha'
T02D1347-2:208b-10: ni mtha' dag lus la gnas pa de rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:208b-11: sgrib pa med pa las sa bcu po de rnams
T02D1347-2:208b-12: // so // gang zhig sa bcur gsungs pa de
T02D1347-2:208b-13: rnams kyang sde pa drug dang la sogs gzhan dbyangs
T02D1347-2:208b-14: dang ldan pa rnams su gsungs so //
T02D1347-2:208b-15: de la ka'i sde pa ni rab tu dga' pa
T02D1347-2:208b-16: ste de bzhin du grangs ji lta bar tsa ta
T02D1347-2:208b-17: pa ta sa zhes pa de pa drug po rnams
T02D1347-2:208b-18: dang / la wa ra ya ha aal ao yar ae aa /
T02D1347-2:208b-21: de bzhin du lugs las bzlog pas kyang ring po
T02D1347-2:208b-22: la sogs pa'i sde pa rnams shes rab kyis rnams
T02D1347-2:208b-23: so // 'di dag dus kun rnal 'byor rnams la bde mnyam 'bras bu ster //
T02D1347-2:208b-24: de phyir bla ma'i zhabs la gnas pa zhes pa
T02D1347-2:208b-25: aa ba dh'u t'i'i zhabs la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor
T02D1347-2:208b-26: pa rnams kyis ni thar pa'i slad du btsal bar
T02D1347-2:208b-27: bya zhes pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:208b-28: lus las ma gtogs gang zhig khyab byed thar pa
T02D1347-2:208b-29: ster ba'i sangs rgyas gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa
T02D1347-2:208b-30: min te 'dir lus kyi khams sgrib pa med pa
T02D1347-2:208b-31: rnams sangs rgyas nyid ster bar byed pa dang thar
T02D1347-2:208b-32: pa ster pa'o // tshigs su bcad pa drug cu
T02D1347-2:208b-33: rtsa lnga pa 'di nas bdun cu rtsa bzhi pa'i
T02D1347-2:208b-34: mthar thug pa gzhan tshigs su bcad pa dgu ni
T02D1347-2:208b-35: pa ster pa'o // go sla'o // da ni stong
T02D1347-2:208b-36: pa nyid kyi gzugs mthong ba'i rjes la srog 'gog
T02D1347-2:208b-37: pas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi skad cig thob pa
T02D1347-2:208b-38: gsungs pa rlung zhes pa la sogs pa ste sngar
T02D1347-2:208b-39: gzugs mthong ba'i rjes la srog rtsol gyis rlung bcu
T02D1347-2:208b-41: srog dang thur sel la sogs pa bcu po yang
T02D1347-2:208b-42: dag par phrad pa de rnams kyis lte ba'i lte
T02D1347-2:208b-43: ba la gtum mo glog gi me'o //
T02D1347-2:208b-44: de yi rtse mo ni 'od zer yin zhing rtse
T02D1347-2:208b-45: mo des spyi bo ste dpral bar zla ba zhu
T02D1347-2:208b-46: bar byed ces pa ni byang chub kyi sems skye
T02D1347-2:209a-1: byang chub sems kyi thig le gang gang dpral ba
T02D1347-2:209a-2: 'di nas mgrin pa dang snying ga dang lte ba
T02D1347-2:209a-3: dang gsang ba rnams la son pa ni srog rtsol
T02D1347-2:209a-5: gsang bar sku'i thig le 'gog cing de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:209a-6: gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi thig le ni
T02D1347-2:209a-7: lte ba dang snying ga dang mgrin pa la 'gog
T02D1347-2:209a-8: go // thig le 'di las g-yo ba'i khu ba
T02D1347-2:209a-9: gang zhes pa ni 'dir gsang ba la gnas pa
T02D1347-2:209a-10: sku'i thig le bska ba'i rang bzhin las gzhan sla
T02D1347-2:209a-11: ba'i khu ba gang yin pa de ni g-yo ba'i
T02D1347-2:209a-12: khu bar gsungs shing de ni rdo rje nor bu
T02D1347-2:209a-13: la gnas rgyal mtshan rtse la ste rtags kyi sgo
T02D1347-2:209a-15: g-yo ba de ni shes rab ye shes skad cig
T02D1347-2:209a-16: gal te thig le'i phreng ba 'pho ba med pa'i
T02D1347-2:209a-18: de'i tshe las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ma yin te shes rab ye shes so zhes grub bo //
T02D1347-2:209a-19: mi 'pho ba'i rgyu de'i phyir g-yo med bde ba'i
T02D1347-2:209a-20: skad cig gang yin pa 'dir ni chos kyi dbyings
T02D1347-2:209a-21: te shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin mas ster
T02D1347-2:209a-22: bar byed do // des na phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba ni mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'o //
T02D1347-2:209a-23: las dang ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i bde ba ni
T02D1347-2:209a-24: bde ba 'dzag pa dang g-yo ba'i thabs te byis
T02D1347-2:209a-26: ji ltar dngul chu byis pa dang lang tsho dang
T02D1347-2:209a-27: rgan po dang bcings pa de bzhin du khu ba
T02D1347-2:209a-28: yang byis pa dang lang tsho dang rgan po dang
T02D1347-2:209a-29: 'gog pa ste sgrib pa thams cad zad pa las
T02D1347-2:209a-30: so // sgrib pa ni dri ma'o //
T02D1347-2:209a-31: byang chub kyi sems de nyid gang gi tshe dpral
T02D1347-2:209a-32: bar steng du 'gro ba de'i tshe sems de ji
T02D1347-2:209a-33: ltar byon pa de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:209a-34: ro yi 'gro ba rnams la gnas pa ste /
T02D1347-2:209a-35: sa la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor drug po rnams la gnas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:209a-36: srog rnams thams cad bkug cing zhes pa ni nyi khri chig stong drug brgya po'o //
T02D1347-2:209a-37: de ltar nyon mongs bdud rnams bcom byas nas rdzu
T02D1347-2:209a-38: 'phrul dang kun mkhyen gyi sa bcu gnyis 'chang bar
T02D1347-2:209a-39: 'gyur pa rnams dang srid gsum bla ma nyid ces
T02D1347-2:209a-40: pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang rnam pa thams
T02D1347-2:209a-41: cad mkhyen pa nyid dang lam mkhyen pa nyid dang
T02D1347-2:209a-42: lam gyi rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:209a-43: 'phyogs pa ni rnal 'byor pa ni brtson 'grus dang
T02D1347-2:209a-44: ldan pa rnams kyi skye ba 'di la ster bar
T02D1347-2:209b-0: byed do // ci ste gang gi tshe @209b lam
T02D1347-2:209b-1: du rab tu zhugs par gyur pa rnal 'byor ma
T02D1347-2:209b-2: thob par shi bar gyur na de'i tshe de yi
T02D1347-2:209b-3: 'dzin pa ste bag chags kyi stobs kyis slar yang
T02D1347-2:209b-4: mi'i skye ba gzhan la thams cad thob par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:209b-5: te brtson 'grus dang mi ldan par gyur cing ye
T02D1347-2:209b-6: shes ma bsgoms kyang skye ba bdun gyi mthar thug
T02D1347-2:209b-7: pas so zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:209b-8: da ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa
T02D1347-2:209b-9: skye ba gsungs pa gang zhig yon tan med ces
T02D1347-2:209b-10: pa la sogs pa ste 'dir gzhon nu ma gang
T02D1347-2:209b-11: yig yon tan med pa na mi 'dzag pa'i phyir
T02D1347-2:209b-12: chos kyi khams kyi yon tan dang bral ba'o //
T02D1347-2:209b-13: de ni dngos po chung ba lus kyi khams ma
T02D1347-2:209b-14: rdzogs shing so ma brjes pa ste lo brgyad kyi
T02D1347-2:209b-16: de nas gnyis pa ni so brjes nas lo bcu'i bar ro //
T02D1347-2:209b-17: de ltar sku'i phyag rgya ni skye gnas ma nyams pa'o //
T02D1347-2:209b-18: de'i mtshams nas lo bcu gcig nas brtsams nas lo
T02D1347-2:209b-19: bcva lnga'i bar du gcig ste chags pa rjes chags
T02D1347-2:209b-20: so // yon tan gter gzhan ni lo lnga'i bar
T02D1347-2:209b-21: du ste gsung gi phyag rgya rnam pa gnyis su
T02D1347-2:209b-22: so // 'gyur ro // de ltar lo brgyad dang
T02D1347-2:209b-23: lo gnyis dang de bzhin du lo lnga dang lnga'o
T02D1347-2:209b-24: so // 'gyur ro // // de nas lo nyi
T02D1347-2:209b-25: shu'i rjes la gzhan pa mkha' dus zhes pa lo
T02D1347-2:209b-26: bzhi bcu ni de bzhin du thugs kyi phyag rgya
T02D1347-2:209b-27: gcig ste nag po'i dngos po la rjes su chags
T02D1347-2:209b-28: so // 'gyur ro // // pa'o // de ltar lo drug cu ma'i bud med do //
T02D1347-2:209b-29: slar yang gzhan ma stong pa rig byed ces pa
T02D1347-2:209b-30: lo bzhi bcu'i bar du dkar po'i dngos po la
T02D1347-2:209b-31: rjes su chags pa ste rgan mo rgas pa skra
T02D1347-2:209b-32: dkar dang ldan pa lo brgya'i mthar thug pa'o //
T02D1347-2:209b-33: de ltar thugs kyi phyag rgya yang rnam pa gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:209b-34: gsum po 'di rnams kyi nang nas sku'i phyag rgya ni shin tu bu mo'o //
T02D1347-2:209b-35: thugs kyi phyag rgya ni shin tu lang tsho dang
T02D1347-2:209b-36: rgan mo ste gsum po 'di rnams spangs nas lo
T02D1347-2:209b-37: bcu gcig ma mtshan nyid thams cad yang dag par
T02D1347-2:209b-38: rdzogs pa rnams ni rgyal po'i bla ma'am rgyal po
T02D1347-2:209b-39: dbang bskur ba'am dbang phyug dbang bskur ba gzhan rnams
T02D1347-2:209b-41: / rin chen dbang po mi 'byung bar du ste
T02D1347-2:209b-42: mi 'byung zhes pa rdul mi 'byung gi bar du
T02D1347-2:209b-43: bsrung bar bya'o // rin chen dbang po rab tu
T02D1347-2:209b-44: 'byung ba'i dus su mtha' dag yon tan gter gyi
T02D1347-2:209b-45: dkyil 'khor dus kyi 'khor lo bzhengs nas dang por
T02D1347-2:209b-46: legs par bslab par byas shing der de la dbang
T02D1347-2:210a-0: bsrung bar bya'o // bskur @210a * // nas sangs
T02D1347-2:210a-1: rgyas byin brlabs sngas rnams kyis zhes pa rdo rje
T02D1347-2:210a-2: drug po rnams dang 'jam dpal gyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1347-2:210a-3: gyis shes rab kyis shes rab de yang rdzogs par
T02D1347-2:210a-4: byas te g-yas kyi rtsa la rab tu 'bab pa'i
T02D1347-2:210a-5: dus su de'i gsang ba'i padmar bde mnyam byang chub
T02D1347-2:210a-6: kyi sems sngags dang bcas pa zhes pa sku dang
T02D1347-2:210a-7: gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi sngags dang bcas
T02D1347-2:210a-9: de nas gsang ba de la yan lag drug gis
T02D1347-2:210a-10: bsrung ba rab tu bya ste de nas rang gi
T02D1347-2:210a-11: rdo rje nor bu la gnas byang chub sems ni
T02D1347-2:210a-12: myang bar bya'o // de nas rnal 'byor pas de la yang sbyin no //
T02D1347-2:210a-13: de'i padma'i phyir rol gyi gang yin pa de ni
T02D1347-2:210a-14: ming med dang mthe bo dag gis blangs nas myang
T02D1347-2:210a-15: bar bya ste thams cad bsrung ba'i don du'o //
T02D1347-2:210a-16: cho ga 'dis mngal bzung ba de la gang zhig
T02D1347-2:210a-17: bu ru gyur pa de ni 'jam dpal nyid do
T02D1347-2:210a-18: // shes rab lhag pa las zhes pa ni rdul
T02D1347-2:210a-19: lhag pa las gal te bu mor gyur na de'i
T02D1347-2:210a-20: tshe sna tshogs yum gyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
T02D1347-2:210a-21: // ro // des na nges par sangs rgyas yum
T02D1347-2:210a-22: du 'gyur zhes pa ste 'jam dpal dang sna tshogs
T02D1347-2:210a-23: yum gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i cho ga'o //
T02D1347-2:210a-24: de nas gzhan ma me tog gsum gyis zhes pa
T02D1347-2:210a-25: ni 'dir gal te rdul dang po la mngal ma
T02D1347-2:210a-26: skyes na de'i tshe yang dang yang du rdul mthong
T02D1347-2:210a-27: ba so so la dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas ting nge
T02D1347-2:210a-28: 'dzin gzhan rnams kyis byang chub kyi sems spro bar
T02D1347-2:210a-29: bya'o // de ltar gnyis pa la padma dkar 'dzin
T02D1347-2:210a-30: pa 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sprul par 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:210a-31: bya'o // // gsum pa la dza mbha la'i sprul
T02D1347-2:210a-32: pa dang bzhi pa la phyag na rdo rje ste
T02D1347-2:210a-33: bya'o // // bu'i yul la'o // bu mo'i yul
T02D1347-2:210a-34: la gos dkar mo dang nor rgyun ma dang sgra
T02D1347-2:210a-35: rdo rje mas byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:210a-36: de nas me tog brgyad kyis gzhan phyogs dang phyogs
T02D1347-2:210a-37: bral du gnas rdzu 'phrul che ldan khro bo'i rgyal
T02D1347-2:210a-38: po rnams zhes pa ni 'dir sngar dzambha las byin
T02D1347-2:210a-39: gyis brlabs pa las gtsug tor gyi ting nge 'dzin
T02D1347-2:210a-40: gyis gtsug tor ram shin tu sngon mos byin gyis
T02D1347-2:210a-42: phyag na rdo rje'i gnas su gnod mdzes rgyal po 'am drag spyan mar 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:210a-43: de nas rdul lnga pa la bgegs mthar byed dang brtson 'grus mtha' yas ma'o //
T02D1347-2:210a-44: drug pa la shes rab mthar byed dang rmugs byed ma'o //
T02D1347-2:210a-45: bdun pa la padma mthar byed dang nga rgyal ma'o //
T02D1347-2:210b-0: brgyad pa la gshin rje mthar phyed dang rengs byed @210b ma'o //
T02D1347-2:210b-1: de nas dgu pa la stobs po che dang 'od zer spyan ma'o //
T02D1347-2:210b-2: bcu pa la mi g-yo ba dang tsun d'a'o //
T02D1347-2:210b-3: bcu gcig pa la 'dod pa dang khro gnyer can no //
T02D1347-2:210b-4: bcu gnyis pa la dbyug pa sngon po dang rdo
T02D1347-2:210b-5: rje lcags sgrog ma'o zhes pa ste phyogs bral rnams
T02D1347-2:210b-6: su'o // de ltar khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin gyis
T02D1347-2:210b-7: mngal ni khro bos byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:210b-8: su'o // // de nas zla mtshan bcu gsum pa
T02D1347-2:210b-9: ni slar yang dang po ste ma rig pa la
T02D1347-2:210b-10: sogs pa'i yan lag ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:210b-11: des na zla ba de la rdul gang rab tu
T02D1347-2:210b-12: byung ba'i rdul de ni slar yang 'jam dbyangs rab
T02D1347-2:210b-14: de bzhin du de'i rjes la rnal 'byor pa ting
T02D1347-2:210b-15: nge 'dzin gyi dmigs pa byas nas byang chub kyi
T02D1347-2:210b-16: sems rnam par spro bar bya ste mngal ni des
T02D1347-2:210b-18: yum gyi lo nyi shu dag gi bar du so
T02D1347-2:210b-19: so'i rdul la gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa'
T02D1347-2:210b-20: gcig gam gnyis la sogs par 'gyur pa ni snying
T02D1347-2:210b-21: stobs chen po can du 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:210b-22: yum gyi lo bzhi bcu'i bar du cung zad snying stobs cha shad sman par 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:210b-23: slar yang lo ni shu'i bar du de bas yang ni snying stobs chung zhing brtson 'grus chung ba'o //
T02D1347-2:210b-24: de ltar yum gyi lo brgyad cu ste snying stobs
T02D1347-2:210b-25: dang rdul dang mun pa'i dbye bas mngal byin gyis
T02D1347-2:210b-26: brlab pa'o // de nas skye gnas la ni rdul med cing mngal gyi yul ni rab bcom ste /
T02D1347-2:210b-27: de nyams pa las shes rab la dbang bskur ma yin no //
T02D1347-2:210b-28: thabs la yang sa bon med na ste /
T02D1347-2:210b-29: sa bon zhes pa ni gang rab tu skye ba'o //
T02D1347-2:210b-30: 'on kyang sa bon nyams pa'i rgan po la ni /
T02D1347-2:210b-31: shes rab dbang bskur rgyal ba'i bdag po'i gsung gi sbyin par bya ste /
T02D1347-2:210b-32: dge slong la ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:210b-33: de bzhin du shes rab la yang dge slong ma la ji lta ba bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:210b-34: de ltar lo nyi shu ma rnams dbang gi don dang /
T02D1347-2:210b-35: byin gyis brlab pa'i don du bzang ngo //
T02D1347-2:210b-36: lo nyi shu rnams kyis sa'i khams dang /
T02D1347-2:210b-37: de bzhin nyid du chu dang /
T02D1347-2:210b-40: nam mkha'i yon tan rnams lo brgya'i bar du ste /
T02D1347-2:210b-41: rgyal ba'i yan lag don du brtsal bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:210b-42: byang chub sems kyi bsnyen pa 'di ni sems can
T02D1347-2:210b-43: don gyi byed pa mo ste 'bras bu mang por
T02D1347-2:211a-1: byang chub sems dpa' skyed pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:211a-2: da ni bdud rtsi btung ba gsungs pa gang zhig
T02D1347-2:211a-3: khrag ni zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir phyi
T02D1347-2:211a-4: rol du drang ba'i don gyis gang zhig khrag 'thung
T02D1347-2:211a-5: bar byed pa ni sha sbrang ngo //
T02D1347-2:211a-6: nges pa'i don gyis ni gang zhig aa ba dh'u
T02D1347-2:211a-7: t'ir 'pho ba'i dus su rdul gyi khams 'thung ba
T02D1347-2:211a-8: rab mchog lha mi rnams kyi sha sbrang de ni
T02D1347-2:211a-9: bdud rtsi gcig pu ste aa ba dh'u t'ir 'gog
T02D1347-2:211a-11: phyi rol du skyugs pa za ba gang yin pa
T02D1347-2:211a-12: de ni nges pa'i don gyis byang chub kyi sems
T02D1347-2:211a-13: gsang ba la sogs pa'i kha nas rdo rje nor
T02D1347-2:211a-14: bur song ba ni skyugs pa yin gyi shes rab
T02D1347-2:211a-15: kyi nang du rab tu zhugs pa ni ma yin
T02D1347-2:211a-16: no // de bzhin du 'pho ba med pa'i bshang
T02D1347-2:211a-17: ba dang gci ba dang khrag dang sha ni mchog
T02D1347-2:211a-18: tu ro mnyam ste mi zag pa'o //
T02D1347-2:211a-19: skyugs pa nang du rab tu zhugs pa zhes pa 'gags pa ste sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba'o //
T02D1347-2:211a-20: 'di dag rnams ni ye shes bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing
T02D1347-2:211a-21: 'pho ba med pa'i bdud rtsi lnga ni srid pa
T02D1347-2:211a-22: gsum gyi bla ma yis kyang rgyud rnams kun du
T02D1347-2:211a-23: bstan te phyi rol gyi bshang pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:211a-24: dngos grub kyi slad du bstan pa ni ma yin
T02D1347-2:211a-25: no zhes pa bdud rtsi'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:211a-26: da ni phyi rol du dam tshig bsrung ba dang
T02D1347-2:211a-27: bza' ba gsungs pa shes rab ces pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:211a-28: pa ste 'dir snyoms par zhugs pa la sgom par
T02D1347-2:211a-29: byed pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i byang chub kyi sems ma
T02D1347-2:211a-30: bsdams pa gal te shes rab kyi chos 'byung du
T02D1347-2:211a-31: lhung na de'i tshe shes rab chos 'byung la ni
T02D1347-2:211a-32: gang zhig ltung ba'i bde ba dag kyang rab tu
T02D1347-2:211a-35: ting nge 'dzin gyis spros pa'i byang chub kyi sems
T02D1347-2:211a-36: de yis gang su zhig byung ba de ni rgyal
T02D1347-2:211a-37: ba'i rigs la byang chub sems dpa' nyid de /
T02D1347-2:211a-38: gang gi phyir bde bar gshegs pa'i rigs rab tu
T02D1347-2:211a-39: 'phel bar byed pa de'i phyir bde bar gshegs pa
T02D1347-2:211a-40: pa mnyam par ma bzhag pa rnams kyi byang chub
T02D1347-2:211a-41: kyi sems bsrung ba dang bral ba de ni nyin
T02D1347-2:211a-42: zhag so so'i dus su bdud kyi pho nya dang
T02D1347-2:211a-43: srin po khu ba 'phrog par byed pa rnams dang
T02D1347-2:211a-44: mi rnams kyis kyang rnal 'byor pa'i cha byad kyis
T02D1347-2:211a-45: za ru 'jug par byed cing shes rab me tog
T02D1347-2:211a-46: dang ldan zos pa zhi ba bde ba'i 'bras bu
T02D1347-2:211b-0: ster bar ston @211b du 'jug par byed de byis
T02D1347-2:211b-1: pa'i skye bo gzhan rnams dmyal bar gtang ba'i slad
T02D1347-2:211b-2: du'o // de'i phyir sangs rgyas pa'i sngags pas rdo
T02D1347-2:211b-3: rje 'khums par ma gyur gyi bar du chu skyes
T02D1347-2:211b-4: las ni dbyung bar mi bya'o //
T02D1347-2:211b-5: gang tshe 'dod pa grub pa de'i tshe na 'di
T02D1347-2:211b-6: ni sangs rgyas byin gyis brlabs par rab tu 'gyur
T02D1347-2:211b-7: la rdo rje'i lam nas thabs kyi snying khar gzhug
T02D1347-2:211b-8: par bya zhing padma'i lam nas shes rab kyi snying
T02D1347-2:211b-9: khar gzhug par bya ste rang rang rdo rje'i snying
T02D1347-2:211b-10: khar lha yi 'khor lo rab tu bcug pa 'di
T02D1347-2:211b-11: yi 'od zer rnams kyis gnyi ga'i lus ni gang
T02D1347-2:211b-12: bar byas nas 'khor lo'i rnam par byed do //
T02D1347-2:211b-13: gal te 'di ni grub phar ma gyur na de'i
T02D1347-2:211b-14: tshe rdo rje nor bu la ni yang dag gnas
T02D1347-2:211b-15: pa'i byang chub kyi sems ming med dang mthe bo
T02D1347-2:211b-16: dag gis blangs nas bza' bar bya'o //
T02D1347-2:211b-17: de bzhin du shes rab kyi padma'i phyi rol du
T02D1347-2:211b-18: 'ongs pa de nyid kyang gnyis po dag gis bza'
T02D1347-2:211b-19: bar bya'o // shes rab kyi ni chos 'byung na
T02D1347-2:211b-20: gnas pa la mtha' dag rgyal ba'i rigs ni bsrung
T02D1347-2:211b-21: ba'i don du dgod par bya ste dpral ba la
T02D1347-2:211b-22: sogs pa rnams su rdo rje drug po rnams dang
T02D1347-2:211b-23: snying kha la sogs pa rnams su yan lag drug
T02D1347-2:211b-24: bar bya'o // go // shes rab ldan pa la'o zhes pa ni rdul dang ldan pa la'o //
T02D1347-2:211b-25: de nas byang chub kyi sems gcig pu bsrungs pa
T02D1347-2:211b-26: la bsod nams chen por 'gyur te slar yang gsung
T02D1347-2:211b-27: ni rab tu gsungs pa byang chub kyi sems 'di
T02D1347-2:211b-29: bdud kyi rigs gang su zhig 'di ni nyams la
T02D1347-2:211b-30: mngon par dga' byed g-yon can de ni rdo rje
T02D1347-2:211b-31: can te he ru kas gsod par byed do ;
T02D1347-2:211b-32: / byang chub sems kyi dam tshig bsrung ba dang bza' ba'i nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:211b-33: 'dir sngags kyi tshul las srid pa gsum gyi bdag
T02D1347-2:211b-34: pos drag po'i las kyi rang bzhin du ma'i sngags
T02D1347-2:211b-35: rnams rab tu gsungs pa gang /
T02D1347-2:211b-36: de rnams thams cad bdud kyi phyogs nyams 'jigs pa
T02D1347-2:211b-37: skyed byed srog chags rnams la nam yang ma yin
T02D1347-2:211b-38: no // 'dir bdud rnams ni gang zhig dran pa
T02D1347-2:211b-39: rnams dang byed po g-yul gyi yul la dga' zhing
T02D1347-2:211b-40: gsod byed gzhan yang mu stegs pa de rnams la
T02D1347-2:211b-41: ni mchog gi rgyal sras rnams kyis srog chags bsrung
T02D1347-2:211b-42: ba'i don du de rnams sbyar bar bya /
T02D1347-2:212a-0: @212a * // de rnams kyi phyogs zhes pa ni rig byed kyi
T02D1347-2:212a-1: chos la sogs pa ste chos de chos nyams pa
T02D1347-2:212a-2: dang 'jigs pa'i slad du yin gyi de rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:212a-3: srog gzhom pa'i slad du ni ma yin no //
T02D1347-2:212a-4: 'dir rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud las rdo rje mkha' 'gro
T02D1347-2:212a-5: ma gang yin pa de rnams la phyugs kyi skye
T02D1347-2:212a-6: bo ste mi shes pa rnams bsad pa'i don du
T02D1347-2:212a-7: mkhas pa ste sangs rgyas pa rnams kyis gsol ba
T02D1347-2:212a-9: gang las ci'i phyir zhe na sems can rnams ni
T02D1347-2:212a-10: bsrung ba'i don du srid pa gsum gyi bla mas
T02D1347-2:212a-11: de rnams 'jig rten khams su spros pa ste de'i
T02D1347-2:212a-12: phyir mchog gi snying rje dang ldan pa de rnams
T02D1347-2:212a-13: ni 'jig rten rnams srung bar byed cing 'jig rten
T02D1347-2:212a-14: slu bar byed pa'i sgrub pa po la sdang bar
T02D1347-2:212a-15: byed do // ci ste bsad pa la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:212a-16: las byas par gyur pa na bsgrub bya dag ni
T02D1347-2:212a-17: las kyi mthu yis shi bar gyur na de'i tshe
T02D1347-2:212a-18: 'di ni sgrub pa po yi bdud yin te bdag
T02D1347-2:212a-19: gis bsad do zhes pa'i nga rgyal las dman pa'i
T02D1347-2:212a-20: las kyis sgrub pa po dmyal bar 'gro'o //
T02D1347-2:212a-21: nga rgyal med cing nga yir 'dzin pa med pa
T02D1347-2:212a-22: ni dman pa'i las mi byed de bdag nyid la
T02D1347-2:212a-23: ji lta ba de bzhin du sems can rnams la
T02D1347-2:212a-24: lta'o // 'dir 'khor ba pa'i skyes bu rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:212a-25: sems ni kun nas mi dge'i 'bras bu'i dbang gis
T02D1347-2:212a-26: phran tshogs rig pa la rjes chags rig pa 'di
T02D1347-2:212a-27: yis srid pa gsum po mtha' dag skad cig gi
T02D1347-2:212a-28: ni bdag gi dbang du byed pa'o zhes pa'i bsam
T02D1347-2:212a-29: pa brkam chags sems kyis sbyin dang ye shes rnam
T02D1347-2:212a-30: par spangs nas shi bar gyur pa dmyal bar rab
T02D1347-2:212a-31: tu 'jug / phyis ni ste shi bar gyur pa'i
T02D1347-2:212a-32: rjes la rdzas gzhan gyi dbang dang rang gi chung
T02D1347-2:212a-33: ma gzhan gyi dbang du 'gyur te kye ma 'khor
T02D1347-2:212a-34: ba pa rnams kyi gzhan la chags pa ni ngan
T02D1347-2:212a-35: pa'i chos la rab tu 'jug go zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:212a-36: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:212a-37: rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-2:212a-38: stong phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-2:212a-39: kyi ye shes kyi le'u las rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud
T02D1347-2:212a-40: la sogs pa spro ba'i mdor bsdus chen po ste
T02D1347-2:212a-42: / yod min med min yod med min //
T02D1347-2:212a-43: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid min pa'ang min //
T02D1347-2:212b-0: @212b mtha' bzhi las ni rnam grol ba //
T02D1347-2:212b-1: bde chen sku la phyag 'tshal nas //
T02D1347-2:212b-2: dang po'i sangs rgyas ris med las //
T02D1347-2:212b-3: 'jam pa'i rdo rjes rab phyung ba //
T02D1347-2:212b-4: sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku bzhi yi //
T02D1347-2:212b-5: mtshan nyid de ni dgrol bar bya //
T02D1347-2:212b-6: shes rab ma yin pa zhes pa la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:212b-7: ste 'dir shes rab ni cha bco lnga'i bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:212b-9: thabs ni nag po'i phyogs te zla ba'i cha nyams pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:212b-10: de bzhin du dkar po ni mtshan mo dang nag po ni nyin mo'o //
T02D1347-2:212b-11: de'i phyir lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ni shes rab
T02D1347-2:212b-12: ma yin thabs kyang min pa 'di ni sangs rgyas
T02D1347-2:212b-13: rnams kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i sku ste de ltar
T02D1347-2:212b-14: yod pa dka' po'i phyogs ma yin no //
T02D1347-2:212b-15: med pa ste cha'i dngos po med pa nag po'i phyogs ma yin no //
T02D1347-2:212b-16: yod med min te 'di dag phan tshun 'gal ba'i phyir tshogs pa med do //
T02D1347-2:212b-17: gnyi ga'i bdag nyid min pa'ang min zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:212b-18: dkar po dang nag po'i phyogs 'di dag ma gtogs
T02D1347-2:212b-19: pa yang lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba de ma

T02D1347-2:278a-16: pa ni lte ba'i chu skyes phyed dang bcas pa'i
T02D1347-2:278a-18: de bzhin du gsang ba'i chu skyes phyed dang bcas pa'i sor bcu gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:278a-19: de ltar gtsug tor nas gsang ba'i padma'i mthar phyed
T02D1347-2:278a-20: dang bcas pa'i sor drug cu rtsa gnyis kyi tshad
T02D1347-2:278a-22: zhabs kyi mthil ni ma nu zhes pa sor bcu bzhi rnams kyis 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:278a-23: rje ngar de nyid ces pa nyi shu rtsa lnga ste brla yang de bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:278a-24: zhabs kyi dpangs ni rig byed ces pa ste phyed dang bcas pa'i sor bzhis so //
T02D1347-2:278a-25: de bzhin du pus mo'i tshigs dang dpyi yang sor bzhis so //
T02D1347-2:278a-26: de ltar phyed dang bcas pa'i sor drug cu rtsa
T02D1347-2:278a-27: gnyis kyis dpyi nas zhabs kyi mthil gyi mthar ro
T02D1347-2:278a-28: // de ltar sor nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya ni sangs rgyas kyi sku'o //
T02D1347-2:278a-29: brang phyed phyed bcas nyi mas zhes pa ni phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis kyi tshad kyis so //
T02D1347-2:278a-30: rang dpung dbung lag rnams ni mkha' mig rgyal po
T02D1347-2:278a-31: nyi ma'i tshad kyis so zhes pa ni nyi shus
T02D1347-2:278a-32: dpung pa dang bcu drug gis nye ba'i dpung pa
T02D1347-2:278a-33: dang bcu gnyis kyis lag pa gung mo'i sor mo'i
T02D1347-2:278a-34: mthar thug pa'o // gcig gis lag pa dang nye
T02D1347-2:278a-35: ba'i dpung pa'i mtshams dang dpud [*dpung?] pa dang nye
T02D1347-2:278a-37: de ltar phyed dang bcas pa'i sor drug cu rtsa
T02D1347-2:278a-38: gnyis te g-yon la ji lta ba de bzhin du
T02D1347-2:278a-40: thams cad du nyi shu rtsa lnga lhag pa'i brgya phrag gcig ni sku'i tshad de gru bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:278a-41: de nyid sems can rnams kyi ni khru bzhi ste
T02D1347-2:278b-0: mi rnams kyi sor dgu @278b bcu rtsa drug go
T02D1347-2:278b-1: // steng dang 'og tu ni brgyad cu rtsa bzhi
T02D1347-2:278b-2: ste de ltar mi rnams ni mtshan nyid dang mi
T02D1347-2:278b-4: rig byed ces pa bzhis gtsug tor gyi tshad do //
T02D1347-2:278b-5: phyed dang bcas pa'i bzhis mgo bo'i dpangs dang bzhis dpral ba dang /
T02D1347-2:278b-6: dang yig las bzhis shangs dang phyed dang bcas pa'i
T02D1347-2:278b-7: bzhis shangs kyi 'og ko sko'i mthar te bzhis mgrin
T02D1347-2:278b-8: pa'o // de nas snying kha lte ba gsang bar
T02D1347-2:278b-9: mi yi bdag po phyed bcas nyi ma rnams kyis
T02D1347-2:278b-10: pa'o // rim par 'gyur // gsang ba'i chu skyes
T02D1347-2:278b-11: lte ba'i rtsa bar rdo rje dag kyang thub pa
T02D1347-2:278b-12: yi ni steng gi gtsug tor nyid //
T02D1347-2:278b-13: mdzod spu gsang pa'i chu skyes dbus su khu ba'i
T02D1347-2:278b-14: thig le mi 'gyur bde bskyed byed gnas pa gang
T02D1347-2:278b-15: // dpal ldan rdo rje'i sa 'di gnyi ga'i rigs
T02D1347-2:278b-16: kyi dbang gis sku'i 'khor lo dpral ba dang lte
T02D1347-2:278b-17: ba dang gsung gi 'khor lo mgrin pa dang snying
T02D1347-2:278b-18: kha dang thugs kyi 'khor lo gsang ba dang gtsug
T02D1347-2:278b-19: // tor dag pa'o // da ni sku la dkyil
T02D1347-2:278b-20: 'khor dag pa gsungs pa phyed bcas nyi ma zhes
T02D1347-2:278b-21: pa la sogs pa ste 'dir lus la gsang ba
T02D1347-2:278b-22: dang mdzod spu'i dbus su thugs ka'o //
T02D1347-2:278b-23: de nyid ni thugs kyi 'khor lo ste lte ba
T02D1347-2:278b-24: dang mgrin pa'i dbus nas phyed dang bcas pa'i sor
T02D1347-2:278b-25: bcu gnyis so // lte ba dang mgrin pa'i mtshams
T02D1347-2:278b-26: su sor nyi shu rtsa lnga ni gsung gi 'khor
T02D1347-2:278b-27: bcu gnyis so // lo'o // gsang ba'i padma dang
T02D1347-2:278b-28: mdzod spu'i mthar sor lnga bcu ni sku'i 'khor lo
T02D1347-2:278b-29: ste rdo rje'i sa gzhi la'o //
T02D1347-2:278b-30: thugs kyi phyed ces pa ni thugs kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:278b-31: nang du gnas pa ste rkang ba dang bcas pa'i
T02D1347-2:278b-32: sor drug gi ye shes kyi 'khor lo sbyang bar
T02D1347-2:278b-33: bya'o // gsum po dag las zhes pa ni bdun pa'i don la lnga pa'o //
T02D1347-2:278b-34: dkyil 'khor gsum po dag la sgo rnams bya zhes
T02D1347-2:278b-35: pa la thugs kyi sgo rnams ni sad pa la
T02D1347-2:278b-36: sogs pa'i gnas skabs bzhi dang gsung gi sgo rnams
T02D1347-2:278b-37: ni kha dang bshad lam dang sna'i bu ga rnams
T02D1347-2:278b-38: dang sku'i sgo rnams ni mig dang rna ba'i bu
T02D1347-2:278b-39: ga rnams te de ltar sgo bcu gnyis so //
T02D1347-2:278b-40: lhag ma ni sngar brjod zin to //
T02D1347-2:278b-41: de ltar byang chub sems kyi 'gro ba dang 'ong
T02D1347-2:278b-42: ba'i dbye bas steng dang 'og tu sku dang gsung
T02D1347-2:278b-43: dang thugs kyi 'khor lo nyis 'gyur dag tu 'gyur
T02D1347-2:278b-44: te sor brgya'o zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-2:278b-45: de bzhin du lhun por gnas pa la yang ste
T02D1347-2:278b-46: dkyil 'khor la rgyal ba'i bdag po'i sor mo phyed
T02D1347-2:278b-47: gang yin pa de ni mi yul du dpag tshad
T02D1347-2:278b-48: stong phrag dag tu 'gyur te de ltar na khru
T02D1347-2:279a-1: rnams la rlung gi khor yug gi mthar thug pa dpag tshad 'bum phrag bzhir 'gyur ro //
T02D1347-2:279a-2: de bzhin lha yi ri bo dag ni lus kyi
T02D1347-2:279a-3: tshad du 'gyur te rgyur ni phyed kyi tshad yin
T02D1347-2:279a-4: no zhes pa ni sngar brjod zin to //
T02D1347-2:279a-5: de yi steng du rdo rje'i rnam pa brtsegs pa
T02D1347-2:279a-6: cha gsum pa ste de yi yang ni phyed du
T02D1347-2:279a-7: 'gyur zhing lhun po'i phyi rol du 'og gi char
T02D1347-2:279a-8: 'dzin ma'i khor yug dang chu'i khor yug dang me'i
T02D1347-2:279a-9: khor yug dang rlung gi khor yug go //
T02D1347-2:279a-10: de'i phyi rol gyi cha la 'bar ba dang bcas
T02D1347-2:279a-11: pa'i rdo rje'i phreng ba ni rdo rje'i khor yug
T02D1347-2:279a-12: go // phyed bcas zhes pa la sogs pa tshigs su bcad pa gcig ni go sla'o //
T02D1347-2:279a-13: steng dang 'og tu sangs rgyas sku ni mnyam pa
T02D1347-2:279a-14: gru bzhi par 'gyur te sku dang gsung dang thugs
T02D1347-2:279a-16: kun nas rlung gi bgrod pa'i dbang gis thad ka'i
T02D1347-2:279a-17: tshad kyis zhes pa ni phyi rol du rlung gi
T02D1347-2:279a-18: dkyil 'khor gyi bgrod pa'i dbang gis nang du lag
T02D1347-2:279a-19: pa g-yon gyi sen mo nas lag pa g-yas kyi
T02D1347-2:279a-20: sen mo'i mthar mnyam gnas la sogs pa'i rlung bgrod
T02D1347-2:279a-21: pa'o // des na lus kyi dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa ste gru bzhi'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:279a-22: 'khor lo gsum rnams kyis sngom pa'am yang na 'khor
T02D1347-2:279a-23: lo drug rnams kyis sngom pa'i dkyil 'khor zlum po
T02D1347-2:279a-24: sgo brgyad pa ste 'khor lo so so'i chad rgyal
T02D1347-2:279a-25: ba'i bdag po'i rkang pa dang bcas pa'i sor drug
T02D1347-2:279a-27: sgo brgyad rnams kyis bskor ba ni sngar brjod zin to //
T02D1347-2:279a-28: rang gi lag mthil sen mo rnams kyis dpal ldan
T02D1347-2:279a-29: dur khrod brtag par bya ste de la dkyil 'khor
T02D1347-2:279a-30: gyi thad ka dang 'og dang steng du yang kha
T02D1347-2:279a-31: la sogs pa sgo brgyad po rnams dang dur khrod
T02D1347-2:279a-32: rnams so zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:279a-33: da ni bcom ldan 'das ma'i sku'i dag pas dkyil
T02D1347-2:279a-34: 'khor gsungs te steng 'og zhal dang gsang bar gnyis
T02D1347-2:279a-35: dang chu gter tshad kyis bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil
T02D1347-2:279a-36: 'khor dag tu 'gyur zhes pa ni sor bzhi bcu
T02D1347-2:279a-37: rtsa gnyis kyis 'gyur te mdzod spu dang gsang ba'i
T02D1347-2:279a-38: padma dag las sor brgyad dor nas sor bzhi bcu
T02D1347-2:279a-39: rtsa gnyis kyis rdul gyi khams so //
T02D1347-2:279a-40: des bcom ldan 'das ma'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:279a-41: padma'i phyed dang 'khor lo drug ni mtshungs pa'i cha
T02D1347-2:279a-42: rnams kyis so // 'dir sgo ni mi mtshungs te 'khor lo las lnga cha'o //
T02D1347-2:279b-0: 'khor lo las lnga cha gang yin pa de ni gdan bzhi la sogs par @279b ro ;
T02D1347-2:279b-1: / de ci'i phyir zhe na 'dir skye ba'i dus
T02D1347-2:279b-2: su ma'i skye gnas sor bcu gnyis su 'gyur te
T02D1347-2:279b-3: cha dgu bcu rtsa drug las brgyad cha'o //
T02D1347-2:279b-4: des na gling bzhi rnams su bud med rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:279b-5: skye gnas ni sgo bzhi rnams te mngal gyi gnas
T02D1347-2:279b-6: ni dkyil 'khor gyi khang ba dang byis pa'i lus
T02D1347-2:279b-7: ni lha'i tshogs so zhes byis pa rnams kyi skye
T02D1347-2:279b-8: ba lha'i rnam par bstan pa ni bcom ldan 'das
T02D1347-2:279b-10: 'on kyang gsang ba nas gtsug tor gyi cha las
T02D1347-2:279b-11: sgo ni lnga cha'o zhes pas te rigs pa las
T02D1347-2:279b-12: so // de ltar sems can rnams kyi lus ni dkyil 'khor gyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:279b-13: mchod rten ni shes rab ma yin zhing thabs kyang
T02D1347-2:279b-14: ma yin te ma ning ngo zhes pa ni nges
T02D1347-2:279b-15: pa'o // lhun po'i phyi rol du ni 'og gis
T02D1347-2:279b-16: gzhi'i gnas la grub pa brgyad po yang dag gnas
T02D1347-2:279b-17: pa ste shar du ral gri dang drag po'i zur
T02D1347-2:279b-18: du ro yi dbang po dang byang du bdud rtsi'i
T02D1347-2:279b-19: 'bras bu dang rlung du ril bu dang nub tu
T02D1347-2:279b-20: mig sman dang bden bral du ro tsa na dang
T02D1347-2:279b-21: lho ru rkang mgyogs dang me yi zur du mi
T02D1347-2:279b-22: zad pa'i gter dang dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su mchod
T02D1347-2:279b-23: pa'o // phyir thogs pa'o // lha dang mi yi
T02D1347-2:279b-24: bla ma dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshangs pa'i dbyangs ni
T02D1347-2:279b-25: de nyid do zhes pa ni gzhom du med pa'i
T02D1347-2:279b-26: sgra ste lha la sogs pa rnams rab tu sad
T02D1347-2:279b-27: par byed pa'o zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:279b-28: da ni rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i mtshan nyid
T02D1347-2:279b-29: gsungs pa nor bu zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:279b-30: 'dir rdo rje nor bu rnam par dag pas rdo
T02D1347-2:279b-31: rje sor gcig par 'gyur ro gtsug tor gyi 'khor
T02D1347-2:279b-32: lo rnam par dag pas sor gnyis pa dang dpral
T02D1347-2:279b-33: pa rnam par dag pas sor bzhi pa dang mgrin
T02D1347-2:279b-34: pa rnam par dag pas sor lnga pa dang snying
T02D1347-2:279b-35: kha rnam par dag pas sor brgyad pa dang lte
T02D1347-2:279b-36: ba rnam par dag pas sor dgu pa dang gsang
T02D1347-2:279b-37: pa rnam par dag pas sor bcu gnyis pa ste
T02D1347-2:279b-38: zad par rlung dang me dang chu dang sa dang
T02D1347-2:279b-39: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha dang lha ma yin
T02D1347-2:279b-40: dang mi rnams kyi grangs ji lta ba bzhin no
T02D1347-2:279b-41: // des na rna ba'i phyag rgya rnams sor gcig
T02D1347-2:279b-42: pa dang mthe bo'i rdo rje ni sor gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:279b-43: dang dpral par rdo rje phreng ba'i don du sor
T02D1347-2:279b-44: bzhi pa dang mgrin par yang sor lnga pa dang
T02D1347-2:279b-45: phrag par rdo rje phreng pa'i don du sor brgyad
T02D1347-2:279b-46: pa dang snying khar 'dogs pa'i rdo rje ni so
T02D1347-2:279b-47: rang gu pa ste rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis rdo
T02D1347-2:279b-48: rje'i rgyan gyi ched du bya'o //
T02D1347-2:279b-49: gsor ba'i rdo rje ni sor bcu gnyis pa'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-0: de rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni steng dang dbus dang 'og @280a * //
T02D1347-2:280a-1: tu gsum gyi cha ste mnyam pa'i cha'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-2: gsor ba'i rdo rje de nyid zlum pa ni zhi ba ste zhi ba'i las la'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-3: rnam par rgyas pa ste rtse mo rnam par bye
T02D1347-2:280a-4: ba ni drag po la zhes pa drag po'i las
T02D1347-2:280a-5: la'o // dril bu dag kyang de bzhin cha gsum
T02D1347-2:280a-6: ste dbus dang steng du rdo rje dang zhal yang
T02D1347-2:280a-7: la'o // mtshungs pa'o // ba lang gi gdong ni zhi ba la'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-8: padma rnam par rgyas pa'i kha ni drag po la ste gyis pa'i rdo rje dang bcas pa'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-9: 'dir rdo rje'i rva rnams kyi khyon ni rdo rje'i tshad las sum cha'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-10: rdo rje'i dbus su lte ba zhal bzhi pa ste sum cha de yi sum cha'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-11: de bzhin du lte ba'i 'og dang steng du lte ba'i tshad kyis 'dab ma brgyad rnams so ;
T02D1347-2:280a-12: / rva ni rdo rje'i khyon dang mtshungs pa zhes
T02D1347-2:280a-13: pa phyogs sam phyogs bral gyi dbus su sum cha
T02D1347-2:280a-14: ste phyogs bzhi po rnams sam phyogs bral rnams su'o
T02D1347-2:280a-15: // rva yi zlum po ni rdo rje'i sum cha'i bzhi cha'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-16: phyi rol gyi rva rnams kyi sum cha ni 'og go //
T02D1347-2:280a-17: steng du cha gnyis pa ni rgya shug gi tsher
T02D1347-2:280a-18: ma lta bu ste steng dbus la bsres pas sbyor
T02D1347-2:280a-19: ba'o zhes pa ni zum pa'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-20: rnam par gyes pa la rtse mo rnam par bye ba bya'o //
T02D1347-2:280a-21: dril bu'i zhal rnams de bzhin zhes pa ni sku
T02D1347-2:280a-22: dang gsung dang thugs dang ye shes kyi thig le
T02D1347-2:280a-23: rnam par dag pa byams pa la sogs pa'i gnas
T02D1347-2:280a-24: kyis rdo rje la zhal bzhi ji lta ba de
T02D1347-2:280a-25: bzhin du shes rab kyi rdul gyi thig le'i chos
T02D1347-2:280a-26: dang stong pa nyid la sogs pa rnam par thar
T02D1347-2:280a-27: pa'i sgo bzhi rnam par dag pas zhal bzhi bya'o
T02D1347-2:280a-28: zhes pa ni rigs pa ste gcig go //
T02D1347-2:280a-29: gnyis pa ni nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can
T02D1347-2:280a-30: zhes pa k'a li gsal byed kyi chos brjod du
T02D1347-2:280a-31: med pa ste dbyangs med pa'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:280a-32: des na rdo rje'i lte ba la zhal med do //
T02D1347-2:280a-33: mtshan mo shes rab rab tu grags zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:280a-34: a'a li dbyangs kyi chos te des na brjod pa'i
T02D1347-2:280a-35: rang bzhin gyi phyir bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhal gcig
T02D1347-2:280a-36: go zhes pa ni rdo rje dril bu la grub
T02D1347-2:280a-37: pa'o // da ni mchod rten gyi mtshan nyid gsungs
T02D1347-2:280a-38: pa gsung ba'i zhes pa la sogs pa ste gsang
T02D1347-2:280a-39: ba'i chu skyes mdzod spu'i mtha' yi cha yis zhes
T02D1347-2:280a-40: pa sor lnga bcu rnams kyis mchog gi rgyal ba'i
T02D1347-2:280a-41: bdag po'i mchod rten dpangs kyi tshad do //
T02D1347-2:280a-42: de yi phyed kyis zhes pa nyi shu rtsa lngas
T02D1347-2:280a-43: gdan gyi rgya ste sa bzhin du gru bzhi pa
T02D1347-2:280a-44: shin tu mnyam pa ste thad ka'i chas so //
T02D1347-2:280a-45: de yi sum chas phyogs cha rnams zhes pa ni
T02D1347-2:280b-0: sor sum @280b cha dang bcas pa'i sor brgyad rnams
T02D1347-2:280b-1: te sor byed dang gnyis phyir 'bur ba'o //
T02D1347-2:280b-2: gdan de'i steng gi padma'i phyir 'bur ba dang thugs
T02D1347-2:280b-3: khar gnas pa'i khor yug gi phyir 'bur ba yang
T02D1347-2:280b-5: thugs khar gnas pa'i khor yug tu gyur pa de
T02D1347-2:280b-6: bzhin du zlum po'i padma yang ste gdan gyi tshad
T02D1347-2:280b-7: kyis so ; / gzhi dang mnyam pa'i padma'i mtha'
T02D1347-2:280b-8: yi chas dman pa ste sor phyed dang gnyis bcum
T02D1347-2:280b-10: de yi phyogs cha yis kyang mgrin pa'o zhes pa
T02D1347-2:280b-11: ni thad dka'i tshad kyis sor brgyad dang sum cha'o
T02D1347-2:280b-12: // dpangs kyi tshad ni sor bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:280b-13: gdan gyi phyed kyi cha yis gdong ste zhes pa
T02D1347-2:280b-14: ni thad ka'i char phyed dang bcas pa'i sor bcu
T02D1347-2:280b-15: gnyis kyis so // de nyid ni gru bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:280b-16: de bzhin du mgrin pa ste sa bzhin shin tu mnyam pa zhes pa'o //
T02D1347-2:280b-17: gdong dang mgrin pa de yi sum cha ni phyogs bzhi'i cha'o //
T02D1347-2:280b-18: mgrin pa'i phyogs kyi cha rnams ni sor phyed phyir
T02D1347-2:280b-19: 'bur ba ste gdong gi ni rkang pas dman pa'i
T02D1347-2:280b-21: de ltar gsang ba'i padma dag las phyed bcas nyi
T02D1347-2:280b-22: mas zhes pa phyed dang bcas pa'i sor bcu gnyis
T02D1347-2:280b-23: kyis dpangs kyi tshad de shin tu mnyam par yang
T02D1347-2:280b-24: ni 'gyur zhes pa gru bzhi pa'o //
T02D1347-2:280b-25: gdan gyi padma'i sngon mtshams zhes pa gdan gyi mthil
T02D1347-2:280b-26: nas lte ba'i padma'i mthar thug pa ste aa ba
T02D1347-2:280b-27: dh'u t'i'i gnas ji srid par phyed dang bcas pa'i
T02D1347-2:280b-29: de nas thugs kar gnas pa'i khor yug gi mthar
T02D1347-2:280b-30: yang phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis kyi tshad do
T02D1347-2:280b-31: // de nas mgrin pa'i rtsa ba ni phyed dang bcas pa'i bcu gnyis kyi tshad do //
T02D1347-2:280b-32: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo'i gnas de nas gdong
T02D1347-2:280b-33: gi mthar ni de bzhin zhes pa gdugs kyi phreng
T02D1347-2:280b-34: ba'i gnas kyi mthar thug pa de bzhin te mgrin
T02D1347-2:280b-35: pa sor bzhi dang ko sko nas zhal gyi gnas
T02D1347-2:280b-36: kyi mthar thug pa phyed dang bcas pa'i sor bzhi
T02D1347-2:280b-37: dang de bzhin du sna bzang po'i gnas la sor
T02D1347-2:280b-38: bzhi'o // de bzhin du spyi bo'i gnas su gdugs kyi phreng ba'o //
T02D1347-2:280b-39: de ltar na chu gter phyed bcas dus dang rig
T02D1347-2:280b-40: byed rnams kyis dum bu gsum zhes pa mgrin pa'i
T02D1347-2:280b-42: gdan las zhes pa gdan gyi steng du padma'i gdan
T02D1347-2:280b-43: gyi dpangs ni rig byed dag gis zhes pa sor
T02D1347-2:280b-44: bzhis padma'o // de bzhin du thugs khar gnas pa'i khor yug sor bzhi'o //
T02D1347-2:281a-0: mgrin pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin te sor bzhi @281a * //
T02D1347-2:281a-2: phyed bcas brgyad kyis gdong pa'i tshad ces pa ni
T02D1347-2:281a-3: phyed dang bcas pa bzhis ko sgo nas zhal gyi
T02D1347-2:281a-4: mtha' dang bzhi bshal gyi mthar te de nas mdzod
T02D1347-2:281a-5: spu'i gnas smin ma'i dbus su'o //
T02D1347-2:281a-6: de'i steng du dpral ba nas brtsams nas de yi
T02D1347-2:281a-7: steng du gdugs kyi phreng bar 'gyur ro mi yi
T02D1347-2:281a-8: dbang mdzod spu'i mtshams nas gdugs kyi phreng ba dang
T02D1347-2:281a-9: dpral ba dag dang spyi bo la ste de nas
T02D1347-2:281a-10: 'dir ni gtsug tor dag gi mthar thug 'di phyed
T02D1347-2:281a-11: dang bcas pa'i sor bcu gnyis so zhes pa nges
T02D1347-2:281a-12: pa'o // de ltar lhun po dang 'jig rten gyi
T02D1347-2:281a-13: khams ni mtha' dag rgyal ba'i sku ste mchod rten
T02D1347-2:281a-14: gyi dngos po ni lhun po'o //
T02D1347-2:281a-15: gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs
T02D1347-2:281a-16: sprul pa'i sku ste skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum
T02D1347-2:281a-17: cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:281a-18: 'dir skyes bu chen po'i mtshan rnams ni 'di lta
T02D1347-2:281a-19: ste de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i phyag dang zhabs kyi
T02D1347-2:281a-20: mthil 'khor los mtshan pa ste 'khor lo rtsibs stong
T02D1347-2:281a-21: yongs su rdzogs pa lte ba dang bcas pa dang
T02D1347-2:281a-22: ; zhabs mthil shin tu gnas pa ni zhabs kyi
T02D1347-2:281a-23: mthil thams cad kyis sa la reg pa ste de
T02D1347-2:281a-24: yang zhabs kyi mthil bteg na 'phar bar byed cing
T02D1347-2:281a-25: mnan na nem par byed pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-26: phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel pa ste dang pa'i rgyal po ltar dra ba dang ldan pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-27: phyag dang zhabs dag byis pa skyes ma thag gi bzhin du shin tu 'jam pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-28: bdun mtho bzhes pa zhabs dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-29: phrag pa gnyis po dag dang lhag pa yang mtho ba dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-30: phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring ba ste mthe
T02D1347-2:281a-31: bo la sogs pa rnams zlum zhing yangs la byin
T02D1347-2:281a-33: zhabs kyi ting pa yangs pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-34: sku tshe zhing drang ba dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-35: zhabs kyi long bu mi mngon pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-36: ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs shing g-yas su 'khyil ba dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-37: byin pa ri dags ae ne ya'i lta bu dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-38: mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su nub pa ste glang
T02D1347-2:281a-39: po che'i bzhin du mdoms kyi sba ba sbubs su
T02D1347-2:281a-41: gser la sogs pa ltar snum pa'i mdog dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-42: gser gyi pags pa dri ma dang rdul gyis ma gos pa dang ;
T02D1347-2:281a-43: ba spu'i bug nas spu re re skyes pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-44: smin ma'i dbus su mdzod spu yongs su zlum po
T02D1347-2:281a-45: ste ras bal gyi skud pa ltar dkar zhing shin
T02D1347-2:281a-46: tu phra ba sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid
T02D1347-2:281a-47: g-yas su 'khyil pas bskor ba dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-48: ro stod seng ge'i lta bu ste ro stod yangs pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281a-49: phrag pa shin tu che ba dang /
T02D1347-2:281b-0: mgrin pa yongs su @281b zlum pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281b-1: yan lag dang nyid lag rnams la ro bro ba'i
T02D1347-2:281b-2: mchog rnams kyis ro bro bar byed pa ste ro
T02D1347-2:281b-3: bro ba'i mchog de rnams kyang kha zas dang ldan
T02D1347-2:281b-4: pa'i rtsa'i mchog rnams las te rlung dang mkhris pa
T02D1347-2:281b-5: dang bad kan gyis ma nyams pa'i phyir ro zhes
T02D1347-2:281b-6: pa dang / nya gro dha ltar chu zhing gab
T02D1347-2:281b-7: pa'i skyes bu chen po ste chu dang zhing kun
T02D1347-2:281b-9: dbu gtsug gtor dang ldan pa ste gtsug gtor gdugs ltar yongs su gyur cing mtho ba dang /
T02D1347-2:281b-10: dbu skra dang snyan ngag gi bar du ljags kyi
T02D1347-2:281b-11: rtse mos reg pa ste dbu skra'i mthar thug pa
T02D1347-2:281b-12: dpral ba yang ljags kyis khebs pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281b-13: tshangs pa'i dbyangs 'khor mtha' yas pa la nang du
T02D1347-2:281b-14: ji lta ba de bzhin du phyi rol tu yang
T02D1347-2:281b-15: sems can thams cad kyis thos pa dang /
T02D1347-2:281b-16: 'gram pa seng ge'i ltar che ba dang /
T02D1347-2:281b-20: skyon thams cad dang bral ba dang /
T02D1347-2:281b-21: spyan shin tu sngo ba la sogs pa ste spyan
T02D1347-2:281b-22: dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de ni shin
T02D1347-2:281b-23: tu sngon po dang dmar po gang yin pa de
T02D1347-2:281b-24: ni shin tu dmar po dang dkar po gang yin
T02D1347-2:281b-25: pa de ni shin tu dkar po dang /
T02D1347-2:281b-26: ba glang gi rdzi ma ste khyu mchog gi ltar
T02D1347-2:281b-27: spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams steng dang 'og nas byung
T02D1347-2:281b-28: ba dang / sems can rnams kyi rigs sna tshogs
T02D1347-2:281b-29: la gzigs pa'i phyir sku'i kha dog sna tshogs so
T02D1347-2:281b-30: ba dang / // de ltar zhabs kyi mthil nas
T02D1347-2:281b-31: brtsams nas gtsug tor gyi mthar thug pa skyes bu
T02D1347-2:281b-32: chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ni chos yang
T02D1347-2:281b-33: dag par sdud pa las gsungs te nges na tshigs
T02D1347-2:281b-34: su bcad pa rnams kyis ma brjod do //
T02D1347-2:281b-35: de ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku dang mtshungs so //
T02D1347-2:281b-36: de bzhin du sems can rnams kyis bsod nams thob pa'i slad du rdul tshon gyi dkyil 'khor ro //
T02D1347-2:281b-37: nyi ma la sogs pa rnams g-yas skor du 'khor
T02D1347-2:281b-38: ba dang mchod rten la phyag 'tshal ba'i slad du
T02D1347-2:281b-39: lhun po ji lta ba de bzhin du mchod rten
T02D1347-2:281b-40: mi yi yul du bstan to //
T02D1347-2:281b-41: mchod pa la sogs pa bya ba'i slad du sangs
T02D1347-2:281b-42: rgyas ji lta bde bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs
T02D1347-2:281b-43: brnyan gyi sku'o // de ltar bsod nams thob pa'i slad du kun rdzob kyi bden pa bstan to //
T02D1347-2:281b-44: 'dir dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu ni gzhung mangs
T02D1347-2:281b-45: pas 'jigs pa'i phyir ma brjod de gang gis na
T02D1347-2:281b-46: thams cad las gsungs pas so //
T02D1347-2:282a-0: da ni 'jig rten gyi khams su khams sna tshogs kyi rang @282a * //
T02D1347-2:282a-1: bzhin gsungs pa gser zhes pa la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:282a-2: 'dir gser ni sa yi khams su 'gyur zhes pa
T02D1347-2:282a-3: gser ni sa'i rang bzhin ser po dang dngul ni
T02D1347-2:282a-4: chu'i rang bzhin dkar po dang zangs ni me'i rang
T02D1347-2:282a-5: bzhin dmar po dang lcags ni rlung gi rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:282a-6: nag po dang zha nye dkar nag 'dres pa zhes
T02D1347-2:282a-7: pa ni ro dang lcags nam mkha'i mtshan nyid dang
T02D1347-2:282a-8: ye shes kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid de de ltar
T02D1347-2:282a-9: gser la sogs pa'i lcags drug go //
T02D1347-2:282a-10: de bzhin du nor bu rin chen rnams te rin chen ser po ni sa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1347-2:282a-11: dkar po ni chu'i rang bzhin dang dmar po ni
T02D1347-2:282a-12: me'i rang bzhin dang nag po ni rlung gi rang
T02D1347-2:282a-13: bzhin dang ljang khu ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang
T02D1347-2:282a-14: sngon po ni ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:282a-15: te khams de rnams las byung ba'i phyir ro //
T02D1347-2:282a-16: de bzhin du ro drug po rnams te lan tshva'i
T02D1347-2:282a-17: ro ni sa'i rang bzhin dang mngar ba ni chu'i
T02D1347-2:282a-18: rang bzhin dang tsha ba ni me'i rang bzhin dang
T02D1347-2:282a-19: kha ba ni rlung gi rang bzhin dang bska ba
T02D1347-2:282a-20: ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin dang skyur ba ni ye
T02D1347-2:282a-22: de bzhin du zhing gi rdo rnams dag gi skye gnas ni sa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:282a-23: de bzhin du sman rnams rnam pa drug gi ro
T02D1347-2:282a-24: rnams dang mchog gi ro zhes pa grub pa'i ro
T02D1347-2:282a-25: rnams dang khams rnams gzhan pa nor bu'i dbang po
T02D1347-2:282a-27: de bzhin du sa la sna tshogs reg pa rnams
T02D1347-2:282a-28: dang mtha' dag nad ni 'phrog pa nyid kyi chu
T02D1347-2:282a-29: rnams zhes pa rdo tshul sogs pa rnams ni rnam
T02D1347-2:282a-30: pa drug go zhes yang dag par ro //
T02D1347-2:282a-31: da ni nor bu dang rin po che'i yon tan
T02D1347-2:282a-32: gsungs pas zhes pa la sogs pa ste 'dir sa
T02D1347-2:282a-33: yi rigs kyi nor bu'am rin po ches zug gzer
T02D1347-2:282a-35: chu yi rigs ni drug 'phrog par byed pa dang
T02D1347-2:282a-36: me yi rigs ni 'byung po zhugs pa 'phrog par
T02D1347-2:282a-37: byed pa dang rlung gi rigs ni rengs pa 'phrog
T02D1347-2:282a-38: par byed pa dang stong pa'i rigs ni gdug pa'i
T02D1347-2:282a-39: lta ba lhung ba rab tu 'phrog par byed pa
T02D1347-2:282a-40: dang ye shes kyi rigs ni skyon thams cad 'phrog
T02D1347-2:282a-41: par byed pa'o // rin po che dang nor bu
T02D1347-2:282a-42: ji lta ba de bzhin du thun mong pa sbal
T02D1347-2:282a-43: ba la sogs pa rnams kyi mgo la skyes pa
T02D1347-2:282a-44: dang mi bdag rnams kyi lus la gnas pa'i nor
T02D1347-2:282a-45: bu yang skyon 'phrog par byed pa'o //
T02D1347-2:282a-46: de ltar sa la sogs pa'i chos can gang dag
T02D1347-2:282a-47: brjod pa thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rang
T02D1347-2:282a-48: bzhin no // de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:282a-49: 'di nas tshigs su bcad pa gnyis ni go sla'o //
T02D1347-2:282b-0: da ni chu srin la sogs pa'i khyim @282b rnams
T02D1347-2:282b-1: kyi rnag bzhin gsungs pa 'dir ni zhes pa la
T02D1347-2:282b-2: sogs pa ste 'dir chu srin ni rnam par shes
T02D1347-2:282b-3: pa dang stong pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin dang bum
T02D1347-2:282b-4: pa ni 'du byed dang rlung gi khams kyi rang
T02D1347-2:282b-5: bzhin dang nya ni tshor ba dang me'i khams kyi
T02D1347-2:282b-6: rang bzhin dang lug ni 'du shes dang chu'i khams
T02D1347-2:282b-7: kyi rang bzhin dang glang ni gzugs dang sa'i khams
T02D1347-2:282b-8: kyi rang bzhin te 'khrig pa ni ye shes kyi
T02D1347-2:282b-9: phung po dang ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:282b-10: no // de bzhin du karka ta la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:282b-11: khyim rnams ni mtha'i lhan cig skyes pa la sogs
T02D1347-2:282b-12: pa'i rang bzhin rnams te lugs las bzlog pas so
T02D1347-2:282b-13: no // // chu srin la sogs pa 'di rnams
T02D1347-2:282b-14: kyi mtshan ma ni rdo rje la sogs pa ste
T02D1347-2:282b-15: rdo rje dang ral gri dang rin po che dang
T02D1347-2:282b-16: padma dang 'khor lo dang gri gug go //
T02D1347-2:282b-17: karka ta la sogs pa rnams kyi skyed pa'i rim pas lugs las bzlog pa rnams so //
T02D1347-2:282b-18: ka'i sde pa la sogs pa rnams ni chu srin
T02D1347-2:282b-19: la sogs pa rnams kyi ka tsa ta pa ta
T02D1347-2:282b-20: sa rnams dang karka ta la sogs pa rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:282b-21: thakna man nyang la sogs pa 'jig rten khams kyi
T02D1347-2:282b-22: le'u las gsungs pa rnams so //
T02D1347-2:282b-23: ring po thung du lhag pa'i lha zhes pa ne
T02D1347-2:282b-24: dbyangs ring pos phye ba ka yig la sogs pa'i
T02D1347-2:282b-25: gsal byed brgya brgyad cu ste de bzhin du dbyangs
T02D1347-2:282b-26: thung dus phye ba rnams so //
T02D1347-2:282b-27: da ni gza' rnams kyi skye ba'i khyim gsungs pa
T02D1347-2:282b-28: lug ces pa la sogs pa ste 'dir grangs bzhin
T02D1347-2:282b-29: du lug dang 'khrig pa dang karka ta ra ni
T02D1347-2:282b-30: ri bong can dang pa sangs dang nyi ma byung
T02D1347-2:282b-31: bar gyur to // seng ger sa skyes dang bu
T02D1347-2:282b-32: mor phur bu dang srang du skrag can dang sdig
T02D1347-2:282b-33: par gza' lag dang gzhu'i thog mar spen pa dang
T02D1347-2:282b-34: de'i mtha' mar mjug rings so //
T02D1347-2:282b-35: de bzhin du bum par ri byi ste glang du brtan pa'o //
T02D1347-2:282b-36: de ltar sngar brjod pa'i rim pas sa la sogs
T02D1347-2:282b-37: pa'i khams zhes pa rdul phra rab kyi tshogs kyi
T02D1347-2:282b-38: gtso bo'i dngos po la phal pa'i dngos po kun
T02D1347-2:282b-39: nas phan tshun sbyor ba ste kun 'byung gi chos
T02D1347-2:282b-40: kyi phyir ro // 'gro ba 'di ni sems rnams
T02D1347-2:282b-41: kyi las kyi rang bzhin du 'gyur te gang zhig
T02D1347-2:282b-42: rin chen kun gyis rab tu gang ba ni sangs
T02D1347-2:282b-43: rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o //
T02D1347-2:282b-44: da ni sems can rnams kyi las kyi mthu gsungs pa 'di lta ste /
T02D1347-2:282b-45: gang dag sa la dpag bsam shing dang ro dang
T02D1347-2:282b-46: mchog gi ro dang sman dang lha yi ro yi
T02D1347-2:282b-47: dbang po gzhan / mtha' dag nad 'phrog rdul phran
T02D1347-2:282b-48: rnams kyis rab tu skyed pa de rnams sems can
T02D1347-2:283a-1: ma yin pa'i dbang gis mi mthong ste gang zhig
T02D1347-2:283a-2: phal pa'i rtsva dang shing dang chu dang rdul dang
T02D1347-2:283a-3: rdo ba dang ni lcags rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro
T02D1347-2:283a-4: // yi dags rnams kyis chu bo la sogs pa
T02D1347-2:283a-5: rnams su chu ni me 'bar ba'i rang bzhin du
T02D1347-2:283a-6: // mthong ngo // dmyal bar song ba'i mi rnams
T02D1347-2:283a-7: kyi sdig pa'i dbang gis gcod pa dang 'bigs pa'i
T02D1347-2:283a-8: mdung la sogs par mthong ngo //
T02D1347-2:283a-9: da ni sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa gsungs pa 'di
T02D1347-2:283a-10: rnams zhes pa la sogs pa ste sems can 'di
T02D1347-2:283a-11: rnams dgrol pa'i slad du bsod nams 'byung ba'i dus
T02D1347-2:283a-12: su sras dang bcas pa rgyal ba'i bdag po zhes
T02D1347-2:283a-13: pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang bcas pa'i sangs
T02D1347-2:283a-14: rgyas bcom ldan 'das las kyi sar ni rab zhugs
T02D1347-2:283a-15: te / sems can gdul ba'i slad du mngal ni
T02D1347-2:283a-16: rab tu gzung ba mdzad cing mchog gi thugs rje
T02D1347-2:283a-17: dag gis byang chub bskyed pa mdzad nas ni //
T02D1347-2:283a-18: nyon mongs dang ni bdud rnams bcom nas sa yi
T02D1347-2:283a-19: steng gi gnas su chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor
T02D1347-2:283a-20: te // sprul pa sgyu ma mdzad nas slar yang
T02D1347-2:283a-21: bcom ldan 'das ni dag pa'i sku can de nyid
T02D1347-2:283a-22: kho na ji ltar byon pa de bzhin gshegs pa
T02D1347-2:283a-23: te // ste / de ltar sangs rgyas kyi sprul
T02D1347-2:283a-24: pa sgyu ma dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang
T02D1347-2:283a-25: bzhin ni sems can rnams kyi bsod nams kyi dbang
T02D1347-2:283a-26: dang bsod nams ma yin pa'i dbang gis rab tu
T02D1347-2:283a-27: snang bar 'gyur ro zhes pa nges pa'o //
T02D1347-2:283a-28: tshigs su bcad pa 'di nas gzhan tshigs su bcad pa bdun ni go sla'o //
T02D1347-2:283a-29: da ni ro chen po la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa bsreg bya zhes pa la sogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:283a-30: 'dir m'a kshi ka ni ro chen po dang sa'i rang bzhin te /
T02D1347-2:283a-31: dang yig gis ro chen po'o //
T02D1347-2:283a-32: dri ma med pa ni chu'i rang bzhin dang tud
T02D1347-2:283a-33: [?] tha ka ni me'i rang bzhin dang g-yo ba
T02D1347-2:283a-34: ni rlung gi rang bzhin dang ras ka ni stong
T02D1347-2:283a-35: pa'i rang bzhin dang ri bong can dang mtshal ni
T02D1347-2:283a-36: ye shes kyi khams kyi rang bzhin te ro chen
T02D1347-2:283a-37: po bdun no // de nas nye ba'i ro rnams
T02D1347-2:283a-38: te k'a kshi ni mnyam pa zhes pa ye shes

T02D1347-2:292a-27: tan no // // dbye ba bzhi'o // // na

T02D1347-2:292a-29: drug gis bsgyur pa'i drug ni sum cu rtsa drug
T02D1347-2:292a-30: 'gyur te rkang pa drug gi dbang gis bkra shis
T02D1347-2:292a-31: la sogs pa rnams kyi dbye ba'o //
T02D1347-2:292a-32: bzhi po la nyi ma zhes pa dbye ba bcu
T02D1347-2:292a-33: gnyis te lag pa dang rkang pa'i tshigs kyi dbye
T02D1347-2:292a-34: ba bcu gnyis dang phyi rol du zla ba dang
T02D1347-2:292a-35: khyim bcu gnyis kyi dbye ba las so //
T02D1347-2:292a-36: lnga po la nyi shu ste sor mo'i grangs so //
T02D1347-2:292a-37: de bzhin du sor mo'i tshigs rnams la dbye ba
T02D1347-2:292a-38: drug cu ste dbye ba 'di rnams mi rnams dang
T02D1347-2:292a-39: lha rnams dag gi mtha' dag lus la gnas pa
T02D1347-2:292a-40: ste dri ma med pa'i lus la gnas pa ni
T02D1347-2:292a-41: ma yin no zhes pa'i don to //
T02D1347-2:292a-42: thams cad bsdus pa ni bug pa drug dang zla
