T02D1347-2:292a-44: ro // de dag thams cad bsdus pa zhes pa
T02D1347-2:292a-45: de rnams bsdus pa las sum 'gyur dgu ru 'gyur
T02D1347-2:292a-46: te zhes pa nyi shu rtsa bdun no //
T02D1347-2:292a-47: slar yang zhi ba dang nus ma'i dbye ba rten
T02D1347-2:292a-48: dang brten pa'i chos kyis lnga bcu rtsa bzhi'o zhes
T02D1347-2:292b-1: rigs 'di la gang zhig srog gi rtsa la yang
T02D1347-2:292b-2: dag par rgyu ba dang gza' rnams kyi rgyu skar
T02D1347-2:292b-3: la yang dag par rgyu ba ste 'di rnams kyi
T02D1347-2:292b-4: yang dag par rgyu ba gang yin pa de ni

T02D1347-2:292b-6: kyis rnal 'byor ma'i yang dag par rgyu bar brjod
T02D1347-2:292b-7: do // de skad du rtsa ba'i mdo las bshad pa /
T02D1347-2:292b-8: gang zhig nus ma bha ga zhes bya de ni
T02D1347-2:292b-9: rnam gsum bgrod ldan yi ge gsum dang rang bzhin
T02D1347-2:292b-10: gsum // de la dpal ldan ao di y'a na
T02D1347-2:292b-11: mchog gi cha dang bcas pa dbus su gnas shing
T02D1347-2:292b-12: gsum // shin tu 'bar // de yi g-yas zur

T02D1347-2:292b-18: 'jigs dang skyed ma khyab byed ma ni drag po'i

T02D1347-2:293a-11: gnyis po ni shes rab dang thabs te /

T02D1347-2:293a-29: dge 'dun la skyabs pa ste de ltar skyabs su 'gro ba gsum mo //

T02D1347-2:293a-34: bdud bzhi ni phung po dang /

T02D1347-2:293b-27: sems dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang /

T02D1347-2:293b-37: chos thams cad bdag med pa dang /

T02D1347-2:294a-36: shes rab kyi phung po dang /
T02D1347-2:294a-37: rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
T02D1347-2:294a-38: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po'o //

T02D1347-2:294a-40: khams rnams ni sa la sogs pa rnams dang /
T02D1347-2:294a-41: dbang po rnams ni mig la sogs pa rnams dang /

T02D1347-2:294b-0: de ltar lnga ste chos kyi khams @294b dang lhan cig thams cad drug go //
T02D1347-2:294b-1: rjes su dran pa drug ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang /

T02D1347-2:294b-13: btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag go //

T02D1347-2:294b-15: mchod pa dang bshags pa dang /
T02D1347-2:294b-16: rjes su yi rang ba dang /

T02D1347-2:294b-26: yang dag pa'i dran pa dang /
T02D1347-2:294b-27: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin no //
T02D1347-2:294b-28: bsam gtan gyi rnam par thar pa brgyad ni gzugs stong par lta ba dang /
T02D1347-2:294b-29: nang gi gzugs dang phyi'i gzugs stong par lta ba ste /
T02D1347-2:294b-30: stong pa zhes pa ni rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs so //
T02D1347-2:294b-32: mi sdug par lta bas byas pa stong par lta ba dang /
T02D1347-2:294b-33: nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched stong par lta ba dang /
T02D1347-2:294b-34: rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched stong par lta ba ste /
T02D1347-2:294b-35: rnam pa thams cad pa'i gzugs la'o //
T02D1347-2:294b-36: ci yang med pa'i skye mched stong par lta ba dang /
T02D1347-2:294b-37: 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched stong par lta ba dang /
T02D1347-2:295a-1: pa stong par lta ba ste /
T02D1347-2:295a-2: stong pa nyid sgom pa la'o //

T02D1347-2:295a-14: de lta bu byung ba dang /
T02D1347-2:295a-16: shin tu rgyas pa rmad du byung ba ste chos yang dag par bsdu pa'i slad du'o //
T02D1347-2:295a-17: pha rol du phyin pa bcu la sogs pa bcu
T02D1347-2:295a-18: po rnams ni mchog tu mi 'gyur pa'i ye shes
T02D1347-2:295a-20: sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcva brgyad po rnams kyang brjod zin to //

T02D1347-2:295a-37: don to // 'di'i rjes la rtsis kyi grangs gcig
T02D1347-2:295a-38: la sogs pa la zla ba la sogs pa'i ming

T02D1347-2:295a-43: ma dang / rnal 'byor gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po

T02D1347-2:295a-45: tu mi 'gyur pa'i bde ba ni rdo rje can

T02D1347-2:295b-17: 'jig rten las 'das pa rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de /

T02D1347-2:295b-26: 'gags pa ste gang la thog mtha' dbus med ces

T02D1347-2:296a-1: zhes pa la sogs pa nas dus kyi 'khor lo
T02D1347-2:296a-2: la phyag 'tshal zhes pa'i mthar thug pa go sla'o
T02D1347-2:296a-3: // de bzhin du 'du byed gzhan de rnams zhes gsungs pa'i phyir rlung gi khams dang /
T02D1347-2:296a-4: dbang po la sogs pa rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid stong pa gnyis pas rig par bya'o //
T02D1347-2:296a-5: de nas stong pa gsum pa ni tshor ba 'gags pa ste /
T02D1347-2:296a-6: spro byed ces pa la sogs nas rnam par bcad
T02D1347-2:296a-7: pa de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'i mthar thug
T02D1347-2:296a-8: pa ste / tsher ba gzhan de ni zhes gsungs pa'i phyir me'i khams dang /
T02D1347-2:296a-9: dbang po la sogs pa rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid ni stong pa gsum pa'o //
T02D1347-2:296a-10: de nas stong pa bzhi pa ni 'du shes 'gags pa ste /
T02D1347-2:296a-11: dkar po zhes pa la sogs pa nas thig le'i
T02D1347-2:296a-12: gzugs la phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'i mthar thug pa
T02D1347-2:296a-13: ste / 'du shes gzhan de ni zhes gsungs pa'i phyir chu'i khams dang /
T02D1347-2:296a-14: dbang po la sogs pa rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid ni stong pa bzhi pa'o //
T02D1347-2:296a-15: de nas stong pa lnga pa ni gzugs 'gags pa ste /
T02D1347-2:296a-16: sems tsam zhes pa la sogs pa nas rdo rje
T02D1347-2:296a-17: sems dpa' la yang phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'i mthar
T02D1347-2:296a-18: thug pa ste / gzugs gzhan de ni zhes gsungs pa'i phyir de'i rigs can sa'i khams dang /
T02D1347-2:296a-19: dbang po la sogs pa rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid ngo //
T02D1347-2:296a-20: 'di'i rgyas pa ni dang po 'jig rten khams kyi
T02D1347-2:296a-21: le'u las brjod zin te des na 'dir ma bkrol
T02D1347-2:296a-22: lo // 'di ni stong pa chen po 'gyur med lnga'o //
T02D1347-2:296a-23: de nas thig le stong pa 'gyur med drug ces pa ni /
T02D1347-2:296a-24: 'di'i rten du gyur pa'i chos 'byung sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi mtshan nyid khams gsum dang /
T02D1347-2:296a-25: dus gsum po thams cad du 'jig pa'o //
T02D1347-2:296a-26: 'di'i 'gog pa'i phung po la sogs pa drug dang
T02D1347-2:296a-27: khams sum cu rtsa drug dang 'gyur pa'i ye shes
T02D1347-2:296a-28: sum cu rtsa bdun pa ste /
T02D1347-2:296a-29: 'di rnams sgrib pa med pa nyid ni chos kyi
T02D1347-2:296a-30: sku chos 'byung du brjod cing rdo rje bzhi ni
T02D1347-2:296a-31: 'gyur med lnga ste 'di dag gi sprul pa ni
T02D1347-2:296b-0: sprul pa'i sku rdzu @296b 'phrul sna tshogs ston par
T02D1347-2:296b-1: byed pa'o // chos ston pa bo'i sgra ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'o //
T02D1347-2:296b-2: de'i phyir gcig dang du ma dag kyang gcig cing
T02D1347-2:296b-3: mnyam dang mi mnyam pa yang mnyam pa zhes pa
T02D1347-2:296b-4: la sogs pas dbu ma ba'i grub pa'i mtha'o //
T02D1347-2:296b-5: gang zhig kun gyi rten gcig ces pa la kun ni mi 'gyur pa'i bde ba chen po'o //
T02D1347-2:296b-6: de'i rten gcig ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do //
T02D1347-2:296b-7: bha ga bzang mo zhes pa ni dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan gyi bdag nyid do //
T02D1347-2:296b-8: mchog gi bha ga ni khams gsum gyi mchog go //
T02D1347-2:296b-9: rgyu nges na khyod la 'dud de da spyi bo yis so //
T02D1347-2:296b-10: khyod la zhes pa ni khyod la 'jam dpal gyis so //
T02D1347-2:296b-11: 'dud ces pa ni phyag 'tshal bar gyur cig pa'o //
T02D1347-2:296b-12: da ni dus kyi 'khor lo'i ston pa dang yon
T02D1347-2:296b-13: tan la sogs pa ni gang zhig ces pa la
T02D1347-2:296b-15: bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dus kyi 'khor lo'i
T02D1347-2:296b-16: rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa
T02D1347-2:296b-17: stod phrag bcu gnyis pa dri ma med pa'i 'od
T02D1347-2:296b-18: las thabs sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba'i mdor bsdus chen
T02D1347-2:296b-20: ye shes kyi le'u'i rgyas 'grel rdzogs so /
T02D1347-2:296b-22: // / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni lung bstan dpal
T02D1347-2:296b-23: ldan rigs ldan rgyal po 'jam pa'i rdo rje gang
T02D1347-2:296b-24: gis ni // mchog gi thugs rjes rab mchog thub
T02D1347-2:296b-25: pa'i tshogs ni sangs rgyas lam la bkod cing shes
T02D1347-2:296b-27: byin nas dang po'i sangs rgyas las phyung rgyud ni
T02D1347-2:296b-28: mda' yi le'u dus kyi 'khor lo 'di bstan te
T02D1347-2:296b-29: // 'dir ni dpal ldan ka l'a ba ru mi
T02D1347-2:296b-30: yi bdag po grags pa'i sras po padma dkar po
T02D1347-2:296b-31: bdag / rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ni lung bstan
T02D1347-2:296b-32: rab tu dga' ba'i yid can dpal ldan grags pas
T02D1347-2:296b-33: // bskul ba yis // dpal ldan rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1347-2:296b-34: gsal rgyud kyi rgyal po la ni rdo rje'i tshig
T02D1347-2:296b-35: rnams tshol bar byed pa yi //
T02D1347-2:296b-36: rgyas 'grel byas nas phyin pa las ni bsod nams
T02D1347-2:296b-37: yang shing shin tu dkar ba gang zhig thob gyur
T02D1347-2:296b-38: pa // de yis 'jig rten mtha' dag rdo rje
T02D1347-2:296b-39: can gyi lam thob sangs rgyas rab tu thob par
T02D1347-2:297a-0: pa // shog / bsdus pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal @297a * //
T02D1347-2:297a-1: po dus kyi 'khor lo'i rgyas 'grel rtsa ba'i rgyud
T02D1347-2:297a-2: kyi rjes su 'jug pa stong phrag bcu gnyis pa
T02D1347-2:297a-3: dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba rdzogs so
T02D1347-2:297a-5: / // / kha che'i pandi ta chen po so ma n'a tha dang /
T02D1347-2:297a-6: bod kyi lo ts'a ba chen po 'bro dge slong
T02D1347-2:297a-7: shes rab grags kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
T02D1347-2:297a-8: phab pa las / dus phyis yon tan phul du
T02D1347-2:297a-9: byung ba dpag tu med pas spras pa'i bla ma
T02D1347-2:297a-10: dam pa chos kyi rgyal po'i bka' lung dang /
T02D1347-2:297a-11: dpon chen sh'akya bzang po'i gsung bzhin du mkhas pa chen po zhang ston mdo sde dpal dang /
T02D1347-2:297a-12: dus kyi 'khor lo'i tshul khong du chud pa'i dge
T02D1347-2:297a-13: slong tshul khrims dar gyis don gyi chal dpyad cing
T02D1347-2:297a-14: legs par bskul te legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis
T02D1347-2:297a-15: brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos rig pa'i lo ts'a ba
T02D1347-2:297a-17: dpal sa skya'i gtsug lag khang chen por yul dbus
T02D1347-2:297a-18: kyi rgya dpe gnyis la gtugs shing legs par bcos
T02D1347-2:297a-20: gang gi thugs dgongs rnam par dag pa yis //
T02D1347-2:297a-21: 'di la bskul zhing mthun rkyen sgrubs pa dang //
T02D1347-2:297a-22: bdag gis 'bad las bsod nams gad thob des //
T02D1347-2:297a-23: kun gyis 'di rtogs sangs rgyas sar gnas shog //
T02D1347-2:297a-24: slar yang dpal ldan bla ma dam pa chos kyi rje thams cad mkhyen pa dang /
T02D1347-2:297a-25: dpal ldan dus kyi 'khor lo pa chen po dha rma k'i rti shr'i bha dra sa /
T02D1347-2:297a-26: 'di'i don rnams legs par dgongs shing bka' yis bskul nas de dag gi gsung bzhin du //
T02D1347-2:297a-27: pandi ta chen po sthi ra ma ti'i bka' drin
T02D1347-2:297a-28: las legs par sbyar ba'i tshul rig pa lo ts'a
T02D1347-2:297a-29: ba sh'akya'i dge slong blo gros rgyal mtshan dang /
T02D1347-2:297a-31: rgyud dang 'grel pa'i rgya dpe mang po la gtugs
T02D1347-2:297a-32: nas dag pa rnams dang mthun par bsgyur cing zhus
T02D1347-2:297a-34: de ltar gsung rab rgya mtsho'i nges don stong nyid snying rje'i snying po ni //
T02D1347-2:297a-35: rnam kun mchog ldan stong pa nyid dang 'gyur med mchog gi bde chen du //
T02D1347-2:297a-36: legs ston dus kyi 'khor lor 'bad pa'i dge ba gad nges 'gro ba kun //
